Doba yen yedag len gedig lusud leigdoumesa len meroho dag Allah misen meren sogougb naugb yen yaimo len aud areg len larougb yen an gin toua terimda . Dobnaro . Len laugwan lemedag Allah misen teiteiyero . Doba len ledag merna mog dous .
48004009	Doba iteitogin , kaba , yen yecinaga areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes augwan dag misen namcirohob . Era eigouhw edreg , kaba , dan denara dou yen dag Allah enin ecinaga yen yaugwan dag misen touohob . Dangga dagiro , naugwe hang , yen youwan yeineg dau en naugb yen yedag sogougb dou merna mog mog gedig len loiharaga lusud se cinogo gin deita ? Anai len , kaba , len lemedag Allah misenero , doba len ledag merna dous . Hang meren goubesa emedeinyum naugb sug len lemeic ara ara dou yen touwero . Doba len lomomtom namcir .
48004010	Dan dahau dag dan deic dan indug erij icira yen , doba dag augwougb dousei ? Anai yen yeigdoumesa lona gouji , dara igda loba , dara cumougt , dara arisogomoc augwan an meren lona naugb yen yesijaresa dara yen yougwan ared debin augwan gini ucugb deitohob .
48004011	
48004012	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , dan desulou yen dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba yen yemedag sogougb naugb yen yaimo merna mog mog dara Musa men gomnomna gin deitero . Doba yen yedag dan naugb yen yarges dau augwan gin namcir , aninim dag dan dedag sud hom dau yeng yugmahara gin touohob . Anai dan demaimo Musa men gomnomna dag nosa toua deitero , doba dan darges dau gin toua terimdohob .
48004013	Dan dacgeij yen dag gini , anai yen yemeic gecgu an dan mougwa hom touebma . Doba yen meigdoc eigouhw an dan terimdohob . Anai yen yecinaga dag aimougtut , kaba , dan demesedeb naugb dan desai Krisdus moro dou yenero . Doba sug dan dedebeij se meijen hancob ingga , kaba , areba dan medam gougwa . Hang emeic cumougt dou dan naugb dan demesai Krisdus moro sug aimougtut ingga dou yen toua .
48004014	Dangga hang , sug areba dan dag gin , kaba , yen yemeigdorus meimeij dara yen yemesdigeij dan touwero . Doba yen yeic meijus naugb yen yagauwesa dan terimda . Hanoba yen yebin dan , aninim dag sug Allah men malaikad , era Yesus Krisdus enin ladebeij yen toua . Anai yen meigdoc agahugouhw medam naugb dan sug dan desai Krisdus moro dou yenohob .
48004015	Doba iteitogin , kaba , meijen gagahugouhw gini inggiro deitohoba ? Era ediyebeiya dau yendohobei ? Anai dan decinaga dag sug nosa , kaba , yen yemeija meigdocesa sug yen yeihwa yen meijiresi dauwero . Doba emedag dan demacgeij dau yen , kaba , yen yaimo dan indir an . Hanoba yen yeic dou dan toua .
48004016	Dangga dagiro , naugwe hang , yen yowun dan indoho aninim dag meijen moca ? Anai dan desai areg se geica dou yen danggangei ? Era dagiro ?
48004017	Doba yen yesa decicijahabi , anai dan decinaga dau leng Krisden dau leng Yahudi gin , kaba , dag len leic meruwemougb esesa naugb len lenara laineg yen meigdoc mes terimda . Doba meren gauwamara an yen , kaba , ecgu namcir . Anai len louwan lasid yen dau emen , dauntoba yen yemaimo emen aud areg se geica gin touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa desij len se Musa men gomnomna dous .
48004018	Doba areg dan den dou yen eisaugb genara gaineg gin , kaba , dag ecgu namcir inggei ? Naro . Anai sug sud hom en mou en dou eigouhw an lusud , kaba , ara ingma emeb dougwo gin touwero . Doba en enara baineg len merdoc mes aud gin terimda . Doba areg esloulougb , kaba , aud areg geigouhw dous . Naro , kab , naro . Dangga sug dan indugwengga an yen , era dan indugwero toua , doba sug lusud meru en dou eigouhw an yen , hanoba len lenara laineg yen meigdoc mes , kaba , eic gerleij dou yen naugb yen yaimo len terimda .
48004019	Dan indihirija , dan indoc erij an yen deit , aninim dag gida sug en ouwadan meh , kaba , en menuhwa mogo erij an en toua . Dara dan demarges dau gin touwero . Doba dan indoc erij an yen terimda Krisdus men maireseb augwan ens ainyes se meijen geicara augwan ucugb deitahabi . Anai yen yobsara dau gin namcirohob .
48004020	Dangga hang , dan indoc esesa an yen terimda naugb dan douwan dedeiya yen sungga iteitogin toua . Dauntoba dan demenara se goubesa dou yen dag nosa deitero . Doba dan denara dara garjaga dou yen dous , kaba , gini eic dag yen yecicugb aud Krisdus enggei ? Era naroei ? Anai dan demeb ara naugb yen deita ?
48004021	Sug yen meigdoc erleij naugb yen youwan yaimo Musa men gomnomna naugb sug Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou yen ucugb , kaba , dagiro , naugwe hang , yen yemouman dau areg Musa men gomnomna ens dou yen ginero ? Yen yauni gin ucucugb dou danahabi .
48004022	Anai men gomnomna gin , kaba , enara , endagai : Abraham , kaba , en meisi lahwai . Laingma , kaba , dau mesouwa men sogougb . Doba laingma , kaba , dau mesouwa sud misen .
48004023	Dara gida gedag sogougb gin , kaba , en aimo dau areg lusud misen merdoc etrij icirim an dous . Hang en emouwadan meh gini . Doba gida gedig sud misen en meh gin , kaba , emen dau lusud misenero . Doba aimo dau areg Allah enin eng os dou en sug nosohob . Hang en emouwadan en toua .
48004024	Dangga lagida lahwai gin , kaba , aimeh an dag Allah men gos dou hwai geb naugb mamanohob . Gida gedig en mehir dag sogougb gin , kaba , en moho Hagar . Hang eni aimeh an dag Allah men gos dou mohon gedig en eic dou Musa se menmod Torsina sug nosohob . Anai gareg en aimo Allah men gos dou mohon gin , kaba , en toua dag sogougb . Aninim dag Hagar en medebeitor len laugwan , kaba , len ledag sogougb namcir . Anai Hagar enin toua dag sogougb an len teiteiyohob .
48004025	Sug Hagar eni aimeh an menmod Torsina geb se leng Arabia meren hancob dag ginohob , kaba , en toua dag aimeh an Yerusalem geb se cinogo gini an men lusud dau leng Yahudi len laugwan toua . Anai len laugwan gin , kaba , len laimo Allah men gomnomna geic dou Musa se menmod Torsina . Hang len ledag sogougb , anai len ledag Hagar medebeitor touohob .
48004026	Doba leng leinesa Yerusalem geb se bogo , kaba , len lemedag sogougb dou Musa men gomnomna toua deitero . Doba len larges dau gin namcirohob . Hang Hagar , kaba , en emedag mem naugb maman toua deitero . Doba Sarai enin eng edag mem naugb maman , anai en aimeh an Yerusalem geb se bogo gedag mem naugb mamanohob .
48004027	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg maman Adehsud en ens deb se Surad Yesaya deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Bang bedebdena naugb ban bemeic abihero , kaba , ban abdoc edeigouhw deit . Era ban gedig ban abinuhwa emerij an ban abih ingmebma , kaba , ban bagahugouhw namcir . Anai ban gedig ban absuwa arges ban debohob , kaba , cum , ban abihir leinyana medam edreg dau gida hom gedig mesuwa eigtou desij en terimda .
48004028	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , yen yemedag Allah mogwihi mogo dau sug yen yaimo Musa men gomnomna ginero . Doba yen yedag en mehir dau areg en os dou yen ogdoc Krisdus gin dous . Aninim dag Sarai en emouwadan Isag dau areg lusud louwan touwero . Doba en ouwadan meisi gini , aimo dau areg Allah enin os dou en dous .
48004029	Dangga se lona ingga , kaba , Hagar meisi Ismael eic gecgu an Sarai meisi Isag gin toua . Anai Ismael gin , kaba , mem ouwadan en , aimo dau areg lusud misen merdoc icirim an en . Doba Isag , kaba , en ouwaden dau mem , aimo dau areg Mena Gogoufu enin ouwan dous . Hang iteitogin , kaba , leng Yahudi leic mog erij dou yen toua . Anai len , kaba , len ledag Hagar medebeitor naugb len laimo Musa men gomnomna gin terimdaba . Doba naugb yen , kaba , yen yarges dau gomnomna gin namcir . Anai yen meigdoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou yen ogdoc Krisdus ginohob .
48004030	Doba gida gedag sogougb an en meh , kaba , Surad Injil Meb Mohon enara dagiro eisaugb lana ? En enara dag gini , endagai : Ban berba gida sogougb gin an en meh namcirda . Anai sogougb meisi gin , kaba , en emesma mena mecigbougb aninim dara gida gedig sud misen en meh touwero . Doba en edag sogougb terimda .
48004031	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij dara dan indamouwerij , maman gedig maman madag Krisdenohob , kaba , maman mamedag gida sogougb gini en mehir maman toua deitero . Doba maman madag gida gedig sud misen en mehir maman dous .
48005001	Sug Krisdus esga maman dau Musa men gomnomna ginohob , kaba , yen yemamsoho gembala areibahau naugb len lagaigeij yen . Hanoba len lahwan yen naugb yen yedag Musa men gomnomna men sogougb toua deitero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij dougwo len namcir . Anai sug Krisdus esga maman dag ginohob , kaba , en emouwan naugb maman mamedag sogougb deitero . Doba en ouwan naugb maman madag lusud misen terimda .
48005002	Dangga yen yemousa deisa gembala areibahau naugb len lemec yen meijus dau yen touwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij dau gin namcir . Anai sug yen yamsoho len an gin , kaba , Krisdus men geicara taiba sogo salib emeb naugb yen toua deitero . Doba augwan ediyebeiya dau yen deitohob . Yen youman dan indir an areg dan den dou yen gini deigeigouhw namcir . Anai dang , Paulus , eng desulou yen an gini .
48005003	Dan den dougwo yen mougwa hom deit , dendagai : Gareg dau yen en amsoho len gus naugb len lec en mos dau , kaba , esloulougb medam naugb en emedreg dau Musa men gomnomna hom touwero . Doba en aimo augwan aududi terimda . Naro , kaba , sesar men gogom eb naugb en toua deitohob .
48005004	Dangga gareg dau yen en aimo Musa men gomnomna gin ucugb , hanoba en ouwan Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou en ogdoc men geicara gin toua , kaba , en ogod ameiji dougwo Krisdus enohob . Hang Allah medoc an en emoiharaga en toua deitero , doba en edreg dau gin namcirohob .
48005005	Doba emen , kaba , emen emdoc ebdebin an Krisdus men geicara naugb emen gin dous . Dangga hang , emen emod emina debsa Allah naugb en eic gesgigouhwesa dou emen ogdoc sug emen emaimo Musa men gomnomna ginero . Doba emen emod emina debsa en dag en eic gesgigouhwesa dou emen ogdoc Krisdus men geicara gin dous . Hang emen emobsara dau gin touwero . Doba ogdoc Mena Gogoufu men goubesa , kaba , emen emaiyan emdocesem naugb emen emeigtou emateteij naugb gin toua terimda .
48005006	Anai sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus Yesus ginohob , kaba , emesloulougb naugb sug maman mac mamus dau , era sug maman mamec mamus daubuma . Doba aremer hom esloulougb namcir , kaba , dag maman mamdoc ebdebin an Krisdus hom gin dous . Hanoba arautut maman naugb sug maman mamdoc gororougwim toua terimda .
48005007	Sug nosa , kaba , yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus eiseisaugb namcirohob . Dangga gareg en agaresa yen meigdoc mes , hang yen yobsara dau mer misen eisaugb Krisdus naugb yen yemaimo gin toua deitero ?
48005008	Anai gini dau Allah gedig en eija yen aud en sug nosa ginero , doba dau sud hom gus dous .
48005009	Dara sud hom dous eng edeinyum naugb sug en ahwan lusud leinyana dau ucina se geica gin toua . Anai yen yecinaga dau aremeijouhw dag augwu mei getaha hom eb se iyohob , kaba , cum , esij geigouhw augwan betaha namcir toua .
48005010	Doba dan , kaba , dan decinaga yen yaugwan dag misenohob . Dangga hang , dan dod indina debsa yen dag yen yemobsara aud sud hom areg en arougb yen naugb yen yec meijus dau gin touwero . Doba yen yobsara aud dan se aremer hom gin dous . Anai maman maugwan madag hom se maman Adehsud ginohob . Dara sud hom areg en enara baic yen meigdoc mes dau gin , kaba , dan decinaga dag Allah emeic gogom medam dou en toues .
48005011	Dara yen yauweila dau leng Krisden dau leng Yahudi meren geicara dou dan toua . Anai len gin , kaba , len lerei dou lusud , lendagai : Paulus , kaba , en emebedbed dou lusud dag len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus toua dousero . Doba en arougb len dag len lec merus dau . Hanoba len laimo Musa men gomnomna aud gousanara laos dara ginahabi , kaba , emedeinyum naugb sug Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou len ucugb toua . Naro , kab , naro . Doba dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug dan debedbed dou lusud dag gin , kaba , dagiro , naugwe hang , leng Yahudi gini len leic gogom dou dan terimda ? Naro , len lemeic gogom dou dan icira ginero . Anai indan gebedbed gin , kaba , eic len merdoc esgiraha an gin namcirohob . Dobnaro . Dan debedbed dou lusud dag len lemec merus dauwero . Doba len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dous , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou len ucugwohob . Hang leng Yahudi gini len lemeic mog erij dou dan toua terimda . Anai len merdoc esrougb an indan gebedbed gin namcir .
48005012	Dangga leng lenara lai yen meigdoc mes dag gin terimda . Hanoba eic dag yen meigdoc eijesa dou yen touohob , kaba , eigouhw naugb len lemec merus dau dousero , doba len letin lenin namcir toua .
48005013	Doba dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , yen , kaba , yen yemedag sogougb naugb Musa men gomnomna gin deitero . Doba sug Allah eija yen sug nosa naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus , kaba , en esga yen dau gin toua namcirohob . Doba deciciji . Sug gomnomna hom emeb naugb yen dag gin deiterohob , kaba , yen yemeic gini naugb yen yemaiyeiyo dougwo areg yen meigdoc etrij icira gin touwero . Doba yen yeic gini naugb yen yeicara yaimo anim dareg yen meigdoc gororougwim dous .
48005014	Anai Allah men gomnomna augwan , kaba , eb debin gomnomna hom dag gini : Yen meigdoc gororougwim , aninim dag yen meigdoc gororougb yenin toua .
48005015	Doba sug yenin yaum , era yetim terimda , kaba , decicijahabi . Anai cum , kaba , yen yaugwan yediyebeiya dau cinogo gin dangga .
48005016	Dangga areg dan den dou yen gin , kaba , men meijouhw dag gini : Eigouhw naugb yen yaimo Mena Gogoufu en mer an areg en arautut yen aud gin dous . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yemaimo areg yen meigdoc etrij icira gin toua deitero , doba yen yarges dau namcir .
48005017	Anai areg yen meigdoc etrij icira gin , kaba , susugb dau areg Mena Gogoufu ouwan . Dangga toua , areg Mena Gogoufu arautut yen aud gin , kaba , susugb dau areg yen meigdoc etrij icira arautut yen aud gin toua namcir . Hang yen youwan yaimo ara geigouhw toua dagiro ? Anai lan labemocedoum se yen meigdoc mes terimda .
48005018	Doba sug Mena Gogoufu en edag meijen mougt naugb yen yaimo areg en arautut yen aud gin dous , kaba , Musa men gomnomna emedag mougt , hang emeic gogom dou yen toua deitero . Doba yen yarges dau namcirohob .
48005019	Dara leng laimo areg len merdoc etrij icira gin , kaba , maman macinaga dau meren geicara augwan dag misen touohob . Anai len , kaba , meren geicara dag mihi meren geicara naugb len lohw len meraga doum , dara len laimo areg gogor anim toua terimda .
48005020	Dara len lesijaresa seiseij . Dara len meru ouforoho an ara moung mohu naugb len lagaresa lusud merdoc mes . Dara len lemarges dau sug len lebemocedoum touwero . Doba len lenara ledregim , dara laisedim . Dara len merdoc mog mog anim , dara len merdoc etrij icira len gus meren aremougb toua terimda . Hang len lemauwam an len gus meren aremer naugb len lemousa len touwero . Doba len lauwam an lenin dous . Dangga sug lusud lemobsara aud lenero , kaba , len lenara lakeba lusud naugb len largesim namcir toua .
48005021	Dara len lehigdud len gus an meren aremougb . Dara len leg ahwei mohu ed len lomom . Hanoba len logo ara gaihim , dara areg gecgu gus gus dag gin toua terimda . Dara leng leicara dag gin , kaba , len lemeinesa Allah men uro mes naugb en oiharaga len touwero . Doba len leigtou dig medigo namcir dous . Dan desulou yen an aremer gini sug nosohob , hanoba dan demesulou yen ucan deit toua .
48005022	Doba leng laimo Mena Gogoufu aud areg en arautut len aud ginohob , kaba , len lemesenagan lusud toua deitero . Doba len merdoc gororougwim . Dara len merdoc agahugouhw anim . Dara len laigdougwom dara leic gesgigouhwesem toua terimda . Dangga hang , len merdoc mog mog naugb len lemeic gogom dou len gus dedemeda touwero . Doba len leigtou lateteij an meren geicara . Hanoba len merdoc an len dara len merdoc edag beim anim toua . Dara len lemaimo ucina agabgebi an lusud touwero . Doba se meren geicara augwan , kaba , len merdoc dag hom an len toua namcir .
48005023	Dara len lemenara gouji dou lusudero . Doba len lenara dara mer arjaga dou len dous . Dara len lemobsara aud areg len merdoc etrij icira dedemeda touwero . Doba len lebehnehino lenin merdoc mes dougwo augwan gin terimda . Dara meren geicara gin , kaba , gomnomna hom ingma emen dougwo len an gin touwero , doba ousa deisa len an gin dous .
48005024	Dangga hang , eigouhw naugb maman mameimiman mamanin an maman geicara deseino len gus . Dara maman mameic gesrougb doum . Dara maman mamehigdudim an aremougb touwero . Doba sug Mena Gogoufu eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou maman dag ginohob , kaba , en edag mougt naugb maman maimo en aud areg en arougb maman an gin dous . Anai sud hom areg en edag Krisdus Yesus men logodehohob , kaba , en emaimo areg en medoc etrij icira , dara areg edarougb en gin toua deitero . Doba en ogod se enin medoc mes dag en omom dau gin namcirohob .
48005025	
48005026	
48006001	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug sud hom dau yen en eitig dau ucina misen aud sesarohob , kaba , yen gedig yen yaimo Mena Gogoufu en merohob , kaba , yen yemenara se meijir gouji dou en touwero . Doba yen yahwan en aud ucina misen gin ucugb dara yen meigdoc arjaga an en namcir . Hanoba yen toua yebehnehino dougwo yenin meigdoc mes . Dauntoba yen meigdoc emetrij naugb yen yobsara se sesar gin touwero , doba yen yaimo areg se geica terimda .
48006002	Dara yen yemamsoho yen meisir gus an meren gogom geb debin len touwero , doba yen meigdoc anim naugb yen yeigdoumesa gogom daum ucucugb toua . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gini , kaba , yen yaimo areg asesa Krisdus enin medoc mes augwan namcirohob .
48006003	Dara yen meigdoc emagas an augwan touwero . Anai sug sud hom en oudesa endag en moho eb taiba dau augwanohob , doba men geicara emedeinyum naugb ginero , kaba , gini aninim dag en augwohosa enin dous .
48006004	Hang maman mameic len gus meren geicara mamaos dara mamanin maman geicara touwero . Doba astesda sud hom dau maman , kaba , en ogmac enin medoc mes an men geicara dous . Anai sug gogom eb debin maman , kaba , maman mameigdoumesa daumero . Doba sud hom yom enin esemougwisa enin mos an gin toua . Dangga sug sud hom enin men geicara augwan eigouhwohob , kaba , en emeic men geicara gini naugb en emeiya dau len gus meren geicara touwero . Doba en eigdoumesa enin moho an men geicara gin dous .
48006005	
48006006	Gareg en ebedbed Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen , kaba , yen yemehig debin meijen aremougb dau en touwero . Doba yen yesi areg geigouhw ingma dau gin dou en toua .
48006007	Dara se meijen geicara augwan gin , kaba , yen yemauwam an didi dag yen meiju ouforoho edeinyum naugb sug yen yarerei Allah en mairesi touwero . Doba yen yarges dau sug yen yeicara dag gin namcir . Anai areg yen yeba meij gin , kaba , en emauni gini ucugb dou yen toues .
48006008	Dangga hang , gareg en aimo areg en medoc etrij icira gin terimda , kaba , en edec mera gecgu naugb enin se dum smougb dous . Doba gareg en aimo Mena Gogoufu mer aud areg geigouhw , kaba , en edesma mera maireseb menau geb huhugb dau Mena Gogoufu ingga toua .
48006009	Dara yen yemeisan gurog dau areg geigouhw gin touwero , doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa se gin terimda . Anai sug yen yemarges dau ginero , doba yen yes agadgeij namcir , kaba , mera areg Allah esedeb naugb yenohob , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba edebeij lona sug Allah esedeb naugb ginohob , kaba , yen yedec mera dau en toua .
48006010	Dangga sug cumougt mougb gebaba gin , kaba , maman maicara geigouhw an lusud laugwan toua terimda . Doba areg gesloulougb aimougtut , kaba , dag maman maic geigouhw an maman mamsir se Krisdus nosahabi .
48006011	Dara yen yeiya dau sug dan dog surad sug ouwedoc naugb yen gin , kaba , dag dan dog ai danin insira dara meb gouji dou yen toua . Dauntoba dan desulou yen eisaugb leng Krisden dau leng Yahudi gedig len leigtou desij yen sungga mougwa hom ucan deit .
48006012	Anai len gin , kaba , len lahau dau sug len lebedbed Krisdus omom taiba sogo salib gin dou lusud dous , kaba , dag cum , kaba , leng Yahudi gus leic mog erij dou len icira gin toua . Hang len lagodgod yen naugb yen yec meijus dau dara yen yaimo Musa men gomnomna aud gousanara gin toua . Dauntoba sug leng Yahudi gus len leiya dau gin , kaba , len lemeic gogom dou lenero , doba len merdoc esgiraha an len namcir . Dangga hang , areg len lagodgod yen an gin , kaba , dougwo sug leng Yahudi gus len lemeic mog erij dou lenero gin dous .
48006013	Dobnaro . Anai leng laimo ucina naugb len lec merus dau dag gini terimda , kaba , ousa len naugb len laimo Musa men gomnomna augwan namcirohobei ? Naro , augwan gini emousa len naugb ginero . Anai len ledis gomnomna gin ucucugb terimda touohob . Dangga hang , areg len lagodgod yen an gin , kaba , naugb len laigdoumesa lenin meroho , dauntoba leng Yahudi gus leimiman len an gini dous .
48006014	Doba naugb dan , kaba , dan deigdoumesa danin indoho an maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus sug en omom taiba sogo salib naugb maman sesar gin dous . Areg gus , kaba , dan demeigdoumesa dan indoho an touwero . Anai sug dan domom dara Yesus se sogo salibohob , kaba , dan domom dau areg gus augwan toua . Hang areg geb se cinogo gin toua len lomom dau dan namcir .
48006015	Sug dan domom dau augwan dag ginohob , kaba , dagiro , naugwe hang , dan demeigdoumesa dan indoho an areg geb se cinogo gin ucugb deita ? Anai deseino Allah , kaba , sug sud hom ec mos dau era en emec mos dauwero toua . Doba inggaida . Esloulougb , kaba , dag maireseb menau geb huhugb eb naugb en dous .
48006016	Dangga gareg en os debin areg dan dens dou yen gin terimda , kaba , dan dacgeij dau Allah naugb en eseyeiyo en dara eic gesgigouhwesa dou en dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua namcir . Hanoba en medoc eineg an en toua terimda . Anai len laugwan gin , kaba , ledag Allah men meijouhuda leng Israel dag misenohob .
48006017	Dara sug ouwedoc gin , kaba , dan douwan den dougwo yen , dauntoba yen yemeic momogo dou dan deitlo . Anai dan dedag Krisdus men sogougb naugb dan desai en moro dou lusud , kaba , dan deic indiswes aigteim icira gin touohob .
48006018	Dan dacgeij maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus eic geigouhw dou dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , yen yaugwan terimda . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
49001001	Surad gini dau dang , Paulus , dou Allah men lusud se cinogo Epesus yen yaugwan . Anai Allah enin eng ouci dan . Hanoba en eigdoumesa dan indoho naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus Yesus dou lusud laugwan toua , aimo dau areg enin eng ogod deb deinaugb dan sug nosohob . Dan dog surad gin dou yen , anai sug yen yedag hom dara Krisdusohob , kaba , yen yemobsara dau en touwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij namcir naugb yen yeicara yaimo en aud areg en arougb yen an gin toua terimda .
49001002	Hang dan demacgeij maman Mamina Allah dara maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus naugb lan mardoc eigouhw an yen . Dara lan laseyeiyo dara laic gesgigouhwesa dou yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua namcir .
49001003	Eigouhw naugb maman maugwan magahugouhw an dara man sijo dou maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus en Mena Allah gini esesa terimda . Anai sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , en eic areg geigouhw geb se bogo augwan ogdoc Mena Gogoufu dou maman toua .
49001004	Allah eicara dangga an maman , anai sug en emahasesei cinogo augwanbuma , kaba , en ouci maman debinim dag enin men lusud . Dauntoba sug maman mamdoc dag hom dara Krisdusohob , kaba , areg gogor emeb se maman toua deitero . Doba maman madag ecabeci dara edag beim deseino en dous .
49001005	Sug Allah medoc gororougb maman dag ginohob , kaba , en esedeb maman dau sug acgunog naugb en eigdoumesa maman dag en mogwihi mogo maman ogdoc Krisdus men geicara taiba sogo salib , aimo dau areg en medoc esgiraha an gin toua .
49001006	Dangga hang , sug Allah en medoc eigouhw an maman medam gougwa dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamarges dau sug maman maigdoumesa en moho touwero . Doba maman magahugouhw an areg en eic dou maman ogdoc en Meisi gin besesa terimda . Anai en emacgeij aregoufu naugb areg graga dau mamanero . Doba sug maman mamdoc dag hom dara en Meisi ginohob , kaba , en eic augwan dag mogud dou maman ogdoc en Meisi gedig en medoc gororougb en gin toua .
49001007	Hang sesar men gogom augwan emeb naugb maman toua deitero . Doba sug maman madag hom dara en Meisi dag ginohob , kaba , en medoc eigouhw an maman eiseisaugb terimda naugb en aigdougwo maman sesar augwan dau maman toua . Anai Krisdus eic enin mogwihi ancoho aga maman dou Allah naugb maman sesar augwanohob .
49001008	
49001009	Hanoba en ens dau areg en esedeb naugb maman se lona daiyamo gacin ogdoc Krisdus augwan asesa dou maman toua . Anai en emens dau augwan gini dou sud hom ingma sug nosa touebma . Doba en ecgoneh augwan dau len namcir . Dangga hang , sud hom ingma , kaba , en emens ucina dou en naugb gini touwero . Doba en aimo augwan gini dau enin medoc mes an gin dous , aimo dau areg en medoc esgiraha an gin toua . Anai en mou ouforoho dara auti naugb augwanohob .
49001010	Dara areg en esedeb naugb lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , augwan dag gini : Sug lona edagasohob , kaba , en ouci areg en ahasesei dara areg en esinsin se bogo dara cinogo augwan debinim . Hanoba en eigdoumesa Krisdus en edag mougt mera medam naugb augwan gin toua . Anai gini aimo dau areg en ogod deb deinaugb en sug nosohob .
49001011	Sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , Allah ouci maman dau sug acgunog . Hanoba en esedeb maman naugb sug maman madag enin men lusud , aimo dau areg enin eng ogod an gin toua . Anai sud hom ingma , kaba , en emens ucina naugb ara ara hom dou enero . Doba areg en ouci deb dara areg en esedeb naugb sug en aimo , kaba , en aimo augwan gini dau enin medoc mes dous .
49001012	Dangga hang , eigouhw naugb mamang Krisden maman maugwan maigdoumesa Allah en moho agas medam . Dara maman magahugouhw an men geicara geigouhw gini beiseisaugb beb huhugb namcir toua . Anai maman , kaba , maman maod mamina debsa en an Krisdus dag en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom dau lusud gus laugwan sug aimougtut ginohob .
49001013	Maman maugwan maicara dag gini , anai yeng yugmahara , kaba , yen yedag Allah men lusud touohob . Anai sug lusud lesai en mer geica dou yen sug nosa , kaba , yen yemohoiya len merir gin touwero . Doba sug yen youman Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin , kaba , yen meigdoc ebdebin an en dag misen toua namcir . Hang Allah esa Mena Gogoufu bansins se yen meigdoc mes . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dag en moho aiga yen toua , aimo dau areg en os dou yen sug nosa . Anai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin , kaba , ahwan yen aud en . Hanoba en eigdoc yen dau sesar men gogom augwan aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touohob .
49001014	Sug Mena Gogoufu einesa maman mamdoc mes dag ginohob , kaba , maman macinaga dag areg Allah os dou men lusud maman , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau maman touwero , doba eb naugb maman toua beb huhugb namcir . Anai en , kaba , en edag ansins naugb ginohob . Hanoba maman mamdoc eica dag maman mamedag sesar men sogougb toua deitero . Doba sug maman madag men lusud ginohob , kaba , en eigdoc maman dau sesar men goubesa augwan toua . Dangga hang , eigouhw naugb maman maigdoumesa en moho agas medam . Dara maman magahugouhw an men geicara gin toua eiseisaugb terimda . Anai men geicara augwan gin , kaba , eigeigouhw namcirohob .
49001015	Sug Allah eic areg graga augwan dou yen touohob , kaba , dan demarges dau sug dan den sijo dou en naugb yen touwero . Doba astesda sug dan docuncum dou en , kaba , dan deicara dangga besesa terimda . Anai dan douman dau sug len lesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb maman Adehsud Yesus dou yen sug nosa , kaba , dag yen yemohoiya len merir anero , doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en . Dara dan douman dag yen yemarges dau sug yen meigdoc gororougb Allah men lusud gin touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo dag gin an len esesa terimda touohob .
49001016	
49001017	Dangga hang , dan dacgeij maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus men Allah naugb en esa Mena Gogoufu dou yen . Dauntoba en ens dau areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes . Dara en eic mou ouforoho dou yen naugb yen yecinaga areg geb se Allah enin medoc mes gini meijouhw augwan asesa toua . Anai Allah gin , kaba , en edag maman Mamina gedig en eigtou se gogouf cucugb namcirohob .
49001018	Dara dan dacgeij en naugb en esa men mouf se yen meigdoc mes . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dag areg yen yod meijina debsa en anohob , kaba , meijouhw augwan asesa toua . Anai en ouci yen debinim naugb ginohob . Hanoba dan dacgeij en naugb en ens dau areg en os dou men lusud mamanohob augwan asesa dou yen . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dag misen toua . Anai areg en esedeb naugb maman gin , kaba , einyana dag mouf esisilo dara mera eisaugb namcir . Dara sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , dan dacgeij Allah naugb en ens dau men mobisamougb geb se maman mamdoc mes augwan asesa dou yen , dauntoba yen yecinaga dag misen toua .
49001019	
49001020	Anai men mobisamougb geb se maman mamdoc mes gin , kaba , aninim dag men mobisamougb gedag ganusbus gedig en eic baigdoumesa Krisdus dau gomom sug nosa touohob . Hanoba en eigdoumesa en dig bogo naugb en eigtou desij en se men maija moc dig en mesira misen , dauntoba en edag mougt mera medam dara en toua namcir .
49001021	Dangga hang , en edag mougt mera medam naugb malaikadir dara merna mog mog an meren mougt mera medam laugwan . Dara en moho agas edreg dau leng meroho agas iteitogini se cinogo gini dara leng meroho agas se lona daiyamo gacin len laugwan toua namcirohob .
49001022	Anai areg Allah en ahasesei dara areg en esinsin se bogo dara cinogo ginohob , kaba , en ogugwo augwan gini se Krisdus en mesira . Dauntoba en edag mougt mera medam naugb augwan beb huhugb namcir . Hanoba en eigdoumesa en edag maman mougt mera medam gin toua . Dauntoba en emeigtou dou eninero , doba maman maigtou desijim . Anai maman madag men maga gini , hang emeic dag en maga omnen an maman . Aninim dag areg en ahasesei dara esinsinohob , kaba , lemeigtou dou lenin touwero . Doba en eigtou desij len laugwan toua terimda .
49001023	
49002001	Sug nosa , kaba , yen yaimo lusud gedig Bilis oiharaga len se cinogo gin aud sesar dara meren geicara gecgu gin toua namcir . Dara yen yesogwa deisa merna mog mog meren mougt mera medam en mohotimei mohw an men geicara gecgu toua terimda . Anai en edag leng lohoiya Allah en mer gini len laugwan meren mougt mera medam touohob . Dangga hang , se lona ingga , kaba , yen meijina dag agau naugb yen yaimo areg Mena Gogoufu arautut yen aud gin touwero . Doba yen yedag yomom dau gin namcir , anai yen yaiga Allah men hancob dara yen yebesesar an en toua terimdohob .
49002002	
49002003	Dara yeng Krisden dau yeng yugmahara , kaba , yen yemeicara dangga sug nosa dousero . Doba emeng Krisden dau emeng Yahudi , kaba , emen emaugwan toua emaimo leng lohoiya Allah en mer gini aud meren geicara gecgu gini . Anai emen toua emaimo areg emen emdoc etrij icira gin toua terimdohob . Hang emen ememebehnehino emenin emaga dara emen gauwamara dougwo areg gecgu touwero . Doba emen emaimo emen emaga dara emen gauwamara aud areg len larautut emen aud gin dous . Dangga sug maman maimo leng lohoiya Allah en mer gini len laugwan aud areg gecgu dag gin terimda , kaba , en medoc esrougb an maman dau acgunog , aninim dag en medoc esrougb an len gus laugwan dau acgunog touohob .
49002004	Doba Allah medoc eineg an maman medam gougwa . Dara en medoc gororougb maman beiseisaugb terimda toua namcirohob .
49002005	Dangga hang , en emamsoho maman deb touwero . Doba en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb . Aninim dag en eigdoumesa Krisdus dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb sug nosa touohob . Anai sug nosa , kaba , maman mamaimo areg Mena Gogoufu arougb maman aud touwero . Doba maman mahoiya en mer terimda . Hang eic dag maman mamom dau en ogdoc maman sesar gin toua namcirohob .
49002006	Doba sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa maman dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb . Dauntoba se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , maman maigtou desij Krisdus se bogo dag mougt mera medam naugb maman masedougwo lusud dara malaikad len laugwan toua namcir . Anai sug Krisdus en omom sug nosa , kaba , en emomom terimdero . Doba Allah eigdoumesa en dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb ginohob .
49002007	Allah eicara dag gini dou maman dauntoba sug lusud dara malaikad len leiya dag en medoc gororougb maman beiseisaugb bedreg dag ginohob , kaba , len lecinaga beb huhugb terimda dag en medoc gini . Doba edreg dau areg len lecic augwan toua namcirohob . Dara len lecinaga dag en medoc gororougb maman beiseisaugb gin , kaba , dag augwougb touwero . Doba en eicara dangga dou maman , aimo dau sug maman mamdoc dag hom dara Krisdus Yesus ginohob .
49002008	Anai Allah emeigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb ogdoc mamanin maman geicara touwero . Doba en eigdoc maman dau augwan gini dau sug enin medoc gororougb maman dous . Hang maireseb menau geb huhugb gin , kaba , emeb naugb maman ogdoc sug maman maic mamuwemougb esesa se ara ara gin touwero . Doba Allah eic augwan gini dag mogud dou maman , anai maman mamdoc dag hom dara Krisdusohob .
49002009	Allah eicara dag gini , dauntoba sud hom ingma , kaba , en emeimiman enin moho an maireseb menau geb huhugb gini ogdoc men geicara deseino Allah touwero . Doba len laugwan larges dau namcir .
49002010	Anai maman mamesinsin mamanin mamdoc mes dara maman mamu menenau ogdoc maman geicara ginero . Doba sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus Yesus dag ginohob , kaba , Allah enin eng esinsin maman mamdoc dara maman mamu menau dou maman dous . Dauntoba maman mamaimo areg mohon toua deitero . Doba maman maimo areg gedag beim dara geigouhw gedig Allah en esedeb dau acgunog naugb mamanohob gin toua terimda .
49002011	Dara yeng Krisden dau yugmahara , kaba , yen meigdoc moc dougwo areg mohon touwero , doba yen yeiseisan terimda . Anai se lona ingga , kaba , yen yemeigtou desij Krisdus touebma . Doba dau lona sug yen meijim ouwadan yen , kaba , yen yedag lugmaharohob . Hanoba yen yemedag hom dara emen meijouhuda Israel . Dara Allah misen men gomnomna areg en os dou emen sug nosa , kaba , augwan emeb naugb yen touwero , doba eb naugb emeng Yahudi emen dous . Sug areg graga augwan emeb naugb yen namcirero , kaba , Allah misen gini en emedag meijen Allah . Dara yen yemod meijina debsa en an areg geigouhw naugb en eic dou yen se lona daiyamo gacin touwero . Doba yen yeigtou augwougb dag gin terimda .
49002012	Dangga hang , emeng Yahudi , kaba , emen emesbes an yen dag lusud gedig len lemec merus dauwero toua namcir . Anai areg graga augwan , kaba , eb naugb emen . Hang emen emec emen emus gansins debin gin . Dara emen emeigdoumesa emenin emoho dag lusud gedig len lec merus dauwohob gin toua terimda . Doba yen , kaba , areg graga augwan emeb naugb yenero . Hang yen yemec yen meijus dau touwero . Doba inggaida , anai areg emen emec dau gin , kaba , emen emec se emen emaga dara emen emsira gin dous .
49002013	Doba iteitogin , kaba , yen meigdoc dag hom dara Krisdus Yesus touohob . Dangga hang , yen yemeb aigusi dau Allah misen gin toua deitero . Doba sug Krisdus eic en mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb meijen sesar dag ginohob , kaba , men geicara gini eic dag yen yeigtou desij Allah , aninim dag emeng Yahudi gin touohob .
49002014	Anai sug nosa , kaba , Allah men gomnomna dara areg en arougb emen an , kaba , edag sogo maga bagod dougwo yen namcir . Hang maman madag hom touwero . Doba maman madag moc naugb mabemocedoum terimda . Doba sug Krisdus eic enin maga bomom taiba sogo salib naugb mamanohob , kaba , en egrij sogo maga geb dougwo maman gini . Dauntoba emen emedag leng Yahudi dara yen yemedag lugmahara toua deitero . Doba sug maman madag hom dara enohob , kaba , en eic maman daihim dag meijouhuda menau hom se en toua . Dangga hang iteitogin , kaba , maman mabemocedoum toua deitero . Doba men geicara gin , kaba , eic dag maman mamdoc edag hom namcirohob .
49002015	
49002016	Dauwohob , kaba , en ahwan maman dou Allah naugb en eic gesgigouhwesa dou maman maugwan ucugb toua . Anai sug en omom taiba sogo salib dag ginohob , kaba , en egrij sogo maga geb dougwo maman gini , dauntoba maman mabemocedoum deitero . Doba maman madag meijouhuda hom se en ogdoc men geicara taiba sogo salib gin terimda .
49002017	Hang en emen naugb en esai Mer Geigouhw dau areg graga augwan dou yeng yugmahara gedig yen yeigtou aigusi dau Allah sug nosa dara emeng Yahudi gedig emen emeigtou deinyor Allah maman maugwan toua . Dauntoba sug maman macinaga dau Mer Geigouhw ginohob , kaba , maman mabemocedoum toua deitero . Doba eic dag maman daihim naugb sug maman maic gesgigouhwesem ucugb . Dara arautut maman naugb sug maman man aud Allah , dauntoba en eic gesgigouhwesa dou maman ucugb ogdoc Mer Geigouhw gin toua .
49002018	Anai sug Krisdus en omom taiba sogo salib naugb maman sesar dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamahau naugb sug maman madebeij maman Mamina Allah toua deitero . Doba ogdoc Krisdus men geicara gin , hang yeng yugmahara dara emeng Yahudi maman maugwan maic mamus naugb sug maman macuncum dou en dara masijaresa en . Anai Mena Gogoufu hom gin , kaba , en einesa maman maugwan mamdoc mesohob . Hang en emarautut maman naugb sug maman man aud maman Mamina Allah gin toua terimda .
49002019	Dangga hang , sug yen yedag hom dara emenohob , kaba , yen yemedag lugmahara dara leng medigo dau emen toua deitero . Doba maman maugwan madag Allah men meijouhuda hom . Hanoba maman maugwan madag men logodeh gedig len leigtou desij en se men tu touohob .
49002020	Sug yen yeigtou desij Allah se en men tu dag ginohob , kaba , en ohud yen toua dag en men tu icira leng lesai Allah moro sug nosa dara leng lesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus , aninim dara emeng Yahudi gin touohob . Anai meren geicara gin , kaba , edag buc gototo naugb yen . Doba Krisdus Yesus enin eng edag buc mandeij naugb augwan toua .
49002021	Dangga hang , enin eng edag sud hom gesedougwo tu gini dara men goubesa . Dauntoba tu gini emaic baisoboro touwero , doba ebsugeb . Hanoba en ohud bauloulo dag maman Adehsud men tu gecabeci gin toua namcir .
49002022	Dara en emohud emeng Yahudi gin dousero . Doba en ohud yeng yugmahara gin toua . Dauntoba yeni dara leng gus maman maugwan madag Allah men tu naugb sug en eigtousa ogdoc Mena Gogoufu gin toua terimda , anai yen toua yedag hom dara Krisdus Yesus ginohob .
49003001	Sug maman maugwan madag Allah men meijouhuda hom dag ginohob , kaba , dan demarges dau sug dan docuncum dou en naugb yen touwero . Doba dan deicara daimo dag gin esesa an yen terimda . Anai areg Allah en esedeb naugb yeng yugmahara , kaba , en ogod dan dag domom sug nosa . Hanoba en ens meijouhw dau gin augwan asesa dou dan . Dauwohob , kaba , en eigdoumesa dan indoho naugb dan desai augwan gini dou yen toua . Sug dan deicara dag gin naugb yen , hang lusud lemouf dan se tu gesisug icira gin touohob . ( Yen yemecinaga dau areg graga augwan dag misen touebmei ? Naro , yen yecinaga dau augwan gini dag misen . Anai sug nosa , kaba , dan dog dau gini gurereito dou yenohob .
49003002	
49003003	
49003004	Dangga sug yen yecic dau gini se indan surad gin , kaba , yen yecinaga dag dan demog augwougb dou yen touwero . Doba dag dan decinaga meijouhw eisaugb Krisdus men geicara dau augwan gini asesa dag misen namcirohob . Hang dan demog dou yen toua . )
49003005	Anai Allah emens dau areg en esedeb naugb lusud ogdoc Krisdus gin , kaba , dou sud hom ingma dau len sug nosa touebma . Doba iteitogin , hang en emens dau augwan ogdoc Mena Gogoufu dou leng lesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus , dara leng lesai Allah en moro dou lusud emen emaugwan , anai en ouci emen debinim naugb ginohob .
49003006	Dara areg en ens dou emen , kaba , dag gini : Sug yen yedag hom dara Krisdus ginohob , kaba , yen yemedag lugmahara toua deitero . Doba yen yeigtou desij emen se men uro mes . Hanoba en ekeba geigouhw areg en esedeb naugb emeng Yahudi gin dou yen . Dara en eic dau areg en os dou emeng Yahudi ogdoc Krisdus augwan gin dou yen toua . En eicara baimo augwan gini an yen ogdoc sug emen emesai en Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yenohob .
49003007	Mer Geigouhw gin , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa dan indoho dag men sogougb . Hanoba en eic mou ouforoho dara men goubesa dou dan naugb dan desai augwan gini dou lusud toua . Anai en medoc eigouhw an dan naugb ginohob .
49003008	Dara en eicara dangga dou dan gedig dan indoho eb tainya se men lusud laugwan merufu namcir . Anai sug nosa , kaba , dan deic mog erij dou men lusud laugwan touohob . Doba en medoc eineg an dan . Hang en emarougb dan naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou yeng yugmahara gin toua . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dau areg en esedeb ogdoc Krisdus naugb yenohob augwan asesa dag misen toua . Anai augwan gin , kaba , mera eisaugb edreg dau areg lusud lauwam an gin toua namcirohob .
49003009	Dara en arougb dan naugb dan dens dau men ucina areg en esedeb naugb lusudohob meijouhw augwan asesa dou yen toua . Dauntoba sug leng se bogo dara merna mog mog se bogo meniha an meren mougt mera len louman dau areg Allah en esedeb naugb men goucimdeb maman dag gin , kaba , len lecinaga dag en mou ouforoho an aingma aingma augwan toua namcirohob . Anai sug nosa , kaba , Allah emens dau areg en esedeb naugb maman ogdoc Krisdus gini dou sud hom ingma touebma . Doba en ecgoneh augwan gini dau acgunog terimda iteitogini dau len namcir . Anai en , kaba , en sud hom gedig en ahasesei dara en esinsin augwanohob .
49003010	
49003011	Dara areg en esedeb gin , kaba , dag menenau touwero . Doba en esedeb augwan gin dau acgunog naugb mamanohob . Hanoba en ogugwo augwan gini se maman Adehsud Krisdus Yesus mesira naugb en aimo areg Allah esedeb gini an maman toua .
49003012	Sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamahau dau sug maman madebeij Allah touwero . Doba sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag misenohob , kaba , maman maic mamus naugb maman man aud Allah en toua namcir . Anai maman macinaga dag areg Allah en os dou maman ogdoc Krisdus ginohob , kaba , en emobsara dau hom touwero . Doba en aimo augwan gini an maman toua terimda .
49003013	Dara sug yen yeiya dag dan deigtou se tu gesisug icira yenohob , kaba , yen yemeija meigdocesa gin touwero . Doba yen yagahugouhw naugb gin namcir . Anai areg dan daimo gin , kaba , naugb yen yera mera dag yen yeigtou se gogouf cucugb gin toua terimda .
49003014	Dangga hang , dan demarges dau sug dan docuncum dou maman Mamina naugb yen touwero . Doba sug yen yedag men lusud , aninim dara emeng Yahudi dag gin touohob , kaba , dan dacgeij en naugb en ekeba dau men geigouhw aingma aingma geinyana gougwa areg geb se bogo ingma dou yen toua . Dauntoba yen meigdoc emomomtomlo . Doba areg en eic dou yen gin , kaba , ousa yen naugb yen yaiyan meigdocesem dougwo areg gecgu . Dara arautut yen naugb yen yes agadgeij se ucina aud maireseb menau geb huhugb ogdoc Mena Gogoufu men goubesa , areg en esa se yen meigdoc mesohob gin toua namcir . Anai Allah gin , kaba , en esinsin leng se bogo dara leng se cinogo len laugwan . Hanoba en eic moho dou astesda len laugwan touohob .
49003015	
49003016	
49003017	Dara dan dacgeij Allah dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus ginohob , kaba , dag en ousa yen , dauntoba Krisdus emeihwededau yen touwero . Doba en eigtou se yen meigdoc mes ogdoc yen meigdoc ebdebin an gin terimda . Hanoba en arautut yen meigdoc mes , dauntoba yen yemobsara dau sug yen meigdoc gororougwim touwero . Doba yen yogod se yenin meigdoc mes naugb yen yeicara yaimo dangga , anim ucucugb edag buc gototo namcir . Aninim dag sogo dara tu lan lamedreg dau lan maruhw touwero . Doba labsugeb se maruhw hom ingga toua terimda .
49003018	Dara dan dacgeij Allah dau sug Krisdus eigtou se yen meigdoc mes touohob , kaba , dag en eic mou ouforoho dara mou auti dou yen . Dauntoba Allah men lusud yen yaugwan yecinaga dau sug Krisdus medoc gororougb yen men meijouhw geiyara , geisaugb , gagas , dara gouwada augwan asesa toua terimda . Anai men medoc gororougb gin , kaba , edreg dau lusud meren goubesa naugb sug len lauwam an ara ara namcir . Dara dan dacgeij Allah naugb en ousa yen , dauntoba yen meigdoc eica Krisdus men medoc gororougb augwan gini dag misen toua . Anai sug yen meigdoc obgesa augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir , kaba , eic dag yen meigdoc atij an areg geb se Allah enin medoc mes augwan gin touohob .
49003019	
49003020	Dangga hang , sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , eigouhw naugb maman maugwan maigdoumesa Allah en moho , dara maman masijaresa en beb huhugb ogdoc Krisdus Yesus gin toua terimda . Anai ogdoc men goubesa geb se maman mamdoc mes , kaba , en ousa maman edreg medam dau areg maman mauwam an dara macgeij dau en touohob . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
49003021	
49004001	Sug Allah eic areg graga augwan ogdoc Krisdus men geicara taiba sogo salib dou yenohob , kaba , dan desulou yen dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba yen yemobsara dau areg Allah arougb yen anohob se lona sug en eija yen gin touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yaimo augwan gini esesa terimda . Anai gini ucina areg en esedeb naugb mamanohob . Dan desulou yen an dag gini , anai dan indugwengga se tu gesisug icira sug dan desai maman Adehsud en moro dou yen gin touohob .
49004002	Dangga hang , yen meigdoc emagas toua deitero , doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga anim . Dara yen yemenara gouji dou len gus touwero . Doba se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yaimo dara yen meigdoc eijouhw an len namcir . Dara yen meigdoc emesrougb anim dedemeda touwero . Doba yen yeigtou yateteijim terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yens yenin ainyes dou lusud dag yen meigdoc gororougwim dag misen namcirohob .
49004003	Dara yen yemenara yemaisedim toua deitlo . Doba sug Mena Gogoufu arautut yen naugb yen meigdoc dag homohob , kaba , yen yos debin gin naugb yen meigdoc dag hom esesa terimda toua .
49004004	Anai mamang Krisden , dara Mena Gogoufu , dara areg Allah eija maman aud ginohob naugb sug maman maod mamina debsa en an , dara maman Adehsud , dara sud hom gareg maman mamdoc ebdebin an enohob , dara gogun se duhu , kaba , augwan gin toua emeinyanero , doba hom dous .
49004005	
49004006	Dangga toua , lusud se cinogo gin augwan , kaba , meren Allah misen dara len Merna misen lemeinyana touwero , doba hom dous . En , kaba , en edag len laugwan meren mougt mera medam . Hanoba en arautut len naugb len laimo areg enin ouwan gin toua . Anai en toua moongga se len merdoc mes naugb en eic goubesa dou len touohob .
49004007	Dangga hang , sug Allah en moho aiga maman dag ginohob , kaba , Krisdus en medoc eineg an maman naugb en eic mou ouforoho dara goubesa dou astesda dau maman , aimo dau areg enin ogod deb an gin touohob .
49004008	Augwan gini aimo dau areg Daud en erba Ugwaremer eisaugb gin deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Sug en eisaugb dig bogo geiseisum ucugb , kaba , en ahwan men moc leinyana aud usi ingga , anai en aiyan len laugwan eb tainya en namcirohob . Hanoba en ekeba dau men moc meren aremougb ingma dag mogud dou enin men lusud len laugwan toua .
49004009	Doba sug Daud enara dag Krisdus eisaugb dig bogo geiseisum ucugb dag ginohob , kaba , gin men meijouhw dag en ouwaden dau bogo se cinogo gini . Hanoba en edebeij se cinogo mei touohob .
49004010	Dangga hang , sud hom gedig en ouwaden dau bogo , kaba , eni sud hom gedig en eisaugb dig bogo geiseisum gin toua . Dauntoba sug en eisaugb ucugwohob , kaba , en esedougwo areg Allah en ahasesei augwan naugb emedregim touwero . Doba augwan ebsugeb naugb aimo dau areg enin ouwan terimda edebeij Lona Sug Ouwedoc gin toua .
49004011	Sug Krisdus eic mou ouforoho , dara goubesa , dara ara ara dag mogud dou mamanohob , kaba , en eigdoumesa ligbum len meroho naugb len lesai mer geigouhw eisaugb en dou lusud gus . Dara lingma , kaba , en eigdoumesa len meroho naugb len lesai Allah en mer eisaugb aremer aingma aingma dou len toua . Ligbum deit , kaba , en eigdoumesa len meroho naugb len leihwedig cinogo aigusi . Dauntoba len lesai Mer Geigouhw Eisaugb Krisdus dou len sungga . Dara lingma , kaba , en eigdoumesa len meroho dag gembala dara pembela naugb len lesedougwo goucimdeb . Hanoba len lebedbed dara ledidib meijouhw eisaugb Allah en mer gin augwan dou lusud toua .
49004012	Krisdus eicara dangga dou Allah men lusud maman dag gini naugb en ousa maman dara ara ara augwan edeinyum namcir . Dauntoba maman maimo areg maman Adehsud en arougb maman an gin augwan . Hanoba maman mausem ucucugb terimda , dauntoba maman mamdoc emomomtom touwero . Doba maman maiyan mamdocesem naugb mas agadgeij namcir . Dara maman mebir lusud ingma dara naugb maman maiji dag Krisdus enin maga beiseisaugb terimda toua .
49004013	Anai sug maman maicara anim dag gin , kaba , eic dag maman mamdoc emedregim toua deitero . Doba maman maugwan mamdoc gebdebin an . Dara maman mamu aiso Allah Meisi gini aninim dag hom namcir . Hanoba maman maiji dag lusud mos eiseisaugb terimda maman geicara augwan aninim dag Krisdus enin men geicara augwan gin toua .
49004014	Sug maman maiji dag lusud mos se Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamedag lugdeh mahaniheni gedig lusud leicara larei maman dig gacda dig ginda toua deitero . Doba maman mamdoc gororougwim , hanoba maman maimo areg se geica anim . Dauntoba se aremer augwan , kaba , maman maiji dag lusud mos se maman mougt mera medam , moho Krisdus , men ucina gin toua terimda . Anai areg leng gin len lebedbed dou maman , kaba , edag duhu mogo gougwan maman , dara edag loungmen goto maman dous . Hang emaugwohosa maman naugb maman maijahasero dau ucina misen gin toua namcir . Anai len gin , kaba , len meru ouforoho naugb len lenara laceca dara lerba mohoisa lusud namcir .
49004015	
49004016	Doba Krisdus , kaba , en esedougwo maman , dauntoba astesda dau maman mameigtou naugb mamaninero . Doba astesda dau maman , kaba , en eigtou se men usi areg Krisdus ens dou enohob . Hanoba maman maimo maman geicara se usi gini anim toua terimda . Anai maman maugwan , kaba , maman geicara aninimero , doba susugb namcir . Dangga hang , sug maman maimo geicara areg Krisdus eic dou mamanohob anim ucucugb dara maman mamdoc gororougwim dag gin terimda toua , kaba , maman mamedag lugdeh mahaniheni toua deitero . Doba maman mausem naugb maman maiji dag lusud mos se Krisdus , dauntoba maman madag tu geigouhw naugb enin toua .
49004017	Sug Allah eija yen dag men lusudohob , kaba , dan den dougwo yen dara goubesa se maman Adehsud en moho gini . Dauntoba yen yemaimo leng medigo Yesus aud meren geicara deitero . Doba yen yasid yenin dau len terimda . Anai len , kaba , len meru obeigbogo namcir . Hang areg len lauwam an , kaba , emera mera geigouhw hom touwero . Doba meren geicara augwan dag augwougb dous . Dangga maireseb menau geb huhugb areg Allah ouwan eic dou lusud , kaba , emeb naugb len touwero . Doba len leigtou ijes dau gin namcir , anai len leic merus dou en terimda . Hang Allah Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin , kaba , len lemecinaga touwero . Doba len ledag lusud gedig len meru emaiyero gin dous .
49004018	
49004019	Dara sug len laimo dag gin , kaba , igdebes emeba len an meren geicara gin touwero . Doba len leic merus naugb len laimo dag gin terimda . Hang gini eic dag len lemebehnehino lenin merdoc mes dougwo areg gecgu augwan touwero . Doba len merdoc etrij naugb sug len logo ara gaihim dara len lohw lenin meraga doum ucucugb toua terimda .
49004020	Doba naugb yen , kaba , sug yen youman eisaugb Krisdus sug nosa , kaba , len lens en dou yen dag en ogo ara gaihim , era aimo areg gogor gin touohobei ? Naro , len lemens en dag gin dou yenero . Doba dan decinaga len lens en dou yen dag Yesus aimo areg edag beim dara areg gecabeci mogud an lusud dous . Dangga sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an enohob , kaba , len lens dau areg geb se enin medoc mes augwan dag misen ucan gin dou yen toua . Anai augwan gini se geica namcirohob .
49004021	
49004022	Dangga hang , yen yemaimo areg yen meigdoc etrij icira . Dara yen yemauwam an areg mohon toua deitero . Doba yen yacgeij Allah , dauntoba en esinsin yen meigdoc mes dara meijen gauwamara augwan dag menau deit . Anai sug yen meigdoc etrij icira namcir , kaba , ahwan yen naugb yen yaimo areg gecgu gin terimda . Hang emaugwohosa yen naugb yen yaimo ucina aud mor mor se dum smougb gin toua . Doba sug Allah esinsin yen meigdoc mes dara meijen gauwamara menauohob , kaba , eic dag meijen geicara dara meijen gauwamara aninim dag en medoc mes dara men gauwamara toua . Hang emahwan yen naugb yen yemaimo areg mohon toua deitero . Doba ahwan yen naugb yen yaimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes , dara areg edag beim , dara ecabeci an lusud laugwan toua terimda . Sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , ens ainyes dou lusud dag yen yaimo maireseb menau dag misen touohob .
49004023	
49004024	
49004025	Sug yen yeinesa maireseb menau dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemereiyara , era yemaideidora , dara yen yemerba mohoisem toua deitero . Doba yen yenara misen doum se aremer augwan namcir . Anai maman maugwan madag Krisdus en maga hom ginohob .
49004026	Dara yen yemebin areg yen meigdoc esrougb an se meigdoc mes touwero . Doba sug igda emobsara sebuma , kaba , yen meigdoc obsara dau touohob . Dauntoba yen meigdoc gesrougb gin , kaba , emeic cumougt dou Bilis naugb en emahwan yen aud sesarero .
49004027	
49004028	Dangga toua , gareg dau yen en esedi dara eiyoho len gus meren aremougb dau len sug nosohob , kaba , dan den dougwo en naugb en emeicara dag gin toua deitero . Doba dan douwan dag en mesira eicara naugb enin , aimo areg se geica an lusud dous . Dauntoba sug ara ara eb naugb enohob , kaba , en agaha mesira an dou leng gedig meren ara ara emeb naugb len touwero .
49004029	Dara dan demouwan naugb areg gogor emagunya dau yen meijirs touwero . Doba dan douwan dag areg geigouhw eng agunya dau yen meijirs dous , dauntoba ousa lusud . Anai areg ogor gini , kaba , emousa lenero . Doba sug lusud louman dau areg geigouhw , kaba , ousa len naugb len leiji dag lusud mos se Krisdus toua namcir . Dara yen yemenara augwougb dou len touwero . Doba yen yehigdecin dau aremer augwan nosahabi , yen yemenara dou lusud aimo dau meren aremer ingga dou len toua .
49004030	Dangga se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yemeic Mena Gogoufu medoc momogo dou en touwero , doba yen yeic en medoc esgiraha dou en dous . Anai Allah esa en se yen meigdoc mes ansins dag en moho aiga yenohob . Hang yen yemeija meijuwesa en an ara ara toua deitero . Doba yen yod meijina debsa en dag se Lona Sug En Ogod Aremer Aga Lusud , kaba , en emeic gogom dou yen touwero . Doba en eigdoc yen dau gogom augwan namcir .
49004031	Dara yen meigdoc emedougdaha , dara emesrougb , dara mog mog anim toua deitero . Doba yen yarges dau augwan gin namcir . Dara yen yemenara emedregim , dara yen yemeihwim , dara yen meigdoc emobgos anim touwero .
49004032	Doba yen meigdoc eigouhw dara eineg anim dous . Hanoba yen yaigdougwo meijen geicara gecgu anim dag mogud ucucugb terimda . Aninim dag Allah aigdougwo meijen sesar augwan ogdoc Krisdus men geicara dag mogud dau yen touohob .
49005001	Dangga hang , yen yemaimo areg gecgu dag mohon deitero . Doba sug Allah eigdoumesa yen dag en mogwihi mogo yen dag ginohob , kaba , yen yesogwa deisa en mohotimei mohw se aremer augwan toua terimda , anai en medoc gororougb yen namcirohob .
49005002	Dara yen meigdoc gororougwim toua ucucugb terimda . Aninim dag Krisdus medoc gororougb maman sug nosa touohob . Anai en emougbda dau ucina mog erij touwero , doba en ohw enin mougt edug naugb maman . Hang en emeic enin maga dag gauwaharo gouwedebeda dou Allah naugb maman sesar augwan toua . Anai men geicara gini , kaba , eic Allah medoc eigouhw dou en toua namcirohob .
49005003	Dara sug yen yedag Allah men lusud dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemohw yen meijaga doum , dara meijen geicara emedag mihi , dara yen yemogungun len gus an meren aremougb . Hanoba yen yemecic dau gin mougwa hom doum touwero . Doba yen yarges dau gin namcir . Dauntoba yen yemeic cumougt dou lusud naugb len lemecic yen meijoho an gin touwero . Anai augwan gini , kaba , emaimo lusud gedig Allah ouci len debinim naugb enohob meren geicarero , doba edreg dau gin namcirohob .
49005004	Dangga toua , yen yemogmohosa naugb ligida dara ligiji meraga . Hanoba yen yemeicir yemacecim , dara yen yemobohuba an len , dara yen yemecic len dag len gedig len meru emaiyero touwero . Doba areg agunya dau yen meijirs , kaba , dag yen yen sijo dou Allah an areg en eic dou yenohob gin dous .
49005005	Anai gareg en ohw en maga dou len gus , dara men geicara dag mihi men geicara , dara gareg en agungun len gus an meren aremougb terimda , kaba , en emeinesa Krisdus dara Allah maran goiharaga touwero . Doba en eigtou dig medigo beb huhugb namcir . Dara gareg en agungun lusud an meren aremougb , kaba , en eigdoumesa aremougb gini dag seiseij naugb en ecguna dou touohob . Yen youman dan indir areg dan den dou yen gini deigeigouhw namcir .
49005006	Dangga yen yemaimo lusud gedig len ledarougb yen se areg graga augwan touwero . Doba yen yasid yenin dau len namcir . Anai leng leic merus sug lugdeh teiteiyohob , kaba , len leicara dag gin terimda . Hang Allah esedeb gogom medam naugb len , anai en medoc obgos an lenohob .
49005007	
49005008	Sug nosa , kaba , yen yaugwan yedag lobeigbogo men logodeh toua namcir . Doba sug yen yedag hom dara maman Adehsud dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemedag lobeigbogo men lusud toua deitero . Doba yen yedag mouf men lusud dous . Dangga hang , meijen geicara augwan , kaba , emedag lobeigbogo men geicara toua deitlo . Doba sug yen yedag mouf men lusudohob , kaba , yen yera mera areg geigouhw , dara areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes , dara areg se geica terimda . Anai gin , kaba , aimo lusud gedig len leinesa moufohob meren geicara toua namcir .
49005009	
49005010	Hang yen yemarges dau gin touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yecinaga areg geic maman Adehsud medoc eigouhw dou en , hanoba yen yaimo augwan toua terimda .
49005011	Dangga hang , yen yemaimo lusud aud areg len leicara se lobeigbogo gin toua deitero . Doba yen yowun yenin dau gin namcir . Anai meren geicara augwan gin , kaba , emera mera geigouhw hom dou yen touwero . Doba era mera gecgu dou yen dous . Hang yen yemaimo len touwero . Doba yen yens meren geicara gin augwan ainyes dou len dous . Dauntoba sug len leiya dau gin , kaba , len lecinaga dag augwan gin , kaba , ecgu namcirohob . Anai geicara areg geb se mouf , kaba , dag lobeigbogo deitero , doba eperwei dag moufohob . Hang maman mamecinaga areg geigouhw , era gecgu augwan dag misen toua . Dara yen yemecic dau meren geicara areg len laimo se lobeigbogo ucucugb toua deitlo . Anai areg len laimo gin , kaba , eic igdebes dou lusud namcir .
49005012	
49005013	
49005014	Hang sud hom enara eisaugb gin deb sug nosa , endagai : Bang bedag bomomohob , kaba , ban bemomom deitero . Doba ban beisa besa namcir . Anai sug ban beicara dag gin , kaba , Krisdus esa mouf se ban abdoc mes toua .
49005015	Dangga sug yen yeiya , doba leng lobeigbogo meren geicara emera mera geigouhw dou yenero , kaba , yen yemaimo len touwero . Doba yen yebehnehino yenin meigdoc mes dougwo meijen geicara augwan namcir . Dauntoba yen yemedag leng meru emaiyero touwero . Doba yen yedag lusud gedig len meru auti ara ara dous .
49005016	Dara yen yemaisan gurog dau sug yen yos yadi Krisdus en moho deseino lusud laugwan touwero . Doba astesda sug cumougt eb naugb yen , kaba , yen yesai en moro dou len terimda . Anai iteitogin , kaba , lusud leinyana meren geicara dag mog mog namcirohob .
49005017	Dara yen meiju emedgom dougwo geicara areg asesa maman Adehsud enin medoc mes gin touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen meiju obgesa augwan dag misenahabi , yen yemaimo toua terimda .
49005018	Dara yen yemeg ahwei mohu emed yen yemomom touwero . Doba yen yebin Mena Gogoufu naugb en edag mougt se yen meigdoc mes dous . Hanoba yen yaimo en mer an areg en arougb yen an gin toua terimda . Anai sug yen yeg ahwei mohu , kaba , ahwan yen naugb sug yen yogo ara gaihim . Hang eic dag yen yaimo areg gecgu toua namcir .
49005019	Doba sug Mena Gogoufu batij yen meigdoc mesohob , kaba , yen yeic Ugwaremer , dara aresgwemer , dara areg Mena Gogoufu ens dou yenohob naugb sug yen yohu , kaba , yen yeic gin eng yerba doum dous . Hanoba yen yerba Ugwaremer dara yen yohu aresgwemer dou maman Adehsud dareg yen meigdoc agahugouhw an en toua namcir .
49005020	Dara yen yemarges dau sug yen yen sijo dou maman Mamina Allah touwero . Doba se aremer augwan , kaba , yen yen sijo dou en se maman Adehsud Krisdus Yesus , en moho , besesa terimda . Anai yen yedag hom dara enohob .
49005021	Dara yen meigdoc emagas anim ucucugb touwero . Doba sug yen yeigdoumesa Krisdus dag meijen mougt mera medamohob , kaba , yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga anim ucucugb terimda .
49005022	Dangga hang , yigida yen , kaba , yen meigdoc emagas emedreg dau yen meisuwer touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga naugb yen yaimo len merir se aremer augwan toua terimda . Aninim dag yen yemohoiya maman Adehsud en mer an areg en arougb yen an gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo en mer se aremer augwan gin toua namcirohob .
49005023	Anai yen meisuwer gini , kaba , len ledag mougt naugb yen , aninim dag Krisdus en edag mougt mera medam naugb maman maugwan touohob . En , gin , kaba , en ohw en mougt edug naugb en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwan aud maireseb menau geb huhugb , anai maman maugwan madag en maga ginohob .
49005024	Dangga hang , yigida yen yemeicara yemedreg yen meisuwer len merir touwero . Doba astesda dau yen , kaba , en aimo en mesuwa en mer se aremer augwan toua namcir . Aninim dag maman mamedreg dau Krisdus en mer gin touwero , doba maman maimo en mer an areg en arougb maman an gin toua terimda .
49005025	Dara yigiji yen , kaba , yen meigdoc emesrougb dara mog mog an yen meisouwer touwero . Doba astesda sud hom yom dau yen , kaba , en medoc gororougb en mesouwa . Aninim dag Krisdus en medoc gororougb maman , hang en emohw en mougt edug aud gomom naugb mamanohob . Dauntoba sesar men gogom emeb naugb maman toua deitero . Doba en edu maman becabeci namcir ogdoc en mogwihi , aimo dau areg en os deb se en mer geigouhw gini an maman toua . Anai en ouci maman debinim dag enin mesouwa touohob .
49005026	
49005027	En eicara dag gini , dauntoba areg gecgu dara areg gogor gus gus augwan mohw hom emeb naugb maman . Dara en emowun maman an aremer hom toua deitero . Doba maman madag en mesouwa gecabeci deseino en namcir .
49005028	Sug Krisdus medoc gororougb maman dag ginohob , kaba , esloulougb medam dag astesda dau yen en medoc gororougb en mesouwa aninim dag en medoc gororougb enin maga toua . Anai yan yamedag hwai deitero , doba yan yedag homohob . Dangga gareg dau yen en medoc gororougb en mesouwa , kaba , gini dag en medoc gororougb enin maga touohob .
49005029	Anai sud hom ingma , kaba , en medoc emesdigeij enin maga touwero . Doba en agauwesa dara esedougwo enin maga dougwo areg gecgu augwan namcir . Aninim dag Krisdus medoc emesdigeij maman touwero . Doba en agauwesa dara en esedougwo maman dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua terimda , anai maman madag en maga gin touohob .
49005030	
49005031	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg len log deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Sug Allah esinsin gida dau giji dag ginohob , kaba , giji emeigtou desij en mena dara en mem toua deitero . Doba en eihwededau lan naugb en eigtou desij en mesouwa . Hang lan lamedag hwai touwero , doba lan ladag hom namcir dous .
49005032	Se aiyad gin , kaba , Allah ens dau areg se geica dag meiyo dou maman toua . Anai dan doudesa dag men meijouhw , kaba , emeisaugb mesuwa dara mesouwa sug lan lamedag hom ginero . Doba men meijouhw dau sug Krisdus dara maman madag hom gin dous .
49005033	Doba inggaida . Aiyad gin , kaba , naugb yen toua . Dangga hang , yigiji astesda dau yen , kaba , en medoc gororougb en mesouwa , aninim dag en medoc gororougb enin maga . Dara yigida , kaba , astesda dau yen en eigdoumesa en mesuwa en moho terimda toua .
49006001	Yugdeh sug yen yedag hom dara Krisdusohob , kaba , yen yemohoiya yen meijina dara meijim len merir touwero . Doba yen yaimo len an areg len larougb yen an augwan toua terimda . Anai gini , kaba , aimo dau areg asesa Allah enin medoc mesohob .
49006002	Augwan gini aimo dau areg Allah arougb yen an se men gomnomna sug nosa touohob , endagai : Yen yeigdoumesa yen meijina dara yen meijim len meroho deseino yen terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yemomom dedemeda touwero . Doba dan deseyeiyo yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan namcir . Dauntoba yen meijireseb terberba se cinogo gin toua terimda . Hang yen yemowun yen meijina dara yen meijim len meroho touwero . Doba yen yeigdoumesa len meroho namcir . Anai Allah men gomnomna gin , kaba , gomnomna gaimougtut gedig Allah os ara ara ingma dara debin gin naugb yen touohob .
49006003	
49006004	Dangga toua , yen gedig yeic meijirohob , kaba , meijen geicara emeic len merdoc emesrougb ucucugb dou len touwero . Doba yen yesedougwo len . Hanoba yen yomnomnan dau areg maman Adehsud en arougb maman an ginohob augwan dou len toua . Dara sug len ledreg maman Adehsud men gomnomna gin , kaba , yen yen dougwo len . Dobnaro , kaba , yen yogod len , dauntoba len lahau an dougwo . Hanoba len laimo men gomnomna augwan toua terimda .
49006005	Dara yeng Krisden gedig yen yedag sogougb , kaba , yen yemohoiya meijen mougtir len merir touwero . Doba yen yeigdoumesa len meroho dara yen yahau dau len namcir . Hanoba yen yaimo len merir an areg len larougb yen an dara yen meigdoc hom toua terimda . Aninim dag yen yemohoiya Krisdus en mer touwero . Doba yen yaimo en mer an areg en arougb yen an dara yen meigdoc hom touohob .
49006006	Dara yen yemaimo len merir an areg len larougb yen an sug len lauweila yen . Dauntoba len leigdoumesa yen meijoho an gin touwero . Doba sug yen yedag Krisdus men sogougb dag ginohob , kaba , yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yaimo len merir dara yen meigdoc augwan sug len lemauweila yenero toua terimda . Anai gini aimo dau areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes ginohob .
49006007	Dara sug yen yeicara yaimo areg meijen mougtir larougb yen anohob , kaba , yen meigdoc momogo an gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo augwan dara yen meigdoc agahugouhw an dous . Anai yen yemeicara dou meijen mougtir se cinogo gin dousero . Doba yen yeicara dou maman Adehsud gin toua .
49006008	Anai sug yen yedag sogougb , era yen yedag sogougwero , kaba , augwan gini inggaida deseino maman Adehsud . Doba gareg en aimo men geicara dara geigouhw namcir , kaba , en emeic areg geigouhw dag siouwa dau en toues .
49006009	Dangga toua , yeng yedag mougt mera , kaba , yen yemeic kwag dou meijen sogougwir dag yen yeic mog erij dou len ucucugb touwero . Doba meijen geicara augwan dou len , kaba , aninim dag Allah arougb meijen sogougwir an meren geicara augwan dou yen toua . Anai en emedag meijen sogougwir meren mougt mera medam gin dousero . Doba en edag yenin meijen mougt mera medam gedig en eigtou se bogo naugb yen touohob . Hang en emobsara aud yen se Lona Sug En Ogod Aremer Aga Lusud touwero . Doba en medoc edag beim naugb en ogod aremer aga lusud laugwan aninim dous .
49006010	Dangga hang , sug ouwedoc gin , kaba , dan desulou yen dauntoba yen yes agadgeij se maman Adehsud men goubesa namcir . Anai yen yedag hom dara enohob .
49006011	Dara yen yacgeij Allah naugb en eic enin men ariloboc kermum dou yen , dauntoba Bilis emaugwohosa yen aud areg gecgwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij terimda .
49006012	Anai maman mamesara dara lusudero . Doba maman masara dara merna mog mog geb se bogo meniha , dara meren mougt mera , an meren gedeijan len laugwan toua terimda . Anai len merubisamougb medam gougwa dara len loiharaga lusud gedig len leigtou se lobeigbogo len laugwan dara goubesa toua namcir .
49006013	Sug len merubisamougb dag gin , kaba , yen yacgeij Allah naugb en eic enin men ariloboc kermum dou yen . Dauntoba edebeij lona sug Bilis ainyen yen , kaba , meijen moc gini en emaiyan yen touwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij dougwo en namcir . Dara ousa yen naugb sug yen yemobsara dou en touwero . Doba yen yeic meijimihec mougb erebero dou en terimda edebeij lona sug ouwedoc gin toua .
49006014	Dangga yen yeic Allah en mer gini dag hwigbeimos naugb yen yohud yen meijida moc . Dauntoba yen yesedeb yen meigdoc mes naugb yen yesara dara Bilis terimda . Anai Allah en mer gin , kaba , dag geica namcir . Hanoba yen yaimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes toua terimda . Anai gini edag sansun kermum dougwo yen meigdoc mes .
49006015	Dara yen yesedeb yen meigdoc mes naugb yen yesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud . Dauntoba len lecinaga dag Allah esedeb en medoc mes naugb en eic gesgigouhwesa dou len ucugb . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , aninim dag yen yeg hwigbeimos dougwo yen meijohora touohob .
49006016	Dara yen yemarges dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero , doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dangga , kaba , Sud Hom Mobgos Maha men hu smougb emeinesa yen meigdoc mes touwero . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an gini dag tomeh dougwo sug hu augwan en , doba ousros icira namcir .
49006017	Dara yen yemarges dau maireseb menau geb huhugb areg Allah eic dou yenohob gin touwero , doba yen yecgun meisira debin gin terimda . Anai gini dag topi kermum dougwo yen meijugt . Dauntoba Bilis emogod yen naugb yen yomom deit touwero , doba maireseb eb naugb yen namcir . Hanoba yen yesai Allah en Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud terimda . Anai gini dag krawan gedig Mena Gogoufu eic dou yen naugb yen yasara dara Bilis toua .
49006018	Dara sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yacgeij Allah naugb en ousa yen toua . Dara astesda sug yen yocuncum dou en , kaba , yen yemocuncum augwougb touwero . Doba yen yaimo dau areg Mena Gogoufu arautut yen se dous . Dangga hang , yen yemeisan gurog dau sug yen yacgeij Allah an ara ara touwero . Doba yen meiju auti naugb yen yocuncum esesa naugb gin terimda . Dara yen yemocuncum naugb yenin dousero , doba yen yeicara yaimo dag gini an Allah men lusud laugwan esesa toua terimda .
49006019	Dara yen yocuncum dou Allah naugb dan toua . Dauntoba astesda sug cumougt inggebga naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud , kaba , en eic mou ouforoho dou dan naugb dan dens dau areg dan denara dou len meijouhw augwan asesa dou len toua namcir . Dara yen yocuncum dou en , dauntoba en ousa dan naugb dan demahau dau gin touwero . Doba en aiyan dan indocesem naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw gini dara goubesa dou len toua . Anai Allah emens dau mer gin men meijouhw dou sud hom ingma sug nosa mougwa hom touebma . Doba iteitogin , kaba , en ens dau meijouhw augwan gin dou danohob .
49006020	Sug en ens meijouhw gin dou dan dag ginohob , kaba , en eigdoumesa dan indoho naugb dan desai en moro eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud laugwan . Hang len lemouf dan se tu gesisug icira en mer gin toua . Dangga yen yocuncum dou Allah naugb dan , dauntoba sug dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud , kaba , dan demahau touwero . Doba dan deic indus naugb dan desai mer gin terimda , aimo dau areg Allah esedeb naugb danohob .
49006021	Tikikus en emdecic dau aremer geisaugb dan augwan asesa dou yen , dauntoba yen yecinaga meijouhw augwan asesa toua . Anai dan indoc edangga , hang dan demarougb en aud yen . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dau emen geicara augwan dag misen namcir . Dara en enara bad yen meigdoc mes , dauntoba yen yaiyan meigdocesem dara yes agadgeij toua terimda . Dan desa en aud yen , anai en edag maman mamaguna se Krisdus gedig maman mamdoc gororougb en namcir . Dara en emobsara dau sug en edag maman Adehsud men sogougb gin touwero . Doba en aimo en an areg en arougb en an gini dara en medoc augwan terimda touohob .
49006022	
49006023	Dan dacgeij maman Mamina Allah dara maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus naugb lan lausa yeng se goucimdeb yaugwan , dauntoba yen meigdoc dag hom namcir . Dara yen meigdoc gororougwim , hanoba yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus toua terimda .
49006024	Dara gareg en emobsara dau sug en medoc gororougb maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus gin touwero , doba en eicara baimo dangga beb huhugb namcir , kaba , dan dacgeij Allah naugb en medoc eigouhw an en toua terimda . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
50001001	Surad gini dau dang , Paulus , dou yeng yedag Allah men goucimdeb se cinogo Pilipi , an meijen mougtir , dara meren gedeijan yen yaugwan . Anai yen yedag hom dara Krisdus Yesusohob . Dara dan insi , Timotius , en toua esa mer deb se surad gini naugb en ou yen . Anai aman amahwas amedag Krisdus Yesus men sogougb naugb aman amasai en moro dou lusud touohob .
50001002	Dangga hang , aman amacgeij maman Mamina Allah dara maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus naugb lan mardoc eineg an yen . Dara lan laseyeiyo yen . Dara lan laic gesgigouhwesa dou yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua namcir .
50001003	Astesda sug dan indoc eiseisan meijen geicara an dan sug nosa , kaba , dan den sijo dou Allah naugb yen toua . Anai sug dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen sug aimougtut , kaba , yen yemamsoho dan touwero . Doba dau lona ingga terimda iteitogini , kaba , yen yousa dan terimdohob . Dangga hang , astesda sug dan docuncum dou Allah naugb yen , kaba , dan indoc momogo touwero . Doba dan docuncum dou en dara dan indoc agahugouhw an yen namcir .
50001004	
50001005	
50001006	Anai dan decinaga dau sug en ebiji naugb en ens meijen geicara geigouhw dou yen sug aimougtutohob , kaba , dag en emamsoho yen touwero . Doba en arautut yen se gin terimda edebeij Lona Sug Krisdus Yesus En Ecicugwen toua .
50001007	Areg graga augwan , kaba , oihirir areg se misen namcir . Anai sug Allah eigdoumesa dan indoho naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud sug nosa , kaba , yen yemehig dau dan touwero . Doba sug dan doho meh dougwo gini , era dan dos dadi Mer Geigouhw gini se geica dou lusud , hanoba len louf dan se tu gesisug iteitogin icira gin toua , kaba , yen yemamsoho dan an gin touwero . Doba yen yedag hom dara dan se indan geicara gin terimdohob . Dangga hang , dan indoc moc dougwo yen touwero . Doba dan damimiri an yen terimda toua .
50001008	Hang dan indoc gororougb yen medam dag gin , kaba , aninim dag Krisdus Yesus enin medoc gororougb maman sug nosa touohob . Dan dacgeij Allah naugb en ouma debin gin dag dan denara se misen namcir .
50001009	Sug dan indoc gororougb yen dag ginohob , kaba , dan docuncum dou Allah , dauntoba en ousa yen naugb yen meigdoc gororougwim . Dara en eic mou ouforoho dou yen , dauntoba yen yecinaga areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes . Dara yen yed aremeijouhw aingma aingma augwan daum terimda toua .
50001010	Anai sug yen meiju auti dag ginohob , kaba , eic goubesa dou yen naugb yen yemaimo areg gecgu toua deitero . Doba se aremer augwan gin , kaba , yen yaimo ucina gedag beim dara gobosboro anim ucucugb toua terimda . Hang se Lona Sug Krisdus En Ecicugwen , kaba , en emowun yen meijoho an aremer hom touwero . Doba yen yecabeci deseino en .
50001011	Anai ogdoc Yesus Krisdus men goubesa gin , kaba , yen yaimo areg geigouhw atij bobdaga an lusud laugwan namcirohob . Hang emeic dag len leigdoumesa dara lagahugouhw an Allah icira meijen geicara gin toua terimda .
50001012	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , dan douwan dens dau lusud meren geicara dou dan sug nosa meijouhw augwan asesa dou yen touahabi . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dag augwan gini , kaba , emedag sogo maga dougwo Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin touwero . Doba eic dag agaha becinten leng lesedougwo mougt mera gouji en men tu dara lusud gus laugwan namcirohob .
50001013	Dangga hang , len laugwan gin , kaba , lemecinaga dag lusud lemouf dan se tu gesisug emogdoc indan geicara gecgwero . Doba ogdoc sug dan desai Krisdus moro dou lusud gin dous .
50001014	Dara dan insir se Krisdus , kaba , sug len leiya dag dan demahau dau sug dan deigtou se tu gesisug ginero . Doba dan deic indus naugb dan dos dadi Krisdus moho deseino lusud laugwan terimda , kaba , eic leinyana dag len toua lemahau dau sug len lesai Krisdus moro dou lusud touwero . Doba len laiyan meigdocesem naugb len lebedbed en mer gini edreg dau nosa dou lusud deit .
50001015	Dara ligbum , kaba , dan decinaga dag len lemesai Krisdus moro dou lusud dareg len merdoc emeigouhw an danero . Doba len lebedbed dou lusud , anai len leclulan indan mera einyanohob . Dara len louwan lenara laisedim eisaugb areg dan debedbed gin toua terimda . Dangga hang , len lemesai Krisdus moro dou lusud dara len merdoc emecabeci touwero . Doba len lebedbed dara merdoc hwai dous . Anai len louwan dau sug len lebedbed dou lusud , kaba , lusud gini leigdoumesa len meroho an gin toua namcir . Dara len loudesa dau sug dan douman dau gini se tu gesisug , kaba , dag augwan gini eic dan indoc momogo dou dan toua deitahabi . Doba len gus , kaba , len lecinaga dag Allah eigdoumesa dan indoho naugb dan debehnehino dougwo Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dag misenohob . Hang len lemebedbed Krisdus mer dareg merdoc emecgu an danero . Doba len lesai Krisdus moro , anai len merdoc gororougb dan toua terimdohob .
50001016	
50001017	
50001018	Doba sug lusud lesai Krisdus moro naugb sug len leic momogo dou dan . Era len lebedbed en mer , aimo dau sug len merdoc gororougb dan , kaba , augwan gini inggaida . Doba areg esloulougb , kaba , dag len lesai Krisdus moro dou lusud hom dous . Anai sug len leicara dag gini , kaba , eic dag dan indoc eigouhw an gin namcirohob .
50001019	Dara dan demarges dau gin touwero . Doba dan indoc agahugouhw terimda . Anai dan decinaga ogdoc sug yen yocuncum dou Allah naugb dan , dara ogdoc sug Mena Gogoufu men goubesa ousa dan toua , kaba , dag dan demeigtou se tu gesisug gin terimdero . Doba dan indina agau dau aremer gin augwan namcir . Anai Krisdus en esa Mena Gogoufu se dan indoc mesohob .
50001020	Doba sug dan indina agau dau aremer gini , era len leic gomom dou dan toua , doba augwan gin , kaba , inggaida . Anai areg dan douwan dara dan indoc erleij icira gin , kaba , dag dan demahau dau aremer gogom hom touwero . Doba sug aremer gakebin dan iteitogini , era aremer gus augwan gen aud dan se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , dan deic indus naugb dan demobsara dau hom touwero . Doba dan daimo areg Allah esedeb naugb dan augwan toua terimda . Dauntoba se indan geicara augwan , kaba , dan deicara naugb daigdoumesa Krisdus enin moho dous . Anai dan decinaga dau sug dan deicara dag gin , kaba , dag igdebes emeba dan se aremer hom touwero . Doba dan indoc ebtou namcir .
50001021	Anai naugb dan , kaba , sug indireseb gini dag dan deicara daimo Krisdus hom dous . Era sug len leic gomom dou dan , doba indan mera einyana eb naugb dan touohob .
50001022	Doba sug dan indina agau , kaba , dan dec mera einyana icira gin toua deit . Dangga dan douci ara deita ?
50001023	Anai dan indoc erleij naugb dan domom dous , dauntoba dan deigtou desij Krisdus . Anai gini eigouhw edreg dau areg gus augwan namcir .
50001024	Doba naugb yen , kaba , esloulougb dag dan indireseb an yen , dauntoba dan desedougwo yen dara dan dousa yen terimdahabi . Hang iteitogin , kaba , gomom dara maireseb laic dan anim terimdaba .
50001025	Sug dan decinaga , doba esloulougb naugb dan deigtou an yenahabi , kaba , dan dod indina debsa dag dan indina agau an yen toua . Dauntoba dan darautut yen naugb yen meigdoc mes eiloboro aud Krisdus edreg dau nosa deit . Dara dan dousa yen naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an en edreg dau nosa . Dauntoba sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an en bedreg dag ginohob , kaba , eic dag yen yagahugouhw an en eiseisaugb terimda toua .
50001026	Dan douwan deicara dag gini dou yen , dauntoba sug dan dedebeij yen deitohob , kaba , eic dag yen yeimiman Krisdus Yesus an dan edreg dau nosa namcir toua . Anai yen yedag hom dara en touohob .
50001027	Doba sug dan dedebeij yen sungga , era dan demedebeij yenero , kaba , dan douwan naugb lusud ledecic dou dan dag yen yemarges dau Krisdus men ucina gin touwero . Doba yen meiju hom anim namcir naugb yen yes agadgeij terimda . Dara dan douwan naugb len ledenara dou dan dag yen yemobsara dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus gin touwero . Doba yen meigdoc dag hom naugb yen yehin gunini icira gin terimda toua . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yaimo areg Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus arougb yen an gin augwan bedeinyumohob .
