Anai augwan gini , kaba , esloulougb medam edreg dau areg gus augwan namcir .
50001028	Dangga sug meijen moc leic mog erij dou yen , kaba , yen yemahau dau gin touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij terimda . Anai sug Allah eija yen sug nosa , kaba , en emeija yen naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dousero . Doba en esedeb yen naugb yen yesogwa deisa Krisdus mohotimei mohw se ucina mog erij gin touohob . Dangga sug len leiya dag yen yemahau dau lenero , doba yen yes agadgeij namcir , kaba , gini eb ainyes dou len dag se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , Allah eic mor mor se dum smougb dou len toua . Doba yen , kaba , dag en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou yen dous . Anai len leiya , doba Allah enin eng eic goubesa dou yen . Hang yen yemahau dau len touwero , doba yen yeic meijus dou len terimda .
50001029	
50001030	Dangga yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij namcir naugb yen yaimo dan se ucina gin toua terimda . Aninim dag yen yeiya dag dan daimo ucina mog erij gini sug nosa touohob . Dara yen youman dag iteitogin , kaba , dan daimo Yesus se ucina mog erij gin touaba .
50002001	Dan denara daino yen meijin an areg dan dog dou yen graga , dendagai : Sug yen meigdoc dag hom dara Krisdus gin , kaba , eic dag yen meigdoc ongkogos naugb aremer augwan . Dara sug en medoc gororougb yen , kaba , eic dag en oho geigouhw se yen meigdoc mes . Dara sug yen meigdoc dag hom ucucugb dara Mena Gogoufu , dara sug yen meigdoc eigouhw , dara eineg anim dag gin touohob , kaba , dan desulou yen dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba yen yemobsara dau gin touwero . Doba yen yedag hom naugb yen yohw yen meiju anim se aremer augwan . Dara yen meigdoc anim ucucugb . Hanoba yen meijir dag hom naugb yen meiju , aimo ucina hom gin toua terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , eic dag dan indoc eigouhw medam , dara ebtou dou dan touohob .
50002002	
50002003	Dangga hang , se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yemaugb meijaga dougwo len gus . Dara yen yemeic ara ara naugb yemaimiman yenin an gin deseino len gus touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga anim ucucugb . Hanoba yen yeicara yaigdoumesa len gus meroho agas bedreg dau yenin toua .
50002004	Dara yen yemauwam an yenin meijen aremer eng esloulougb emedreg dau len gus touwero . Doba yen yauwam an len gus meren aremer ucucugb ginahabi , yen yemauwam an yenin meijen aremer gin toua .
50002005	Dangga hang , se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yemedreg dau Krisdus men geicara hom touwero . Doba yen meiju aninim dag en toua namcir . Hanoba yen yesogwa deisa en mohotimei mohw an meijen geicara augwan toua terimda .
50002006	Anai en , kaba , en mog toua dag Allah teiteiyohob . Doba en emauwam an en moho dag Allah gin touwero .
50002007	Doba en arges gin augwan deb , aimo dau areg enin ogod an deb sug nosohob . Hanoba sug en eic en maga dag lusud misenohob , kaba , en owun enin moho dag sogougb toua .
50002008	Dangga sug en edag lusud misen dag ginohob , kaba , en owun enin medoc mes arjaga naugb en aimo Allah en mer aud sug en omom taiba sogo salib naugb maman toua .
50002009	Hang Allah emeic moho dou en , hanoba eigdoumesa en moho agas medam bedreg dau lusud gus laugwan namcir .
50002010	Dauntoba leng se bogo , dara leng se cinogo gini , dara leng leigtou se cinogo mei len laugwan lecguna dou en dara lesijaresa en .
50002011	Hanoba len los ladi Yesus Krisdus en moho deseino len gus dag meren Adehsud toua terimda . Anai sug len leicara dag gin , kaba , eic dag lusud leigdoumesa en Mena Allah en moho agas terimda touohob .
50002012	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij gedig dan indoc gororougb yen , sug Krisdus medoc edag beim an Allah en mer dag ginohob , kaba , dan dacgeij yen naugb yen yemarges dau areg dan darougb yen an gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo dan indir sug dan deigtou aigusi dau yen gin bedreg dau nosa deit . Aninim dag yen yaimo dan indir sug dan indugwengga desij yen sug nosa touohob . Hanoba yen yemarges dau ucina aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yaimo ucina gin dareg yen meigdoc eijesa dara yahau dau Allah toua terimda .
50002013	Anai enin eng moongga se yen meigdoc mes naugb en arautut yen meigdoc mes . Hanoba en eic goubesa dou yen naugb yen yaimo areg enin ouwan toua namcir .
50002014	Hang se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yemenara ucucugb anim . Dara yen meijir yemauwim touwero .
50002015	Doba sug yen yeigtou desij lusud gedig len merdoc agabi , dara len merdoc ogor naugb leicara ecgu se cinogo gin , kaba , yen yedag beim naugb yen yaimo areg gecabeci dara obosboro an len terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yens yenin ainyes dou len dag yen yedag Allah mogwihi mogo gedig yen yedag lusud mos ginohob . Hanoba len lemowun yen meijoho an aremer hom touwero . Doba len leigdoumesa yen meijoho an meijen geicara gin terimda .
50002016	Dangga hang , sug yen yesai mer geic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou len gin , kaba , yen yedag tebeij mouf gaisema len se ucina gin toua namcir . Sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , eic cumougt dou dan naugb dan deigdoumesa dan indoho an yen se Lona Sug Krisdus En Ecicugb gin toua . Anai meijen geicara geigouhw gini , kaba , ens ainyes dou dan dag dan demeic dan indug erij augwougwero . Doba mera einyana eb naugb danohob .
50002017	Doba sug Allah ogod an dan dag len gus leir dan indugwihi debin meijen geicara gini dag gauwaharo dou en , kaba , gini emeic dan indoc emeijesa dou danero . Doba eic dag dan indoc agahugouhw medam an gin namcir . Hanoba dan douwan dag dan indoc gagahugouhw gin , kaba , aga gerleij se yen toua . Anai meijen geicara geigouhw gin , kaba , ansins dag yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag misen . Hang edag gauwaharo misen dou Allah touohob .
50002018	Dara dan douwan naugb sug yen meigdoc agahugouhw an ginohob , kaba , dag yen yeic gerleij dou dan toua .
50002019	Doba sug maman Adehsud Yesus en ouwan , kaba , dan demesa Timotius aud yen . Dauntoba sug en ecicugb , hanoba en edens dau meijen geicara augwan dou dan , kaba , eic dag dan indoc ebtou dou dan . Anai dan dod indina debsa maman Adehsud dag dan demomom dau yen touwero . Doba dan indina agau an yen terimdahabi .
50002020	Dara dan desa Timotius enin eng aud yen . Anai len gus laugwan , kaba , len lemehilon areg esloulougb naugb Yesus Krisdusero . Doba len lehilon areg esloulougb naugb lenin dous . Doba Timotius gin , kaba , en hom eng medoc amimiri an meijen geicara augwan namcir . Anai en hom eng aman amdoc an yen dous . Dangga hang , dan demesa en aud yen toua .
50002021	
50002022	Anai yenin yen yecinaga dau sug aman amesai Krisdus moro dou lusud sug nosa , kaba , dag en emobsara dau sug mog erij eb naugb aman touwero . Doba en aiyan medocesem naugb en es agadgeij namcir . Hang en edag areg mera eisaugb naugb dan , aninim dag meisi edeijan mena toua .
50002023	Dangga sug dan douman , doba len logod an dan dag dan indina agauwohob , kaba , dan demesa en dedemeda aud yen toues . Naro , kab , naro .
50002024	Dara dan dod indina debsa maman Adehsud dau sug dan indina agauwohob , kaba , dag en ousa dan naugb dan danin toua demdeiya yen dedemeda toues .
50002025	Doba len lemogod indan aremer deinaugb danbuma . Gin , kaba , dan dogod se dan indoc mes naugb dan desa maman mamaguna Epaproditus ucugb aud yen naugb en edesa baihnehina dougwo yenahabi . Anai en ouman dag yen toua yecinaga dau sug en areba medam desij dan suginohob . Dangga hang , en medoc erleij naugb en edens enin mog dedemeda dou yen , dauntoba en enara bad yen meigdoc mesahabi . Anai en medoc momogo eisaugb gin terimda .
50002026	En ouwan dangga , anai sug nosa , kaba , yen yesa en aud dan naugb en eperwei yen meijuhw an dan . Dauntoba areg ingmemeb naugb danero , kaba , en eic dou dan toua . Dara en emousa dan se dan indaga dousero . Doba en aimo dan naugb aman amahwas amesai Krisdus moro dou lusud . Dara en eic mos naugb sug aman amebehnehino dougwo Krisdus mer misen gin touohob .
50002027	Eisaugb en , kaba , en areba medam naugb sug en omom an namcir . Doba Allah medoc eineg an en naugb en eigdoumesa en ucugwohob . Dara Allah medoc emeineg an en dousero , doba en medoc eineg an dan toua . Dauntoba gini emeic dan indoc momogo ingma dara dou dan touwero .
50002028	Dangga sug yen toua youman eisaugb gareba ginohob , kaba , dan indoc eiloboro medam naugb dan desa en audi yenbo dedemeda toua . Dauntoba sug yen yeiya en mog se yen meijiresohob , kaba , yen meigdoc momogo deitero . Doba yen meigdoc ebtou namcir . Hanoba eic dan indoc ebtou dou dan toua .
50002029	Dangga sug en edebeij yenohob , kaba , yen yebin en dara yen meigdoc agahugouhw naugb en toua . Anai en ohw en mougt edug naugb en esai yen meijuro . Dauntoba en ousa dan icira Krisdus mer , hang aremebeni naugb en emahauwa icira gin touohob . Dara yen yemeicara dag gin dou en dousero . Doba gareg men geicara aninim dag enohob , kaba , yen yeicara dag gin dou len toua .
50002030	
50003001	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug dan dog surad gin sug ouwedoc , kaba , dan douwan desulou yen mougwa hom deit , dauntoba yen yemobsara dau Krisdus touwero . Doba sug yen yedag hom dara maman Adehsud ginohob , kaba , yen meigdoc eigouhw medam an en toua terimda . Dara sug dan dog surad ucucugb dou yen gin , kaba , emeic dag indoc emogom touwero . Doba dan indirs eijouhw naugb dan desulou yen dag gin namcir . Anai dan decinaga dau sug yen yaimo gin terimda , kaba , dag gogom emeb naugb yen toua deitero . Doba maireseb menau geb huhugb eb deinaugb yenohob .
50003002	Dangga hang , yen yebehnehino yenin meigdoc mes dougwo leng Krisden dau leng Yahudi gedig len louwan naugb lehigeij lusud meraga dau toua namcir . Anai len loudesa dau sug len lec merus dau dara len laimo Musa men gomnomna aud gousanara laos dara toua , kaba , gin eng eic dag len ledag Allah mehir misenohob . Hanoba len merug mog dag mihi naugb len lagodgod lusud , dauntoba len lec merus dau toua terimda .
50003003	Dobnaro . Len lemedag Allah mehir misen emogdoc sug len leicara dag ginero . Doba mamang Krisden eng madag Allah mehir misen dous . Anai maman , kaba , maman mamod mamina debsa Musa men gomnomna aud gousanara . Dara maman mamec maman mamus dau naugb sug Allah eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou maman touwero . Doba sug maman mamdoc dag hom dara Krisdus Yesus dag ginohob , kaba , maman magahugouhw an en terimda . Hanoba maman mamesijaresa Allah emogdoc areg Musa men gomnomna arougb maman an gin toua deitero . Doba maman masijaresa Allah ogdoc areg Mena Gogoufu arautut maman aud gin dous . Hang gin eng edag lec merus dau dag misenohob .
50003004	Doba gareg en ec mos dau dara en aimo Musa men gomnomna aud gousanara . Hanoba en od mena debsa augwan gini edeinyum naugb sug Allah eic maireseb huhugb dou en , kaba , dan eng daimo augwan gini edreg dau len laugwan namcirohob . Hang emedeinyum naugb sug dan dod indina debsa gin dag misen toua .
50003005	Anai lona senggemoi debin dau sug dan indim ouwadan dan , kaba , len lec dan indus dau . Dangga dan dedag leng Yahudi toua teisis namcirohob . Dara sug macic mameijouhuda , kaba , dani Benyamin medebeito dan toua . Anai dan injemouwer , kaba , ingma susugwero , doba len laugwan dau leng Ibrani . Hang dan toua dedag leng Ibrani misenohob . Dara eisaugb Musa men gomnomna gin , kaba , dan daimo augwan edreg dau len gus laugwan toua . Anai dan toua dedag sud hom dau leng Parisi ginohob .
50003006	Dangga eisaugb Musa men gomnomna gin , kaba , lusud lemowun dan indoho an aremer hom touwero . Anai dan deic induwemougb esesa naugb dan daimo augwan gin namcirohob . Hang dan indoc emesgiraha an leng Krisden touwero . Doba dan deic mog erij dou len terimda . Anai dan doudesa endag sug dan daimo gini , kaba , eic Allah medoc esgiraha an dan . Hanoba emeic gerleij dou dan se gin terimda toua .
50003007	Dangga sug nosa , kaba , dan insoho mougb an Musa men gomnomna gin augwan namcirohob . Doba ogdoc Krisdus gin hom , hang dan indoho emobsara dau augwan . Dauntoba dan decinaga areg geb se indan Adehsud Krisdus Yesus en medoc mes augwan asesa toua . Anai gin , kaba , mera eisaugb medam edreg dau areg mohon graga augwan namcir . Dangga ogdoc en , hang dan demaimo areg mohon toua deitero , doba dan darges dau augwan . Hanoba dan dowun augwan graga dag mihi mor meiyema toua . Dauntoba sug dan deic Krisdus dag danin indanohob , kaba , dan dedag hom dara en toua terimda .
50003008	
50003009	Hang dan demeic induwemougb esesa naugb Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou dan dau sug dan demaimo Musa men gomnomna gin toua deitero . Doba sug dan indoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag gin , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou danohob . Anai en emeic gesgigouhwesa dou maman emogdoc mamanin maman geicara ginero . Doba dau sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an Krisdus hom dous .
50003010	Sug dan dedag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , dan indoc erleij aud aremer hom gin dous . Aremer hom gin , kaba , dag dan decinaga areg geb se Krisdus enin medoc mes augwan asesa namcir . Hanoba dan deicara daimo en an Allah men goubesa areg en eic naugb aigdoumesa Krisdus dau gomom sug nosa . Dara dan indoc erleij naugb dan daimo en asa ucina mog erij . Dauntoba indan gauwamara augwan , kaba , aninim dag en men gauwamara aud sug en omom gin toua .
50003011	Anai sug dan deicara dag gin , kaba , dan dod indina debsa Allah dag dan domom terimdero . Doba en eigdoumesa dan dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toues .
50003012	Dangga hang , dan demarges dau ucina gin touwero . Doba dan deic induwemougb esesa . Dauntoba areg Krisdus Yesus os dou danohob sug en agaigeij dan sug nosa , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau dan touwero . Doba dan desma augwan gini dag misen namcir . Anai iteitogini , kaba , dan demdaimo deisa usi naugb demesma gin . Hang emedeinyum naugb sug Allah emeigdoumesa dan indoho naugb gin touebma .
50003013	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug dan decinaga dag dan demesma augwan gini dag misenbuma , kaba , dan demaimo indan geicara mohon augwan toua deitero . Doba dan dohw dan indidgo dou namcir . Hanoba dan dobga audi areg geb ino dan indin dara dan den indinesa naugb dan desma augwan gin toua .
50003014	Dangga hang , dan demeitig dau ucina misen gin touwero . Doba dan dobga dobosboro asa ucina gin namcir . Dauntoba maireseb menau geb huhugb se bogo emediyebeiya dau dan touwero . Doba dan dedesma toua . Anai sug Allah eija dan naugb dan dedag hom dara Krisdus sug nosa , kaba , en os augwan gini dag mogud dou danohob .
50003015	Dara gareg dau yen , en edag lusud mos se Krisdus touohob , kaba , eigouhw naugb en emeitig enin dau ucina misen gin touwero . Doba en medoc aninim dara dan naugb aman amobga asa ucina misen aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toua terimda . Doba gareg dau yen , en mou baiso ara gus dougwo ucina misen gin , kaba , dan dacgeij Allah naugb en ens areg se misen dou en touahabi .
50003016	Doba sug sud hom medoc aninim dara danohob , era en mou aiso ara gus dougwaba , kaba , gini emesloulougwero . Doba esloulougb dag areg maman macinagohob , kaba , maman mamarges deb touwero . Doba maman maicara maimo gin terimda .
50003017	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , yen yemarges dau dan indohotimei mohw an indan geicara gin touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo dan terimda . Dara gareg dau yen en emaimo ginbuma , kaba , yen yehigdecin leng laimo emenohob , dauntoba yen yeicara yaimo dangga toua .
50003018	Anai leinyana merugwengga desij yen , kaba , len leigdoumesa areg len merdoc etrij icira dag seiseij naugb lenin terimdaba . Dara areg eic igdebes dou lusud , kaba , len leimiman lenin an gin terimda toua . Anai len merdoc emebdebin an areg gen dau bogoro , doba len merdoc ebdebin an areg geb se cinogo gin dous . Dangga hang , edebeij Lona Sug Ouwedoc gin , kaba , Allah ahacugb len merur mor se dum smougb namcir toua . Anai meren geicara , kaba , aiyan Krisdus an men gomom taiba sogo salib gin debohob . Hang len lemedag en mesir misen toua deitero . Doba len ledag men moc dous . Dan desulou yen dougwo len gin sugragohob . Doba dan desulou yen dougwo len deit dara dan deb dara dan indoc momogo an gin terimda toua .
50003019	
50003020	Doba maman , kaba , maman mamdoc emebdebin an areg geb se cinogo gin deitero . Doba maman mamdoc ebdebin an areg geb se bogo hom dous . Anai maman madag magun sunggohob . Dangga hang , maman maigtou mateteij dara mabehibeh dougwo Lona Sug Maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus En Ecicugwen gin toua namcir . Anai enin , kaba , en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwanohob .
50003021	Hanoba sug en en gin , kaba , en eperwei maman mamaga gomomtom dara getaha gini aninim dag enin maga gebsa gogouf cucugb gini , aimo dau men goubesa an maman toua . Anai men goubesa gin , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug en aiyan ara ara augwan eb tainya en mohora gin toua namcirohob .
50004001	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij gedig dan indoc gororougb yen , sug maman madag magun se bogo dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamobsara dau maman Adehsud gin touwero . Doba maman maiyan mamdocesem naugb maman madag hom dara en terimda . Dan desulou yen dag gin ucucugb . Anai dan indoc gororougb yen dousero . Doba meijen geicara eigdoumesa dan indoho . Hang dan dagahugouhw dara dan indoc emerleij aud yen toua namcir .
50004002	Dara dan desulou Yodia dara Sintiki yan , dauntoba yan maijir emedregim toua deitero . Doba yan maigdoc aninim terimda . Anai yan yahwas yadag hom dara maman Adehsud gin touohob .
50004003	Dara dan dacgeij dan insi ban , dauntoba ban bemarges lan gin deb touwero . Doba ban besa se lan marufu , dauntoba lan ladag hom deit . Anai lan gini dara Klemens an dan insir gus sungga , kaba , len laugwan leic len merug erij desij dan naugb emen emesai Krisdus moro dou lusud sug nosohob . Aninim dag ban bemarges dan deb touwero . Doba ban beic ban abug erij desij dan sug nosa naugb nanan nasai Krisdus moro dou lusud terimda touohob . Hang len gin , kaba , Allah emogu len meroho deb se Surad Maireseb Huhugb gin toua namcir .
50004004	Dangga hang , sug yen meigdoc dag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , yen meigdoc momogo touwero . Doba yen meigdoc agahugouhw namcir . Dara dan dou dan indir se hom gin deit dag yen meigdoc momogo touwero . Doba yen meigdoc agahugouhw terimda .
50004005	Hang yen yemeicara ohonohobo touwero . Doba yen yeb ara arjaga an len gus laugwan . Anai Lona Sug Maman Adehsud En Ecicugwen , kaba , ebeij deinyor namcirohob .
50004006	Dara yen meigdoc emeijesa an ara ara touwero . Doba sug meijen ara ara ingmemeb naugb yenero , kaba , yen yacgeij augwan gin dau Allah enin dous . Hanoba yen yen sijo debin gin dou en toua terimda .
50004007	Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen meigdoc emeijesa icira ara ara touwero . Doba sug yen yedag hom dara Krisdusohob , kaba , Allah eic yen meigdoc ebtou dou yen . Dara yen meigdoc gebtou gin , kaba , edreg dau areg mamanin mamou maiso toua terimda .
50004008	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug areg dan dog dou yen se surad gini deinyor sug ouwedoc gin , kaba , dan douwan desulou yen mougwa hom deit , dauntoba yen yemamimiri an areg gecgu mougwa hom toua deitero . Doba yen yauwan an areg gedag beim dara areg lusud leigdoumesa yen meijoho an gin dous . Dangga hang , yen yemereiyara dara yen yemerba mohoisa toua deitero . Doba yen yaimo areg se geica , dara areg mera eisaugb , dara areg obosboro , dara areg gecabeci , dara areg geic lusud merdoc eigouhw an , dara areg len leigdoumesa dag moho agas augwan gini dous . Hanoba yen yeicara yaimo anim toua terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yaimo areg mera eisaugb dara areg geic lusud merdoc agahugouhw an yen icira gin toua namcirohob .
50004009	Dara areg gus gedig dan desulou yen an gin , hanoba yen yeiya dau indan geicara sug nosa touohob , kaba , yen yemehig dau gin touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo augwan gin terimda . Anai sug yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa se gin dangga , kaba , maman Allah eseyeiyo yen dara eic gesgigouhwesa dou yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua namcir .
50004010	Dara dan indoc esgiraha an yen toua . Anai yen yens dag yen meigdoc an dan mougwa hom dou dan deitohob . Dan decinaga dag yen meigdoc moc dougwo danero . Doba dau sug nosa terimda iteitogin , kaba , cumougt ingmemeb naugb yenero . Hang yen yemens yen meigdoc mes dou dan touwero gini . Dan denara dou yen dag gin , anai dan dedag hom dara maman Adehsud gin touohob .
50004011	Areg dan den dou yen gini , kaba , dag dan demenara ucucugb an yen touwero . Anai sug ared moongga , era sug mogero naugb dan , kaba , dan dainyen se augwan . Hang emeic dan indoc eijesa dou dan touwero . Doba areg eb naugb dan , kaba , dan indoc ebtou an ginohob .
50004012	Dangga sug dan det ared geigouhw , era sireba dan toua , dara sug dan desma ara einyana , era desma gurereito , kaba , augwan gini emeic dan indoc momogo dou dan deitero . Doba sug dan dainyen se aremer augwan dag ginohob , kaba , eic dag dan indoc esgiraha an namcir . Anai dan decinaga dau sug ared ingmaro , era ared einyana eb naugb dan men meijouhw augwan asesa dag misen namcirohob .
50004013	Dara dan indoc emebtou icira ared gin dousero . Doba sug dan dedag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , en eic goubesa dou dan naugb dan daiyan indocesem se aremer gus augwan toua terimda .
50004014	Dangga areg dan dog dou yen graga , kaba , yen youdesa dag dan dowun yen meijoho an gin touei ? Naro , dan demowun yen meijoho an ginero .
50004015	Anai yen yenin yecinaga dau sug dan deihwededau yen se leng Makedonia meren hancob naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou len gus sug aimougtut , kaba , dag goucimdeb hom ingma emousa dan touwero . Doba yen dous eng yousa dan dara aregoufu ucucugb terimdohob .
50004016	Dangga sug dan desai Krisdus moro dou leng se cinogo Tesalonika , kaba , yen yemehig dau dan touwero . Doba yen yousa dan dara aregoufu mougwa hom icira touohob . Dangga hang , areg yen yesa dou dan gin , iteitogin , kaba , dag dan demesbes an gin touwero . Doba dan deigdoumesa yen meijoho an gin namcir .
50004017	Dara areg dan den dou yen dag yen yousa dan ucucugb dag ginohob , kaba , dag dan demenara dematagaij yeng Pilipi an meijen aremougb touwero . Doba dan dahilon , dauntoba yen meijisoho mougb namcir . Anai dan decinaga dau sug yen yousa dan dara aremougb dag gin terimda , kaba , yen yeised huga medam deinaugb yeninohob .
50004018	Dara areg yen yesa dou dan ogdoc Epaproditus gin , kaba , aninim dag yen yemoc indan aremeij dou dan dousero . Doba yen yeic edreg dau gin dou danohob . Dangga hang , Allah en ohu mebesesa gin namcir . Anai augwan gini dag yen yeic areg mena ouwedebeda naugb yen yauwaharo dou en touohob .
50004019	Hang ogdoc Krisdus , kaba , indan Allah en emeic areg emeb naugb yenbuma augwan dou yen toua . Anai en mesoho mougb namcir .
50004020	Dangga eigouhw naugb maman maigdoumesa maman Mamina Allah en moho an gin toua beb huhugb terimda . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
50004021	Dara yen yen dou Allah men lusud hom yom sungga dag len laugwan meriresi . Anai len toua ledag hom dara Krisdusohob . Dara dan indaguner gedig len leigtou desij dan an leng Krisdus sugin , kaba , emen emaugwan emou yen . Doba aimougtut , kaba , leng leigtou se mougt mera medam men tu len lou yen toua .
50004022	
50004023	Maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus eic geigouhw dou yen yaugwan toua terimda .
51001001	Surad gini dau dang , Paulus , dou Allah men lusud se cinogo Kolose yen yaugwan . Anai Allah enin eng ouci dan , hanoba en eigdoumesa dan naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus Yesus dou lusud laugwanohob . Dara maman mamaguna Timotius en ouma debin areg dan dog dou yen gin toua .
51001002	Dan dog surad gini dou yen , anai yen toua yedag aman amaguner dara aman amdamouwer se Krisdus . Dara yen yemobsara dau en touwero , doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem . Hanoba yen yes agadgeij naugb yen yaimo en dara yen meigdoc hom toua namcirohob . Dangga hang , aman amacgeij maman Mamina Allah naugb en medoc eigouhw an yen , dara en eseyeiyo yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua terimda .
51001003	Dara emen ememarges dau sug emen emocuncum dou maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus en Mena Allah naugb yen touwero . Doba astesda sug emen emocuncum dou en , kaba , emen emen sijo medam dou en naugb yen terimda .
51001004	Anai emen emouman dag yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dara yen meigdoc gororougb Allah men lusud len laugwan toua namcirohob .
51001005	Yen yeicara dag gini , anai sug lusud lesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen sug aimougtut , kaba , len lens dau areg Allah esedeb naugb lusud ogdoc Krisdus augwan asesa dou yen touohob . Dangga hang , sug yen youman dau areg se geica gin , kaba , yen yemobsara dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dara sug yen meigdoc gororougb Allah men lusud gini touwero . Doba arautut yen naugb yen yeicara yaimo dag gin toua terimda . Anai yen yecinaga dag areg Allah os dou yenohob , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau yenero . Doba eb naugb yen beb huhugb se bogo namcir . Hang yen yemetogoto en mer an areg en os dou yen gin touwero . Doba yen yod meijina debsa en an gini toua terimda .
51001006	Dara Allah en Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin , kaba , era mera bagaha becinten dou lusud se cinogo augwan . Aninim dag yen toua , sug yen youman dau Allah medoc an yen . Hanoba yen meigdoc obgesa augwan dag misen , kaba , eic dag yen yera mera einyana icira gin toua namcirohob .
51001007	Mer Geigouhw gin , kaba , yen youman dau emen emsi hom , moho Epapras , sug en esai mer augwan gini dou yen sug nosa . En , kaba , emen emdoc gororougb en namcirohob . Anai en , kaba , en emobsara dau sug en esai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin touwero , doba en aimo augwan gini dara en medoc hom an terimda . Hanoba en eperwei emen emuhw naugb en ens augwan dou yen toua .
51001008	Dangga sug en ecicugb aud emen suginohob , kaba , en ecic dau meijen geicara sug yen meigdoc gororougb lusud ogdoc Mena Gogoufu men goubesa meijouhw augwan asesa dou emen toua .
51001009	Sug emen emouman dag ginohob , kaba , emen ememarges dau sug emen emocuncum dou Allah naugb yen touwero . Doba ebiji dau lona sug emen emouman dau meijen geicara ginohob , kaba , emen emacgeij en naugb en eic mou ouforoho dara mou auti bauloulo ogdoc Mena Gogoufu men goubesa dou yen . Dauntoba yen yecinaga areg Allah esedeb naugb sug yen yaimo augwan asesa dag misen toua namcir .
51001010	Anai sug yen meiju ouforoho dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemeigtou augwougb touwero . Doba eic dag se aremer augwan , kaba , yen yera mera areg geigouhw einyana . Dara yen yecinaga areg geb se Allah enin medoc augwan bauloulo . Hang Allah medoc emesrougb an yen touwero , doba eic dag en medoc eigouhw an yen esesa terimda . Anai yen yemedis dau areg en ouwan mougwa hom touwero . Doba yen yaimo areg en arougb yen an augwan dag misen namcir touohob .
51001011	Dangga hang , emen emacgeij Allah naugb en eic men goubesa geigouhw medam gini augwan dou yen . Dauntoba sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin , kaba , yen yemahau dau gin touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yaimo gin terimda . Dara sug lusud leic mog erij dara gogom dou yen dag gin , kaba , yen yemauni gogom ucugb dou len touwero . Doba yen yeigtou yateteij dara yen meigdoc agahugouhw an gin toua namcir .
51001012	Dara yen yemarges dau sug yen yen sijo dou maman Mamina Allah gin touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo dangga besesa terimda . Anai areg en esedeb naugb men lusud se men goiharaga dag gogouf cucugb ginohob , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba en eigdoumesa yen meijoho naugb en ogugwo areg en esedeb gin augwan dou yen toua namcir .
51001013	Anai sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus gin , kaba , maman sesar emeb naugb maman toua deitero . Doba sug Krisdus eic enin maga ancoho aga maman dou Allah naugb maman sesar dag ginohob , kaba , Allah eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwan . Hanoba en aigdougwo gin augwan dau maman toua namcir . Dangga hang , maman mamedag lobeigbogo men sogougb toua deitero . Doba Allah eigdoc maman dau men goubesa augwan . Hanoba en esohw maman se en Meisi men uro mes deb naugb sug en oiharaga maman ucugb toua terimda . Anai en medoc gororougb en Meisi gin toua namcirohob .
51001014	
51001015	Dara maman , kaba , maman mameiya Allah se maman mamires mougwa hom touebma . Doba Krisdus , kaba , en ens Allah eb ainyes dou maman . Anai en , kaba , en edag Allah en mog teiteiyohob . Dangga hang , en emedag Allah en Meis Mebin Geis Huhugb gedig en moho agas edreg dau areg Allah ahasesei dara esinsin augwan toua namcir .
51001016	Anai areg geb se bogo dara areg geb se cinogo , dara areg maman maiya dara areg maman mameiyero dag malaikad , dara merna mog an meren mougtir , dara leng lesedougwo lusud , dara leng meroho agas , kaba , Allah emahasesei dara emesinsin augwan gini dau enin dousero . Doba en esinsin augwan ogdoc en Meis mebin gin , hang en emedag mougt naugb augwan toua . Anai areg Allah en ahasesei dara en esinsin gin , kaba , augwan ogdoc en Meisi gin dous .
51001017	Sug en edag mougt naugb augwan dag ginohob , kaba , areg en ahasesei dara esinsin augwan toua emedregim touwero . Doba men goubesa edeinyum naugb augwan ec dara gesgiraha namcir . Anai sug augwan gini emebbuma , kaba , eni moongga sug nosohob .
51001018	Dara en edag mamang Krisden maman mougt mera medam . Hanoba en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou maman , aninim dag mougt eic maireseb dou maga toua . Anai en emomom terimdero . Doba Allah eigdoumesa en Meisi mebin gini acgunog dau leng lomom len laugwan ucugb touohob . Dauntoba se aremer augwan , kaba , en moho eb taiba dau augwan toua namcir .
51001019	Anai Allah enin eng ogod an deb dag en Meisi mebin gin , kaba , men goubesa emeb tainya men goubesa touwero . Doba en medoc esgirahesa en namcir naugb en ogugwo men goubesa augwan dou en . Dauntoba areg geb se Allah enin medoc mes , kaba , augwan eb se en Meisi gini en medoc mes toua .
51001020	Hanoba en ogod an toua dag ogdoc en Meisi mebin gin , kaba , en eic gesgigouhwesa dou leng se bogo dara maman se cinogo gin maman maugwan toua namcir . Anai sug en Meisi gini en omom taiba sogo salib dag ginohob , kaba , leng se bogo dara leng se cinogo len laugwan lemedag Allah men moc toua deitero . Doba maman maugwan mamdoc dag hom dara en ucugb touohob .
51001021	Sug nosa , kaba , Allah eija yen dag men moc ginohob . Anai areg yen yauwam an , dara areg yen yeicara yaimo , kaba , augwan dag mog mog terimda . Dangga hang , se lona ingga , kaba , yen yemeigtou desij Allah touwero , doba yen yeigtou aigusi dau en namcir .
51001022	Doba iteitogin , kaba , Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou yen ucugb . Anai en Meisi hom gin , kaba , en ohw en mougt edug se sogo salib naugb meijen sesar augwan dau yenohob . Hang aremer hom emdagunya debin yen , dara sud hom ingma emowun yen an ara ara toua deitero . Doba se lona sug Krisdus ahwan yen aud Allah , kaba , yen yecabeci deseino en namcirohob . Dara sug en omom taiba sogo salib gin , kaba , en emedag merna touwero . Doba sug en ouwaden dau bogo , hanoba en edomom taiba sogo salib gin , kaba , en omom an maga dag lusud misen toua .
51001023	Dangga yen yesedougwo yenin , dauntoba len gus lemerses yen dau Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus areg yen yod meijina debsa dag misenohob gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo augwan gini dara yen meigdoc hom terimda . Anai mer gin , kaba , edag buc gototo naugb yen . Hang lusud lemesai bagaha becinten dou len se cinogo augwan . Dara Allah enin eng eigdoumesa dan toua dag men sogougb . Hanoba en arougb dan naugb dan desai dou lusud laugwan touohob .
51001024	Sug Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus agaha becinten dag ginohob , kaba , dan indoc momogo an danin sug dan deigtou se tu gesisug icira yen gin touwero . Doba dan dagahugouhw an gin namcir . Anai sug dan deicara daimo dag gin , kaba , gini dag dan toua deic dan indug erij desij Krisdus naugb dan douci men lusud laugwan dahidahim naugb en . Anai men lusud gin , kaba , dag en maga , doba augwan emouwesebma .
51001025	Ogdoc men maga gini , hang Allah emeigdoumesa dan indoho dag meren sogougb naugb len . Dauntoba dan desai en Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus meijouhw augwan asesa dou yeng yugmahara toua , aimo dau areg en ogugwo dou danohob . Dauntoba yen yera mera icira gin toua terimda .
51001026	Dara Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin , kaba , Allah emens dou sud hom ingma dau sug acgunog touebma . Doba iteitogin , hang en emens dau augwan gini dou men lusud emeng Yahudi . Anai en ouci emen debinim naugb en deb sug nosohob .
51001027	En ens dau areg en ecgoneh gini dou men lusud emen . Dauntoba emen emecinaga dag augwan gini naugb emen dousero . Doba naugb lusud se cinogo gus gus len laugwan toua . Anai areg en ens gin , kaba , dag mera eisaugb dara moho agas namcir . Dara areg en ens dou emen ginohob , kaba , dag Krisdus ouwan einesa yeng yugmahara yen yaugwan meigdoc mes toua . Dangga hang , yen yemeigtou augwougb dag nosa toua deitero . Doba yen yod meijina debsa en an men gogouf cucugb gin toua terimda . Anai sug Krisdus einesa yen meigdoc mesohob , kaba , yen yecinaga dag Allah men gogouf cucugb gini emesa ijes dau yen touwero , doba eb naugb yen toua namcir .
51001028	Sug Allah ouwan naugb Krisdus einesa lusud laugwan merdoc mes dag ginohob , kaba , dan demarges dau sug dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb en dou lusud touwero . Doba ogdoc Krisdus men goubesa geb se dan indoc mes . Hang dan demeic dan indug erij dara dan demohw dan indugt edug naugb dan dedidib aremeijouhw debin gin dou lusud laugwan terimda , aimo dau mou ouforoho gedig Allah eic dou dan an gin toua . Hanoba dan desulou len toua dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba len lemobsara dau sug len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus gin touwero . Doba len les agadgeij namcir naugb len leiji dag lusud mos se en toua terimda . Anai dan demouwan naugb sug dan dahwan len aud Allah enohob , kaba , dag sud hom ingma dau len en emedag mahaniheni se Krisdus touwero , doba len laugwan ledag lusud mos deseino en dous .
51001029	
51002001	Dan dog dau areg graga augwan dou yen , anai dan douwan naugb yen yecinaga dag dan indoc emebtou touwero . Doba dan indoc egregra an yen , dara leng se Laodikia , dara leng gus gedig len lemeiya dan se len merires mougwa hom touebma , yen yaugwan namcir .
51002002	Anai dan demouwan naugb yen yemobsara dau Krisdus aud ara ara gus touwero . Doba dan douwan naugb yen yaiyan meigdocesem . Hanoba yen meigdoc yedag hom naugb yen meigdoc gororougwim beiseisaugb terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yecinaga areg Allah en ecgoneh dau lusud gus men meijouhw augwan asesa touohob . Hang yen yemeija meijuwesa Krisdus toua deitero , doba yen yod meijina debsa en terimda . Anai areg Allah ecgoneh dau lusud gin , kaba , emeisaugb ara gusero , doba eisaugb Krisdus gin dous .
51002003	Enin dous eng emens dau mou gouforoho dara mou auti areg geb se Allah enin medoc mes augwan asesa dou maman toua . Anai gini dag mesoho mougb areg Allah ecgoneh dau lusud laugwan sug nosohob .
51002004	Dangga hang , dan demesulou yen , dauntoba sug lusud lenara louseij merir dou yen , kaba , dag yen yemobsara dou sud hom ingma dau len touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij se Krisdus men ucina gin terimda .
51002005	Anai edag dan indug , kaba , aigusi dau yenohob . Doba se dan indoc mes , kaba , dan indugwengga desij yen terimda naugb dan deiya dag yen yemenara emedregimero , doba yen meigdoc dag hom namcir . Dara dan deiya dag yen yemobsara dau Krisdus touwero . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en dag buc gototo terimda touohob . Hang dan dagahugouhw an meijen geicara gin toua namcir .
51002006	Sug yen yebin Krisdus Yesus se yen meigdoc mes dag meijen mougtohob , kaba , yen yemobsara dau en touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo en an areg en arougb yen an toua terimda . Anai yen yedag hom dara enohob .
51002007	Hanoba yen yogo en dag buc gototo se yen meigdoc mes , kaba , yen yeiji dag lusud mos se en toua . Dara yen meigdoc emarges dau en touwero . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en , aimo dau areg emen emedidib dau gini dou yen sug nosohob . Dara yen yen sijo dou en besesa terimda toua .
51002008	Dangga hang , yen yesedougwo yenin , dauntoba sud hom ingma dau yen , kaba , en emeic dau lusud meren gauwamara naugb emahud yen dag sogougb touwero . Doba yen yebehnehino yenin dougwo gin terimda . Anai areg len lesai dou yen gin , kaba , emen dau Krisdusero . Doba aimo dau lusud meren gomnomna dara areg merna mog mog dara mindiri larautut len an dous . Anai len gin , kaba , len loiharaga lusud se cinogo gin augwan namcirohob . Hang meren gomnomna gin , kaba , emera mera geigouhw hom dou len touwero , doba dag augwougb dous .
51002009	Anai areg geb se Allah enin medoc mes , kaba , en emogugwo dou sud hom ingma touwero . Doba en ogugwo augwan gini dou Krisdus en hom gin dous . Dara sug en ouwaden dau bogo se cinogo gin , kaba , en emarges dau gin deb touwero . Doba sug en edag lusud misen se cinogo gin , kaba , augwan gini eb se en medoc mes toua teiteiyohob .
51002010	Dangga hang , sug yen yedag hom dara enohob , kaba , areg eisaugb maireseb menau geb huhugb , kaba , hom emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba en eic augwan batij bobdaga dangga dou yen toua . Anai sug Allah men goubesa augwan eb se Krisdus teitei dag ginohob , kaba , en moho eb taiba dau merna mog mog dara mindiri an meren mougt mera medam len laugwan toua namcirohob .
51002011	Dara sug yen yedag hom dara Krisdus dag gin , kaba , en ec yen meigdoc mes an areg gecgu dau yen toua . Hang augwan gin , kaba , emogdoc sug lusud misen lec yen meijus dauwero , doba ogdoc Krisdus enin men goubesa an yen dous . Sug en ec yen meigdoc mes an areg gecgu dau yen dag ginohob , kaba , areg yen meigdoc etrij icira emedag mougt naugb yen toua deitero . Doba en esga yen dau augwan gin namcirohob . Anai yen meigdoc getrij icira gin , kaba , ahwan yen aud sesar terimda .
51002012	Augwan gini aimo dau sug lusud logun yen se duhu sug nosa . Anai gini ansins dag yen yomom dara Krisdus dau areg mohon augwanohob . Dangga toua , sug len leigdoumesa yen dau duhu ucugb , kaba , gini aninim dag Allah eigdoumesa yen dau gomom aud maireseb menau dara Krisdus gin touohob . Doba augwan gin , kaba , ogdoc sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Allah men goubesa gin dous . Anai en , kaba , en eigdoumesa Krisdus dau gomom sug nosohob . Hang yen yod meijina debsa en dag en mobisamougb gin , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug en eigdoumesa yen dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toua .
51002013	Dangga sug nosa , kaba , yen yaugwan yomom namcirohob . Anai yen yemec areg yen meigdoc etrij icira dau yen meigdoc mes touebma . Doba yen yaiga Allah men hancob naugb yen yebesesar ucucugb terimdaba . Doba iteitogin , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa yen dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb dara Krisdus ucugb deit . Anai en aigdougwo maman sesar augwan ediyebeiya dau mamanohob .
51002014	Gin dauwohob , kaba , en oguc dougwo men gomnomna ogdoc Musa gedag aremeij dou maman augwan dau maman toua . Anai sug maman madreg areg men gomnomna arougb maman an ginohob , kaba , gomnomna gini edag aremeij naugb maman dous . Doba Allah , kaba , en eic aremeij gedag sogo maga dougwo maman gini . Hanoba en etob se sogo salib bediyebeiya dau maman toua namcir .
51002015	Danggohob , kaba , en ogod mougtir dau merna mog mog dara mindiri meren goubesa obsara dau maman ogdoc sungga toua . Dauntoba len lemoiharaga maman naugb len lemarautut maman aud ara ara gecgu toua deitero , doba len larges merisira dau maman namcir . Hanoba en eino len merin naugb en ens len ainyes dou maman . Dauntoba maman macinaga dag meren goubesa ingmemeb naugb len toua deitero . Doba en aiyan len an meren goubesa augwan obsara dau lenohob .
51002016	Sug Allah aigdougwo gomnomna gedag aremeij gini dau mamanohob , kaba , yen yemousa deisa sud hom ingma naugb sug en emens dau ared areg yen yet dara areg yen yeg . Dara yen yemaimo en aud men geicara sug en arougb yen naugb yen yougwan ared debin Lona Gouji dara igda loba menau . Dara yen yemobsara aud en sug en agodgod yen naugb yen yeigtou debin yen meijug se Lona Gemeicaresero gin touwero . Doba yen yeic meijus dougwo en namcir .
51002017	Anai augwan gin , kaba , edag mena bansins dou lusud sug nosa eisaugb Krisdus men geicara se lona daiyamo gacin dous . Doba mog misen , kaba , Krisdus enin . Hang areg dag mena gin , kaba , ediyebeiya dau maman toua namcir , anai Krisdus enin mog enohob .
51002018	Dara yen yemaimo sud hom ingma sug en arougb yen naugb yen yehig dau ared , dara yen yesijaresa malaikadir touwero , doba yen yes agadgeij dau en mer gin toua terimda . Anai sug yen yaimo en mer , kaba , areg Allah esedeb se bogo naugb yenohob , kaba , augwan emeb naugb yen toua deitero . Doba en augwohosa yen dau augwan gin toua namcirohob . Anai en eigdoumesa enin moho deseino yen dag areg en arougb yen an gin , kaba , malaikadir logod en dag bomom . Hanoba len lens dou en touohob . Dobnaro . Areg en eimiman enin an deseino yen , kaba , dau sug en medoc etrij icira gin dous . Anai en emaimo maman mougt mera medam Krisdus gin deitero , doba en asid enin dau en namcirohob . Hang men buimogu ingma emeb naugb gin touwero , doba dag augwougb dous .
51002019	Anai Krisdus enin dous eng eic maman maugwan daihim naugb maman madag hom namcir . Hanoba maman maiji dag lusud mos se en toua , aimo dau areg Allah enin esedeb naugb maman . Aninim toua dag mougt eb , naugwe hang , mesira dara mohora mom , dara mesira dara mohora mohw augwan gini lemeijebdi en dag homohob , kaba , maga eiji dag lusud mos ogdoc mougt men goubesa gin toua .
51002020	Doba sug yen yomom dara Krisdus dau merna mog mog dara mindiri meren goubesa dag ginohob , kaba , dagiro , naugwe hang , meijen geicara aninim dag lusud gedig Bilis oiharaga len se cinogo gin deita ? Anai len gin , kaba , merna mog mog dara mindiri loiharaga len terimdaba .
51002021	Dangga toua , dagiro , naugwe hang , yen yousa deisa lusud merir sug len len dougwo yen dag yen yemos dara yemet dara yemousousa ara ara touwero ?
51002022	Anai areg len len dougwo yen an gin , kaba , emeb huhugwero . Doba cum , kaba , ediyebeiya ucugb dangga . Dara emen dau Allah touwero . Doba areg len len dougwo yen , dara ledidib dou yen toua , kaba , en dau lusud misen lenin meren gauwamara dous .
51002023	Hang areg len larougb yen an naugb sug yen yecguna dou malaikadir , dara yen yehig dau ared , dara yen yogod yen meijaga dougwo ara ara deseino len , kaba , lusud leigdoumesa len meroho an dag len meru ouforoho namcirohob . Dobnaro . Areg len len dougwo lusud an gin , kaba , dau len meru edgom dous . Anai emousa len naugb sug len merdoc omom an areg len merdoc etrij icira gin touwero , doba eic dag len laimo augwan gin terimda .
51003001	Doba yen , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa yen dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb dara Krisdus ginohob . Dangga hang , yen meigdoc emetrij icira areg geb se cinogo gin toua deitero , doba yen meigdoc erleij aud areg geb se bogo dous . Anai sungga , kaba , Krisdus en eigtou se Allah men maija moc dig en mesira misen naugb en edag mougt mera medam toua .
51003002	Dara meijen gauwamara augwan , kaba , emeb debin areg geb se cinogo gin toua deitlo , doba eb debin areg geb se bogo toua terimda .
51003003	Anai yen yomom dau areg mohon augwan naugb yen yeinesa maireseb menau geb huhugb ginohob . Dara yen meijireseb menau gin , kaba , lusud lemeiya touebma . Doba eb desij Allah , aninim dag len lemeiya dau Krisdus men gogouf cucugb touabuma . Doba en moongga desij Allah en touaba .
51003004	Doba edebeij lona sug Allah ens en ainyes dou lusud , kaba , en ens yen toua ainyes dou len laugwan dag yen yeinesa maireseb menau geb huhugb . Dara yen yeb se men gogouf cucugb naugb erbacec yen touohob . Anai maireseb menau gin , kaba , en dau Krisdus enin dous .
51003005	Dangga hang , sug yen meijireseb menau dara Krisdus desij Allah dag ginohob , kaba , yen meisira emebser , dara meijen geicara emedag mihi , dara yen meigdoc emetrij icira ara ara , dara yen meigdoc emehigehi naugb yen yoho areg gecgu dou lusud , dara yen yemagungun len an meren aremougb toua deitero . Doba yen yogod an se yen meigdoc mes dag yen yemaimo areg arautut yen aud gecgu gini augwan deitero . Doba yen meigdoc dag omom dau gin namcir . Anai areg graga augwan , kaba , aninim dag lusud gedig Bilis oiharaga len se cinogo gini meren geicara dous . Dara gagungunara gin , kaba , dag yen yecguna dou seiseij touohob .
51003006	Yen yemaimo augwan gin deitero . Anai gareg en emaimo areg Allah arougb en an ginero , doba en eic mos naugb en en edreg dau en mer gin namcir , kaba , Allah medoc esrougb medam an en . Hanoba en esedeb naugb en eic gogom medam dou en toua .
51003007	Sug nosa , kaba , yen yaimo areg graga augwan touohob . Dara yen meigdoc emarges dau gin touwero . Anai yen meigdoc getrij icira gin , kaba arautut yen naugb yen yaimo gin toua ucucugb terimda .
51003008	Doba iteitogin , kaba , yen yerba areg gecgu gini augwan dau yenohob . Dangga kaba , yen meigdoc mog mog dara emesrougb an len gus , dara yen meiju emehigehi naugb yen yeicara yarses lusud , dara yen yemeic len gus yemacecim , dara yen yemeihwur dara yen yemobob deisara toua deitlo , doba yen yarges dau augwan gin namcir .
51003009	Dara yen yemereiyara doum ucucugb toua deitlo . Doba yen yesa doc gin terimda . Anai Allah en mer an yen gin , kaba , eic dag yen yehino dau meijus mohon dag menau deitohob . Hanoba en eic areg menau bauloulo astesda lona dou yen toua . Dauntoba meijen geicara augwan aninim dag men geicara toua terimda . Anai sug yen yeiji se areg menau dag ginohob , kaba , yen yecinaga areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes augwan dag misen toua namcir .
51003010	
51003011	Hang meijouhuda dau leng Yahudi , dara meijouhuda gus , dara len lec merus dau , dara leng lemec merus dauwero , dara leng lugmahara , dara leng leigtou se lomesmes , dara leng ledag sogougb , dara leng ledag lusud misen , kaba , maman maugwan mameijem dag maingma susugb toua deitero , doba maman maugwan maijem dag hom dous . Anai Krisdus einesa maman maugwan mamdoc mes . Hanoba enin dous eng en moho eb taiba naugb maman maugwan touohob .
51003012	Sug yen yehino dau yen meijus mohon aud areg menau dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemaimo areg gecgu anim ucucugb toua deitero . Doba yen meigdoc eineg dara eigouhw anim ucucugb terimda dous . Anai Allah en medoc agug yen sug nosa . Hanoba en ouci yen debinim dag men lusud naugb enin , dara en medoc gororougb yen toua namcirohob . Dangga hang , yen meigdoc emagas anim touwero , doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga . Dara yen yougarij anim ucucugb . Dara yen yeigtou yateteijim terimda toua .
51003013	Hanoba yen yemauni gecgu dedemeda doum touwero . Doba sug aremer inggebga naugb yen , kaba , yen yesogwa deisa maman Adehsud en mohotimei mohw an men geicara dag yen yeigtou naugb denden dous . Dara yen yaigdougwo meijen aremer anim dag mogud toua terimda . Aninim dag maman Adehsud en emauni gogom dou yen sug yen yebesesar touwero , doba en eigtou ateteij terimda naugb en aigdougwo meijen sesar augwan dag mogud dau yen touohob .
51003014	Doba aremer gesloulougb edreg dau aremer gus augwan , kaba , dag yen yemarges dau sug yen meigdoc gororougwim touwero . Doba yen yaimo gini anim ucucugb debin areg graga augwan toua terimda . Anai gini edag aigdaga naugb ohud yen yaugwan darem dag hom namcir .
51003015	Dangga yen meigdoc emedregim touwero . Doba sug Krisdus eic yen meigdoc ebtou dou yenohob , kaba , yen yaimo dag gin anim ucucugb toua terimda . Anai Allah ouci yen debinim naugb yen yedag maga homohob . Hang en emouwan naugb yen meijir edregim toua deitero , doba yen meigdoc ebtou anim dag gin dous . Dara yen yemarges dau sug yen yen sijo dou Allah touwero , doba yen yeicara dangga toua terimda .
51003016	Dangga toua , sug yen yedidib Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus men meijouhw doum , dara sug yen yesuloum an , aimo dau mou ouforoho areg geb dou yenohob , kaba , yen yemebin augwan gini dag gurerei se yen meigdoc mes touwero . Doba yen meigdoc eisa naugb man , dauntoba era mera se yen meigdoc mes beiseisaugb namcir . Dara yen yen sijo dara yagahugouhw an Allah se yen meigdoc mes besesa toua terimda , aimo dau areg len lei ugwaremer an deb , dara areg len lagahugouhw an Yesus , dara areg Mena Gogoufu ens dou yen touohob .
51003017	Dara sug yen yen sijo dou maman Mamina Allah eisaugb areg en eic dou yen ogdoc Krisdus men geicara ginohob , kaba , yen yemedreg maman Adehsud Yesus en mer touwero . Doba se meijen geicara dara areg agunya dau yen meijirs , kaba , yen yesogwa deisa en mohotimei mohw an gin dous . Anai yen yeperwei en mohw naugb ginohob .
51003018	Yigida sug yen yes meisuwohob , kaba , yen yemeicara yemaihagab en mer touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga naugb yen yaimo en mer se aremer augwan terimda . Anai sug yen yedag hom dara Krisdusohob , kaba , yen yeicara yaimo dangga toua namcir .
51003019	Dara yigiji , kaba , yen yemenara gouji dara mog mog dou yen meisouwer touwero , doba yen meigdoc gororougb len terimda .
51003020	Dangga toua , yugdeh sug yen yedag hom dara maman Adehsud ginohob , kaba , yen yemeicara yamaihagab yen meijiner dara yen meijimir len merir touwero . Doba yen meigdoc edag beim naugb len merir terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gini , kaba , eic dag maman Adehsud en medoc agahugouhw an yen toua namcirohob .
51003021	Dara yigiji gedig yen yeic meijihirohob , kaba , yen yemowun len meroho an meren geicara ucucugb touwero . Doba yen yeimiman len an meren geicara dou yen toua . Anai sug yen yesbes len an meren geicara terimda , kaba , eic dag len merdoc edougdaha dou len . Hang len lemeicara dag graga dou yen toua deitero , doba len merdoc obsara dau augwan namcir .
51003022	Dangga toua , yeng Krisden gedig yen yedag sogougb , kaba , yen yemeicara yemaihagab meijen mougtir len merir touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga naugb yen yaimo len merir se aremer augwan toua terimda . Dara yen yemaimo len merir sug len merugwengga desij yen naugb len leigdoumesa yen meijoho an meijen geicara dousero . Doba sug yen meigdoc ahau dau Allah , kaba , yen yaimo meijen geicara augwan dara yen meigdoc hom namcir sug len merugwero toua .
51003023	Anai yen yecinaga dag yen yemeicara dou leng se cinogo gin dousero . Doba yen yeicara dou maman mougt mera misen , kaba , Krisdus enin dous . Hang areg maman Adehsud gini en esedeb se bogo naugb yenohob , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba enin eng emeic dou yen toues . Dangga hang , areg yen yeicara yaimo , kaba , yen yaimo augwan gini dara yen meigdoc augwan namcir . Anai yen yemeicara dou lusud se cinogo ginero , doba yen yeicara gini aninim dag dou maman Adehsud enin dous .
51003024	
51003025	Hang yen yemedreg dau areg meijen mougt mera arougb yen an touwero . Doba yen yaimo len merir an terimda . Anai gareg en edreg men mougt mera en mer gin namcir , kaba , maman Adehsud emauni men geicara gecgu gini ucugb dou en toues . Anai en emos medoc an sud hom ingma touwero , doba en aimo augwan dara en medoc edag beim an len dous .
51004001	Dara yeng Krisden gedig yen yedag mougtir , kaba , yen yemesenagan meijen sogougwir touwero , doba sug len leicara dou yenohob , kaba , yen yeic areg edeinyum dou len . Dara yen meigdoc edag beim an len se aremer augwan toua . Anai yen yecinaga dag meijen mougt mera medam eni moongga se bogo naugb yen touohob .
51004002	Dara yen yaugwan , kaba , yen yemarges dau sug yen yocuncum dou Allah touwero , doba yen yeicara yaimo gini besesa terimda . Hanoba yen yauweila ucan areg yen yocuncum an dou en toua . Dara yen yemarges dau sug yen yen sijo dou en debin augwan gin touwero . Doba yen yagahugouhw an en eisaugb augwan toua namcir .
51004003	Dara yen yocuncum dou Allah naugb emen toua , dauntoba en ec misis dau emen naugb sug emen emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Yesus meijouhw augwan asesa dou lusud toua . Anai sug nosa , kaba , en ecgoneh meijouhw augwan gini dau len . Hang len lemouf dan se tu gesisug icira gin touohob .
51004004	Dara yen yocuncum dou Allah naugb dan toua . Dauntoba sug dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou lusud , kaba , dag dan demaiyan moho ingma deb dau touwero . Doba dan deic indus naugb dan dens meijouhw augwan asesa dou len toua . Anai Allah en ouwan naugb dan deicara dangga dous .
51004005	Dara yen toua , sug yen yeicara yaimo ara ara an leng medigo Yesus , kaba , yen meiju ouforoho naugb yen yauwam an aremeijouhw augwan an len toua . Dangga sug cumougt mougwebaba gin , kaba , yen yemeisan gurog dau sug yen yesai Krisdus moro dou len touwero , doba yen yos yadi en moho dou len toua terimda .
51004006	Dara sug yen yesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou leng medigo Yesus gin , kaba , yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa . Dauntoba areg yen yesai dou len gini , kaba , emeic dag len merdoc emecbeca yen an touwero , doba eic len merdoc eisa , dara erleij naugb areg yen yens dou len toua . Dangga toua , sug len leijidougwo yen an ara ara , kaba , yen yemauni augwougb dou len touwero . Doba yen yauwam an meijouhw augwan asesa nosahabi , yen yemauni se geica dou len toua . Anai gini aimo dau areg Allah ouwan dangga naugb yen dous .
51004007	Doba aremer eisaugb danin , kaba , maman mamaguna Tikikus , en emens dau augwan gini asesa dou yen toues . Anai dan darougb en aud yen , dauntoba sug en edecic meijouhw eisaugb dan augwan asesa dou yenohob , kaba , yen meigdoc momogo deitero . Doba yen meigdoc esgiraha ucugb deit . Dan desa en aud yen , anai en , kaba , en emarges dau sug en esai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud touwero . Doba emen emaugwan emesai dou lusud terimdohob . Hang emen emdoc gororougb en toua namcir .
51004008	
51004009	Dara dan darougb sud hom , moho Onesimus , naugb en aicira Tikikus , dauntoba lan lamens dau emen geicara sugini meijouhw augwan asesa dou yens . Anai en , kaba , dau meijen cinogo sungga toua . En toua edag maman mamaguna gedig en aimo Krisdus dara medoc homohob . Hang emen toua , emdoc gororougb en namcir .
51004010	Arisdarkus gedig en toua moongga se tu gesisug desij dan , dara Barnabas mem meisi Markus , dara Yosua gedig lusud leija en moho toua dag Yusdus , kaba , len lou yen yaugwan . Anai dau leng Yahudi gedig len merdoc ebdebin an maman Adehsud Yesus ginohob , kaba , merug homoi gin dous eng len lousa dan naugb sug emen emesai Allah en mer eisaugb men goiharaga dou lusud toua . Dangga meren geicara augwan gin , kaba , ousa dan toua namcir . Doba len gus , kaba , len lemousa emen an ginero . Dara eisaugb Markus en , kaba , dan dog surad eisaugb en dou yen sug nosohob . Hang sug en edebeij yen sungga , kaba , yen yebin en dara geigouhw toua .
51004011	
51004012	Dara Epapras gedig en toua dau meijen cinogo sungga , kaba , en ou yen . Anai en toua dag Krisdus Yesus men sogougb enohob . Hang en emarges dau sug en ocuncum dou Allah naugb yen touwero , doba en acgeij en esesa terimda naugb en ousa yen . Dauntoba yen yemobsara dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero , doba yen yes agadgeij naugb yen yaimo en terimda . Dara en acgeij Allah naugb en ousa yen , dauntoba yen yemeija meijuwesa en an areg en arougb yen an gin touwero . Hanoba yen yaimo augwan gini yedag lusud mos se toua namcir .
51004013	Dangga hang , dan douma debin gin dou yen toua . Anai dan deiya dau sug en ocuncum naugb yen , kaba , dag en emarges dau gin touwero . Doba en eicara baimo dangga esesa naugb yen terimda . Dara dan decinaga dag en eicara dangga naugb leng se Laodikia dara leng se Hierapolis len laugwan touohob .
51004014	Lukas gedig emen emdoc gororougb en , dara Demas , kaba , lan lau yen toua . Dara Lukas gin , kaba , en mou ouforoho naugb aremougb toua namcir .
51004015	Dara yen yeden dou maman mamaguner leng Krisden se Laodikia , dara Nimpa an leng leis Ari se men tu , dag emen emou len laugwan toua .
51004016	Sug yen yecic indan surad ginohob , kaba , yen yemehig debin gin deb touwero , doba yen yesa dou leng se Laodikia naugb len lecic toua deit . Dara dan dog surad dou leng se Laodikia touohob . Dangga hang , sug len lesa dou yen , kaba , dan douwan naugb yen yecic dau gin toua .
51004017	Dara yen yen dou Arkipus dag en emarges dau areg maman Adehsud arougb en an gin touwero , doba en eic mouwemougb esesa naugb en aimo augwan gini terimda edebeij Lona Sug Ouwedoc toua namcir .
51004018	Dara danin toua dou yen dag yen meijiresi . Meb hom gini , kaba , danin dog ai dan insira dou yen . Yen meigdoc moc dougwo sug dan deisa tu gesisug gin touwero . Allah medoc eigouhw an yen yaugwan terimda .
52001001	Surad gini dau dang , Paulus , dara Silas , dara Timotius dou yeng se goucimdeb se Tesalonika . Anai yen meigdoc dag hom dara maman Mamina Allah dara maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus lan touohob . Dangga hang , emen emacgeij lan naugb lan laic geigouhw dou yen , dara lan laseyeiyo yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua terimda .
52001002	Astesda sug emen emocuncum dou Allah , kaba , emen emen sijo dou en an yen . Dara emen emarges dau gin touwero . Doba astesda sug emen emocuncum dou en , kaba , emen emdoc eiseisan yen naugb emen emeigdoumesa yen meijoho deseino en toua terimda .
52001003	Anai emen emdoc eiseisan dau lona sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus sug nosohob , kaba , dag yen meigdoc emebdebin an en augwougb touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yeic meijen geicara geigouhw yaos dara debin gin toua namcirohob . Dangga hang , yen meigdoc emagadgeij an lusud touwero . Doba yen meigdoc gororougb len , hanoba yen yeic yen meijug erij naugb yen yousa len touohob . Dara emen emdoc eiseisan dau sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij , kaba , dag yen yemobsara dau gin touwero , doba yen yod meijina debsa maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus gin terimda . Anai yen yecinaga dag se lona hom , kaba , en emecicugb aud mamans . Hang astesda sug emen emocuncum dou maman Mamina Allah , kaba , emen emens dau meijen geicara geigouhw gini dou en toua .
52001004	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , emen emecinaga dag Allah medoc gororougb yen dara en ouci yen debinim naugb enin dag misen touohob .
52001005	Anai sug emen emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen sug nosa , kaba , emen ememebedbed mer gini se emen emirs dou yen dousero . Doba Mena Gogoufu eic goubesa dou emen naugb sug emen emeic gansins emauma debin gin dou yen toua . Dara emen ememeija emuwesa an areg emen emebedbed dou yen touwero . Doba emen emouma debin dag areg emen emebedbed dou yen gin , kaba , se geica namcirohob . Dara yen yecinaga dau sug emen emeigtou desij yen sug nosa , kaba , dag emen geicara gecgu ingma deseino yen touwero . Doba emen geicara augwan edag beim dara obosboro an yen dous . Hang emen geicara augwan gin , kaba , naugb sug emen emehilon ara ara dau yen touwero . Doba eic dag yen yera mera einyana icira ginohob .
52001006	Dara emen emecinaga dag Allah ouci yen debinim naugb en dag misenohob . Anai sug emen emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dag graga dou yen sug nosa , kaba , yen yebin Mer Geigouhw gini se yen meigdoc mes . Hanoba yen yesogwa deisa maman Adehsud an emen se emen geicara augwan toua namcir . Dangga sug lusud leic mog erij dou yen ucucugb icira gin terimda , kaba , yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo ucina gini dara yen meigdoc erleij namcir . Anai Mena Gogoufu eic goubesa se yen meigdoc mes naugb ginohob .
52001007	Hang yen yemedag gansins dou leng merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus se leng Makedonia dara Akaya meren hancob , len laugwanohob .
52001008	Anai meijen geicara graga , kaba , emeic dag Mer Geigouhw eisaugb maman Adehsud gini emagaha becinten leng se Makedonia dara Akaya meren hancob hom dousero . Doba lusud se cinogo augwan , kaba , len louman dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Allah dag misen touohob . Dangga sug emen emesai Krisdus moro dou lusud sungga sungga , kaba , emen ememens dau meijen geicara gin dou lusud mougwa hom touwero .
52001009	Doba len lenin eng lecic dau meijen geicara gin augwan dou emen dag yen yemoc dou meijums dougwo areg emen emesai dou yen touwero . Doba sug emen emeinesa meijen cinogo Tesalonika gin , kaba , dag yen yebin Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dara goubesa toua namcirohob . Dara len lens dou emen dau sug yen yebin Mer Geigouhw ginohob , kaba , dag yen yemesijaresa seiseij augwan toua deitero . Doba yen yesijaresa Allah misen dara yaimo en mer gin dous . Anai enin dous eng eis huhugb sugragohob .
52001010	Dara len lecic dou emen dag yen toua yeigtou yateteij naugb lona sug Allah Meisi mohora hom , moho Yesus , en ecicugwen . Hanoba yen yod meijina debsa en toua dag se lona ingga , kaba , en eigdoc yen dau Allah men gogom areg en esedeb naugb sesar augwan toua namcir . Anai yen yecinaga dag Allah eigdoumesa en Meisi Yesus dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb ucugb naugb ginohob .
52002001	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , leng gus , kaba , len lemecic dau meijen geicara graga dou emen dousero . Doba yenin toua yecinaga dau sug emen emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen sug nosa , kaba , dag emen emirs emobdobdem an augwougb dou yen touwero . Doba eic dag yen yera mera einyana icira ginohob .
52002002	Dara yen yecinaga dau sug emen emedebeij yen sunggabuma , kaba , dag leng se cinogo Pilipi len leic mog erij . Hanoba len leic emen emoho lacicim toua namcirohob . Dangga hang , sug lusud leinyana lougb sogo maga dougwo emen an dag ginohob , doba maman Allah eic emen emdoc aiyansem dou emen naugb emen emesai en Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou lusud toua terimda .
52002003	Dara sug emen emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou yen , kaba , emen emeic mer areibahau naugb emen emahurim dara gin touwero . Doba sug emen emenara emaic yen meigdoc mes aud en mer gin , kaba , emen emebedbed augwan se geica mogud dou yen dous . Dara emen emdoc emetrij icira ligida dara ligiji dau yen mougwa hom touwero . Doba emen emebedbed augwan dou yen dara emen gauwamara gecabeci dou yen toua . Dara sug emen emebedbed dou yen gin , kaba , emen emereiyara , dara emerba mohoisa , hanoba emen emaugwohosa yen an ara ara hom dau yen touwero . Doba emen geicara augwan , kaba , emaimo ucina gobosboro an yen dous .
52002004	Dangga emen ememaimo areg gecgu an lusud touwero . Doba areg Allah arougb emen anohob , kaba , emen emesai gin augwan dou lusud toua terimda . Anai enin eng eiya emen emdoc mes , doba edeinyum naugb ginohob . Hang en emeigdoumesa emen emoho naugb emen emebedbed en mer gin dou yen toua . Sug en eigdoumesa emen emoho dag ginohob , kaba , emen ememouwan naugb sug emen emeic lusud merdoc eigouhw dou len touwero . Doba emen emouwan naugb sug emen emeic Allah enin medoc eigouhw dou en dous . Anai enin eng eicara bainyen emen emdoc mes an areg emen emebedbed dou lusud gin , kaba , dag emen emdoc hwai , era hom an gin dousei ?
52002005	Dara yen yecinaga dag misen dau sug emen emebedbed dou yen sug nosa , kaba , dag emen ememouseij emen emir naugb emaunun dougwo emen emdoc getrij icira meijen aremougb touwero . Doba Allah ouma debin emen geicara gini dag emen emens emen emdoc mes an augwan beb ainyes dou yen dag misen . Dara yen toua yecinaga dag emen geicara augwan dag gin touohob .
52002006	Dara se emen geicara augwan , kaba , emen ememainyen naugb sug sud hom ingma dau yen en emeigdoumesa emen emoho . Dara emen ememeic emouwemougb esesa naugb sug sud hom ingma dau len gus en emeigdoumesa emen emoho an gini touwero . Doba emen emouwan naugb sug Allah enin eng eigdoumesa emen emoho an emen geicara augwan gin dous . Anai enin eng eigdoumesa emen emoho . Hanoba en arougb emen naugb sug emen emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud toua .
52002007	Sug en eigdoumesa emen emoho dag ginohob , kaba , emen goubesa inggebga naugb sug emen emacgeij ara ara einyana dau yen toua . Dobnaro . Emen ememouwan naugb sug emen emeic aguci dou yen touero . Dangga sug emen emugwengga desij yen sug nosa , kaba , emen emug arjaga an yen namcir , aninim dag mem en mog arjaga an mehir naugb en agauwesa len toua terimda .
52002008	Doba emen emdoc an yen . Hang emen emesedeb naugb sug emen ememesai Allah Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen dousero . Doba emen emesedeb naugb emen emohw emen emougt edug naugb yen toua . Anai emen emdoc gororougb yen medam namcirohob .
52002009	Dangga hang , sug emen emugwengga desij yen sug nosa , kaba , emen ememacgeij ara ara hom dau yen touwero . Doba emen emeic emen emug erij astesda lona loba naugb emen emeicara naugb emenin terimda . Dauntoba sug emen emesai Allah Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen , kaba , gini emedag ara gogom geb dougwo sud hom ingma dau yen touwero . Doba ucina esgiraha naugb yen dous . Yen meigdoc moc dougwo ginohobei ? Naro , yen meigdoc eiseisan gin toua terimdaba .
52002010	Hang emen geicara augwan deseino yen , kaba , dag lusud lemowun emen emoho an aremer hom touwero . Anai yeni dara Allah , yen youma debin emen dag emen emaimo areg ecabeci dara edag beim an yen .
52002011	Dara yen yecinaga dag emen geicara augwan dou yen astesda , kaba , toua aninim dag mena men geicara dou en mehir touohob .
52002012	Anai sug emen emugwengga desij yen sug nosa gin , kaba , emen emesulou yen ucucugb , dara emen emahahumohumesa yen , dara emen emenara emad yen meigdoc mes toua terimda . Dauntoba se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yeic Allah medoc eigouhw dou en dous . Anai enin eng eija yen naugb yen yeinesa men goiharaga dara en ekeba men gogouf cucugb dou yen touohob .
52002013	Dara emen ememen sijo dou Allah naugb areg graga augwan gin dousero . Doba emen emen sijo esesa dou en eisaugb meijen geicara augwan toua namcir . Anai sug emen emesai Allah mer eisaugb Krisdus dou yen sug nosa , kaba , yen yebin en mer gini se yen meigdoc mes . Anai yen yecinaga dag areg emen emebedbed dou yen gin , kaba , emen dau lusudero . Doba en dau Allah dag misenohob . Hang sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an en mer ginohob , kaba , yen yera mera areg geigouhw toua terimda . Anai Allah enin eng arautut yen meigdoc mes ogdoc en mer gin toua .
52002014	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug yen yebin Allah en mer se yen meigdoc mes dag ginohob , kaba , gogom areg geb dou Allah men goucimdeb se leng Yudea meren hancob gin , kaba , eb naugb yen touohob . Anai sug len merdoc dag hom dara Krisdus Yesus sug nosa , kaba , leng Yahudi gus len leineg merohotimei an len . Hanoba len leic mog erij medam dou len icira gin toua namcir . Aninim dag leng Yahudi se meijen cinogo ingga , kaba , len lococ yenin meijen lusud naugb len leic mog erij medam dou yen sug yen meigdoc dag hom dara Krisdus gin touohob .
52002015	Anai leng Yahudi gin , kaba , len merdoc eigouhw an lusud gus len laugwan touwero . Doba gareg en emaimo len se meren gomnomna ginero , kaba , len merdoc esrougb medam an len laugwan namcir . Dangga sug Allah esa men lusud aud len merjemouwer sug nosa naugb len lesai en mer dou len , kaba , len lemebin en mer ginero . Doba len leic gomom dou men logodeh len laugwan . Dara sug maman Adehsud Yesus en esai Allah en mer dou len merner sug nosa , kaba , len merner gini len merdoc emesgiraha an en touwero . Doba len letob en se sogo salib toua . Dara emen toua , sug emen emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou len mersir dau leng Yahudi gin , kaba , len lamsoho emen touwero . Doba len leic mog erij dou emen . Hanoba len locirma emen dau meren tuari dara cinogo gus gus augwan toua terimdohob . Hang Allah medoc emesgiraha an len touwero . Doba en medoc esrougb medam an len namcir .
52002016	Dara gin dousero , doba sug emen emouwan naugb emesai Mer Geigouhw gini dou lugmahara , kaba , len lebehnehino emen dougwo len toua . Anai len lemouwan naugb Allah emeigdoc len dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb touwero . Dangga hang , Allah emamsoho len toua deitero . Doba en medoc mog mog medam an len . Hanoba en esedeb gogom deb naugb len touohob . Anai meren geicara gecgu gin , kaba , edag duhu gatij duga moc toua namcirohob .
52002017	Doba dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , ebiji dau sug len graga leiso emen dau meijen cinogo , kaba , emen emdoc eiseisan yen terimda . Anai emen dag sud hom gedig en ougbdedau en mehir laisoboro deb dous . Dangga hang , emen emagodgod lo terimda naugb sug emen emdeiya yen toua deit . Anai emen ematou se igda hosa dau yen . Doba se emen emaga dous . Doba se emen emdoc mes , kaba , emen emugwengga desij yen terimda .
52002018	Hang emen emainyen naugb sug emen emecicugb aud yen . Dara danin toua dainyen naugb dan dedebeij yen mougwa hosa touohob . Dobnaro . Bilis ougb sogo maga dougwo emen terimdaba .
52002019	Emen emainyen naugb emecicugb aud yen dag gini . Anai se Lona Sug Maman Adehsud Yesus En Ecicugwen , kaba , emen ememagahugouhw dara ememeimiman emenin an gareng deseino en se lona ingga ? Yen youdesa leng gus dousei ?
52002020	Naro , emen emagahugouhw dara emeimiman emenin an yen deseino en se lona ingga . Anai yen yedag emen mera touohob . Dara yen yedag ansins dou emen dag emen emeic emen emug emerij augwougb touwero . Doba emen emaingmo deb se usi namcirohob . Hang emen emod emina debsa maman Adehsud gini dag en emecgun sogo mesira an merij naugb en emeg se emen emugt toues .
52003001	Sug emen emdoc esesa an yen dag gin terimdohob , kaba , emen ememouwan emeigtou emateteij deitero . Doba emen emogod an dag Silas aman , kaba , aman amanin ameigtou se cinogo Atena gini deb .
52003002	Doba Timotius , kaba , en edeiya yen sungga naugb en enara bad yen meigdoc mes , dauntoba yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij ginero . Doba yen yes agadgeij naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus terimda . Anai maman mamaguna Timotius gin , kaba , en toua eicara baimo Allah en mer se aremer augwanohob . Hang en emousa Silas aman naugb sug emen emaugwan emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud toua . Dara eisaugb ucina mog erij gin , kaba , yen yenin yecinaga dag augwan gini aimo dau areg Allah enin ogod deb naugb mamanohob .
52003003	
52003004	Anai sug emen emugwengga desij yen sug nosa , kaba , emen emesulou yen deb dag cum , kaba , maman maimo ucina mog erij gin toua . Hang areg emen ememesulou yen an ingga , kaba , yen yecinaga dag augwan gini acgunog dou yen dag misenohob .
52003005	Dangga sug dan decinaga dag yen yaimo ucina mog erij dag ginohob kaba , dan demeigtou demateteij toua deitero . Doba dan darougb Timotius aud yen naugb en edogod dougwo yen endag yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus terimdei ? Era mog erij gini eic dag yen yobsara dau endohobei ? Anai dan dahau dag cum , kaba , Bilis augwohosa yen dau Krisdus men ucina gini . Hang emen emeic emen emug erij augwougb touohob .
52003006	Doba iteitogin , kaba , Timotius en ecicugb an mer geigouhw aud amanohob . Hanoba en edecic dou aman dag yen yemobsara dau Krisdus touebma , doba yen yes agadgeij naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an en . Dara yen meigdoc gororougwim toua terimdaba . Dara en edecic dou aman dag yen meigdoc esesa an aman toua naugb yen yedeiya aman deit . Aninim dag aman amdoc esesa an yen naugb aman amdeiya yen toua .
52003007	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug Timotius ens dau areg graga augwan dou amanohob , kaba , aman amdoc momogo sug aman amaimo ucina mog erij dara ara gogom toua deitero . Doba aman amdoc ebtou naugb aman amaimo ucina gini toua terimda . Anai sug aman amouman dag yen yemobsara dau Krisdusero , doba yen yes agadgeij naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an en terimda , kaba , eic dag aman amdoc ebtou toua namcirohob .
52003008	Hang aman amdoc amomomtom toua deitero . Doba sug aman amecinaga dag yen meigdoc dag hom dara Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , eic gerleij dou aman naugb sug aman amaimo ucina gin toua terimda . Naro , kab , naro .
52003009	Sug yen yeic aman amdoc erleij dou aman dag ginohob , kaba , aman amen sijo dag ara dou Allah naugb yen toua deita ? Naro , meijen geicara geigouhw gin , kaba , eic dag aman amdoc agahugouhw medam gougwa deseino enohob .
52003010	Hang aman amemarges dau sug aman amocuncum dou Allah touwero . Doba aman amocuncum astesda lona loba dara aman amdoc augwan dou en . Dauntoba en ousa aman amir naugb sug aman amdeiya yen se aman amires touahabi . Anai aman amdoc erleij naugb aman amousa yen . Dauntoba areg aman amarges mougwa deb graga , kaba , aman amaulo gin deit , terimda augwan edeinyum dou yen toua namcirohob .
52003011	Dangga hang , aman amacgeij dau maman Mamina Allah enin dara maman Adehsud Yesus naugb lan lagririj sogo maga augwan dau ucina an aman , dauntoba aman amedebeij yen toua .
52003012	Dara aman amocuncum dou maman Adehsud naugb en ousa yen . Dauntoba yen meigdoc gororougwim an len gus laugwan toua eiseisaugb terimda . Dara yen meigdoc gororougwim gin , kaba , edeinyum dag aman amdoc gororougwim yen sug nosa touohob .
52003013	Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , eic dag maman Adehsud eic gototo se yen meigdoc mes dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua namcir . Hang edebeij Lona Sug Maman Adehsud Yesus En Ecicugwen an men logodeh laugwan , kaba , lusud lemowun yen an aremer hom deseino maman Mamina Allah touwero . Doba meijen geicara augwan ecabeci deseino en terimda .
52004001	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug surad gini deinyor ouwedoc , kaba , emen emesulou yen . Hanoba emen emarougb yen dara goubesa namcir , dauntoba yen yemarges dau areg emen emens dou yen sug emen emugwengga desij yen sug nosa gin touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo augwan gini ucucugb terimda . Anai gini dau areg Allah esedeb naugb yenohob . Dangga hang , sug yen yesogwa deisa areg emen emesai dou yen gini terimda , kaba , eic dag yen yeic Allah medoc eigouhw dou en toua . Emen emesulou yen an dag gini , anai emen emeperwei maman Adehsud en mohw naugb ginohob . Dara emen emecinaga dag yen yaimo augwan gin touohob . Doba emen emouwan , kaba , yen yemarges debero , doba yen yeicara yaimo augwan gini beiseisaugb namcir .
52004002	Anai areg maman Adehsud Yesus en eigdoumesa emen emoho naugb sug emen emesai dou lusud , kaba , emen emens dau augwan gini dou yen sug nosa . Hang yen yemecinaga dag misen touohob .
52004003	Dangga hang , astesda dau yen , kaba , yen yemaiga hancob naugb yen meisira emebsa yen meisir mersouwer augwougblo . Anai gareg en eicara dag gin , kaba , aninim dag en aiga hancob naugb en eiyoho dau enohob . Dara yen meigdoc emetrij icira ligida gus aibibra aninim dag leng lohw meridgo dou Allah touwero . Doba astesda dau yen , kaba , yen yaimo ucina gecabeci dara areg eic Allah dara lusud merdoc geigouhw dou len an yen meisouwer dous . Anai Allah en emouwan naugb yen yemaimo ligida gus . Dara yen yemohw yen meijaga dou len gus aibibra touwero . Doba sug Allah ouci yen debinim naugb enohob , kaba , en ouwan naugb meijen geicara augwan edag beim an len gus terimda . Hang yen yemaimo areg graga augwan mougwa hom touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes dau gin namcir . Anai emen emesulou yen dara emen dougwo yen dara goubesa sug nosohob dag gareg en eicara dag gini , kaba , Allah esedeb gogom medam deinaugb en namcir .
52004004	
52004005	
52004006	
52004007	Dangga eigouhw naugb maman mamaimo areg gecgu touwero . Anai sug Allah eija maman aud en sug nosa , kaba , en emeija maman naugb sug maman maimo areg maman mamdoc etrij icira touwero . Doba en eija maman naugb maman maimo areg asesa enin medoc mes gin dous . Anai en ouci maman debinim naugb enohob .
52004008	Hang gareg dau yen en otogoto emen emir an gin , kaba , en emotogoto emen emusud misen emen emirero . Doba gini dag en otogoto Allah gedig en esa Mena Gogoufu gecabeci se yen meigdoc mes en mer ginohob .
52004009	Doba eisaugb aremer medoc gororougwim , kaba , dan demog dau gin dou yen ucucugwero . Anai Allah enin eng ens meijouhw dau augwan gin dou yen .
52004010	Hang yen yemaimo dangga an yen meijaguner dara yen meigdamouwer se yeng Makedonia meijen hancob augwan ingga touohob . Sug yen yaimo dag ginohob , kaba , emen emesulou yen dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba yen yemarges deb touwero , doba yen yeicara dag gini beiseisaugb terimda .
52004011	Dara yen yemodo yen meijaga se len gus meren aremer touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes naugb yen yeigtou dau gin namcir . Dara yen yemeisan gurog dau meijen areg yeic touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen meisira eicara an yenin terimda , aimo dau areg emen emarougb yen an sug nosohob .
52004012	Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , leng medigo Yesus len lemowun yen meijoho an ara ara touwero . Doba len leigdoumesa yen meijoho an meijen geicara augwan gini terimda . Hanoba eic dag yen yemesa mougwisa len gus an ara ara touwero . Doba meijen ara ara edeinyum naugb yen touohob .
52004013	Dan indamouwerij , dara dan indagunerij , emen ememouwan naugb yen meiju emedgom dougwo maman mamsir leng Krisden gedig len ledatou debin len merug se cinogo mes touwero . Doba emen emouwan naugb yen yecinaga meijouhw augwan gini dag misen namcir . Dauntoba yen meigdoc emerij an leng lomom gini , aninim dag leng medigo Yesusero , doba yen meigdoc ebtou namcir . Anai len gin , kaba , len lemod merna debsa Allah dag en eigdoumesa len dau gomom ucugb deitero . Dangga hang , sug sud hom dau len en omomohob , kaba , len merdoc erij an en terimda .
52004014	Doba maman , kaba , maman macinaga dau sug Krisdus en omom sug nosa , kaba , dag en emomom namcirero , doba en eisa dau gomom ucugwohob . Sug maman macinaga gin dag misenohob , kaba , maman maod mamina debsa Allah dag gareng dau maman en medoc ebdebin an Krisdus . Hanoba en atou debin en mog se cinogo mes , kaba , en emomom terimda touwero . Doba Allah emeigdoumesa en , hanoba , ahwan en dig bogo naugb eni eigtou desij Krisdus sungga toua . Anai en edag hom dara enohob .
52004015	Dangga edebeij Lona Sug Maman Adehsud En Ecicugwen , kaba , maman gedig maman mamiresebaba , kaba , maman mameino leng latou debin len merug se cinogo mes gini len merin touwero .
52004016	Doba se Lona ingga , kaba , Allah en arougb men malaikad moho agas hom , en eino naugb en eiyaga mer medam . Hanoba en ohu Allah men higbei mougb nosahabi , maman Adehsud enin emouwaden dau bogo naugb en eigtou se bogo meniha naugb maman toua . Sug en eigtou sunggohob , kaba , Allah ebir leng merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus sug nosohob len laugwan leisa nosa .
52004017	Dau , kaba , en eigdoumesa maman gedig maman mamireseb se Lona ingga , aninim dara len naugb maman maugwan magasa dara maman Adehsud se umer taiba toua . Hang se Lona ingga , kaba , maman mamargesim toua deitero . Doba maman maigtou desij en beb huhugb namcir .
52004018	Dangga hang , yen yemeic yen meigdoc momogo ucan maman mamsir leng Krisden gedig len latou debin len merug gin touwero . Doba areg dan den dou yen gin , kaba , yen yecic naugb yaic gototo doum , dauntoba yen meigdoc aiyansem namcir . Anai areg dan den dou yen gin , kaba , dan demeic dau danin indoc mesero . Doba maman Adehsud enin eng ens meijouhw dau augwan gin dou dan . Hang dan demog dou yen toua .
52005001	Doba eisaugb Lona Sug Maman Adehsud En Ecicugwen , kaba , emen ememog eisaugb gin dou yen deitero .
52005002	Anai emen emens dau augwan gini dou yen sug nosohob . Hang yen yenin yecinaga dag maman Adehsud , kaba , en emens dau men cumougt dou maman touwero . Doba en en augwougb debin maman dous . Aninim dag sud hom geiyohora se loba , kaba , en emens men lona sug en eiyohora gin dou lusud touwero . Doba en en naugb eiyohora augwougb dousahabi , len lemeijesan toua .
52005003	Dangga hang , se lona sug lusud merdoc obdara anim dag areg gogom emeb naugb len deiterohob , kaba , se lona ingga Allah esa gogom en baiyan len merur mor namcir . Hanoba len lemougb dau gogom ginero , doba len laugwan lesa naugb gin terimda . Aninim dag gida hom sug en menuhwa erijohob , kaba , en emougbdedau gin touwero , doba en aimo gerij gin terimda ouwedoc toua .
52005004	Doba dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , yen , kaba , yen yemeigtou se lobeigbogo deitero . Dangga hang , Lona Sug Maman Adehsud En Ecicugwen gin , kaba , emobsara debin yen augwougb dag sud hom geiyohora gin touwero . Doba yen yecinaga augwan dag misen .
52005005	Anai yen yaugwan yedag mouf dara lona maran logodehohob . Sug yen yedag mouf dara lona maran logodeh dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamaimo loba dara lobeigbogo aud areg lan larougb maman aud gin toua deitero . Doba maman marges dau gin toua terimda . Anai maman mamedag maran logodeh deitero , doba maman masid mamanin dau lan namcirohob .
