52005006	Dangga hang , sug maman mamedag loba dara lobeigbogo maran logodeh dag gin deiterohob , kaba , eigouhw naugb maman mamatou dau Allah men Lona sug en ecicugwen , aninim dag leng gus gin touwero . Doba maman masedeh mauweila , hanoba maman mamu mauti eisaugb Lona gin toua terimda .
52005007	Anai leng latou gin , kaba , len latou se loba . Dara leng leg ahwei mohu bed len lomom , kaba , len leicara dag gin se loba toua .
52005008	Doba maman gin , kaba , maman madag lona men logodehohob . Dangga hang , maman mamsdemaga emembreij dag len gus touwero . Doba maman mamu maiso aremeijouhw augwan terimda . Hanoba maman mamarges dau sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an Allah dara maman mamdoc gororougb lusud touwero . Doba maman mas agadgeij se gin namcir . Anai sug maman maicara dag gin , kaba , aninim dag maman mag sansun kermum se mamus dougwo Bilis men hu smougwohob . Dara maman mamarges dau sug maman maod mamina debsa Allah an maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touwero . Doba maman maiyan mamdocesem naugb gin terimda toua . Anai sug maman maicara dag gin , kaba , aninim dag maman mag topi dau kermum dougwo maman mamugt . Dauntoba Bilis emeic gomom dou maman dau maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touwero . Doba maman mamina agau naugb madesma touahabi .
52005009	Anai Allah emouci maman deb naugb sug en eic gogom dou mamanero . Doba en ouci maman naugb en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb ogdoc maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus gin dous .
52005010	Anai enin dous eng omom naugb maman sesarohob . Dauntoba sug maman mamina agau , era sug maman mamomohob , kaba , maman maugwan mamireseb huhugb dara en se Lona Sug En Ecicugwen gin toua .
52005011	Dangga hang , yen yemarges dau sug yen yenara yad yen meigdoc mes naugb yeic gototo doum touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo dag gin anim terimda . Aninim dag yen yeicara yaimo iteitoginohob .
52005012	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , emen emesulou yen dara goubesa namcir , dauntoba yen yemamsoho leng ledag mougt naugb lesedougwo yen , dara leng lens ucina misen dou yen , len laugwan touwero . Doba sug len leic merug erij naugb yenohob , kaba , yen yeigdoumesa len meroho naugb yen yeic ara ara bedeinyum dou dou len toua .
52005013	Hang yen yemesbes an len touwero . Doba sug len leicara dangga dou yenohob , kaba , yen meigdoc gororougb len . Hanoba yen yeigdoumesa len meroho agas medam toua namcir . Dara yenin , kaba , yen yemoho aremer doum touwero . Doba se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen meigdoc anim ucucugb terimda .
52005014	Dangga toua , emen emesulou yen dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba yen yemamsoho leng leisan gurogero . Doba yen yenara dou len dag len lemeisan gurog dag gin deitero , doba len toua merisira eicara naugb lenin terimda . Dara yen yeiya dau leng Krisden gus dag len lahau dau ucina mog erij , kaba , yen yemarges len gin deb touwero . Doba yen yenara yad len merdoc mes , dauntoba len les agadgeij namcir . Dara leng leija meruwesa Krisdus men ucina gin , kaba , yen yemowun len dedemeda toua . Doba yen yarautut len naugb len lecinaga areg se geica touwero . Dara sug yen yenara eisaugb ara ara dou lusud , kaba , yen yemenara se goubesa dou len touwero . Doba yen yenara dara meijir arjaga dou len dous .
52005015	Hang se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yemauni gecgu doum ucucugb touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yoho geigouhw anim . Dara yen yeicara dangga dou len gus laugwan toua terimda .
52005016	Dara yen meigdoc emeijesa eisaugb ara hom touwero . Doba se aremer augwan , kaba , yen yagahugouhw an Allah , dara yen yocuncum dou en , dara yen yen sijo dou en besesa terimda . Anai gareg en medoc dag hom dara Krisdusohob , kaba , Allah ouwan naugb en eicara dag gin toua namcir .
52005017	
52005018	
52005019	Dangga hang , se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yemob Mena Gogoufu dag smougb mouf dau yen meigdoc mes touwero . Doba yen yebin en edag smougb mouf gererij se yen meigdoc mes terimda .
52005020	Dara sug lusud lesai ara ara dou yen , kaba , yen yemebin augwan gini augwougb se yen meigdoc mes touwero . Doba yen yainyen augwan nosahabi . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dag areg len lesai gin , kaba , dau Mena Gogoufu era dau merna mog mog dousei ? Dangga hang , sug yen yecinaga dag areg len lens dou yen , doba dau Mena Gogoufohob , kaba , yen yemeicara yemaihagab gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo terimda . Doba sug yen yecinaga dag areg len lebedbed dou yen gini en dau merna mog mog dous , kaba , yen yemaimo touwero . Doba yen yasid yenin dau namcir .
52005021	Dara yen yemaimo ara ara gus augwan toua augwougblo . Doba yen yainyen nosahabi . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dag augwan gini eigouhwei ? Era , naroei ? Sug eigouhw , kaba , yen yeicara yaimo . Doba sug ecgu , kaba , yen yasid yenin dau augwan gin namcir toua .
52005022	
52005023	Dangga hang , dan dacgeij Allah naugb en ousa yen . Dauntoba se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yemaimo areg gogor touwero . Doba yen yaimo areg gecabeci dag lusud mos terimda . Anai enin eng sud hom geic gesgigouhwesa dou maman dougwo augwan namcirohob . Dara dan dacgeij en , dauntoba en ebehnehino dougwo yen meijaga , dara yen meijina , dara yen meigdoc mes terimda edebeij Lona Sug Maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus En Ecicugwen gin toua . Dauntoba se Lona ingga , kaba , meijen geicara gecgu hom emdagunya dau yen touwero , doba augwan ecabeci deseino en namcir .
52005024	Dan dacgeij en an yen dag gini . Anai dan decinaga dau sug en eija yenohob , kaba , dag en emarges dau gin touwero . Doba en aimo augwan gin an yen toua terimda .
52005025	Dara dan dacgeij naugb yen yemarges dau sug yen yocuncum naugb emen touwero . Doba yen yocuncum an emen esesa terimda .
52005026	Dara yen yen dou emen emaguner dara emdamouwer se Krisdus dag emen emou len dara emen emdoc mes an len . Hang sug yen youcimdeb , kaba , yen you meijufesem dara yen meigdoc ecabeci anim toua terimda .
52005027	Dara indan surad gini , kaba , yen yemobdeb touwero . Doba dan desulou yen dara dan dou maman Adehsud en moho debin gin dou yen . Dauntoba yen yecic indan surad gin dou dan indaguner dara dan indamouwer len laugwan toua .
52005028	Maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus en medoc an yen naugb en eic geigouhw dou yen terimda .
53001001	Surad gini dau dang , Paulus , dara Silas , dara Timotius dou yeng se goucimdeb se Tesalonika . Anai yen meigdoc dag hom dara maman Mamina Allah , dara maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus , lanohob .
53001002	Dangga hang , emen emacgeij lan naugb lan laic geigouhw , dou yen , dara lan laseyeiyo yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua terimda .
53001003	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , meijen geicara augwan , kaba , eic emen emdoc mes naugb emen emen sijo dou Allah an yen toua terimda . Anai yen meigdoc emobsara dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an en touwero . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en , dara yen meigdoc gororougwim beiseisaugb toua terimda . Dangga hang , sug emen emen sijo dou en dag gin , kaba , emen ememedreg dau gin touwero . Doba emen emaimo areg se geica an gin touohob .
53001004	Sug yen yeicara anim dag gin namcir , kaba , emen emdoc moc dougwo yen meijoho touwero . Doba astesda sug emen emedebeij Allah men goucimdeb augwan , kaba , emen emeimiman yen meijoho an meijen geicara deseino len . Anai sug mog erij dara gogom eb naugb yen , kaba , yen yemobsara dau ucina gin touwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an Allah terimda .
53001005	Dara yen yemaimo ucina mog erij gini augwougb touwero . Doba sug yen yeic yen meijug erij naugb Krisdus dag gin , kaba , eic dag yen yemeinesa Allah men goiharaga toua . Anai meijen geicara edeinyum naugb ginohob . Doba leng leic mog erij dou yen iteitogini , kaba , Allah emauni yen meijug gerij gini ucugb dou len toues . Anai en oudesa , doba aimo areg gedag beim an lenohob . Augwan gini ens ainyes dou maman dag Allah emobsara aud sud hom touwero . Doba en medoc edag beim namcir naugb sug en ogod aremer debin lusud laugwan dag misen terimda .
53001006	
53001007	Anai edebeij Lona sug maman Adehsud ens enin ainyes dau bogo an men malaikadir gedig len merubisamougb len laugwan , kaba , yen yemaimo ucina mog erij gini toua deitero . Doba Allah esga yen dau augwan . Dara en emesga yen dousero . Doba en esga emen dau mog erij augwan se Lona ingga toua .
53001008	Doba leng lohw meridgo dou Allah terimda , dara leng lemaimo Mer Geigouhw eisaugb maman Adehsud Yesus gin touwero , kaba , en esa gogom medam debin len . Anai sug en ouwaden gin , kaba , en edag smougb mouf gererij naugb ait len laugwan toua terimda .
53001009	Dangga hang , se Lona ingga , kaba , len lemeigtou desij maman Adehsud naugb len lemeiya men gogouf cucugb medam gin touwero . Doba Allah ecicugb len dig medigo naugb en eic mor mor dou len se dum smougb beb huhugb namcir .
53001010	Augwan gini acgunog se Lona Sug Maman Adehsud En Ecicugwen . Anai se Lona ingga , kaba , maman gedig maman mamdoc ebdebin an enohob , kaba , maman maugwan maigdoumesa en moho agas medam namcir . Dara maman maimiman dau en moho doum ucucugb terimda toua . Anai en ouci maman debinim dag enin men lusud naugb enohob . Dara yen toua meijugwengga desij emen se lona ingga toua . Anai sug emen emesai Krisdus moro dou yen sug nosa , kaba , yen yemotogoto emen emir an gin touwero . Doba yen yod meijina debsa areg emen emesai dou yen gin toua namcirohob .
53001011	Sug yen toua meijugwengga desij emen se Lona ingga dag gin , kaba , emen ememarges dau sug emen emocuncum dou Allah naugb yen touwero . Doba emen emeicara emaimo dangga esesa an yen terimda . Hang emen emacgeij en naugb en ousa yen . Dauntoba meijen geicara augwan edeinyum areg en esedeb naugb yen , sug en eija yen aud en sug nosa gin toua . Dara emen emacgeij en naugb en arautut yen , dauntoba yen yaimo geigouhw , areg yen yesedeb se yen meigdoc mesohob augwan gini toua terimda . Dara emen emacgeij en naugb yen yemobsara dau leng Krisden meren geicara gedag beim gin touwero . Doba sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , emen emacgeij en naugb en eic goubesa dou yen , dauntoba yen yaimo ucina gini terimda yen yedebeij usi an augwan gin toua namcir .
53001012	Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , eic dag yen yeigdoumesa maman Adehsud Yesus en moho agas deseino lusud . Hanoba en toua eigdoumesa yen meijoho agas medam deseino lusud laugwan toua namcir . Augwan gini acgunog , anai maman Mamina Allah dara maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus , lan mardoc eigouhw an yen terimda toua namcirohob .
53002001	Doba eisaugb maman Adehsud Men Lona Sug En Ecicugwen , dara sug maman macinim desij en , kaba , dan desulou yen dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba yen meigdoc emeijesa dara yen meijdemaga emembreij eisaugb aremer gin dedemeda touwero , doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem terimda .
53002002	Anai dan douman dag ligbum , kaba , len ledenara dou yen dag maman Adehsud men Lona naugb sug en ecicugwen , kaba , edagasa namcirohob . Hanoba dan douman dag lingma , kaba , len louma debin gin dou yen , dag Mena Gogoufu ens dou len . Dara lingma , kaba , len louma debin dou yen dag meijouhw gini eb se Surad Injil Meb . Dara ligbum deit , kaba , len ledereiyara dou yen , dag emen emog augwan gini se surad dou yen touohob . Dobnaro . Augwan gini dag len lerba mohoisa yen dous .
53002003	Dangga hang , yen yemouman len merir an gin touwero , doba yen yebehnehino yenin meigdoc mes dougwo augwan gin terimda . Dauntoba meren genara gin , kaba , emaugwohosa yen touwero . Anai maman Adehsud , kaba , en emen debin maman augwougb touwero . Doba aimougtut , kaba , leng Krisden leinyana len merdoc obsara dau en naugb len leicara laihagab en mer . Dara Sud Hom Gagada Mos Dau Krisdus gedig Allah esedeb en naugb en erba en se dum smougb teiteiyohob , kaba , ens enin ainyes dou lusud touahabi .
53002004	Sud hom gin , kaba , en owun seiseij dara areg lusud lesijaresa augwan moho obsara namcir . Hanoba en eigdoumesa enin moho eb taiba dau augwan gin toua terimda . Dara en emahau dau Allah misen touwero . Doba sug en ens enin moho dag Allah misen dou lusud laugwanohob , kaba , en einesa Allah Men Tuari naugb en eigtou se men maija moc gin toua .
53002005	Yen meigdoc moc dougwo augwan ginohobei ? Anai sug dan indugwengga desij yen sug nosa , kaba , dan dens dau augwan gin dag misen dou yen touohob .
53002006	Dara Sud Hom Gagada Mos Dau Krisdus , kaba , en emens enin ainyes dou lusud augwougb touwero . Doba ebeij Lona sug Allah ogod an deb naugb enohob , kaba , en agunyen naugb ens enin ainyes dou lusud namcir . Anai iteitogini , kaba , ara gus eng edag sogo maga dougwo enaba . Dara sud hom gin , kaba , yen yecinaga dau en touohob .
53002007	Dangga hang , terimda Lona sug Allah asid areg gedag sogo maga dau Sud Hom Gagada Mos Dau Krisdus gin , kaba , en emens enin ainyes touebma . Doba en mena , kaba , eisa se lusud leinyana merdoc mesohob naugb en ahwan len aud areg gecgu dousaba .
53002008	Doba ebeij Lona sug Allah asid areg gedag sogo maga gin dau enohob , kaba , se Lona ingga en ens enin ainyes dou lusud laugwan . Doba se Lona Sug Maman Adehsud Yesus En Ecicugwen naugb en ens enin ainyes an men gogouf cucugb dou lusud laugwan , kaba , se Lona ingga en men bahu en omom . Hanoba men gogouf cucugb eic mor mor dou en toua namcir .
53002009	Anai sug Sud Hom Gagada Mos gini en en , kaba , en agunyen an Bilis men goubesa augwan . Dauntoba en aban ganusbus dara gansins gareibahau naugb auma debin enin deseino lusud laugwan .
53002010	Hanoba en eic men gereiyara aingma aingma gedag mog mog gini naugb en augwohosa leng lesedeb naugb len laimo ucina aud dum smougb teiteiyohob len laugwan toua namcir . Anai len gin , kaba , len lemebin dara len merdoc gororougb Allah mer misen geic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou len se len merdoc mes touwero . Doba len lotogoto en mer misen gin dau len merdoc mes namcirohob .
53002011	Dangga hang , sug len lemebin areg se geica ginero , kaba , Allah edug merdoc misen dau len . Dauntoba len lemod merna debsa areg se geica gin toua deitero . Doba len lod merna debsa areg dag areibahau gin dous .
53002012	Dau , kaba , en ogod gogom dag dum smougb deinaugb len toua . Anai len merdoc emebdebin an areg se geica ginero . Doba len merdoc gororougb areg gecgu terimdohob .
53002013	Doba dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , eisaugb yen , kaba , Allah emesedeb yen naugb sug en eic mor mor se dum smougb dou yenero . Doba en ouci yen deb dau sug acgunog . Dauntoba sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an aremer se geica ginohob , kaba , en eigdoc yen dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin ogdoc Mena Gogoufu men goubesa naugb yen yedag Allah men lusud gecabeci gin toua namcir . Allah eija yen aud gini ogdoc sug emen emesai en mer gin dou yen sug nosohob . Anai en ouwan naugb en ogugwo maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus men gogouf cucugb ingma dou yen toua . Augwan gini eica emen emdoc mes . Hang emen ememarges dau sug emen emen sijo dou Allah an yen touwero . Doba emen emeicara emaimo dangga an yen besesa terimda . Anai maman Adehsud medoc gororougb yen toua namcir .
53002014	
53002015	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug Allah ouci yen deb naugb sug en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou yen dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemobsara dau ucina misen gin touwero . Doba areg emen emesai dou yen se emen emir sug nosa , dara areg emen emesulou yen an se emen surad gin touohob , kaba , yen yes agadgeij namcir naugb yen yecgun yen meisira debin gin toua terimda .
53002016	Dara emen emocuncum dou maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus enin dara maman Mamina Allah , dauntoba lan laic yen meigdoc aiyansem dou yen . Dara lan lanara lad yen meigdoc mes toua . Dauntoba yen yemobsara dau meijen geicara geigouhw gin touwero . Doba meijen geicara dara areg agunya dau yen meijirs , kaba , augwan edag beim dara obosboro an lusud terimda . Emen emocuncum dou lan dag gini , anai Allah en medoc gororougb dara en medoc an maman toua namcirohob . Hang maman mamdoc emeijesa toua deitero , doba maman mamdoc ebtou namcir . Dara maman mameija mamuwesa en touwero . Doba maman maod mamina debsa endag areg en os dou mamanohob , kaba , en emeic dou maman toues .
53002017	
53003001	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug surad gin ouwedoc , kaba , dan dacgeij naugb yen yocuncum naugb emen toua . Dauntoba maman Adehsud en mer gin , kaba , emebtou touwero , doba ec bagaha dedemeda sungga sungga namcirahabi . Dara yen yocuncum naugb emen , dauntoba sug emen emesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou lusud , kaba , dag len lemesbes emen emir an touwero . Doba len lebin dara geigouhw namcir , aninim dag yen yebin en mer gin dara geigouhw sug nosa touohob .
53003002	Dara yen yocuncum naugb emen toua , dauntoba Allah eigdoc emen dau areg gecgu augwan toua namcir . Anai leinyana , kaba , len merdoc emebdebin an maman Adehsud en mer ginero . Doba len merdoc esrougb dara merug mog an emen toua terimda .
53003003	Doba maman Adehsud , kaba , en medoc dag hom an mamanohob . Dangga hang , en emamsoho yen touwero . Doba en eic goubesa dou yen , dauntoba yen yaiyan meigdocesem . Dara en eseyeiyo yen dougwo Sud Hom Mobgos Maha toua terimda .
53003004	Dara emen emod emina debsa maman Adehsud dara goubesa dag en arautut yen . Dauntoba yen yemehig dau areg emen emarougb yen an gin touwero , doba yen yeicara yaimo augwan gin toua namcir .
53003005	Hang emen emacgeij en , dauntoba yen yemobsara dau sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba en eic yen meigdoc aiyansem dou yen naugb yen yaimo gin terimda . Aninim dag enin toua aimo ucina mog erij naugb yen sug nosa touohob . Dara emen emacgeij en naugb en ousa yen , dauntoba yen yecinaga dau sug Allah medoc gororougb yen gini meijouhw augwan bedreg dau sug nosa toua deit .
53003006	Doba dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , eisaugb leng lesbes emen emir an areg emen emesai dou yenohob . Hanoba len lagaij merisira dougwo sug len leicara terimda , kaba , emen emesulou yen se maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus , en moho , dag yen yemeigtou desij lenero . Doba yen yasid yenin dau len namcir , anai emen emeperwei en mohw naugb ginohob .
53003007	Dara yen yenin yecinaga dag Allah emouwan naugb yen yesogwa deisa leng lagaij merisira len meruhotimei mohw aud meren geicara gin touwero . Doba en ouwan naugb yen yaimo emen aud emen geicara gin dous . Anai sug emen emugwengga desij yen sug nosa , kaba , emen ememagaij emen emsira touwero .
53003008	Doba emen emeic emen emug erij naugb emenin astesda lona loba terimda . Dauntoba emen ememedag areg gogomcin sud hom ingma dau yen touwero . Doba yen meigdoc ebtou naugb ucina hom gin dous . Dangga hang , sug emen emacgeij ara ara dau yen , kaba , emen ememacgeij dag mogud dau yen touwero . Doba emen emouma augwan teitei dau yen namcir .
53003009	Emen goubesa inggebga naugb sug emen emacgeij ara ara dag mogud dau yen . Doba emen ememeicara dag gin dou yenero . Anai emen emouwan dauntoba emen emedag gansins dou yen naugb yen yesogwa deisa emen emohotimei mohw an emen geicara gin toua terimda .
53003010	Augwan gini aimo dau areg emen emesulou yen an sug emen emugwengga desij yen sug nosa touohob . Anai emen emenara dou yen , dag gareg en agaij mesira namcir dougwo sug en eicara , kaba , eigouhw naugb yen yemeic ared dou en touwero . Doba yen yamsoho namcir .
53003011	Emen emesulou yen an dag gini , anai emen emouman dag merug hosa se meijen cinogo ingga , kaba , len lemeicara deitero . Doba len lesugrog namcir , hanoba len lemehigdog touwero . Doba len merohora esesa naugb len lodo len meraga se len gus meren aremer toua namcirohob .
53003012	Dangga hang , se maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus men goubesa , kaba , emen emen dougwo len . Hanoba emen emesulou len dara goubesa toua . Dauntoba len lemeicara dag gin deitero . Doba len lehigdog naugb len merisira eicara an lenin terimda .
53003013	Doba dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , yen , kaba , yen yemehig dau sug yen yaimo areg gedag beim dara obosboro an lusud touwero . Doba yen yos debin gin terimda .
53003014	Doba gareg en emaimo emen emir an areg emen emesulou yen an se surad ginero . Hanoba en eic mos terimda , kaba , yen youmesem dougwo en naugb yen yemeigtou desij en touwero . Doba yen yasid en dau yen . Dauntoba sug meijen geicara gini eic igdebes dou enohob , kaba , eic dag en mos obsara an men geicara gin toua namcir .
53003015	Doba yen yemowun en moho dag meijen moc touwero . Doba yen yesulou en an men geicara dag yen meijaguna se Krisdus dous .
53003016	Dan dacgeij maman Adehsud en eng , dauntoba en moongga desij yen naugb en eseyeiyo yen dougwo aremer augwan toua terimda . Anai enin eng eic gesgigouhwesa dou lusud dous .
53003017	Dang , Paulus , dan dou yen toua . Dan dog moho hom gini ai danin insira naugb yen . Anai astesda surad gus gus augwan , kaba , danin deic dan insira mena eb debin dag gin dou lusud terimda .
53003018	Maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus medoc eigouhw an yen yaugwan namcir .
54001001	Surad gini dau dang , Paulus , dou Timotius , ban , gedig dan deija ban dag dan indisi misen se Krisdusohob . Anai Allah dara Krisdus Yesus lan laigdoumesa dan indoho , hanoba lan larougb dan naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus Yesus dou lusud laugwan toua . Hang dan dacgeij maman Mamina Allah dara maman Adehsud Krisdus Yesus naugb lan mardoc an ban namcir . Dara lan mardoc eineg an ban , hanoba lan laseyeiyo ban dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua terimda . Anai Allah gin , kaba , eni Sud Hom Geigdoc Maman Dau Sesar Men Gogom Augwan namcir . Dara Krisdus , kaba , eni sud hom gedig maman maod mamina debsa en naugb en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou maman toua .
54001002	
54001003	Dan dog surad gini dou ban , dauntoba ban bemeihwededau cinogo Epesus inggaro . Doba ban beigtou sungga terimda naugb ban ben dougwo lusud merug aibibra dag len lemamimiri an areg dag huhugb , dara maman mamjemouwer , dara malaikadir len meroho . Hanoba len lemebedbed mer areibahau eisaugb Krisdus debin gin touwero , doba len larges dau namcir . Anai areg len lamimiri an gin , kaba , emousa Allah an areg en esedeb naugb en eigdoc lusud dau sesar men gogom ginero . Doba eic dag len lenara laisedim dous .
54001004	Hang ban ben dougwo len dara goubesa namcir , dauntoba len lemedidib dau areg graga dou lusud deitero . Doba len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus terimda . Anai areg Allah en esedeb naugb mamanohob , kaba , eb naugb maman ogdoc sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an Krisdus hom gin dous . Dan denara dau areg graga augwan dou banohob sug dan demeihwededau ban dig leng Makedonia meren hancob touebma , doba dan deigtou desij banaba . Hang dan demens dau leng lebedbed mer areibahau gini len meroho dou ban touwero . Anai ban becinaga len laugwan dag misenohob .
54001005	Dara indan gauwamara dau sug dan den dougwo leng graga an meren geicara , kaba , dag len lemarges dau gin dousero . Doba ousa maman naugb sug maman mamdoc gororougwim toua terimda . Dangga hang , dan demouwan naugb sug len lemeisa merir an ara ara deitero . Doba len leic meruwemougb esesa naugb len merdoc emogdogda len an aremer hom touwero . Doba lousa deisa len an dag len merdoc ecabeci namcir . Dara dan demouwan naugb sug len lemekeba merdoc hwai icira touwero . Doba len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag misen namcirahabi , len lemaimo en an areg en arougb len an gini dara merdoc hom toua terimda . Anai sug len leicara dag gin , kaba , eic dag maman mamdoc gororougwim toua namcir .
54001006	Dan den dangga dou len , anai ligbum dau leng lesai mer areibahau gin , kaba , len leigdoumesa lenin meroho dag len meru ouforoho naugb len ledidib meijouhw dau Allah men gomnomna areg en eic dou Musa augwan asesa dou lusud touohob . Dobnaro . Areg len louma debin gin , kaba , len lemecinaga moho hom dara meijouhw dau augwan gin touwero . Doba len merirs obdobdem an gin dous . Dangga hang , len lemaimo ucina an areg ousa len naugb len merdoc gororougb lusud toua deitero . Doba len laijahasero dau augwan gin namcirohob . Hanoba len lenara laisedim eisaugb huhugb dara meroho gin toua terimda .
54001007	
54001008	Doba maman macinaga dag Allah men gomnomna areg en eic dou Musa ginohob , kaba , augwan eigouhw namcir . Dangga hang , esloulougb naugb sug maman maimo gomnomna gini an lusud , kaba , dag maman mamedreg Allah men gauwamara eisaugb men gomnomna gin touwero . Doba maman maimo men gauwamara gini an lusud gin dous .
54001009	Anai maman macinaga dau sug Allah eic men gomnomna dou Musa , kaba , dag en emeic men gomnomna gini dou en naugb len gedig laimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes ginero . Doba en eic men gomnomna gin dou en naugb leng lohoiya dara laiga gomnomna gin terimda . Dara len gedig lemaimo areg Allah arougb len an ginero , doba lebesesar abeba en mer gin namcir . Dara leng ledegeij merir an en , hanoba len lemesijaresa en touero . Doba len laimo areg geb se cinogo gin dous . Dara leng logod merner , dara leng merimir , dara leng lohudara .
54001010	Dara leng merisirebsem , dara ligida dara ligiji gedig len leicara dag mihi naugb laidim aibibrida , dara leng los lusud dag sogougb naugb latagaij aremougb terimda , dara leng laideidoro , dara leng lerba mohoisa , dara leng loho meh dougwo leng gus , dara areg gedreg dau mamang Krisden maman gomnomna gus gus augwan gin toua . Anai gomnomna gin , kaba , eic lusud merdoc erleij dou len dous , aimo dau Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus areg Allah en ogugwo dou danohob naugb sug dan desai dou lusud laugwan toua . En , kaba , en moho agas medam namcir . Hang en eigouhw naugb maman magahugouhw an en dareg masijaresa en toua terimda .
54001011	
54001012	Dan den sijo medam dou maman Adehsud Krisdus Yesus , anai en eic mou ouforoho dara goubesa dou dan naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb en dou lusud . Anai en eiya dan indoc mes , doba edeinyum naugb ginohob . Hang en emeigdoumesa dan indoho naugb gin toua .
54001013	En eicara dangga dou dan gedig dan indug mog mog an en , hanoba dan deic en moho bacecim . Dara dan deic mog erij dou men lusud len laugwan sug nosa touohob . Doba en medoc eineg an dan . Hanoba en aigdougwo indan geicara gecgu gin augwan dau dan toua . Anai dan daimo augwan gini dau sug dan demecinaga meijouhw eisaugb en dag misen touebma . Doba dani moongga se lobeigbogaba ,
54001014	Dara maman Adehsud emarges dau sug en medoc eineg an dan gin touwero . Doba en medoc eineg an dan beiseisaugb terimda . Hang en emeic dan indoc aiyansem dou dan naugb sug dan indoc ebdebin an en . Dara dan indoc gororougb lusud toua terimda . Anai sug maman madag hom dara Krisdus Yesusohob , kaba , areg gin augwan eb naugb maman toua namcir .
54001015	Anai Krisdus Yesus gin , kaba , en emouwaden dau bogo naugb leng ledag beimero . Doba en ouwaden dau bogo naugb en eigdoc leng lebesesar len laugwan dau meren gogom dous . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir . Dangga yen yemetogoto en mer gini touwero . Doba yen yebin se yen meigdoc mes , anai se geica namcirohob . Hang eigouhw naugb lusud laugwan merdoc ebdebin an dara laimo toua terimda . Doba gareg Yesus eigdoc en dau sesar men gogomohob , kaba , dan eng debesesar edreg dau len laugwan namcirohob .
54001016	Doba Krisdus Yesus , kaba , en ouwan dan dedag gansins naugb lusud se lona daiyamo gacin toua . Dauntoba sug len leiya dag en emeic gogom dou dan gedig dan debesesar edreg dau len laugwanohob gin dedemedero . Doba en eigtou bateteij dan dag gin terimda , kaba , eic len merdoc erleij dou len naugb len merdoc ebdebin an en . Dauntoba en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou len toua . Hang en medoc emeineg an dan naugb en emaigdougwo indan sesar augwan dau dan toua namcir .
54001017	Dangga hang , eigouhw naugb maman magahugouhw dara maigdoumesa Allah en moho agas beb huhugb terimda . Anai enin eng edag Allah hom dous gedig maman mameiya en se maman mamiresi mougwa hombuma . Dara en emomom touwero . Doba en edag mougt mera medam beb huhugb terimda toua . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
54001018	Timotius , dan indisi , areg leng lesai Allah moro len lens deb dou leng se goucimdeb eisaugb ban sug len leigdoumesa ban dag gembala sug nosohob , kaba , dan desulou ban dara goubesa namcir naugb ban abdoc moc dougwo gin touwero . Doba ban abdoc eiseisan gin namcir . Dauntoba areg len louma debin ban ginohob , kaba , ousa ban naugb sug ban bemahau touwero . Doba eic geic mos dou ban naugb sug ban besara dara areg gecgu deigeigouhw terimda .
54001019	Dara ban bemobsara dau sug ban abdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero . Doba ban bes agadgeij naugb ban baimo en terimda . Hanoba ban bebehnehino banin abdoc mes dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua , dauntoba aremer hom emen dougwo ban touwero . Doba aban geicara augwan ecabeci namcir . Anai ligbum , kaba , len merdoc emogdoc aremer augwan ginero , doba len ledreg ginohob . Hang len merdoc emebdebin an Krisdus toua deitero . Doba len ledag ij mebes ocro bobrugb naugb len lobsara dau en namcir touohob .
54001020	Lahwai dau len gin , kaba , lan maroho dag Himeneus dara Aleksander . Hang dan dogugwo lan deb se Setan mesira ucugwohob . Dauntoba sug en eic mog erij medam dou lan , kaba , lan lameic Allah en moho lamacecim dag gin toua deitero . Doba lan lahau an dougwo namcir .
54002001	Dangga hang , sug yen youcimdeb , kaba , dan desulou yen ucucugb terimda , dag aimougtut , kaba , yen yocuncum dou Allah naugb mougt mera gouji an meren gedeijan len laugwan . Dauntoba len lemeic gogom augwougb dou maman touwero . Doba len merdoc eigouhw an maman , kaba , maman mamdoc ebtou naugb sug maman masijaresa Allah . Dara maman maimo areg obosboro an lusud toua terimda . Anai aremer hom gin , kaba , esloulougb medam edreg dau areg gus augwan namcir . Hanoba yen yacgeij Allah naugb en eic ara ara gedeinyum dou len . Dara en ousa len an meren aremer . Dara yen yen sijo dou en naugb len toua terimda .
54002002	
54002003	Sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yeic Allah en medoc dag en agahugouhw an yen toua . Anai augwan gin , kaba , eigouhw namcir deseino enohob .
54002004	Anai en , kaba , en emouwan naugb sug sud hom ingma emeihwedig dum smougb touwero . Doba en ouwan naugb sug en eigdoc len laugwan dau sesar men gogom augwanohob , kaba , dag en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou len laugwan . Hanoba en ouwan naugb len lecinaga areg se geica meijouhw augwan asesa ucan gin toua .
54002005	Anai enin eng Allah hom dous . Dara en eigdoumesa sud hom dous eng naugb en edag maman gembala gesa taij deseino en touohob . En ingga sud hom misen , moho Krisdus Yesus , gedig en eic enin maga bancoho aga lusud laugwan dou Allah naugb meren sesarohob .
54002006	Augwan gini ens ainyes dou maman dag Allah esedeb en medoc mesohob naugb sug en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwan gin toua . Dangga hang , sug cumougt edagasohob , kaba , en ens dau augwan gini asesa dou maman touohob .
54002007	Sug Allah esedeb medoc mes naugb gin dag ginohob , kaba , en eigdoumesa dan indoho . Hanoba en arougb dan naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lugmahara . Dara dan dedidib meijouhw dau augwan gini dou len toua . Dauntoba len toua merdoc ebdebin an en . Anai augwan gini se geica mogud dous . Hang dan demereiyara dou yenero . Doba dan denara se misen dou yen namcir .
54002008	Dangga hang , dan demouwan naugb yen yemarges dau sug yen yocuncum naugb mougtir dara lusud se cinogo augwan touwero . Doba se astesda goucimdeb sug yen yeisa Ari , kaba , dan douwan naugb ligiji mogud len locuncum an len terimda . Dara sug len lou merisira aud bogo naugb len locuncum dou Allah , kaba , dan demouwan naugb len merdoc emesrougb anim , dara len merir emedregim eisaugb ara ara touwero . Doba len merusutimei ogoufu namcir .
54002009	Dangga toua , sug yen youcimdeb , kaba , dan demouwan naugb ligida len lemeic areg mera eisaugb naugb lemacgun merugt . Dara len lemobungma lenin meraga dara emas dara sariou mogo touwero . Doba len lobungma lenin dara meren geicara gedag beim dous . Anai gini aimo dau ligida areg len leigdoumesa lenin meroho dag len lesogwa deisa Allah mohotimei mohw se men geicara augwan dag misenohob . Dara dan demouwan naugb sug len loucimdeb , kaba , dag len lemeg sansun mera eisaugb touwero . Doba len leg sansun misen areg mera ouwada gedig lusud merdoc esgiraha an gin dous .
54002010	
54002011	Dara hom deit , kaba , dan demouwan naugb sug len lemens aremeijouhw dau Surad Injil Meb dou lusud se goucimdeb touwero . Doba len lowun lenin merdoc mes arjaga naugb len louman dau sug lusud lens aremeijouhw dau gin dou len .
54002012	Hanoba len lemeigdoumesa lenin meroho dag mougt se goucimdeb touwero . Doba se aremer augwan , kaba , len leigtou dag osum namcir .
54002013	Anai Allah emesinsin Epa aimougtutero . Doba en esinsin Adam eng aimougtut . Hang en emedag mougt naugb en .
54002014	Dangga toua , Bilis en emainyen Adam sug aimougtut touwero . Doba en ainyen Epa , hang en emobsara se sesar toua .
54002015	Doba inggaida . Anai sug len lemobsara dau sug len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero , doba len merdoc ebdebin an en terimda . Hanoba len merdoc gororougb lusud naugb len ledag us mod mod an len . Dara len meru aiso naugb len lemaimo areg gecgu touwero . Doba len laimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes dous , kaba , maireseb menau geb huhugb emediyebeiya dau len touwero . Doba eb naugb len toua terimda . Hang len lemahau dau sug len leis an merihir touwero , doba len laimo gin terimda . Anai gini emedag sogo maga dougwo len an merireseb menau geb huhugb touwero . Doba sug len laimo areg graga augwan esesa terimda , kaba , eb naugb len namcir .
54003001	Gareg en ouwan naugb en edag mougt naugb goucimdeb , kaba , gini dag en ouci areg mera eisaugb naugb enohob . Aremeijouhw gini misen namcir .
54003002	Dangga gareg en ouwan naugb yen yeigdoumesa en dag mougt , kaba , Allah en ouwan naugb lusud lemehin meriresa en icira aremer hom touwero . Doba men geicara augwan ecabeci namcir . Dara en eic mesuwa toua hom dous . Dara en medoc ouforoho se aremer augwan namcir . Hanoba en esedougwo enin medoc mes dougwo sug en aimo areg gecgu augwan . Dara en medoc edag beim an lusud laugwan toua teitei . Dara en ebin len gus . Dara en mou ouforoho naugb en edidib meijouhw augwan asesa dou lusud .
54003003	Hang en medoc gororougb ahwei mohu . Dara en mer emeised lusud naugb en emogod len gus dedemeda touwero . Doba Allah ouwan dag en medoc arjaga namcir naugb en oho geigouhw se lusud merdoc mes terimda . Dara en medoc emetrij icira aregoufu dara aremougb naugb en emenara ucucugb dou lusud touwero . Doba en enara dara medoc arjaga namcir .
54003004	Dangga toua , Allah en ouwan naugb en edag mougt naugb en ens ucina geigouhw dou leng leigtou desij en se men tu . Dara en omnomna dou en mehir naugb len lowun lenin merdoc mes arjaga deseino en . Hanoba len leigdoumesa en moho toua terimda .
54003005	Anai sug sud hom en mou emouforoho naugb en esedougwo lusud se men tu dara geigouhwero , kaba , dagiro , naugwe hang , en esedougwo Allah men lusud dara geigouhwa ? Naro .
54003006	Dara Allah emouwan naugb sug yen yemeigdoumesa sud hom Krisden menau dag gembala touwero . Doba yen yeigdoumesa sud hom gedag lusud mos dous . Anai sug yen yeigdoumesa sud hom Krisden menau edag mougt , kaba , cum , en agahugouhw beimiman enin an gin namcir . Dangga en esma gogom , aninim dag gogom areg Bilis esma sug nosa touohob .
54003007	Dangga toua , Allah en ouwan sud hom gedag mougt naugb yen , kaba , dag eni sud hom areg leng medigo Yesus leigdoumesa en moho an men geicara gedag beim sug nosa touohob . Anai sug yen yeigdoumesa sud hom areg men geicara gecguohob , kaba , cum , lusud lesbes an en . Hanoba en obsara se Bilis men digorobei ucugb toua .
54003008	Dangga toua , sug yen yeigdoumesa sud hom dag pembela , kaba , yen yemeigdoumesa sud hom gedig en metemouwu maraida . Dara en medoc gororougb ahwei mohu dara en medoc etrij icira aremougb touwero . Doba yen yeigdoumesa sud hom gedig lusud leigdoumesa en moho an aremer augwanohob , dag pembela dous . Anai gareg en medoc etrij icira naugb en agungun lusud an meren aremougb , kaba , men geicara gini eic dag lusud igdebeseba len an namcir .
54003009	Dara yen yemeigdoumesa sud hom gedig en eija mouwesa areg Allah ens dou maman eisaugb Krisdus gin touwero . Doba yen yeigdoumesa sud hom gedig en esetoto se mer gin namcirohob dous . Anai sug nosa , kaba , Allah emens dau areg eisaugb Krisdus dou sud hom ingma touebma . Doba en ecgoneh augwan dau len terimda . Doba iteitogin , kaba , en ens augwan gini ainyes dou mamanohob .
54003010	Dara sud hom areg yen yeigdoumesa en dag pembela , kaba , en mesouwa toua hom dous . Hanoba en esedougwo en mehir dara men sogougwir laugwan dara geigouhw toua . Dara yen , kaba , yen yemeigdoumesa en namcirlobma . Doba yen yehigdecin en mairesebahabi . Dauntoba sug yen yeiya , doba men geicara edeinyum naugb augwanohob , kaba , yen yeigdoumesa en dag pembela misen deit toua . Anai sug pembela aimo men ucina gin dareg gedag beim an lusud namcir , kaba , eic dag len leigdoumesa en moho an gini terimda . Hang eic geic mos dou en naugb en os badi Krisdus Yesus en moho se goubesa dou len toua . Dangga toua , sug yen yeigdoumesa ligida dag pembela , kaba , Allah en emouwan naugb yen yemeigdoumesa ligida gedig len loc desan aremer touwero . Doba en ouwan naugb yen yeigdoumesa ligida gedig lusud leigdoumesa len meroho an aremer augwanohob dag pembela dous . Hanoba yen youci ligida gedig len lebehnehino lenin merdoc mes dougwo areg gecgu augwan . Dara len lemesediara touwero . Doba meren geicara augwan edag beim an lusud terimda toua .
54003011	
54003012	
54003013	
54003014	Dan desedeb naugb dan dedeiya ban sungga . Dauntoba dan dens dau gin augwan ai dan indirs dou ban touahabi . Dobnaro , kaba , dan dog dau augwan gini se surad gin dou ban . Dauntoba ban becinaga dau maman geicara areg Allah esedeb naugb men lusud maman men meijouhw augwan asesa toua .
54003015	Anai maman mainesa Allah gedig en maireseb huhugb men uro mesohob . Hang en emogugwo en mer geica gini se maman mamsira toua . Dauntoba maman madeijan en mer misen gini . Dara maman masedougwo deigouhw dougwo areg gecgu toua .
54003016	Dangga areg Allah en ens dau Krisdus dou mamanohob , kaba , sud hom ingma dau maman , kaba , en emaideido dougwo gin touwero . Doba maman maugwan mauma debin dag en mer gin , kaba , moho agas namcir . Anai enin eng ouwaden dau bogo naugb en edag lusud misen . Dara sug Mena Gogoufu eigdoumesa en dau gomom ucugwohob , kaba , gini dag en ouma debin Krisdus dag en emereiyara dou maman mougwa hom touwero . Doba en edag Allah Meisi mohora hom dag misen namcirohob . Dara malaikad len toua , merugwengga desij en naugb len leiya dau men geicara augwan gin toua . Hang Mer Geigouhw eisaugb en , kaba , agaha becinten lugmahara len laugwan naugb len merdoc ebdebin an en toua . Anai maman macinaga dag Allah eigdoumesa en ucugb dig bogo aud en . Dauntoba en edag mougt mera medam naugb augwan namcir .
54004001	Doba Mena Gogoufu ens se misen dou mamanohob , dag se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , ligbum dau maman len merdoc emebdebin an Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus areg maman mabedbed dou len gini deitero . Doba len lei merums naugb merna gaugwohosa dara merna mog mog an areg len lebedbed dou len ogdoc lusud gedig len merdoc omom dau mer misen eisaugb Krisdus gin namcirohob .
54004002	Hang len lemebedbed areg se geica dou lusud toua deitero . Doba len lebedbed mer areibahau dou len . Hanoba len leicara larerei len meriresi naugb len laijahasero dous .
54004003	Anai len len dougwo lusud dag len lemeicim deitero . Dara len lagodgod len naugb len lousan areg Allah en esinsin gin toua . Dobnaro . Maman gedig maman mamdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag misenohob , kaba , maman maic augwan dareg man sijo dou en dauwahabi , maman mamet toua . Anai maman macinaga areg se geica augwanohob .
54004004	Anai areg Allah en ahasesei dara en esinsin naugb maman gin , kaba , en ouma debin dag augwan gini ecabeci namcirohob . Dangga hang , maman mamousan hom touwero . Doba maman maic augwan dara man sijo dou en toua . Anai sug maman man sijo dag gin , kaba , gini aninim dag maman mauma debin en mer dag hom emogor touwero . Doba augwan ecabecohob . Hang en emowun maman an areg maman mat hom touwero . Doba en eigdoumesa augwan dag eigouhw deseino en toua terimda .
54004005	
54004006	Ban bens dau areg dan desulou ban an graga augwan asesa dou nanan nanaguner dara nandamouwer len laugwan toua . Anai sug ban beicara dag gin , kaba , ban bedag Krisdus Yesus men sogougb hom gedig en aimo en deigeigouhw namcirohob . Dara ban bemeisan gurog dau mer misen eisaugb Krisdus . Dara meijouhw areg lusud ledidib dou banohob gin touwero . Doba ban abir ebdebin areg ban abdoc ebdebin an dara baimohob gin toua terimda . Anai sug ban beicara dag gin , kaba , eic gerleij dou ban toua .
54004007	Hang ban bemaimo leng lecic huhugb dara len merjemouwer meroho graga touwero . Doba ban basid banin aigusi dau leng merirs obdobdem ingga namcir . Anai areg len lecic gin , kaba , dag lusud gedig len meru emaiyero meren genara . Hang emousa ban naugb ban bemaimo Allah en mer se aremer augwan touwero , doba ahwan ban dau gin dous .
54004008	Dara ban bemeic abuwemougb esesa naugb ban abaga eiji dag goubesa touwero . Doba ban beicara baimo naugb ban abdoc ecabeci . Dara ban beic abuwemougb esesa naugb ban baimo Allah en mer se men aremer augwan toua terimda . Anai sug ban becgun ban absira naugb ban abaga eiji dag goubesa , kaba , gini ousa ban . Doba cum cum dous . Doba sug ban beic abuwemougb esesa naugb ban baimo Allah en mer se men aremer augwan dag gin , kaba , ban bemec mera sug ban abireseb gin dousero . Doba os dou ban dag ban bemdec mera beb huhugb se lona daiyamo gacin toua . Hang gini emedeinyum naugb aremer hom graga dousero . Doba edeinyum naugb aremer augwan toua namcir .
54004009	Dangga sug maman macinaga dau ginohob , kaba , maman mamarges dau sug maman maimo Allah se aremer augwan gin touwero . Doba maman maic mamug erij dara maic mamuwemougb esesa se gin terimda . Anai maman macinaga dau sug maman maicara dag gin , kaba , dag maman mamom touwero . Doba Allah eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toua . Dangga hang , maman mamarges en deb touwero . Doba maman maod mamina debsa en terimda . Anai en , kaba , mobisamougb namcir naugb en eic maireseb huhugb dou maman . Dara maman macinaga dag en emeigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom gin dousero . Doba astesda gareg en medoc ebdebin an en dara od mena debsa en dag misen , kaba , en eigdoc len laugwan dau sesar men gogom augwan aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toua . Ban bens dau augwan gini meijouhw esesa dou aban goucimdeb . Hanoba ban barougb len , dauntoba len lemobsara dau gin touwero . Doba len leicara laimo gin terimda . Anai areg dan den dou ban gini , kaba , augwan asesa dag misen namcir . Hang yen yemohoiya touwero , doba yen yebin se yen meigdoc mes . Dara yen meigdoc ebdebin an dara yen meigdoc augwan toua terimda .
54004010	
54004011	
54004012	Dangga ban bemaimo areg gecgu homero . Doba areg agunya dau ban abirs . Dara aban geicara augwan , kaba , edag beim dara ecabeci namcir . Hanoba ban bemarges dau sug ban abdoc gororougb lusud . Dara ban abdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero . Doba se aremer gin augwan , kaba , ban bedag gansins naugb len gedig len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdusohob len laugwan toua terimda . Hang dan demouwan naugb lusud lowun ban dag bugdeh mesaba touwero .
54004013	Doba astesda sug yen youcimdeb , kaba , dan douwan naugb ban becic dau Surad Injil Meb dou len . Hanoba ban bebedbed dara bedidib meijouhw ucan dou len toua . Dara ban bemarges dau gin touwero . Doba ban bos debin augwan gin terimda dan dedacu ban sungga toua .
54004014	Dangga hang , ban bemeisan gurog an mou gouforoho areg Allah eic dou banohob sug en esa men lusud aud ban gin touwero . Doba ban beic abuwemougb esesa naugb ban beicara baimo gini terimda . Anai Allah en esa en mer dou ban ogdoc leng lesai en moro sug nosohob dag en ouwan naugb ban besai en mer eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud . Dara ban bens meijouhw augwan dou len toua . Dangga hang , sug mougtir se goucimdeb len lob merisira se ban abugtohob , kaba , Allah eic mou ouforoho dou ban naugb gin touohob .
54004015	Dangga hang , ban bemarges dau areg Allah eic dou banohob ginlo . Doba ban bogoncin hom gin terimda . Anai sug ban beicara baimo dag gin , kaba , ban beiji dag lusud mos se Krisdus namcir . Hanoba eb ainyes naugb lusud laugwan leiya toua .
54004016	Doba esloulougb medam naugb ban bebehnehino banin abdoc dougwo areg gecgu augwan . Dara ban besedougwo areg ban bebedbed ingga toua . Dauntoba areg misen mogud eng agunya dou lusud dous . Anai sug ban beicara baimo dangga , kaba , ban bemeigdoc banin dau sesar men gogom dousero . Doba ban beigdoc leng louman ban abir an gin len laugwan dau sesar men gogom gin touohob .
54005001	Sug sud bod hom dau leng Krisden en ebesesar , kaba , ban bemesa ban abir debin enlo . Doba ban benara baded en medoc mes dous , aninim dag ban benara baded ban abina misen toua . Dangga toua , sug lugdeh mes len lebesesar , kaba , ban bemenara gouji dou len touwero . Doba ban benara dara garjaga dou len dous . Aninim dag ban benara dara ban abir arjaga dou ban abaguner dara ban abagtor misen len toua .
54005002	Dangga toua , sug ligida lusudbod laimo areg gecguohob , kaba , ban abir bemaic len touwero . Doba ban besulou len aninim dag ban besulou ban abim misen toua . Dara sug ligdob toua leicara gecgu , kaba , ban bemenara medam dou len touwero . Doba ban ben dougwo len dara ban abir arjaga . Aninim dag ban ben dougwo banin abdemeitor toua . Doba sug ban besulou len dag gin , kaba , ban besedougwo banin abdoc mes agadgeij dau len namcir .
54005003	Doba eisaugb debdesir , kaba , dan demouwan naugb yen yemousa len aibibrero . Doba yen yousa debdes misen dous .
54005004	Anai en , kaba , en mehir dara medebeitor lingma naugb sug lousa en touwero . Doba en eigtou dou enin terimda . Hang men ara ara hom emeb naugb enero , kaba , en acgeij Allah astesda lona loba terimda naugb sug en eic ara ara dou en toua . Anai en od mena debsa en hom dous .
54005005	Doba debdes gedig en mehir dara medebeitor toua merugwengga , kaba , eigouhw naugb lenin eng merdoc an en naugb len lagauwesa en nosahabi . Dauntoba len ledug men geicara geigouhw dou len ingma ucugb dou en toua . Anai sug len leicara dangga , kaba , len leicara laimo Allah en mer se ginohob . Hang emeic en medoc esgiraha an len toua .
54005006	Doba debdes hom gedig en ohw en maga dou lusud naugb en arei aremougb dau len dous , kaba , yen yemousa en touwero . Doba yen yasid en dau goucimdeb . Anai se maga , kaba , en mairesebaba . Doba se en medoc mes , kaba , en omom dau Krisdus namcirohob .
54005007	Ban bens dau augwan gini dou debdes an en mehir dara en medebeitor len laugwan . Hanoba ban barougb len naugb len laimo toua terimda . Dauntoba ogdoc aremer gin , kaba , lusud lemowun len touwero .
54005008	Anai gareg en emagauwesa mosur , hanoba en emeigdoumesa enin men lusud naugb en emagauwesa len debinbin touwero , kaba , gin dag en aideido dougwo Krisdusohob . Hang en moho eiyema edreg dau leng medigo Yesus len laugwan toua namcirohob .
54005009	Dangga hang , debdes gedig en men arisogomoc sud homoi , hanoba en es mesuwa hom terimda en omom dauwohob , kaba , enin dous eng yen yog en moho se surad naugb yen yousa en . Debdes gus , kaba , ban bemog len meroho se suradero .
54005010	Dara esloulougb toua dag lusud leigdoumesa en moho an men geicara geigouhw dag en emedag medehidera touwero , doba en edag hweij lomoumougb an en mehir . Dara en ebin leng Krisden gus . Hanoba en owun enin medoc mes arjaga dag sogougb deseino len naugb en ousa len dara ara ara . Dara en eigdoumesa gogom dau leng gedig meren aremer eb debin len . Dara en ecgun mesira naugb en aimo ucina geigouhw an lusud gus len laugwan toua terimdohob .
54005011	Doba debdes gedig en edag ligdobaba , kaba , yen yemog en moho se surad ginero . Anai cum , kaba , en medoc etrij icira ligiji deit . Hanoba en emeicara dou Krisdus toua deitero . Doba en arges dau en namcir naugb en edes mesuwa menau toua .
54005012	Dangga hang , Allah eic gogom dou en toua namcir . Anai sug yen yog en moho se surad gin , kaba , gini aninim dag en os dou Krisdus dag en emdes mesuwa deitero , doba en eicara naugb en hom dous . Doba sug en edes mesuwa deit , kaba , gini dag en edreg dau areg en os dou Krisdus aimougtut augwan gini touohob .
54005013	Dara len lemedreg dau gin dousero . Doba sug yen yousa debdes ligdobaba dag gin , kaba , eic dag len lesebesa augwougb naugb len loc desan len gus meren aremer se len gus meren tu toua terimda . Dara gin dousero , doba eic dag len lecic len gus meroho gouhw genes . Dara len lodo meraga se len gus meren aremer . Hang len merirs emogom an ara ara touwero . Doba len merirs eijouhw naugb len lecic dau areg Allah en dougwohob gin toua namcir .
54005014	Dangga hang , dan douwan naugb debdes ligdobaba , kaba , len ledes mersuwa deit , dara len lemouwadan merihir , hanoba len ledag hweij lomoumougb an len . Dara len leicara edag beim an leng se meren tu len laugwan toua terimda . Anai sug len leicara dag gin , kaba , emeic cumougt dou maman moc dau leng medigo Yesus naugb len lemeic maman mamoho lemacecim touwero .
54005015	Anai ligbum dau debdes ligdobaba gin , kaba , len lobsara dau ucina gini . Hanoba len laimo Setan aud areg gecgu ucugb touohob .
54005016	Doba sug debdes merugwengga desij ligida gedig len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdusohob , kaba , dan douwan naugb len lenin lousa debdes ginahabi . Dauntoba augwan emogomcin goucimdebero . Doba ebsa laugwan merbera toua . Anai sug len leicara dag ginohob , kaba , eic goubesa dou goucimdeb naugb len lousa debdes hom yom gedig len merihir dara merdebeitor ingmaro len dous .
54005017	Leng lesedougwo meijen tuari , doba leic meruwemougb esesa se gin terimda , kaba , yen yeigdoumesa len meroho edreg dau mougtir gus gus laugwan namcir . Hanoba yen yousa len dara ara ara edreg dou len toua . Anai len leic len merug erij medam naugb len lesedougwo meijen tuari deigeigouhwohob . Dara leng lemesedougwo meijen tuari gin dousero . Doba len leic meruwemougb esesa dara len leic merug erij laos dara naugb len lebedbed dara ledidib meijouhw asesa dou yen toua , kaba , yen yed len gin eng ino naugb yen yousa len edreg dau len gus laugwan toua namcir .
54005018	Anai augwan gini esogwa deisa areg Musa en og deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Ban bemeg aigdaga mes dougwo sapi mers sug en aiyan tramero . Doba ban bamsoho en naugb en et toua . Dara maman Adehsud Yesus enara dangga dou men logodeh sug nosa touohob , endagai : Gareg en esai Allah moro dou lusud , kaba , eigouhw naugb leng louman en mer gini , kaba , len lousa en toua .
54005019	Sug sud hom ohobas mougt hom en moho deseino ban , kaba , ban bemeic en mer an gin dedemedero . Doba sug lahwai era merug homoi len louma debin aremer gin dou ban , kaba , ban bemousa deisa len merir an gin toua .
54005020	Dangga sug ban becinaga , doba mougt hom gini en ebesesar dag misenohob , kaba , ban bemod aremer gini se simei touwero . Doba ban ben dougwo len deseino goucimdeb laugwan dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba sug leng se goucimdeb len louman , kaba , len lemeicara danggero . Doba len lahau an dougwo toua . Dau , kaba , ban bowun en moho , dauntoba en emesedougwo goucimdeb toua deitero .
54005021	Hang se aremer augwan , kaba , ban bemobsara aud sud hom ingma mougwa hom touwero . Doba deseino Allah dara Krisdus Yesus an men malaikad gecabeci len laugwan , kaba , dan darougb ban naugb ban bagod meren aremer augwan dara ban abdoc gedag beim an len dous .
54005022	Dara sug ban bowun mougt hom en moho ginohob , kaba , ban bemob ban absira se sud hom ingga en mougt naugb ban bemeigdoumesa en ucugb dedemeda touwero . Doba ban beigtou bateteijahabi . Dauntoba ban bemaimo en se men sesar ginero . Doba ban baimo ucina gecabeci dara gedag beim an gin dous .
54005023	Anai ligbum , kaba , meren aremer ens ainyes naugb lusud logod an ginohob . Doba lingma , kaba , meren aremer emdagunya se lona daiyamo gacin deits . Aninim dag lusud meren geicara geigouhw , kaba , ligbum eb ainyes deseino lusud naugb len lecinaga dedemeda . Doba lingma , kaba , ban bemeiya dau meren geicara geigouhw gin dedemedero . Doba emdagunya se lona daiyamo gacin . Anai emedeinyum naugb sug len lemecgoneh gin touwero . Dangga sug ban beigdoumesa sud hom graga en mougt dedemeda deit . Doba en medoc emobsara dau men sesar augwan touebma , kaba , gini aninim dag ban baimo men sesar gin touohob . Dara naugb banin , kaba , ban bemeg duhu mogud toua deitero . Doba ban beg anggur mohu gurereito dag ariawen debin duhu gin , dauntoba edis areg geb se ban abdoc mes augwan dau ban toua . Anai areba ban ucucugb terimdohob .
54005024	
54005025	
54006001	Doba mamang Krisden gedig lusud lowun len meroho dag sogougwohob , kaba , ban besulou len , dauntoba len lemedreg mougtir dau leng medigo Yesus len merir mougwa hom touwero . Doba se aremer augwan , kaba , len leigdoumesa meren mougtir gini len meroho naugb len laimo areg len larougb len an gini toua terimda . Dauntoba mougtir ingga , kaba , len lemeic Allah en moho lemacecim . Dara len lemesbes an en mer gin touwero . Doba len merdoc esgiraha se gin namcir .
54006002	Dara sogougb gedig meren mougtir len toua ledag Krisdenohob , kaba , ban besulou len . Dauntoba len lemesbes an len sug len ledag meragunem se Krisdus touwero . Doba len leic meruwemougb esesa edreg dau nosa deit . Dauntoba meren mougtir gini lec mera einyana dau len . Anai meren mougtir gin , kaba , len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus . Hang len ledag lusud gedig maman mamdoc gororougb len touohob . Aremer augwan gin , kaba , ban bens meijouhw asesa dou len . Hanoba ban barougb len naugb len laimo dangga toua terimda .
54006003	Doba gareg en emouma debin maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus mer geic gerleij dou maman . Dara en medoc emeica areg emen emedidib dou yen gin touwero . Hanoba en ebedbed mer susugb dau areg Allah arougb maman an gin , kaba , en medoc agas . Hanoba en emecinaga meijouhw augwan asesa touebma . Doba en mou edgom namcir .
54006004	Dangga areg en ebedbed gin , kaba , emahwan lusud naugb len lemaimo Allah en mer gin touwero . Doba eic dag len lekebem , dara leclul anim , dara lesmesmanim . Hanoba eic dag len merdoc ogdogdem an areg gecgu ucucugb terimda toua . Anai len lemaimo areg se geica deitero . Doba len lerba augwan dau len merdoc mesohob .
54006005	Hang len merdoc etrij naugb len lenara laisedim dara len merir edregim ucucugb . Anai len mersdemaga emesgiraha toua deitero . Doba dag embreij namcir naugb len lenara lauwim icira ara ara toua terimda . Dara gin dousero . Doba sug len meru emaiyero dag ginohob , kaba , len loudesa dag sug len laimo maman se Allah men ucina gin , kaba , eic dag len merisoho mougb an aremougb toua .
54006006	Dobnaro . Anai sug maman maimo Allah se men ucina gin , kaba , maman mamamsoho mougb an aremougb ginero . Doba gareg en eic mouwemougb esesa naugb en esogwa deisa Allah mohotimei mohw an areg en arougb en an gin terimda . Hanoba en medoc ebtou an aremougb areg Allah eic dou en toua , kaba , men geicara gini eic dag en mesoho mougb namcirohob .
54006007	Dangga sug ared , dara sansun , dara tu eb naugb mamanohob , kaba , eigouhw naugb maman mamdoc ebtou an gin namcir .
54006008	Anai sug maman mamimir louwadan maman se cinogo gin , kaba , maman mamen an ara ara ingma . Dara sug maman mamom , kaba , maman mamodo ara ara ingma naugb maisa augwan touwero . Doba maman mamug mogud namcir dous .
54006009	Doba leng merdoc etrij icira naugb len merisoho mougb , kaba , len mersdemaga emesgiraha naugb ara ara deitero . Doba sug len meru emaiyero namcirohob , kaba , eic dag len lobsara se Bilis men digorobei dedemeda naugb len laimo areg geic gogom einyana debin lenin terimda . Dara ahwan len naugb len merur mor se dum smougb beb huhugb toua . Anai sug len merdoc gororougb aregoufu dag ginohob , kaba , eic dag len lemaimo areg geigouhw an lusud touwero . Doba eic dag len leicara laimo areg gecgu einyana an len dous .
54006010	Dangga ligbum dau maman , kaba , len merdoc emebdebin an Krisdus toua deitero . Doba sug len mersdemaga embreij icira aremougb dag ginohob , kaba , eic dag len lobsara dau men ucina gin toua namcir . Hang len merdoc emebtou touwero . Doba len merdoc momogo dara eijesa an aremer einyana toua terimda .
54006011	Doba ban , kaba , ban bedag Allah men lusudohob . Dangga hang , ban bemaimo len gin an meren geicara . Dara ban abdoc emetrij icira mesoho mougb aninim dag len touwero . Doba ban basid banin aigusi dau gin namcir . Hanoba ban beic abuwemougb esesa naugb ban baimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes . Dara aban geicara augwan , kaba , aninim dag Allah enin men geicara augwan toua terimda . Dara ban bemobsara dau sug ban abdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero . Doba ban bes agadgeij namcir naugb ban baimo en dara ban abdoc augwan namcir . Hanoba ban bemarges dau sug ban abdoc gororougb len gus touwero . Doba ban beicara baimo dangga dara ban abdoc arjaga an len terimda .
54006012	Dara ban bemedis dau ucina aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touwero . Doba sug ban bedag hom dara Krisdusohob , kaba , ban becgun ban absira dara ban baiyan abinesem naugb ban bobga asa ucina gini dara aban goubesa augwan namcir . Anai ebiji se lona sug ban bos badi Yesus dag aban mougt mera medam deseino lusud leinyana sug nosa , kaba , Allah esedeb ban naugb ban baimo ucina gin touohob .
54006013	Hang ban bemobsara dau areg dan darougb ban anohob augwan gin touwero . Doba deseino Allah gedig en eic maireseb dou augwan . Dara Krisdus Yesus gedig en os badi en mer augwan asesa deseino Pilatus sug nosohob , kaba , dan desulou ban dara goubesa namcir , naugb ban baimo augwan gini dara gedag beim dara gecabeci terimda edebeij Lona Sug Maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus En Ecicugwen gin toua .
54006014	
54006015	Dangga sug ban beicara baimo augwan gini dara gedag beim terimdohob , kaba , Allah emowun ban aboho an aremer hom touwero . Doba en eigdoumesa ban aboho an augwan terimda . Anai enin dous eng , kaba , mobisamougb naugb en esedougwo augwan namcir . Hanoba en edag mougt mera medam naugb mougtir dara leng meroho agas len laugwan toua .
54006016	Dara enin dous eng eis huhugb sugragohob . Dara en eigtou se gogouf cucugb gedig sud hom ingma emedebeij naugb sug en emeiya en touwero . Hang maman magahugouhw an en . Dara maman maigdoumesa en moho agas beb huhugb terimda toua . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
54006017	Doba eisaugb leng Krisden gedig len merisoho mougb , kaba , ban besulou len dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba len merdoc emagas an meren aremougb areg emeb terimdero naugb len lemod merna debsa gin touwero . Doba ban besulou len naugb len lod merna debsa Allah gedig en eic maireseb dou lusud an augwan dous . Anai en , kaba , en emecgun mesira an ara ara dau maman touwero . Doba en agaha mesira an dou maman beiseisaugb namcir , dauntoba maman mamdoc eigouhw an augwan gin toua terimda .
54006018	Hanoba ban barougb len naugb len lemecgun merisira debin meren aremougb touwero . Doba len leicara eigouhw an lusud naugb len lagaha merisira an dou len . Hanoba len lekeba ara ara beiseisaugb dou len terimda toua . Dauntoba meren geicara geigouhw gin , kaba , eic dag len ledesma merisoho mougb misen icira gin toua namcir .
54006019	Anai sug len leicara dag gin , kaba , meren geicara geigouhw gini dag len leised huga medam naugb lenin se lona daiyamo gacin . Hang len lemobsara dau ucina aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touwero . Doba meren geicara gin , kaba , dag deic , dauntoba len les agadgeij naugb laimo toua terimda .
54006020	Dangga Timotius , ban bemaimo leng lenara laisedim . Dara lenara lauwim meren geicara mougwa hom touwero . Doba ban basid banin dau len namcir . Hanoba ban besedougwo areg Allah ogugwo dou banohob naugb sug ban besai gin augwan deigeigouhw dou lusud toua terimda . Anai leng lenara laisedim gin , kaba , len leigdoumesa lenin meroho dag areg len ledidib gin , kaba , eic dag lusud meru ouforoho an ara ara touohob . Dobnaro . Areg len lebedbed gin , kaba , emahwan lusud naugb len lera mera geigouhwero . Doba ahwan len naugb len merdoc edregim dous . Dara emarautut len naugb len lemaimo Allah en mer dara lemesijaresa en dag misen touwero . Doba einoisa len naugb len laijahasero dau en terimda .
54006021	Hang ligbum dau maman , kaba , len merdoc emebdebin an Krisdus toua deitero . Doba len lobsara dau en namcirohob . Anai len leigdoumesa lenin meroho dag len laimo leng laisedim gini se meren gebedbed dag huhugb augwanohob . Allah medoc eigouhw an ban terimda .
55001001	Surad gini dau dang , Paulus , dou dan indisi bang , Timotius gedig dan indoc gororougb ban namcir . Anai Allah enin eng ouci dan , hanoba en eigdoumesa dan indoho naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus Yesus dou lusud toua . Anai gareg en medoc dag hom dara enohob , kaba , Allah os dou en dag en emomom deitero . Doba Allah eigdoc en dau sesar men gogom augwan aud maireseb menau geb huhugb toua namcir .
55001002	Dangga hang , dan dacgeij maman Mamina Allah dara maman Adehsud Krisdus Yesus naugb lan mardoc eigouhw dara eineg an ban . Dara lan laseyeiyo ban dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua terimda .
55001003	Dan demarges dau sug dan den sijo dou Allah an ban touwero . Doba astesda sug dan docuncum dou en , kaba , dan denara dou en eisaugb ban astesda lona loba terimda . Anai dan indoc eiseisan dau sug dan deihwededau ban sug nosa , kaba , dag ban abdoc momogo dara ban beb ucan dan touohob . Hang dan indoc esesa naugb dan dideiya ban deit , dauntoba dan indoc agahugouhw ucugb toua . Dan docuncum dangga dou Allah , anai sug dan deicara daimo areg en arougb dan an gini , kaba , dan indoc emogdogda dan an aremer hom touwero . Doba ouma debin dan dag dan indoc ecabeci namcirohob . Aninim dag dan injemouwer merdoc emogdogda lenin an aremer hom sug nosa touwero . Doba ouma debin len dag len laimo Allah men gomnomna augwan dag misen touohob .
55001004	
55001005	Dara dan den sijo dou Allah an ban , anai dan indoc eiseisan dau sug ban abdoc ebdebin an Krisdus sug nosa , kaba , dag ban bemobsara dau gin touwero . Doba ban baimo en se ucina gini dag misen namcir . Aninim dag dan decinaga dau ban abauwa Lowes , dara ban abim Unike , kaba , dag lan lamobsara dau sug lan mardoc ebdebin an Krisdus sug nosa touwero . Doba lan laimo en se ucina gini dag misen toua namcirohob . Hang dan demecinaga dag areg lan mardoc ebdebin an gin , kaba , dag augwan gini ebsa ban abdoc mes iteitogin touohob .
55001006	Sug dan decinaga dag ban baimo Krisdus se men ucina gini dag misenohob , kaba , dan desulou ban , dauntoba ban bemahau dau sug ban besai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud touwero . Doba ban bebir ban abdoc mes edag smougb mouf gererij ucugb deit , dauntoba ban bebedbed mer gini dou len terimda , aimo dau mou ouforoho dara goubesa areg Allah eic dou ban se lona sug dan dob dan insira se ban abugt naugb ginohob .
55001007	Anai sug Allah esa Mena Gogoufu se maman mamdoc mes sug nosohob , kaba , en emeic gahau dou maman touwero . Doba en eic geic mos dara goubesa dou maman naugb sug maman masai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud terimda . Hanoba en arautut maman naugb maman mamdoc gororougb lusud . Dara en eic mamdoc aiyansem dougwo areg gecgu augwan dou maman toua namcir .
55001008	Dangga hang , igdebes emeba ban naugb sug ban bos badi maman Adehsud en moho deseino lusud . Dara igdebes emeba ban an dan sug dan indugwengga se tu gesisug icira en gin touwero . Doba sug ban besai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou lusud , kaba , ban beic abus naugb ban baimo ucina mog erij ogdoc Allah men goubesa , aninim dag dan daimo ucina mog erij icira gin touohob .
55001009	Anai enin eng eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwan aud maireseb menau geb huhugb . Hanoba en ed maman debinim dag men lusud touohob . Dara en emeic augwan gini dou maman emogdoc maman geicara touwero . Doba en esedeb naugb en eic augwan gini dou maman ogdoc Krisdus Yesus enin men geicara taiba sogo salib gin dous , aimo dau areg enin ogod an deb sug en emahasesei bogo dara cinogo touebma . Anai en medoc eineg an maman teiteiyohob .
55001010	Hang iteitogin , kaba , en emens dau en medoc geineg an maman gini eb ainyes dou maman , anai en esa Krisdus Yesus ouwaden dau bogo naugb en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwan ginohob . Anai sug Krisdus ens Mer Geigouhw eisaugb enin dou maman gin , kaba , maman macinaga dag gomom men goubesa emoiharaga maman toua deitero . Doba en oho maireseb menau geb huhugb naugb en eic dou maman dous . Anai sug en omom taiba sogo salib , kaba , en aiyan gomom men goubesa gini dau maman toua namcirohob .
55001011	Hang Allah eigdoumesa dan indoho naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gini dou lusud . Dara dan dedidib meijouhw eisaugb gin augwan asesa dou len toua .
55001012	Ogdoc gin , hang dan demeic dan indug erij se tu gesisug icira gin touohob . Doba igdebes emeba dan dau ginero . Anai dan decinaga sud hom areg dan indoc ebdebin an en dag misenohob . Dangga hang , dan decinaga dag areg dan dogugwo dou en se lona sug dan indoc ebdebin an en sug nosa , kaba , hom emediyebeiya dau en mesira touwero . Doba en esedougwo augwan deb naugb dan terimda edebeij Lona Sug En Ecicugwen gin toua .
55001013	Dangga areg dan debedbed dou ban sug nosohob , kaba , ban bemobsara dau gin touwero . Doba sug ban bebedbed dara ban bedidib meijouhw dou lusud , kaba , dan besogwa deisa dan indugtemei mohw an gin aisa lusud toua terimda . Anai mer gin , kaba , eic lusud merdoc erleij icira gin namcir . Dara ban bemarges dau sug ban abdoc ebdebin an Krisdus Yesus dara ban abdoc gororougb lusud touwero . Doba ban bes agadgeij naugb sug ban baimo augwan gin terimda . Anai sug maman madag hom dara enohob , kaba , augwan gini eb naugb maman dag misen toua .
55001014	Dangga hang , ban bemeisan gurog dau Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus areg Allah ogugwo dou ban gin touwero . Doba ogdoc Mena Gogoufu men goubesa gedig en moongga se maman mamdoc mesohob , kaba , ban beic naugb ban babehnehino dougwo areg se geica gedig mera eisaugb gin terimda . Dauntoba mer areibahau emahurim dara gin touwero . Doba ecabeci bebsugeb namcir .
55001015	Anai ban becinaga dau leng se Asia meren hancob , kaba , dag sud hom ingma emaimo dan toua deitero . Doba len laugwan larges dan debohob . Dara lahwai dau len gin , kaba , lan maroho dag Pigelus dara Hermogenes toua .
55001016	Doba Onesiporus an leng leigtou desij en se men tu , kaba , dan dacgeij maman Adehsud naugb en medoc eineg an len terimda . Anai len leic dan indoc eigouhw mougwa einyana dou dan sug nosohob . Dara sug dan indugwengga se tu gesisug se cinogo Roma gin , kaba , igdebes emeba en dau dan touwero .
55001017	Doba sug en edebeij suginohob , kaba , en eic mouwemougb esesa naugb en ehilon dan terimda en edesma dan toua .
55001018	Dara ban becinaga dau sug nanan nanugwengga se cinogo Epesus sug nosa , kaba , dag en emarges nanan deb touwero . Doba en eic mouwemougb esesa naugb en agauwesa nanan mougwa einyana touohob . Dangga hang , dan dacgeij maman Adehsud , dauntoba se Lona Sug En Ogod Aremer deinaugb lusud laugwan , kaba , dag en emogod gogom deinaugb en touwero , doba en medoc eineg an en namcir .
55002001	Doba dan indisi , Timotius , naugb ban , kaba , ban bemeicara dag Pigelus dara Hermogenes dara len gus ginlo . Doba ban baiyan abdocesem naugb ban baimo Krisdus gin terimda . Anai en medoc eigouhw an maman . Hanoba en eic goubesa dou maman naugb gin toua . Anai maman madag hom dara enohob .
55002002	Dangga hang , ban bemarges dau sug ban besai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou lusud touwero . Doba Mer Geigouhw areg ban bouman dau dan deseino lusud leinyana sug nosohob , kaba , ban bogugwo augwan gini dou lusud areg len laimo Krisdus dara merdoc hom dag misenohob len laugwan toua . Dauntoba sug len merdoc ouforoho se ginohob , kaba , len ledidib meijouhw dau Mer Geigouhw gini augwan asesa dou len gus toua deit . Anai dan dens dau augwan gini dou ban sug emen emeigdoumesa ban aboho naugb gin sug nosohob .
55002003	Dara sug lusud leic mog erij dou ban icira Krisdus gin , kaba , ban bemobsara dau en naugb ban bemaimo ara gus touwero . Doba sug ban bedag Krisdus Yesus men sadodor dag ginohob , kaba , ban bes agadgeij naugb ban baimo en se ucina gini dara ban abdoc hom namcir . Aninim dag emen toua emaimo ucina mog erij ginohob .
55002004	Anai gareg en edag sadodor , kaba , en emaimo leng gus se meren geicara hom toua deitero . Doba en eic mouwemougb esesa . Dauntoba men geicara augwan , kaba , eic men mougt mera medam medoc esgiraha an en dous .
55002005	Doba esloulougb dau sug ban besai mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou lusud , kaba , dag ban bemedreg dau areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes gin touwero . Doba ban baimo augwan gini dara ban abdoc edag beim an namcir . Anai sug ban besai Krisdus moro dou lusud , doba aban geicara edreg dau Allah men gomnomna terimda , kaba , maireseb huhugb emeb naugb ban toua deitero . Aninim dag sud hom sug en obga bainyen len gus . Doba en edreg dau areg mougtir logod anohob , kaba , len lemecgun sogo mesira an merij geigouhw naugb lemeg se en mougt touwero . Doba len lowun en moho an gin toua namcir .
55002006	Dara ban bemaisan gurog dau sug ban besai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin touwero . Doba ban beic ban abug erij naugb ban baimo ucina hom gin terimda . Anai sug ban beicara dangga namcir , kaba , aban siouwa emediyebeiya dau ban touwero , doba eb naugb ban . Aninim dag sud hom areg en eic mog erij naugb sug en eicara se men lo terimda , kaba , enin eng eic mera ino , aimo dau areg Allah enin ogod an deinaugb en touohob .
55002007	Ban bauwam an areg dan den dou ban gragohob augwan deigeigouhw namcir . Anai sug ban beicara dag gin , kaba , aman Adehsud emeic mou ouforoho dou ban naugb ban becinaga meijouhw augwan asesa dag misen toues .
55002008	Dara ban abdoc moc dougwo Yesus Krisdus en edag Daud medebeito gedig Allah eigdoumesa en dau gomom ucugwohob gin touwero . Doba ban abdoc eiseisan gin terimda . Anai sug dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin dou lusud , kaba , dan den dag gin dou len touohob .
55002009	Ogdoc gin , hang lusud lemeic mog erij dou dan . Dara len lemahud dan insira hwas darem dara kermum , aninim dag leng merug mog touohob . Doba Allah en Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin , kaba , lusud lemohud gini dara kermumero , doba agaha becinten lo namcir .
55002010	Dangga hang , sug Mer Geigouhw gini agaha becinten lo dag ginohob , kaba , dan demarges dau sug dan daimo areg gogom icira gin touwero . Doba dan daiyan indocesem naugb dan daimo gin terimda . Dauntoba len gedig Allah ouci len deb naugb enohob , kaba , sud hom ingma dau len en emomom touwero . Doba Krisdus eigdoc len laugwan dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb naugb len toua leigtou se gogouf cucugb se bogo beb huhugb namcir .
55002011	Anai sug maman maimo en aud gomomohob , kaba , maman mamireseb emeb dara en . Dara sug maman mas agadgeij terimda , kaba , maman mamedag mougt desij en toues . Dara sug maman maideido dougwo en , kaba , en aideido dougwo maman toua namcir . Doba sug maman mamaimo en dara mamdoc hom deitero , kaba , en emagag en medoc mes an men geicara hom an maman touwero . Doba en , kaba , en aimo men geicara augwan an maman terimda . Anai sug en emeicara emaimo dag ginero , kaba , en emedag Allah toua deitero . Doba gini dag en aideido dougwo men gobob namcirohob . Areg dan dog gin , kaba , ban bod abina debsa , anai augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
55002012	
55002013	
55002014	Dangga hang , ban bemarges dau sug ban bens areg graga augwan asesa dou aban lusud touwero . Doba ban besulou len an gin ucucugb . Dauntoba len merdoc emougworo , doba len merdoc eiseisan gin terimda . Hanoba ban ben dougwo len se goubesa namcir toua . Dauntoba len lemenara lemaisedim icira ara moho hom yom men meijouhw terimlo . Doba len larges dau gin namcir . Anai sug lusud louman dau gin , kaba , emousa len naugb len lemera mera geigouhw touwero . Doba ahwan len naugb len lobsara dau Krisdus dous . Dara ban ben dou len dag areg ban besulou len an gin , kaba , aninim dag deseino Allah touohob . Dauntoba len lecinaga dag areg ban ben gin , kaba , misen namcir . Dara len lahau an dougwo toua .
55002015	Doba naugb ban , kaba , sug ban besai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud , kaba , ban bebehnehino banin abdoc mes , dauntoba ban bemeic areibahau mer bemahurim darero . Doba ban besai augwan gini se geica mogud dou len dous . Anai sug ban beicara dag gini , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa ban aboho an gin namcir . Hang igdebes emeba ban dau gin touwero .
55002016	Dangga hang , ban bemaimo leng lenara laisedim dara lenara lauwim eisaugb ara moho hom yom gin terimdero . Doba ban basid banin dau len ingga namcir . Anai meren geicara gin , kaba , emahwan len naugb sug len laimo Allah en mer dara lesijaresa en touwero , doba ahwan len naugb len ledreg dau en mer eiseisaugb bedreg dau mohw deit .
55002017	Hang meren gebedbed gin , kaba , edag ugwar bet lusud merdoc mes . Hanoba agaha becinten lusud laugwan toua namcir . Lahwai dau leng leineg dau areg se geica aud mer areibahau ginohob , kaba , lan maroho dag Himeneus dara Piletus .
55002018	Anai lan lan dougwo lusud , landagai : Maman mamaisa dau gomom se lona daiyamo gacin deitero , doba ouwa dau mamanohob . Anai sug gembala ogun maman se duhu , hanoba maman maisa dau duhu ucugb , kaba , gini aninim dag maman maisa dau gomom ucugb touohob . Dangga maran gebedbed gareibahau gin , kaba , eic dag merug hosa dau leng Krisden len merdoc emebdebin an Krisdus dag misen toua deitero . Doba len lobsara dau enohob .
55002019	Doba mamang Krisden misen , kaba , gembala areibahau lemougdud mamanero . Anai Allah en ogo maman dag buc mandeijohob . Hang emesa se gototo namcir . Dara en og se buc gini dag ouma debin maman touohob , endagai : Dang , Adehsud , dan decinaga indan logodeh len laugwan dag misen namcir . Anai dan dedag meren mougt mera medam naugb lenohob . Dara en og deit , endagai : Gareg en eigdoumesa dang , Adehsud , dan indoho dag men mougt mera medamohob , kaba , dan douwan naugb en emaimo sesar toua deitero . Doba en eineg dau augwan namcir .
55002020	Augwan gini toua , aninim dag tu medam hom . Anai se tu gouji hom gin , kaba , debecij dau emas dara perag emeb se dousero . Doba debecij dau sogo dara cinogo toua inggeb se tu hom gini . Dara debecij gedig mera eisaugb mogud , kaba , emeb se tu gin touwero . Doba debecij gedig mera ouwada , kaba , einyana ahurim se tu hom gin toua .
55002021	Dangga sug sud hom emeigtou desij debecij mera ouwada gin deitero , doba en asid enin dau augwan gin namcir , kaba , en edag debecij gedig mera eisaugb mogud dous . Hanoba men mougt mera medam ouci en deb naugb aremer geigouhw augwan toua . Anai en edag debecij gecabeci naugb enohob .
55002022	Dangga hang , ban bemaimo areg ban abdoc etrij icira gin touwero . Doba sug ban bedag lugdeh mesaba , kaba , ban beic abuwemougb esesa naugb ban baimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes gin dous . Dara ban bemobsara dau sug ban abdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero . Doba ban bes agadgeij naugb ban baimo en terimda . Hanoba ban becgun ban absira naugb ban abdoc gororougb len gus . Dara ban abdoc dag hom dara laugwan toua namcir . Dara ban bemeicara bemaimo dangga dou banin dousero . Doba gareg en aimo maman Adehsud dara medoc hom dag ginohob , kaba , ban bedag hom dara len naugb yen yacgeij en . Dauntoba en ousa yen se aremer augwan gin toua .
55002023	Dara ban bemaimo leng meru edgom dara meru emaiyero sug len lenara merir edregim icira ara moho hom yom touwero . Doba ban basid banin dau len namcir . Anai meren genara gin , kaba , eic dag lusud lenara merir edregim icira dous .
55002024	Doba maman Adehsud , kaba , en emouwan naugb men sogougb emenara emaisedir touwero . Doba en ouwan naugb men sogougb gini en enara dara mer arjaga dou lusud laugwan dous . Dara sug en esai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud , kaba , en emesai gin augwougb dou lusud touwero . Doba en mou ouforoho naugb en ens meijouhw augwan asesa dou len . Hanoba en eigtou ateteij len se aremer augwan gin toua terimda .
55002025	Dangga toua , sug en owun leng lohoiya en mer eisaugb Krisdus an meren geicara , kaba , en emenara dara mer mog mog dou len touwero . Doba en ens meren geicara gecgu gini dara merdoc arjaga dou len dous . Dauntoba edebeij lona hom , kaba , Allah eic cumougt dou len naugb len lesga meren sesar moho asesa dou en .
55002026	Hanoba sug len lecinaga areg se geica augwan dag misen touohob , kaba , len lemeb se Bilis men digoro toua deitero . Doba edeinyum naugb sug len lesga lenin dau touei ? Era , naroei ? Anai sug nosa , kaba , en agaigeij len . Hanoba len laimo en aud areg en arougb len an gin toua namcirohob .
55003001	Doba edebeij Lona Sug Ouwedoc gin , kaba , gogom medam eb naugb mamang Krisden toua deit . Hang dan demouwan naugb ban abdoc moc dougwo gin touwero . Doba ban abdoc eiseisan gini terimda .
55003002	Anai se Lona ingga , kaba , lusud leinyana len lemed len gus an ara ara toua deitero . Doba len merdoc gororougb lenin dous . Dangga hang , len lemousa lusud touwero . Doba len lagungun len an meren aremougb dau len terimda . Anai len merdoc etrij icira gin namcirohob . Dara len merdoc emarjaga touwero . Doba len merdoc agas namcir , kaba , len leimiman lenin an meren geicara deseino lusud . Hanoba len lemeigdoumesa lusud gus len meroho touwero . Doba len lowun len meroho toua terimda . Hang len lemaimo merner dara merimir len merir an areg len larougb len an gin touwero . Doba len lohoiya len merir . Dara len lemesijaresa Allah touwero . Doba len merdoc esdigeij en mer an men geicara augwan toua namcir .
55003003	Dangga len merdoc emeineg an lusud touwero . Doba len merdoc agadgeij an len , hanoba len lemaigdougwo meren aremer . Dara len lemeic gesgigouhwesa dou len touwero . Doba len lecic len meroho gouhw genes dous . Dara len merdoc emagadgeij dau areg gecgu touwero . Doba sug len merdoc etetaha naugb len laimo ara ara aibibrida dag ginohob , kaba , len merdoc oung mogo naugb len leic gogom dou len gus toua terimda . Hang len lemouwan naugb len lemaimo areg geigouhw touwero . Doba len merdoc esdigeij gin namcir .
55003004	Hang maman mamod mamina debsa len an areg len len dou maman touwero . Doba maman mamdoc obsara dau gin namcir . Anai areg len len gin , kaba , augwan dag augwougb dous . Dara len lemed aremeijouhw daum toua habero . Doba sug len leigdoumesa lenin meroho agas naugb augwanohob , kaba , len merdoc agas naugb len laimo areg len louwan augwan toua dedemeda terimda . Dangga len merdoc gororougb Allah touwero . Doba len merdoc gororougb areg eic len merdoc eigouhw dou len se cinogo gin dous .
55003005	Hang len lemouwan naugb Allah men goubesa arautut len aud areg gedag beim touwero . Doba len laimo en an areg geb ainyes gin dous . Sug len leicara dag gin terimda , kaba , ban bemaimo len se meren geicara gin touwero . Doba ban basid banin dau len namcir .
55003006	Ligbum dau len gin , kaba , len ledu len meraga naugb len leinesa lusud gus meren tu aud ligida . Hanoba len lagaigeij len dag meren sogougb ogdoc areg len lebedbed gin dou len toua . Anai ligida gin , kaba , len lemaiyan merdocesem dougwo areg gecgu touebma . Doba len merdoc etrij icira ara ara namcir , kaba , ahwan len aud areg gecgu einyana gin touohob .
55003007	Dangga hang , len louwan naugb lusud gus lens ucina dou len . Dauntoba sesar men gogom emeb naugb len toua deitero , doba ediyebeiya dau len toua . Anai len merdoc ogod len an meren sesar gin terimdohob . Dobnaro . Len lemecinaga Allah men ucina naugb sug en eigdoc len dau sesar men gogom touwero . Doba len meru emaiyero dangga terimda . Anai areg gembala areibahau len lebedbed dou ligida gin , kaba , dag mer areibahau dous .
55003008	Dara len lemaugwohosa ligida gin dousero . Doba gareg en esai mer misen eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud , kaba , len lenara laugbtarera dougwo len merir an mer misen gin toua terimda . Anai len lemaimo ucina se geica gin deitero . Doba len lobsara dau gin namcirohob . Hang eic dag len mersdemaga emesgiraha touwero , doba dag embreij dous . Augwan gini aninim dag Musa sug en esai Allah en moro dou Piraun sug nosa .
