Anai sug len leic aremeta mogwihi astesda lona dag lauwaharo dou Allah naugb lusud meren sesar dag gin , kaba , len leic aremeta mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb lusud meren sesar dousero . Doba len leic aremeta mogwihi lauwaharo dou en naugb lenin meren sesar nosahabi . Hanoba len lemeic aremeta mogwihi naugb lusud meren sesar ucan dou Allah toua . Doba sug Yesus eic enin mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar gin , kaba , en eic enin mogwihi bauwaharo mougwa cum dou Allah naugb maman sesar dous . Hanoba en arges dau gin toua , anai gini edeinyum naugb maman sesar augwan beb huhugb namcirohob .
58007028	Dara Musa men gomnomna gin , kaba , eigdoumesa gembala gesa taij moho agas gedig len lemaimo areg Allah arougb len an ginohob augwan asesa touwero . Doba len ledreg mougwa einyana dau gin toua terimdohob , anai leni toua dag lusud misen dous . Hang meren goubesa naugb sug len les agadgeij , kaba , toua ingmaro . Doba sug Allah eigdoumesa en Meisi Yesus dag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas naugb maman , kaba , en ou enin moho debin gin . Hang enin eng edag Sud Hom Geigdoc Maman Dau Sesar Men Gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gini beb huhugb namcir . Anai en emedreg dau areg Allah arougb en an eisaugb maireseb huhugb gini mougwa hom touwero . Doba en aimo augwan gini an maman terimda edebeij sug ouwedoc touohob . Dara Allah men gouwara gin , kaba , aimo ucan Musa men gomnomna gin toua . Dangga hang , gomnomna gin , kaba , emeb naugb maman toua deitero , doba ediyebeiya dau maman namcir . Anai gomnomna menau gin , kaba , en baihiron dougwo areg mohon augwanohob .
58008001	Dangga hang , areg dan den dou yen graga , kaba , men meijouhw augwan dag gini : Iteitogini , kaba , maman Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas en eigtou desij Allah gedig en moho agas namcir se men maija moc dig en mesira misen naugb mamanohob .
58008002	Dara en emedag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas se cinogo gin touwero . Doba en eicara baimo dag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas se tuari misen gecabeci se bogo gedig lusud lemohud se len merisira touwero , doba gedig maman Adehsud enin eng esinsin dous .
58008003	En eicara baimo dag gini , anai astesda Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas areg Allah eigdoumesa en moho se cinogo gin , kaba , en arougb sud hom gini naugb en eic aremeta mogwihi bauwaharo dou en naugb lusud meren sesar . Dara en eic areg lusud leic dag mogud dou Allah naugb auwaharo dou en toua . Dangga hang , sug Yesus en edag maman Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas se bogo naugb maman dag ginohob , kaba , esloulougb dag men ara ara ingma inggebga naugb sug en eic bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman toua .
58008004	Dangga toua , sug Yesus eni moongga se cinogo ginaba , kaba , en emedag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas naugb maman touwero . Anai se cinogo gin , kaba , gembala gesa taij leinyana merugwengga . Hanoba len leic areg lusud leic dag mogud dou Allah naugb lauwaharo dou en toua , laimo dau areg Musa men gomnomna arougb len anohob . Doba Yesus , kaba , eni moongga se cinogo gin deitero , doba en eisaugb dig bogohob . Hang en edag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas se tuari misen sungga naugb maman toua namcirohob .
58008005	Doba areg gembala gesa taij len leicara laimo an lusud se cinogo gin , kaba , dag ansins era edag mena dau gembala gesa taij men geicara se tuari misen geb se bogo naugb maman dous . Augwan gini aimo dau areg Allah enara dou Musa deb sug nosa touohob . Anai sug en esedeb naugb en ohud Allah Men Tuari Dag Hugbei se lomougwisa sug nosa , kaba , Allah esulou en dara goubesa namcir dag en emedreg hom touwero . Doba en eicara baimo areg Allah ens dou enohob augwan dag misen namcir . Hanoba en enara dou Musa , endagai : Sug ban bohud indan tuari dag hugbei gin , kaba , ban bemedreg dau tuari geb se bogo areg dan dens dou ban se menmod Torsina hom touwero . Doba ban bohud men mocbobaga augwan aimo dau areg dan dens dou banohob ingga dous .
58008006	Doba iteitogin , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa Yesus dag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas se men tuari se bogo naugb mamanohob . Dangga hang , areg en eicara baimo an maman sungga , kaba , moho agas edreg dau areg gembala gesa taij se cinogo gini len leicara laimo an lusud sugin toua namcir . Aninim dag gos dou areg en ogod an se Allah dara men lusud merufu gin , kaba , moho agas edreg dau areg gembala gesa taij len logod an se Allah dara leng Israel merufu sug nosa touohob . Anai areg Allah en os dou men lusud maman se men gos dou menau gin , kaba , era mera geigouhw medam naugb maman bedreg dau areg en os dou leng Israel se men gos dou mohon sug nosa namcir .
58008007	Dangga toua , sug Musa men gomnomna gini edeinyum naugb sug eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugwohob , kaba , Allah emeic men gos dou menau ucan dou maman deit touwero . Anai gos dou mohon augwan edeinyum naugb mamanohob . Dobnaro . Gos dou mohon gin , kaba , emedeinyum naugb augwan ginero . Hang Allah emeic men gos dou menau dou maman gin deit .
58008008	Augwan gini aimo dau areg Allah en enara dou Yeremia se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob . Anai sug maman Adehsud owun leng Israel meroho deseino enohob , kaba , en os dou en , endagai : Lona ebeij deinyor namcirohob naugb sug dan deic indan gos dou menau dou leng Israel dara leng Yehuda len laugwan deit .
58008009	Dara indan gos dou menau gin , kaba , emedag indan gomnomna gedig dan deic dou len merjemouwer ogdoc Musa se lona sug dan deinoisa len dau cinogo Mesir ingga touwero . Doba susugb dau gin namcir . Anai len lemaimo indan gomnomna gogdoc Musa gin touwero . Doba len ledis terimda . Hang se lona ingga , kaba , dan demeinoisa len toua deitero . Doba dan damsoho len deb namcir dous .
58008010	Hang dan demog indan gos dou menau gin se igdahab naugb len toua deitero . Doba areg dan dos dou leng Israel naugb lona daiyamo gacin gin , kaba , dan dog augwan gin se len merdoc mes dous . Dauntoba len merdoc moc dougworo , doba len lauwam an areg dan dos dou len gini terimda . Dara se lona ingga , kaba , dan demamsoho len toua deitero . Doba dan dedag meren Adehsud . Hanoba len ledag indan lusud toua terimda .
58008011	Dara se lona ingga , kaba , len lemens dau areg asesa danin indoc mes dou len mersir dau meren cinogo dara meren hancob dag nosa toua deitero . Dara len lemarougb len aud gin touwero . Doba len larges merir dau gin namcir . Anai se lona sug dan deic indan gos dou menau dou len gin , kaba , len laugwan lecinaga areg asesa danin indoc mes augwan dag misenohob , ebiji dau leng meroho agas terimda edebeij leng meroho eb tainya len laugwan toua .
58008012	Dara se lona ingga , kaba , dan indina emeiseisan dau sug len lohoiya dan indir dara len ledreg indan gomnomna dag nosa toua deitero . Doba dan indoc moc dougwo augwan gin namcirohob .
58008013	Sug Allah os men gos dou menau dou maman dag ginohob , kaba , gini aninim dag en owun Musa men gomnomna edag mohon . Hang emeb naugb maman toua deitero . Anai areg dag mohon , hanoba mohw ousirij , kaba , cum ediyebeiya namcir .
58009001	Dara Allah emeic men gomnomna ogdoc Musa gin augwougb dou maman mamjemouwer sug nosa touwero . Doba sug en eic men gos dou mohon gin dou lenohob , kaba , en ens dau gembala gesa taij dara lusud meren geicara aud gousanara debin gin dou len toua . Dauntoba sug len lesijaresa en dara leic ara ara naugb lauwaharo dou en , kaba , len laimo augwan asesa toua namcir . Dara len lesinsin Allah Men Tuari Dau Hugbei debin gini naugb sug len lesijaresa en se gin toua .
58009002	Sug len lesinsin Tuari Dau Hugbei gin debohob , kaba , len lekeba dag dimei hwai icira . Dimei geb ino ginda , kaba , len leija dag Dimei Gecabeci . Se dimei mes ingga , kaba , len lob smougb mouf maga senggai , dara boromei naugb sug gembala gesa taij en ob roti mogo sisa hobjerai areg len leic dou Allah dag lauwaharo deb se toua .
58009003	Se dimei geb ino gin medigo , kaba , dimei hom toua inggebga . Dimei gin , kaba , len leija dag Dimei Gecabeci Namcir . Hang len leh minc medam hom dougwo gin toua . Anai dimei gin , kaba , Allah men dimei sug en eigtousa . Dara len leija minc gini toua dag minc geb ucan .
58009004	Se dimei gin , kaba , len lob boromei dau emas debsa . Se boromei gin , kaba , len leic areg men ouwadebeda naugb len lasaih dou Allah . Dara Biruwa hom dau sogo gedig len leic emas mogud lasinsin dougwohob , kaba , len lob se dimei gin toua . Se Biruwa mes ingga , kaba , len lob dabei hom dau emas an ared , moho w mana . Dara Harun men ijouhugwa gedig mesgougb agunya se nosohob . Dara igdahab mehir hwai gedig Musa en og Allah men gomnomna sisa debsa toua . Dangga hang , lusud lemeija Biruwa gini dag Allah Men Biruwa Gos Dou .
58009005	Dara se Biruwa moc gin , kaba , len lesinsin emas hwai lan marucbobaga dag malaikad . Hanoba laingma lasa dig nagama , kaba , laingma lasa dig nagama toua . Lan maroho dag Kerub , anai ansins dag Adehsud Geis Huhugb eni toua moongga se dimei mes inggohob . Dara lan laih marbera naugb laihiron dougwo Biruwa meh gin toua . Anai meh gin , kaba , dag Adehsud Geis Huhugb men usi geigtousa naugb sug en aigdougwo lusud meren sesar sungga terimda . Dan douwan dens dau areg graga augwan meijouhw ingma dou yen deit , anai einyana inggebga . Doba iteitogin , kaba , cumougt ingma naugb sug dan dens dou yen touwero .
58009006	Sug len lesinsin areg graga augwan bouwohob , kaba , gembala gesa taij len lebiji naugb len leinesa dimei mes geb dougwo Adehsud Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir graga astesda lona toua . Hanoba len leicara laimo areg Allah arougb len an ginohob naugb lasijaresa en se dimei mes gin toua terimda .
58009007	Doba se Adehsud Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir geb dig medigo gin , kaba , Gembala Gesa Taij Meren Mougt Mera Medam enin eng einesa astesda arisogomoc mougwa cum dous . Dara sug en einesa dimei mes gin , kaba , en emeinesa augwougb touwero , doba en odo dabei an aremeta mogwihi toua . Hanoba en eic mogwihi gini bauwaharo dou Allah naugb enin men sesar dauwahabi , en emeic ingma bemauwaharo dou en naugb lusud gus meren sesar ucan gin toua . Dara en emeic aremeta mogwihi gini dou Allah naugb lusud meren sesar gedig len lesedeb dara leic merus an gin touwero . Doba en eic naugb lusud an meren sesar gedig len laimo augwougb dous . Anai len lemecinaga meijouhw dag meren geicara gin , kaba , dag sesar touwero .
58009008	Ogdoc areg graga augwan , hang Mena Gogoufu ens meijouhw asesa dou maman dag misis emec dau lusud naugb sug len leinesa Dimei Gecabeci Namcir aud Allah touebma . Doba eb dougwo len terimdaba . Anai sug Dimei Gecabeci geb dougwo moc eb naugb len terimda , kaba , gini ansins dou maman dag lusud lemeic merus naugb sug len ledebeij Allah touebma . Doba len leigtou aigusi dau enaba .
58009009	Hang areg graga , kaba , men meijouhw dag areg gembala gesa taij leic dag lauwaharo dau aremeta mogwihi dou Allah naugb lusud meren sesar . Dara areg lusud leic dag mogud dou en naugb len lesijaresa en , kaba , augwan emedeinyum naugb edu len merdoc mes dau sesar augwan touwero . Doba gini dag aihnehina deb naugb maman daiyamo gin dous .
58009010	Anai meren geicara graga augwan , kaba , eisaugb areg len let dara leg . Dara eisaugb sug len ledu len meraga augwan , dauntoba len lecabeci deseino Allah toua . Dobnaro . Augwan gin , kaba , dag gousanara dous gedig Allah eic dou len terimda edebeij lona sug men gos dou menau agunya toua .
58009011	Doba Krisdus , kaba , en agunyen dag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas naugb mamanohob . Hanoba en ogod an areg geigouhw einyana dau Allah naugb maman touohob . Dara tuari gedig en edag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas se gin , kaba , aninim dag Allah men tuari gedig leng Israel lohud se cinogo gin touwero . Doba moho agas dara eigouhw bedreg dau tuari geb se cinogo gin namcir . Anai tuari gin , kaba , lusud lenin lemohud se merisira . Hang emen dau areg Allah en ahasesei dara esinsin gin touwero .
58009012	Dara sug Krisdus einesa tuari geigouhw gin , kaba , en emogdoc Dimei geb ino ginda touwero . Doba en edreg Dimei gini naugb en edeinesa Allah Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir mougwa cum beb huhugb namcir . Sug en einesa dimei gin , kaba , en emodo dabei an kambing giji dara sapi meh meijaba mogwihi dag gauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar touwero . Doba en odo dabei an enin mogwihi naugb asga maman dau sesar men gogom beb huhugb namcir .
58009013	Anai sug lusud logor deseino Allah sug nosa , kaba , gembala gesa taij en eic kambing dara sapi giji mogwihi . Dara sapi gida meijaba gedig smougb ait mor mor namcirohob , kaba , en eic mor ingma toua . Hanoba sug en eic mogwihi dara mor bahurimohob , kaba , en eic mogwihi ingga argeh leng logor gin toua . Dauntoba len lemogor deseino Allah deitero , doba len lecabeci deseino en deit .
58009014	Sug aremeta mogwihi edu lusud meraga ecabeci deseino Allah dag ginohob , kaba , Krisdus en mogwihi era mera einyana edreg dau aremeta mogwihi gin toua namcir . Anai ogdoc Mena Gogoufu Geis Huhugb men goubesa gin , kaba , en eic enin maga dag gauwaharo gecabeci dou Allah naugb maman sesar ginohob . Dangga hang , maman mamdoc emeijesan sesar men gogom toua deitero . Doba Krisdus edu maman mamdoc mes an maman geicara dag gousanara augwan dau maman toua namcirohob . Dauntoba maman mamaimo augwan gin toua deitero . Doba maman maimo areg asesa Allah gedig en maireseb huhugb enin medoc mes gin terimda . Anai maman geicara dag gousanara gin , kaba , emahwan maman aud maireseb menau geb huhugb ginero . Doba ahwan maman aud gomom dous .
58009015	Doba Krisdus , kaba , en eic enin mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar ginohob . Dangga hang , areg Allah os dou maman se men gos dou menau gin , kaba , emediyebeiya dau maman touwero . Doba Krisdus en edag maman Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas naugb en ogod areg geigouhw gini augwan aga maman gedig Allah eija maman aud enohob beb huhugb namcir . Anai sug Krisdus en omom taiba sogo salib naugb maman sesar dag ginohob , kaba , gos dou mohon men gogom emeb naugb maman toua deitero . Doba en esga maman dau augwan gini namcirohob .
58009016	Dara areg sud hom en os dou lusud , kaba , emeb naugb len augwougb touwero . Doba esloulougb naugb len louma debin dag en omom dauwahabi , len lemeic toua .
58009017	Anai sud hom areg en os ara ara dou len gus sug en mairesebaba , kaba , areg en os gini emeb naugb len touebma . Doba sug en omom dauwohob , kaba , eb naugb len dag misen namcir .
58009018	Dangga hang , areg Allah os dou maman mamjemouwer acgunog ogdoc Musa sug nosa , kaba , en emeic augwan gini augwougb dou len touwero . Doba sug len logug aremeta an mogwihi debin ginohob , kaba , areg en os gini eb naugb len touohob .
58009019	Anai sug Musa ecic dau areg Allah arougb len an se men gomnomna ginohob , kaba , en eic sapi meh meijaba dara kambing giji mogwihi bahurim dara duhu . Hanoba en eic igdebes mog gahani naugb en ahud aremerij dau w hisob darem . Dauwohob , kaba , en ogun w hisob ingga se aremeta mogwihi naugb en eic bargeh surad an Allah men gomnomna dara lusud meraga augwan toua .
58009020	Sug en eic mogwihi bargeh surad dara lusud laugwan dauwohob , kaba , en esulou len debin gin toua , endagai : Ara mogwihi gini , kaba , ansins dag areg Allah os dou yen gin , kaba , hom emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba augwan ebiji naugb yenohob . Dangga hang , yen yemedreg men gomnomna gin hom touwero . Doba yen yaimo augwan terimda . Anai gini aimo dau areg en arougb yen anohob .
58009021	Dangga toua , sug len lohud Allah Men Tuari Dau Hugbei sug nosohob , kaba , Musa eic aremeta mogwihi . Hanoba en eic bargeh tuari maga dara areg geb se dimei mes augwan gin toua .
58009022	Hang ara moho hom yom dous eng len lemeic ara mogwihi debin ginero . Doba areg gus augwan , kaba , Allah men gomnomna arougb gembala gesa taij naugb len leic ara mogwihi largeh augwanda , dauntoba ecabeci deseino Allah namcir toua . Dangga hang , Allah emaigdougwo sesar hom augwougb touwero . Doba ogdoc sug len leir ara mogwihi nosahabi , en emaigdougwo meren sesar dou len ucan gin toua . Naro , kab , naro .
58009023	Doba tuari an areg geb se graga augwan , kaba , men mocbobaga aimo dau tuari geb se bogo dous . Hang edeinyum naugb len leic aremeta mogwihi largeh augwan , dauntoba ecabeci deseino Allah toua . Doba naugb tuari geb se bogo an areg geb se dimei sungga , kaba , aremeta mogwihi emedeinyumero . Doba esloulougb naugb len leic ara mogwihi gedig mera eisaugb bedreg dau ingga namcir , dauntoba eic gecabeci dou tuari gin toua .
58009024	Dangga sug Krisdus eic enin mogwihi ancoho aga mamanohob , kaba , en emeinesa Allah Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir se tuari gedig lusud lohud se merisira gin touwero . Doba en einesa Allah Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir se tuari geb se bogo naugb en edag maman Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas deseino Allah sungga toua terimda . Anai tuari geb se cinogo gin , kaba , mocbobaga lainyen dous . Doba tuari se bogo , kaba , tuari misen namcir .
58009025	Hang en emesogwa deisa Gembala Gesa Taij Meren Mougt Mera Medam an men geicara se tuari se cinogo gin touwero . Anai Mougt Mera Medam gin , kaba , en einesa Allah Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir an aremeta mogwihi mougwa hom astesda arisogomoc terimda .
58009026	Doba Krisdus , kaba , en emeinesa Allah Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir se tuari geb se bogo ucucugb terimda dag ginero . Hanoba en emeic en mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar ucucugb dag gin touwero . Doba en einesa Allah men dimei gini mougwa cum dous . Anai sug en eicara dag gin ucucugb terimda , kaba , gini aninim dag en omom naugb maman sesar mougwa einyana touohob , ebiji dau lona sug Allah ahasesei cinogo , terimda edebeij lona gin toua . Dobnaro . Edebeij sug Lona Ouwedoc gin , kaba , en ens enin ainyes dou maman mougwa cum dag gin dous . Dangga hang , sug en eic enin maga ancoho aga maman dou Allah mougwa cum dag ginohob , kaba , en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwan toua beb huhugb namcir .
58009027	Dangga hang , Krisdus en emomom mougwa einyana touwero . Doba sug en eic enin maga bauwaharo dou Allah mougwa cum dag ginohob , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug en esga lusud leinyana dau sesar men gogom augwan toua beb huhugb namcir . Aninim dag Allah ogod an lusud dag len lemomom mougwa einyana touwero . Doba sug len lomom mougwa cumohob , kaba , en ogod aremer naugb len toua . Dara leng leigtou lateteij naugb Krisdus sug en ecicugwen , kaba , en en aud len mougwa cum deit . Doba sug en ecicugb gin , kaba , en emomom naugb meren sesar toua deitero . Doba en en aud len naugb en ahwan len aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin dous .
58009028	
58010001	Dangga Musa men gomnomna emedag mog misen dau geigouhw areg Allah esedeb naugb maman se lona daiyamo gacinero . Doba edag mena dau augwan gin dousaba . Hang leng Israel len lemarges dau sug len leic aremeta mogwihi lauwaharo dou Allah naugb meren sesar gin touwero . Doba astesda lona , kaba , len leicara laimo dangga naugb arisogomoc augwan beb huhugb namcirohob . Sug len leicara dag gini terimda , kaba , gini ansins dou maman dag Musa men gomnomna men goubesa emedeinyum naugb oguc dougwo leng Israel meren sesar augwan ecabeci dau len deseino Allah touwero . Doba ens ainyes dou len dau sug len len aud en naugb len lesijaresa en dag meren sesar augwan eb naugb len terimdaba .
58010002	Anai sug meren sesar augwan ediyebeiya dag misen dau lenohob , kaba , len leic aremeta mogwihi dou Allah ucucugb dag gini terimdei ? Naro , len lemeic ara ara dou en ucucugb dangga deitero , doba len larges dau namcir . Anai len lecinaga dag meren sesar augwan , kaba , ediyebeiya dau lenohob . Hang len merdoc mes emeijesa an meren sesar touwero . Doba sug len lesijaresa Allah dag gini , kaba , len merdoc ebtou namcir dous .
58010003	Dobnaro . Sug len leic aremeta mogwihi lauwaharo dou Allah naugb meren sesar astesda lona se arisogomoc augwan dag gin terimda , kaba , ens dou len dag meren sesar emediyebeiya dau len touebma , doba eb naugb len terimdaba .
58010004	Anai sapi dara kambing merugwihi meren goubesa emedeinyum naugb oguc dougwo lusud meren sesar augwan dau len touwero .
58010005	Dangga hang , sug lona ebeij deinyorohob naugb sug Krisdus ouwaden dau bogo se cinogo gin , kaba , en enara dou Allah , endagai : Sug lusud lec aremeta mog se smougb , era sug len leic ara ara lauwaharo dou ban naugb ban baigdougwo meren sesar augwan dau len , kaba , ban abdoc emesgirahesa len an gin touwero . Dangga hang , ban besedeb maga hom naugb dan , dauntoba dan deic dan indaga gini omom naugb lusud meren sesar gin toua . Anai ban bemouwan naugb sug lusud leic aremeta mogwihi dara ara ara gus dag mogud dou ban deiterohob .
58010006	
58010007	Dara sug Krisdus edebeij se cinogo ginohob , kaba , en enara dou Allah deit , endagai : Dan indugwenggini naugb dan daimo areg asesa banin abdoc mes augwan terimda , aimo dau areg len log deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon eisaugb dan deb sug nosa touohob .
58010008	Dangga hang , sug Krisdus enara aimougtut dag Allah emouwan aremeta mogwihi dara ara ara dag mogud naugb lauwaharo dou en deitero . Dara en medoc emesgiraha an lusud sug len lec sapi mog se smougb lauwaharo dou en naugb en aigdougwo meren sesar touwero .
58010009	Dara en enara ucan deit dag eni moongga naugb en aimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes augwan terimda , kaba , gini ansins dag Allah oguc dougwo men gos dou acgunog se Musa men gomnomna . Hanoba en eic men gos dou menau naugb maman toua deitohob . Anai sug Krisdus enara dag gin , kaba , en emenara dau sug leng Israel lemedreg dau Musa men gomnomna an gin touwero . Doba dau sug len laimo gomnomna gini an gin terimdaba . Dangga hang , sug Allah oguc dougwo Musa men gomnomna dau maman dag ginohob , kaba , en emouwan naugb maman mameic aremeta mogwihi mauwaharo dou en naugb maman sesar toua deitero . Doba en ouwan naugb maman maperwei gini . Hanoba maman maic Krisdus mogwihi hom gin eng mauwaharo dou en naugb maman sesar dous .
58010010	Anai Krisdus , kaba , en emedreg dau areg Allah arougb en an gin touwero . Doba en owun enin medoc mes arjaga naugb en aimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes augwan terimda . Hanoba en eic enin maga bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar augwan toua . Dangga hang , sesar men gogom emeb naugb maman toua deitero . Doba Allah ouci maman debinim dag enin men logodeh naugb enin touohob . Anai sug Krisdus en omom naugb maman sesar mougwa cum dag ginohob , kaba , edeinyum naugb en edu sesar augwan dau maman beb huhugb namcir toua .
58010011	Dangga toua , gembala gesa taij dau Lewi medebeitor , kaba , len leinesa se dimei astesda lona naugb len leic ara ara lauwaharo dou Allah . Doba areg len leic dou en gin , kaba , dag aremeta mogwihi hom eng naugb lusud meren sesar dous . Dobnaro . Areg len leic dag lauwaharo dou Allah gin , kaba , augwan emedeinyum naugb sug oguc dougwo meren sesar dau len touwero , doba ebsugeb namcir .
58010012	Doba Krisdus , kaba , en eic enin mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar mougwa cum dous . Dau , kaba , en eisaugb dig bogo naugb en edeigtou desij Allah se men maija moc dig en mesira misen . Hanoba en edag mougt mera medam desij en toua . Anai en mogwihi gin , kaba , edeinyum naugb edu lusud meren sesar augwan dau len beb huhugb namcirohob .
58010013	Dara en eigtou desij Allah sungga terimda edebeij lona sug Allah owun men moc len laugwan dag hotingga naugb len leb tainya en mohora touahabi , en emecicugwen .
58010014	Hang maman sesar hom emeb naugb maman toua deitero . Doba sug Krisdus eic enin mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar mougwa cum dag ginohob , kaba , edu maman sesar augwan dau maman beb huhugb namcir . Hanoba Allah ouci maman debinim dag enin men lusud naugb en beb huhugb terimda touohob .
58010015	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg maman Adehsud en enara dou Yeremia se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob . Anai aimougtut , kaba , en enara dou en eisaugb leng Israel , endagai : Se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , dan deic indan gos dou menau dou len deit . Dara dan demog indan gos dou menau gin se igdahab dou len toua deitero . Doba dan dog areg dan dos gini se len merdoc mes dous , dauntoba len merdoc moc dougwo augwan gin touwero . Doba len lauwam an augwan gin ucucugb terimda . Sug en enara dag graga dou Yeremiyohob , kaba , en enara ucan dou en deit , endagai : Se lona sug dan dog indan gos dou menau se len merdoc mes dag ginohob , kaba , dan indoc emeiseisan meren sesar dara meren geicara gecgu augwan toua deitero . Doba dan indoc moc dougwo augwan gin namcir . Areg graga augwan , kaba , misen namcir . Anai aimo dau areg Mena Gogoufu ouma debin gin dou maman touohob .
58010016	
58010017	
58010018	Sug Allah aigdougwo maman sesar dara maman geicara gecgu augwan dau maman dag ginohob , kaba , gembala gesa taij lemeic ara ara lemauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar toua deitero , doba len larges dau namcir .
58010019	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug Yesus eic enin mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar , hanoba en edag maman Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas se tuari se bogo naugb maman dag gin touohob , kaba , maman mamahau dau sug maman mainesa Allah Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir gin touwero . Doba maman maic mamus naugb maman mainesa dimei gini aud en namcir . Anai sug Yesus eic enin maga bauwaharo dou Allah dag ginohob , kaba , en ogod minc geb dougwo Allah Men Dimei gin dau maman . Hanoba en esa ucina menau aud Allah Men Dimei naugb en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou maman sungga toua .
58010020	
58010021	
58010022	Dangga hang , sug Yesus esa ucina geihwedaud Allah Men dimei naugb maman dag ginohob , kaba , maman mameija maman mamdocesa Allah en toua deitero . Doba sug maman mamdoc ecabecohob , kaba , maman maic mamus naugb madebeij en namcir . Anai en eic Krisdus mogwihi bargeh maman mamdoc mes an areg gecgu dau maman . Dara en edu maman mamaga dara duhu gecabeci touohob . Hang maman mamdoc emeijesa an maman sesar toua deitero . Doba maman macinaga dag augwan gini ediyebeiya dau maman dag misen namcirohob .
58010023	Dara maman mamarges dau areg en os dou mamanohob gini touwero . Doba maman maod mamina debsa en an areg maman maos madi deseino lusudohob gin toua namcir . Anai areg Allah en os dou mamanohob , kaba , en emarges dau gin touwero . Doba en aimo augwan gini an maman terimda .
58010024	Hanoba maman mamehig daum touwero . Doba maman mahilon ucina naugb maman maic mamdoc erleij doum ucucugb . Dauntoba maman mamdoc gororougwim dara maman maimo areg edag beim dara obosboro anim toua terimda .
58010025	Dara maman mamahau dau sug maman maucimdeb se tuari aninim dag ligbum gin touwero . Doba sug yen yecinaga dag maman Adehsud Men Lona Naugb Sug En Ecicugwen ebeij deinyorohob , kaba , maman manara mad mamanin mamdoc mes ucucugb terimda edreg dau nosa deit . Dauntoba maman maobsara dau sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an Krisdus gin touwero , doba maman mas agadgeij namcir .
58010026	Anai gareg dau maman , en ouman Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus . Hanoba en aimo en se men ucina se geica gin touohob . Doba cum , kaba , en eic mos naugb en eineg dau men ucina gin aud sesar ucugb deit , kaba , Krisdus en mogwihi ingma emeb naugb en toua deitero .
58010027	Doba en eigtou dara en medoc ohwohu an enin deb naugb Lona sug Allah ogod aremer aga lusud gin dous . Anai se Lona ingga , kaba , gareg en eic mos dou Allah dag ginohob , kaba , Allah medoc esrougb an en , hanoba en erba en se smougb gesrougb medam namcir toua .
58010028	Anai gareg en eic mos naugb en edreg dau Musa men gomnomna sug nosa , kaba , mougtir merdoc emeineg an en deitero . Doba sug lahwai , era merug homoi louma debin dag en edreg dau gomnomna gin dag misenohob , kaba , len leic gomom dou en toua .
58010029	Dangga hang , sug lusud leic gomom dou gareg en edreg dau Musa men gomnomna dag ginohob , kaba , dagiro eisaugb sud hom areg en eic mos naugb en obsara dau Krisdus aud sesar dag gin ucugb deita ? Allah amsoho enei ? Naro , en emamsoho sud hom gin touwero . Doba en eic gogom medam dou en bedreg dau leng nosa gin namcir . Anai men geicara augwan gin , kaba , dag en owun Allah Meisi Krisdus en moho . Dara en eic Mena Gogoufu en moho bacecim toua namcirohob . Anai Krisdus , kaba , en mogwihi edu men sesar augwan dau enohob . Dara en eir en mogwihi debin Allah men gos dou menau . Dauntoba areg Allah os gin , kaba , eb naugb sud hom gin toua terimda . Dara Mena Gogoufu , kaba , en medoc eineg an en naugb en eic areg geigouhw einyana dou en touohob .
58010030	Dara maman macinaga dau gin dag misen namcir . Anai augwan gini esogwa deisa areg maman Adehsud en enara dou maman mamjemouwer se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Gareg dau yen en eicara gecgu , kaba , dan demamsoho en deb touwero . Doba dan demauni men geicara gecgu gini ucugb dou ens . Dara en enara deit , endagai : Dan demogod indan lusud meren aremer aga len toues .
58010031	Dangga hang , maman mameic mamus dou Allah gin touwero . Doba sug maman maobsara se en mesira mesohob , kaba , maman mahau dau en . Anai enin , kaba , maireseb , hanoba en mobisamougb namcirohob .
58010032	Doba yen , kaba , yen meigdoc eiseisan lona sug lusud lesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen gin terimda . Anai sug yen yebin mouf gini se yen meigdoc mes dag misenohob , kaba , lusud lesmesman yen , dara len logod yen abeba len gus meriresi terimda toua . Hang yen toua yaimo ucina mog erij ginohob , doba yen yemobsara dau gin touwero . Dara yen yemasid yenin dau yen meisir leng Krisdus gus sug lusud lesmesman len dara leic mog erij dou len touwero . Doba yen yeic meijus desij len naugb gin toua .
58010033	
58010034	Anai sug len lerba ligbum dau yen meisir gini se tu gesisug , kaba , yen yemohw meijidgo dou len touwero . Doba yen yaimo len se ucina mog erij gin toua . Dara sug leng medigo Yesus leida meijen tu an meijen aremougb , kaba , yen meigdoc momogo an gin touwero . Doba yen meigdoc agahugouhw an Allah icira gin toua terimda . Anai yen yecinaga dag areg Allah os dou yenohob , kaba , hom emediyebeiya dau yenero . Doba eb se bogo beb huhugb naugb yen . Dara men mera gin , kaba , edreg medam dau meijen aremougb areg geb se cinogo gin toua namcirohob .
58010035	Dangga hang , yen yemahau dau sug lusud leic mog erij dou yen touwero . Doba yen yeic meijus naugb yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin toua . Anai sug yen yeicara yaimo dag gin terimda edebeij lona sug ouwedocohob , kaba , Allah emeic siouwa einyana medam dou yen toues .
58010036	Hang yen yemehig dau sug yen yaimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yaimo gin terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dangga namcirohob , kaba , en emeic areg en os dou yenohob augwan dou yen toua .
58010037	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg maman Adehsud en og deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Cum , kaba , sud hom areg en esedeb naugb en en aud yenohob , kaba , en emeigtou dau yen toua deitero . Doba en emen aud yen toues .
58010038	Dara enin eng esulou maman se Surad Injil Meb Mohon dag gin deit . Dauntoba maman mamobsara dau en touwero , doba maman maimo en mer gin toua terimda . Hanoba en enara dou maman , endagai : Gareg en aimo areg asesa danin indoc mes terimda , kaba , dan demeic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou en toues . Anai en medoc ebdebin an dan indir ginohob . Doba gareg en medoc emebdebin an dan deitero , hanoba en ohw en medigo dou danohob , kaba , dan indoc emesgiraha an en touwero . Doba dan indoc esrougb an en namcir .
58010039	Doba maman gin , kaba , maman mamaimo leng laisacij dau Allah naugb len merur mor se dum smougb gin touwero . Doba maman mamdoc ebdebin an en terimda . Dangga , kaba , en emeic mor mor dou mamanero . Doba en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou maman dous .
58011001	Dangga sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an Allah dag misen namcirohob , kaba , maman mameija mamdocesa en an areg en os dou maman gin touwero . Doba maman maod mamina debsa en dag areg en os dou maman ginohob , kaba , en emeic augwan dou maman toues . Hang maman mamdoc toua ebtou namcir dag areg maman mameiya dara maman mamiresebma , kaba , inggebga naugb maman touohob .
58011002	Aninim dag maman mamjemouwer , kaba , len lemeija merdocesa Allah an areg en en dou len sug nosa touwero . Doba len merdoc ebdebin en mer an gin terimda . Hang eic dag Allah medoc agahugouhw an len toua namcirohob .
58011003	Sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an Allah en mer gin dag misenohob , kaba , maman macinaga dag bogo , dara cinogo , dara areg gus augwan , kaba , lemeb augwougb dag gin touwero . Doba augwan gini , kaba , ebiji namcir dau sug Allah en mer an ginohob . Hang maman macinaga dag areg maman maiya gin , kaba , emen dau areg maman macinaga ginero , doba en dau areg maman mamecinaga gin dous .
58011004	Dangga Habel en toua , sug en eic ara ara bauwaharo dou Allah naugb men sesar sug nosa , kaba , Allah emotogoto en an ginero . Doba en eigdoumesa en moho an gin namcir . Anai en emedreg Allah en mer an areg graga augwan touwero . Doba sug en medoc ebdebin an en mer ginohob , kaba , en aimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes se gin toua terimda . Hang areg en eic dou Allah gin , kaba , eigouhw edreg dau areg en maguna Kain eic dou Allah toua namcir . Anai Kain , kaba , en medoc emebdebin an areg Allah arougb en an ginero . Doba en eic ara ara bauwaharo dou en augwougb dau enin medoc mes dous . Dangga Habel gin , kaba , en toua omom dau ginohob . Doba men geicara gin , kaba , dag gansins eb deinaugb maman terimda .
58011005	Dangga toua , sud hom , moho Henog , kaba , en emomom touwero . Doba sug eni moongga se cinogo ginaba , kaba , Allah eperwei en maga , hanoba eigdoumesa en dig bogoda . Anai en emobsara dau sug en medoc ebdebin an Allah touwero . Doba en od mena debsa en an areg en os dou en gin toua terimda . Hang Surad Injil Meb Mohon enara dou maman dag lusud lehilon dougwo en , doba len lemeiya en touwero . Anai Allah eigdoumesa en dau lenohob . Dara Surad Injil Meb enara dou maman toua dau sug Allah emeigdoumesa enbuma , kaba , dag Allah medoc agahugouhw an en namcir touohob .
58011006	Dangga gareg en en aud Allah naugb en acgeij ara ara dau en , kaba , esloulougb medam dag en emeija mouwesa Allah dag en moongga , era mogero touwero . Doba en en aud en dara medoc eica namcir dag en eis huhugwohob , anai gini aimo dau areg Allah en ouwan dangga . Dara esloulougb toua dag en od mena debsa Allah dau sug en medoc etrij icira naugb ehilon en terimda , kaba , dag en emeic areg en acgeij en an ingga dou en toues . Anai gareg en en aud Allah , doba en eija mouwesa endag Allah maires inggebgei ? Era en emauni en meresei ? Era naroei ? Kaba , Allah medoc emeigouhw an enero , doba en medoc esrougb an en namcir . Hang en emeic ara ara hom dou en touwero .
58011007	Dara Nuh en toua emeiya dau gogom areg Allah en esedeb naugb lusud se lona daiyamo gacin touebma . Doba sug Allah esulou en an ginohob , kaba , en medoc emaihagab en mer an gin touwero . Doba en medoc eiseisan gin namcir . Hanoba en esinsin ij medam hom . Dauntoba ij eigdoc en an en mesouwa , dara en mehir merug homoi an len mersouwer len laugwan toua . Dangga sug Nuh medoc ebdebin an Allah en mer dag ginohob , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa en dag en eic gesgigouhwesa dou en ucugwohob . Doba len gus , kaba , Nuh men geicara geigouhw gini owun len meroho namcir . Anai len lemaimo en naugb len leicara geigouhwero . Doba len leic merus naugb len laimo areg gecgu terimda . Hang gogom emeb dau len touwero , doba obsara baiyan len laugwan namcir .
58011008	Dangga toua , Abraham sug Allah arougb en naugb en eihwedig cinogo menau areg Allah os dou enohob , kaba , en emeija medocesa Allah en mer gin touwero . Doba en medoc hom naugb en aimo areg Allah arougb en an gin toua namcir . Hanoba en eihwededau men cinogo mohon augwougb dous . Anai en emecinaga ucina aud cinogo menau gin touebma .
58011009	Dara sug en edebeij cinogo menau areg Allah os dou en ginohob , kaba , en emohud tu misen naugb sug en atou se touwero . Doba en ohud hugbei naugb en eigtou dag lugmahara desij lugun sungga dous , aimo dau areg Allah os dou enohob gin terimda . Dara en meisi Isag dara en medebeito Yakub , kaba , Allah os cinogo gin dou lan touohob . Hang lan toua lameigtou se tu misen touwero . Doba len latou desij Abraham se men tu hugbei gin toua terimda .
58011010	Anai Abraham , kaba , en eigtou bateteij naugb cinogo misen gedig Allah enin eng esedeb , hanoba ohud deb naugb enohob . Hang gin , kaba , emediyebeiya dau en touwero , doba eb naugb en beb huhugb namcir .
58011011	Dara Abraham , kaba , en edag sudbod . Dara Sarai , kaba , en toua edag duga mec namcir . Hang emedeinyum naugb lan laic marih deiterohob . Doba Abraham , kaba , en emeija medocesa Allah an areg en os dou en gini touwero . Doba en medoc ebdebin an en dag areg en os dou en ginohob , kaba , en emeperwei medoc mes an gini touwero . Doba en aimo augwan gini an en toua terimda .
58011012	Dangga hang , Abraham , kaba , deinyor sug en omom . Doba sug en medoc ebdebin an Allah dag ginohob , kaba , en medebeitor lebedero dag tebeij se bogo , dara lebedero dag geria se dum mebera toua namcir .
58011013	Doba len gin laugwan , kaba , len lomom dau cinogo areg Allah os dou len ginohob . Anai areg en os dou len gin , kaba , en emeic dou len se cinogo ginero . Doba len leiya cinogo gin dag eb aigusaba se len merdoc mes dous . Hanoba len merdoc erleij aud gin toua . Dangga hang , igdebes emeba len sug len los ladi lenin deseino lugun se cinogo gin touwero . Doba len los ladi lenin dag lugmahara dara lusud gedig len latou sousougb se ucina mogumsi aud cinogo menau deseino len terimda .
58011014	Sug len los ladi lenin dou lusud dag gin , kaba , gini ansins dou maman dag len lemoudesan lugun se cinogo gin deitero . Doba len merdoc erleij aud lugun se cinogo menau hom gin dous . Anai sug len merdoc acicin an meren cinogo areg len leihwededau ginohob , kaba , cumougt inggebga naugb len lecicugb aud meren cinogo mohon ucugb deit .
58011015	
58011016	Dobnaro . Len merdoc erleij aud cinogo menau geb se bogo hom dous . Anai cinogo menau gin , kaba , eigouhw bedreg dau meren cinogo mohon geb se cinogo gin namcir . Dangga hang , sug len merdoc erleij aud Allah men cinogo dag ginohob , kaba , igdebes emeba en dau sug len leija en dag meren Allah touwero . Doba en ouma debin len an gin namcir . Anai enin eng esedeb cinogo menau gin deb naugb lenohob .
58011017	Dangga toua , sug Allah ainyen Abraham naugb en eic en meisi Isag bauwaharo dou en sug nosa , kaba , Abraham medoc emagadgeij dau en touwero . Doba en medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou en gin namcir . Hang en esedeb naugb en eic en meisi mohora hom gini bauwaharo dou en toua .
58011018	Anai en ogod se enin medoc mes dag Allah men goubesa edeinyum naugb sug en eigdoumesa Isag dau gomom ucugb dou en toua . Dangga hang , en emen dougwo Allah en mer an gin touwero . Doba en esedeb naugb en aimo en mer an gin namcir . Anai en ecinaga dag Allah os dou en sug nosohob , endagai : Ban abdebeitor areg dan dos dou banohob , kaba , dan deic len laugwan dou ban ogdoc ban abisi Isag gini dous . Hang maman manara dag Allah eic en meisi gini aninim dag sud hom geisa dau gomom ucugb dou en toua . Anai se medoc mes , kaba , Abraham eic gomom dou en meisi ginohob .
58011019	
58011020	Dara Isag , kaba , en toua acgeij Allah naugb en eic geigouhw dou Yakub dara Esau . Anai en medoc ebdebin an Allah dag areg en os dou Abraham eisaugb cinogo Kanaan naugb lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , eb naugb en meisi lan . Hang en ouma debin gin dou lan toua .
58011021	Dara Yakub en toua medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou Abraham eisaugb cinogo Kanaan gin toua . Dangga hang , sug en deinyor omomohob , kaba , en os ijouhugwa adedeij mohumes naugb en esijaresa Allah . Hanoba en acgeij Allah naugb en eic geigouhw dou Yusub meisi lahwai , lan maroho Epraim dara Menase , eisaugb cinogo Kanaan gin toua .
58011022	Dangga toua , Yusub sug eni deinyor omomohob , kaba , en ens dou leng Israel dag se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , len leihwededau cinogo Mesir aud Kanaan gin toua deit . Anai en medoc ebdebin an Allah dag areg en os dou Abraham eisaugb cinogo ginohob , kaba , en emereiyara touwero . Doba en enara se misen namcirohob . Hang en emenara dou leng Israel dau sug len leihwededau cinogo Mesir gin , kaba , dag len lodo en mori dau cinogo ingga dig Kanaan toua .
58011023	Dara Musa mena dara mem , kaba , lan toua mardoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou Abraham ginohob . Dangga hang , lan lamahau dau Piraun an areg en arougb leng Israel naugb len logod meren logodeh ligiji laugwan lomom gin touwero . Doba sug Musa mem ouwadan enohob , kaba , lan lacgoneh en dau Piraun se igda homoi toua . Anai lan laiya , doba en mebes ecabeci namcir . Hang lan lacinaga dag Allah esedeb en naugb ara ara touohob .
58011024	Dangga toua , Musa sug en edag sudohob , kaba , en emouwan naugb lusud lemeigdoumesa en moho dag Piraun mehida mogwihi mogo en toua deitero . Doba en ouwan naugb len larges merir dau gin namcir . Anai en toua medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou Abraham eisaugb cinogo Kanaan ginohob .
58011025	Hang en emaimo leng Mesir meren geicara dag sesar aud areg eic en medoc eigouhw dou en dag cum cum dous gin toua deitero . Doba en ouci naugb en aimo Allah men lusud leng Israel se ucina mog erij gin terimda .
58011026	Anai en toua medoc eiseisan areg Allah os dou leng Israel ginohob . Hang en emogod se enin medoc mes naugb en emaimo leng Israel se meren ucina gesmesman gini . Aninim dag Krisdus aimo ucina gesmesman se lona daiyamo gacin gin touohob . Anai en eigdoumesa Allah men gos dou gin , kaba , mera eisaugb medam edreg dau leng Mesir meren aremougb augwan namcirohob .
58011027	Dangga hang , en emahau dau sug Piraun medoc esrougb an en touwero . Doba sug en medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou Abraham dag ginohob , kaba , arges maga dau Mesir gin deb namcir . Hanoba en emecicugb aud cinogo Mesir gin toua deitero . Doba en eihwedaud cinogo Kanaan gin dous . Anai en emeiya Allah dara en mairesero , doba en ecinaga eni moongga desij enohob .
58011028	Hanoba en arougb leng Israel naugb len leic domba mogwihi largeh meren misis mecdemaga augwan dougwo malaikad . Dauntoba en emogod len merisi mebin lemomom touwero , doba len merna agau namcir . Anai en medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou Abraham eisaugb Kanaan gin terimda . Dangga hang , en emenara dou leng Israel , dauntoba len merdoc moc dougwo Lona Gohw Bedreg gin touwero . Doba len merna eiseisan naugb len lougwan ared debin gin se lona daiyamo gacin toua terimda . Anai sug malaikad en eiya , doba mogwihi eb se misis mecdemaga ginohob , kaba , en emogod meis mebin se tu ingga touwero , doba en edreg namcir .
58011029	Dara leng Israel len toua lod merna debsa Allah an areg en os dou Abraham gin touohob . Dangga hang , sug len ledebeij se Duhu Gahani meberohob , kaba , duhu eij dau len . Hanoba len leraga se medi , aninim dag len leraga se lonog gin toua . Doba sug Piraun men sadodor len lainyen naugb len leraga ucan leng Israel se medi gini , kaba , duhu eij baijahasem debin len laugwan lomom louwa namcir .
58011030	Dangga toua , sug leng Israel lec merohora acec cinogo Yeriko se leng Kanaan meren hancob se lona senggai , kaba , Allah ahacugb liga geb acec cinogo ingga augwan mor mor dau len namcir . Anai len merdoc emaihagab Allah mer an areg en en dou len eisaugb gin touwero . Doba len merdoc ebdebin an en mer gin terimda , hanoba len laimo touohob .
58011031	Dara gida hom gedig en maga eijouhw se cinogo Yeriko ingga , en moho Rahab , kaba , sug lahwai dau leng Israel laino len merin naugb ladogmac dougwo lusud se cinogo ingga , kaba , en emens lan dou men mougtir touwero . Doba en ebin lan dara geigouhw se men tu . Hanoba en ecgoneh lan toua . Anai sug en ouman dag Allah os cinogo Kanaan ingga dou leng Israel ginohob , kaba , en medoc emaihagab gin touwero . Doba en toua medoc ebdebin an gin namcir . Dangga hang , sug leng Israel leinesa cinogo ingga , kaba , len lemogod en touwero . Doba len logod leng gus laugwan eng lomom dous . Anai len loududa Allah en mer an areg len louman dau len gusohob .
58011032	Dara dan douwan decic dau Gideon , Barag , Simson , Yebta , Daud , Semuel , dara leng lesai Allah moro sug nosa , len laugwan meren geicara dou yen toua . Doba cumougt emedeinyum naugb sug dan dens dau meren geicara augwan dou yenero .
58011033	Anai len toua merdoc emaihagab Allah mer an areg en os dou Abraham gin touwero . Doba len merdoc ebdebin an en mer gin toua terimda . Dangga hang , Allah en emamsoho lenero . Doba en eic goubesa dou len naugb len laiyan mougt mera goujir an meren logodeh leinyana , dara len laimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes augwan an len gus toua terimda . Hang areg Allah os dou lenohob , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau len touwero . Doba len lesma namcir . Dara len lemahau dau sug aremeta mog mog au len touwero . Doba sug len merdoc ebdebin an Allah dag ginohob , kaba , meren goubesa inggebga naugb len lagaigeij len merirs dougwo namcir .
58011034	Dara len lob smougb dau len naugb smougb emait len . Dara lusud lemedesugb len touwero , doba len merna agau dau augwan gin terimda . Len laugwan gin , kaba , lenin meren goubesa ingmaro . Doba sug len merdoc ebdebin an Allah en mer dag ginohob , kaba , Allah eic goubesa medam dou len . Dangga hang , sug len lesara dara lugmahara meren sadodor , kaba , len locir len laugwan lougb dau len toua namcir .
58011035	Dara ligida merug hosa , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa len merusur merug aibibra dau gomom ucugb . Hanoba en eic len ucugb dou len toua . Anai len merdoc emaihagab Allah mer touwero . Doba sug len merdoc ebdebin an areg Allah arougb len an ginohob , kaba , len laimo en mer gin toua . Dara lusud merug hosa deit , kaba , leng merug mog lenara dou len , lendagai : Sug yen yobsara dau Allah naugb yen yemesijaresa en deitero , doba yen yesijaresa emen seiseij gin dous , kaba , emen emeic mog erij medam dou yenero . Doba emen emarges dau yen namcir . Dobnaro . Len lemousa deisa len merir an touwero . Doba len louci naugb len laimo ucina mog erij aud gomom gin dous . Anai len merdoc ebdebin an Allah dau sug len lomomohob , kaba , dag en emeigdoumesa len aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toues . Anai maireseb menau gin , kaba , eigouhw bedreg dau maireseb se cinogo gin toua namcir .
58011036	Dara ligbum , kaba , lusud lesmesman len , hanoba len labosbos len . Doba lingma , kaba , len louf len se tu gesisug . Hanoba len leic kawamab naugb len lohud len merisira dara merohora darem sungga toua .
58011037	Dara lingma , kaba , len leic igdahab lad len lomom . Dara lingma deit , kaba , len leic sigigeser , hanoba len lougb len meraga dag hwai icira . Dara ligbum , kaba , len leic krawan naugb ladesugb len lomom toua . Anai len laugwan gin , kaba , len lemouwan naugb lemobsara dau Allah enero . Doba len louwan naugb len merdoc ebdebin an areg en os dou len gin dous . Dara ligbum , kaba , lusud lerba len dau meren tu , hanoba len leida meren aremougb augwan dau len toua . Hang len ledag irinya naugb len leg domba dara kambing mos dag sansun dougwo len . Dara sireba len toua namcir . Dara lusud lemamsoho len touwero . Doba len losos ucucan len naugb len leic mog erij dou len toua terimda .
58011038	Dara lingma deit , kaba , len lougb dau leng merug mog gini . Hanoba len lesebesa se lomougwisa dara menmod . Dara len latou se cinogo dara igdohos mes dau len gin toua namcir . Anai len merdoc emarges dau areg Allah os dou len gin touwero . Doba len lod merna debsa en an gin terimda . Dangga hang , len laugwan gin , kaba , emedeinyum naugb sug len leija lusud gedig Bilis oiharaga len se cinogo gin dag len mersir deitero , doba len merdoc susugb dau lenohob .
58011039	Dara Allah enin toua ouma debin meren geicara gini se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob . Anai len lemobsara dau areg en os dou len gin touwero , doba len les agadgeij namcir . Anai areg Allah os dou maman se lona daiyamo gacin gin , kaba , augwan eigouhw edreg dau areg en os dou len graga sug nosa ingga toua namcir . Dangga hang , areg en os gacgunog dou len gin , kaba , en emeic dou len touebma . Doba en eigtou naugb sug gos dou menau gin eb naugb maman touahabi , en emeic dou len dara maman maugwan cum dous . Anai en emouwan naugb leng nosa gin , kaba , lemedebeij usi ino maman mamin touwero . Doba en ouwan naugb maman maugwan madebeij usi gin mougwa cum aninim dous .
58011040	
58012001	Dangga hang , sug leng graga leino maman mamin se ucina mog erij aud gomom dag ginohob , kaba , eigouhw naugb maman mamobsara dau ucina gin touwero . Doba maman marba areg gougb sogo maga dougwo maman asa ucina gin . Dara sesar gahud maman augwan dau maman toua . Dauntoba sug maman mamug mogud naugb maman maobga mateijim se ucina mog erij areg Allah arougb maman an gin toua terimda . Anai len gini , kaba , len lesa acec maman se ucina gini naugb loho merir debin maman icira gin toua .
58012002	Dara sug maman maobga se ucina mog erij gin , kaba , maman mamdoc moc dougwo Yesus men geicara naugb maman sug nosa gin touwero . Doba sug maman mamdoc ebdebin an en aimougtutohob , kaba , maman mamdoc ebdebin an en terimda edebeij Lona Sug Ouwedoc gin toua . Anai en , kaba , en emobsara dau ucina mog erij aud gomom taiba sogo salib gin touwero . Doba en aiyan medocesem naugb en aimo ucina gin terimda ouwedoc toua . Dara sug lusud lesmesman en icira gin , kaba , igdebes emeba en an touwero . Doba en eic mos naugb gini namcir . Anai en ecinaga dau sug en aimo ucina mog erij gin terimda sug ouwedocohob , kaba , areg eic en medoc agahugouhw dou en , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau en touwero , doba emeb naugb ens . Hang iteitogin , kaba , en edeigtou desij Allah se men maija moc dig en mesira misen naugb en edag mougt mera medam gin touohob .
58012003	Dangga hang , yen meigdoc emomomtom naugb sug yen yobsara dau ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba yen meigdoc eiseisan mog erij areg leng lebesesar leic dou Yesus an yenohob . Hanoba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin toua terimda .
58012004	Anai leng lebesesar gin , kaba , len lemeic gomom dou yen touebma . Doba len leic mog erij misen dou yen dousaba .
58012005	Era dagiro ? Yen meigdoc moc dougwo areg Allah enara dou yen se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosohobei ? Anai sug yen yedag en mogwihi mogo yen dag ginohob , kaba , en enara bad yen meigdoc mes dag gini , endagai : Dan indihirija , yen yemesbes an dan sug dan deic mog erij dou yen debin meijen geicara gecgu touwero . Doba yen yesedoc gin namcir . Dara sug dan den dougwo yen sug yen yaimo areg dag sesar , kaba , yen meigdoc emobsara icira gin touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij namcir . Anai gareg dan indoc gororougb en , kaba , dan den dougwo en an men geicara sug en ebesesar . Dara gareg dan deigdoumesa en moho dag dan indugwihi mogo enohob , kaba , dan deic mog erij dou en icira sug en aimo areg gecgu ingga toua .
58012006	
58012007	Augwan gini aimo dau merner se cinogo gini meren geicara toua . Anai mena gareg en emogod en mehir dougwo meren geicara gecgu ginero ? Naro , sud hom ingma emeicara dag gin touebma . Dangga hang , yen yemobsara dau sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin touwero , doba yen yes agadgeij namcir naugb yen yaimo mog erij gin terimda . Hanoba yen yeigdoumesa mog erij gini , aninim dag en dau yen Meijina se bogo gin touohob . Anai sug yen yemaimo ucina mog erij ginero , kaba , gini ansins dag yen yemedag Allah mogwihi mogo dag misen touwero . Doba yen yedag len gedig merna emaiyero dous . Doba sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin , kaba , gini ansins dag Allah eigdoumesa yen dag en mogwihi mogo yen dag misenohob . Anai astesda gareg Allah eigdoumesa en moho dag en mogwihi mogo enohob , kaba , en eicara dangga an en toua terimda .
58012008	
58012009	Dara maman mamina se cinogo gini , sug len logod maman dougwo maman geicara gecgu gin , kaba , maman mamen dougwo len an touwero , doba maman macguna dou len . Hanoba maman maimo len merir an ara ara augwan toua terimda . Dangga hang , sug maman maigdoumesa maman mamina se cinogo len meroho dag ginohob , kaba , eigouhw naugb maman mameic mamus dou maman Mamina se bogo sug en eic mog erij dou maman touwero . Doba maman macguna dou en icira gin toua namcir .
58012010	Anai maman mamina se cinogo gin , kaba , len leic mog erij dou maman cum cum dous , laimo dau areg len lauwam an se lenin merdoc mes an maman toua . Doba maman Mamina se bogo gin , kaba , en eic mog erij dou maman . Dauntoba sug maman marges dau areg gecgu ginohob , kaba , en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou maman . Hanoba en ogugwo areg geb se enin medoc mes ingma dou maman toua . Dauntoba maman geicara augwan aninim dag men geicara toua terimda . Anai en ouwan naugb areg geigouhw gini eb naugb maman dous .
58012011	Dara aimougtut , kaba , mog erij gini emeic dag maman mamdoc emeigouhw touwero , doba eic dag maman mamdoc momogo icira gin namcir . Doba sug maman maimo ucina mog erij gin terimda edebeij sug ouwedocohob , kaba , ousa maman naugb sug maman maimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes . Hanoba ousa maman naugb sug maman maic gesgigouhwesa dou lusud toua terimda . Anai mog erij gin , kaba , eic bagad dougwo maman mambes . Dauntoba maman mamaimo areg gecgu deitero , doba maman marges dau namcir .
58012012	Dangga hang , sug mog erij gini ens dou yen dag yen yedag Allah mogwihi mogo yen dag misenohob , kaba , yen yemobsara dau ucina gin touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij namcir . Dara yen meijohora emomcirec naugb yen yemeigtou touwero . Doba yen yeisa yesa . Hanoba yen yaimo ucina gin dara goubesa terimda edebeij sug ouwedoc toua .
58012013	Dara sug yen yeraga ucina gin , kaba , yen yemeraga deiyogeh touwero . Doba yen yec dobosboro asa ucina gini terimda . Dauntoba yen meijohora gomcirec gini ouwasis toua . Anai sug yen yaimo ucina gagabgeb terimda , kaba , cum eic dag yen meijohora omcirec medam edreg dau mohw deit .
58012014	Hang yen yemoho aremer debinim touwero . Doba se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yaimo areg geic gesgigouhwesa doum ucucugb dous . Dara yen yemaimo areg gecgu mougwa hom touwero . Doba se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yeicara yaimo areg Allah enin ouwan dous . Anai gareg en emaimo areg gecabecero , kaba , en emdeiya maman Adehsud gin touwero .
58012015	Dara yen yebehnehino yenin meigdoc mes ucucugb terimda . Dauntoba sud hom ingma dau yen , kaba , en emohw medigo dou areg geigouhw gedig Allah eic dou enohob gin touwero . Doba areg Allah ogugwo dou enohob , kaba , en eicara baimo augwan gin toua terimda . Anai Allah , kaba , medoc eineg an enohob . Dara yen yesedougwo yenin meigdoc mes . Dauntoba sud hom ingma dau yen , kaba , areg gedougdaha emeiji se en medoc mes touwero , doba en arges dau namcir . Anai cum , kaba , gedougdaha gini ehin leinyana merdoc mes , hanoba eic gogor dou len laugwan deseino Allah touohob .
58012016	Dangga hang , sud hom ingma dau yen , kaba , en emaimo areg gecgu . Hanoba en emesbes an mecigbougb areg Allah esedeb naugb enohob , aninim dag Esau en touwero . Anai en , kaba , en edag meis mebin , doba en eic mecigbougb areg mena ogugwo debdodo enohob naugb en auma ared geb se igdebir hom dous .
58012017	Dara yen yecinaga dag se lona daiyamo deit , kaba , en aganini en mena naugb en ocuncum dou Allah , dauntoba Allah eic geigouhw dou en . Dara en eb batagaij an toua , doba mena asidged en deb . Anai sug en medoc dag liseh an mecigbougb dou en magto dag ginohob , kaba , mecigbougb gin emeb naugb en toua deitero , doba ediyebeiya dau en beb huhugb namcir .
58012018	Dangga hang , eigouhw naugb yen yemesbes an mecigbougb areg Allah esedeb naugb yenohob , aninim dag Esau gin touwero . Doba yen yesedougwo gin deigeigouhw namcir . Anai sug yen yedebeij Allah gin , kaba , yen yemedebeij en se menmod Torsina , aninim dag maman mamjemouwer leng Israel sug nosa touwero . Doba yen yedebeij en se menmod Sion dous . Anai menmod Torsina gin , kaba , eb se cinogo gini , hang emedeinyum naugb lusud lemos toua . Dara sug nosa , kaba , smougb mouf eisa , dara umer bebeigbogo namcir , dara loungmen eisa medam se menmod gin toua terimda .
58012019	Dara len louman higbei mougb medam . Dara len louman Allah enin eng esulou len dau lobeigbogo mofu gin toua , dauntoba len lemos menmod ingga touwero . Doba len lesa aigusi dau gin namcir . Hanoba , en enara dou len , endagai : Sud hom gareg dau yen en edos menmod gin , kaba , yen gus yeic igdahab yad en bomom namcir . Dara yen yemeicara dangga dou lusud dousero . Doba sug aremeta hom edesa desij menmod gin , kaba , yen yeic igdahabi yad en bomom toua . Dangga hang , sug maman mamjemouwer louman dau areg Allah esulou len an gin , kaba , len lemaiyan merdocesem naugb en mer gin touwero . Doba len len dougwo en , dauntoba en emenara dou len deitero , doba en arges mer dau len . Anai areg len leiya gin , kaba , eic dag len merdoc omom dau gin namcirohob .
58012020	
58012021	Dara Musa enin toua ouma debin gin , endagai : Dan toua indoc eijesa medam . Dara dan dahau dau augwan gin toua terimda .
58012022	Doba se menmod Sion gin , kaba , areg dau nosa ingga augwan emedebeij yen touwero . Doba sungga , kaba , yen yedebeij malaikad leinyana gougwa . Anai menmod Sion gini , kaba , aninim dag cinogo moho Yerusalem eb se bogo naugb sug Allah Gedig En Eis Huhugb en eigtousa .
58012023	Dara yen yedebeij lusud gedig Allah og len meroho se Surad Maireseb Huhugb sungga toua . Anai en eigdoumesa len meroho dag en meis mebin len laugwan touohob . Hang len merdoc agahugouhw an gin toua namcir . Dara yen yedebeij Allah gedig en ogod aremer aga lusud laugwan se menmod Sion gin toua . Dara yen yedebeij lusud gedig len lemarges dau ucina gin touwero . Doba Allah ahwan len laugwan naugb len laimo ucina gini terimda len ledebeij usi gin touohob .
58012024	Dara yen yedebeij Yesus gedig en edag gembala gesa taij naugb en ogod areg geb se Allah men gos dou menau augwan an maman sungga toua . Dangga hang , areg geb naugb mamanohob , kaba , augwan eigouhw bedreg dau areg geb dou lusud se Allah men gos dou mohon sug nosa toua namcir . Anai sug Habel eic aremeta mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb men sesar sug nosa ingga , kaba , mogwihi gini edu en maga dous eng ecabeci deseino Allah . Doba sug Yesus eic enin mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar . Hanoba en eic en mogwihi bargeh maman touohob , kaba , edeinyum naugb edu maman mamdoc mes ecabeci dau maman sesar augwan . Hang sesar men gogom emeb naugb maman toua deitero , doba augwan ediyebeiya dau maman namcir .
58012025	Dangga hang , sug yen yedebeij Allah men cinogo moho Yerusalem geb se bogo dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemeicara yemaihagab en mer gin touwero . Doba yen yei meijums deinaugb en mer gin terimda . Anai sug Allah eic gogom dou maman mamjemouwer gareg en aihagab en mer sug nosohob , kaba , dagiro , naugwe hang , yen youdesa en emamsoho maman sug maman maohw mamidgo dou en mer menau gin toua ? Naro , en emamsoho maman touwero . Doba en eic gogom medam dou maman edreg dau len deit . Anai sug nosa , kaba , en enara dou maman mamjemouwer , doba se menmod Torsina geb se cinogo gin dous . Doba areg en enara dou maman iteitogin , kaba , en enara dou maman dau bogo .
58012026	Dangga hang , eigouhw naugb maman mamesbes an en mer gin touwero , doba maman maimo terimda . Anai en esulou maman dag se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , en emetitir cinogo gin hom dousero . Doba en etitir areg geb se bogo meniha augwan toua . Aninim dau sug en enara dou maman mamjemouwer se menmod Torsina sug nosa , kaba , en mer etitir cinogo an len sungga touohob . Hanoba en os dou len se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa ingga , endagai : Se lona gacin , kaba , dan demetitir cinogo gin dousero . Doba dan demetitir areg geb se bogo meniha augwan mougwa hom dara toues .
58012027	Sug Allah enara dag en etitir augwan mougwa hom dag gin deit , kaba , gini ens dou maman dag areg Allah ahasesei dara esinsinohob , kaba , augwan gini ediyebeiya dau maman namcir . Dauntoba areg emeinyeinyaro , kaba , augwan ebsugeb naugb maman terimda . Anai areg en ahasesei dara esinsin gin , kaba , augwan dag areg geinyeinya dous .
58012028	Dangga hang , sug Allah eigdoumesa maman mamoho naugb sug maman mainesa men goiharaga dag ginohob , kaba , maman man sijo dou en esesa terimda . Dara maman marges dau sug maman maimo areg en arougb maman an gin touwero . Doba maman masijaresa en dara maman mahau dau en toua namcir . Hanoba maman maimo areg geic en medoc eigouhw dou en an augwan toua terimda . Anai men goiharaga gin , kaba , emeinyeinya naugb emediyebeiya dau maman touwero , doba ebsugeb naugb maman namcir .
58012029	Maman maicara dou en dag gini , anai maman Allah gin , kaba , en edag smougb mouf . Hang gareg en emaimo en mer ginero , doba eicara aihagab en mer gin terimda , kaba , en eic mor mor dou en toua namcir .
58013001	Dangga hang , yen toua , sug yen yedag hom se Krisdusohob , kaba , yen yemarges dau sug yen meigdoc gororougb yen meijaguner dara yen meigdamouwer lenero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo dag gin anim terimda .
58013002	Dara yen yemehig dau sug yen yebin lugmahara touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo dangga an len toua terimda . Anai ligbum sug len lebin lusud dag gin sug nosa , kaba , len lebin malaikadir augwougb touohob . Anai sug len lebin len , kaba , len lemecinaga dag len lebin malaikadirero .
58013003	Dara yen meigdoc moc dougwo leng Krisden gedig len leigtou se tu gesisug icira Krisdus gin touwero . Doba yen meigdoc eiseisan len naugb yen yousa len dara ara ara augwan toua . Aninim dag yen toua sug yen yeigtou se tu gesisug , kaba , yen youwan len gus merdoc moc dougwo yen touwero , doba yen youwan len merna eiseisan yen naugb lousa yen toua . Dara yen yemehig dau sug yen yousa leng laimo ucina mog erij touwero . Doba yen meigdoc eiseisan len naugb yen yousa len toua . Aninim dag sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij , kaba , yen youwan lusud lemehig dau yen touwero . Doba yen youwan naugb len lousa yen toua terimda .
58013004	Dara gareg dau yen en eic mesouwohob , kaba , en emaimo ligida gus toua deitero . Doba en eigdoumesa mesouwa en moho naugb en eic en hom dous . Dara yigida , gareg dau yen en es mesuwohob , kaba , en emohw en maga dou ligiji gus touwero . Doba en eigdoumesa mesuwa en moho naugb en es en hom dous toua . Anai gareg en medoc edreg dau mesuwa era mesouwa , hanoba en mesira ebsa len gus aibibra , kaba , Allah ogod gogom medam deb naugb enohob .
58013005	Dara se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen meigdoc emetrij icira aremougb dara aregoufu mougwa hom touwero . Doba areg geb naugb yenohob , kaba , yen meigdoc ebtou an gin namcir . Anai Allah oho mer debin maman se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Dan demarges danin dau yen dara dan demamsoho yen deb touwero . Doba dan deigtou desij yen naugb dan deseyeiyo yen beb huhugb namcir .
58013006	Dangga hang , sug Allah eni moongga desij maman naugb en eseyeiyo maman dougwo areg gecgu dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamahau dau sug len gus leic gecgu dou maman touwero . Doba maman maic mamus naugb augwan gin toua terimda . Hanoba maman manara dou len toua , maimo dau areg sud hom erba Ugwaremer an deb sug nosa touohob , mandagai : Emen Adehsud , kaba , en en aud emen naugb en eseyeiyo emen dougwo areg gecgu ginohob . Hang emen emahau dau aremer areg yen yeic dou emen gin touwero . Doba emen emeic emus naugb yen an gin namcir .
58013007	Dara yen meigdoc moc dougwo meijen mougtir meren geicara sug len meriresebaba touwero . Doba yen meigdoc eiseisan meren geicara gin terimda . Anai sug len lesai Allah en mer eisaugb Krisdus dou yen sug nosa , kaba , len lemobsara dau sug lusud leic mog erij medam dou len icira ginero . Doba len les agadgeij naugb len laimo gin terimda edebeij lona sug len lomom touohob . Dangga hang , yen toua yemobsara dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Allah touwero . Doba yen yesogwa deisa len merohotimei mohw se ucina mog erij gin toua .
58013008	Aninim dag Yesus Krisdus , en emobsara dau men geicara touwero . Doba en aimo augwan gini dau sug aimougtut terimda beb huhugb an maman toua namcirohob .
58013009	Dangga hang , sug lusud lesai mer areibahau aingma aingma dou yen , kaba , yen yemaimo len merir an gin touwero . Doba yen yebehnehino yenin meigdoc mes dougwo len merir gin namcir . Anai areg len ledidib dou lusud dau sug len lousan lenin dau ara ara , dara len lehig dau ared , kaba , emousa len naugb len les agadgeij se ucina se geica ginero . Doba ahwan len naugb len laijahasero dau gin dous . Doba sug yen yaimo geigouhw areg Allah eic dou yenohob gini terimda , kaba , yen yemobsara dau ucina misen ginero , doba yen yes agadgeij se gin namcir . Anai areg en eic dou yen gin , kaba , aimo dag en medoc eigouhw an yenohob .
58013010	Dara areg maman mabdeb se boromei naugb mauwaharo dou Allah iteitogini , kaba , toua susugb dau areg leng lesedougwo Allah men tuari sug nosa len lobdeb se boromei naugb len lauwaharo dou en touohob . Anai sug len logug aremeta an mogwihi , kaba , Gembala Gesa Taij Meren Mougt Mera Medam en odo dabei an mogwihi gini bainesa Allah Men Dimei Gecabeci Namcir . Hanoba en eic mogwihi gini bauwaharo naugb enin dara lusud meren sesar dou Allah . Gin dauwohob , kaba , len lodo aremeta medesa dau igtia dig medigo naugb ledec se smougb se boromei taiba sungga toua . Doba maman , kaba , maman mameic aremeta mogwihi mauwaharo dou Allah dag gin deitero . Doba maman maic dau sug maman magahugouhw an Allah dag mauwaharo dou en dous . Hang gembala gesa taij gesedougwo Allah men tuari sug nosa , kaba , meren goubesa ingma naugb sug len let ara ara dau maman boromei touwero .
58013011	
58013012	Sug gembala gesa taij lodo aremeta medesa dig medigo naugb ledec se smougb bansins dag lusud meren sesar ediyebeiya dau lenohob , kaba , Yesus en omom taiba sogo salib naugb maman sesar se Yerusalem medigo dag gini touohob . Dauntoba sesar men gogom eb naugb maman toua deitero . Doba en edu maman mamdoc mes ecabeci dau augwan gin namcir , aninim dag gembala gesa taij leic aremeta mogwihi naugb lusud meren sesar sug nosa touohob .
58013013	Hang igdebes emeba maman dau Yesus touwero . Doba maman maisa dau igtia mougb ucan en dig medigo naugb maman masogwa deisa en mohotimei mohw se ucina gesmesman gin toua terimda .
58013014	Anai se cinogo gin , kaba , maman mameigtou dag magun deb se terimdero . Doba maman mamdoc erleij aud cinogo menau geb naugb maman se lona daiyamo gacin beb huhugb namcir dous .
58013015	Dangga hang , sug Yesus eic en mogwihi ancoho aga maman naugb Allah dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamarges dau sug maman masijaresa Allah dara magahugouhw an en touwero . Doba sug maman maos madi en moho dag maman mougt mera medam dou lusud dag gin , kaba , maman maicara dangga dou en besesa terimda . Anai gini dag maman maic ara ara mauwaharo dou en touohob .
58013016	Dara yen meigdoc moc dougwo dau sug yen yeicara yaimo areg geigouhw anim touwero . Doba yen yehilon ucina naugb yen yousem ucucugb . Dara yen yeigdoumesa areg gogom geb debin yen daum toua . Anai meijen geicara gin , kaba , aninim dag yen yeic areg mena ouwedebeda yauwaharo dou Allah . Hang eic dag en medoc agahugouhw an yen toua namcirohob .
58013017	Dara yen yemeicara yemaihagab meijen mougtir , len merir touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga deseino len naugb yen yaimo len merir an areg len len dou yen gin toua . Anai len leic meruwemougb esesa naugb len leseyeiyo yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan namcir . Dauntoba yen yemaimo gin deitero , doba yen yaimo areg geigouhw mogud dous . Dangga hang , sug yen meigdoc edag beim an len merir terimda , kaba , len lagauwesa yen dara merdoc agahugouhw an yen toua . Doba sug yen yohoiya len merir , kaba , len lesedougwo yen dara merdoc momogo . Hang emeic dag yen yemesma geigouhw icira gin touwero . Doba eic dag yen yesma gogom medam dau gin dous . Anai se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , Allah arougb len naugb len lens aremeijouhw astesda dau yen dou en toua .
58013018	Doba naugb danin , kaba , dan decinaga dag aremer hom emdagunya debin dan an yen touwero . Anai dan deic induwemougb esesa naugb dan daimo areg gedag beim dara areg obosboro an yen dara len gus laugwan touohob . Dangga hang , yen yemarges dau sug yen yocuncum dou Allah naugb dan touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo dangga besesa naugb dan terimda .
58013019	Dara dan dacgeij yen edreg dau nosa deit , dag yen yocuncum termum namcir , dauntoba Allah esedeb ucina naugb dan dedebeij yen sungga dedemeda toua .
58013020	Dara dan toua docuncum dou Allah gedig en eic gesgigouhwesa dou maman dougwo areg gecgu augwanohob , naugb en eic men goubesa edeinyum dou yen . Dauntoba se meijen aremer augwan , kaba , yen yaimo areg asesa enin medoc mes dag lusud mos toua terimda . Anai en , kaba , mobisamougb namcir . Hang en emeigdoumesa maman Adehsud Yesus en eisa ucugb dau leng lomom laugwan touohob .
58013021	Dara dan docuncum dou en naugb en arautut yen meigdoc mes , dauntoba areg yen yaimo deseino en ogdoc Yesus Krisdus en men goubesa gin , kaba , eic dag en medoc agahugouhw an yen toua . Anai en , kaba , en eir en mogwihi debin Allah men gos dou maman ginohob . Dauntoba areg Allah os dou maman , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya dau maman touwero , doba eb naugb maman beb huhugb namcir . Dangga hang , eigouhw naugb maman mamarges dau sug maman magahugouhw an Krisdus gin touwero . Doba maman maigdoumesa en moho beb huhugb terimda . Anai sug en eic enin mogwihi bauwaharo dou Allah naugb maman sesar dag ginohob , kaba , en edag Gembala Gesa Taij Moho Agas medam naugb maman touohob . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
58013022	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , yen meigdoc emesrougb an areg dan dog dou yen ginlo . Doba yen yeigtou yateteij naugb gin terimda . Anai areg dan dog dou yen gin , kaba , naugb dan denara dad yen meigdoc mes , dauntoba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij namcir . Dangga hang , dan demog surad gini emagas naugb yen touwero . Doba dan dog dag agarougb naugb yen dous .
58013023	Dara dan douwan dens dau maman maguna Timotius men meijouhw augwan asesa dou yen toua . Dauntoba yen yecinaga dag en emeigtou se tu gesisug toua deitero , doba en agunya dauwohob . Dangga hang , sug en edebeij dan sug dan demdeiya yenbuma , kaba , dan dacgeij en naugb en aimo dan . Dauntoba aman amahwas amdoumouma yen toua .
58013024	Dara yen yen dou meijen mougtir dara len gedig Allah ouci len debinim naugb enohob , kaba , dag emen emou len laugwan . Dara leng dau leng Italia meren hancob sugin , kaba , len laugwan lou yen toua .
58013025	Allah medoc eineg an yen yaugwan toua terimda .
59001001	Surad gini dau dang , Yakobus , dou Allah men lusud gedig len laisoboro sungga sungga yen yaugwan . Dan dog surad gini dou yen , anai dan dedag Allah dara maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus maran sogougb ginohob . Hang dan demou yen toua .
59001002	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij aingma aingma , kaba , yen meigdoc emeijesan ginlo . Doba yen meigdoc agahugouhw naugb gin namcir .
59001003	Anai yen yecinaga dau sug lusud lainyen yen , doba yen yeic meijus naugb len . Hanoba yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus terimda , kaba , dag cum , kaba , yen yaiyan meigdocesem dougwo augwan toua namcir . Hang yen yemobsara dau Krisdus men ucina touwero , doba yen yes agadgeij se gin terimda .
59001004	Dara sug yen yaiyan meigdocesem dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemobsara dau gin touwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij naugb sug yen yeiji dag lusud mos se Krisdus . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yemedis aremer geigouhw hom touwero . Doba yen yaimo augwan dag misen toua namcirohob .
59001005	Dangga gareg dau yen en emecinaga areg edag beim dara gobosboro an lusud dag misenbuma , kaba , eigouhw naugb en acgeij Allah . Dauntoba en eic mou ouforoho dara mou auti se aremer augwan gini dou en toua . Anai Allah , kaba , en medoc emagaigeij ara ara dau lusud laugwan , hanoba en emehig debin dau len touwero . Doba en medoc erera naugb en agaha mesira an dou len terimda . Dangga hang , gareg en acgeij mou ouforoho dara mou auti dau en , kaba , en emeic bedeinyum augwan dou en toua .
59001006	Doba esloulougb naugb sug sud hom en acgeij ara ara dau Allah , kaba , en emeija medocesa en an touwero . Doba en od mena debsa en an gin dag misen namcir . Anai gareg en eija medocesa Allah an areg en acgeij dau en terimda , kaba , en edag duhu mogo gedig loungmen oto dig gacda , dig ginin dous .
59001007	Sud hom dag gin , kaba , emedeinyum naugb sug en od mena debsa Allah dag en emeic ara ara hom dou en touwero . Anai en edag sud hom gedig en medoc hwai namcirohob . Hang en medoc eijeij icira aremer gus augwan toua terimda .
59001008	
59001009	Dara yeng Krisden gedig yen meijoho eb tainya , kaba , yen meigdoc momogo dau sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba yen meigdoc agahugouhw an gin namcir . Anai gini ansins dag Allah eigdoumesa yen meijoho agas medam deseino enohob .
59001010	Dangga toua , yeng Krisden gedig yen meijisoho mougb , kaba , yen meigdoc momogo dau sug len gus leic mog erij dou yen . Dara len leiyoho meijen aremougb augwan dau yen touwero . Doba sug Allah owun yen meijoho dag gin , kaba , yen meigdoc agahugouhw an gin dous . Anai yen yemeigtou dougwo meijen aremougb gin terimdero . Doba cum , kaba , yen yomom dau augwan gin namcir . Aninim dag aremerij emeb terberba touwero , doba cum , kaba , og ucugb toua .
59001011	Anai sug igdes ohu desrougb inegohob , kaba , en mohora obesa bogod aremerij maga ombrerij . Dara men merij geigouhw gin , kaba , toua mohw ousirij . Hanoba og an toua . Dangga toua , naugb leng merisoho mougb . Anai len leihweda dinga dingada naugb len lehilon aremougb terimda . Doba cum , kaba , len lomom dau augwan gin toua namcirohob .
59001012	Gareg en emobsara dau ucina mog erij ginero , doba en aiyan medocesem naugb en es agadgeij se gini terimda , kaba , Allah eic geigouhw dou en . Anai sug en aimo ucina mog erij gin terimda edebeij Lona Sug Ouwedocohob , kaba , Allah eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou en toua , aimo dau areg en os deb naugb mamanohob . Anai gareg en es agadgeij dag gin terimda , kaba , en ens enin ainyes dag en medoc gororougb Allah dag misenohob .
59001013	Doba sug ucina mog erij gini ainyen yen , hanoba eic dag yen yobsara aud sesar , kaba , yen yemahacugb gogom debin Allah dag enin eng ainyen yen aud sesar gin touwero . Doba yen yarges meijir dau gin namcir . Anai Allah , kaba , sud hom ingma emainyen en audi areg gecguero . Dara enin , kaba , en emainyen sud hom ingma aud sesar touwero .
59001014	Doba astesda sud hom , kaba , en medoc etrij dau enin medoc mes dous . Hang emahwan en aud areg gecgu . Anai en medoc etrij icira gin , kaba , dag digorobei naugb eica en toua .
59001015	Sug en aimo areg en medoc etrij icira ginohob , kaba , ahwan en naugb en obsara se sesar . Dara sug en aimo sesar ginohob , kaba , eic gomom dou en se dum smougb toua namcir .
59001016	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij gedig dan indoc gororougb yen , eigouhw naugb yen yemauwam an didi eisaugb Allah men geicara ginlo .
59001017	Anai en , kaba , en esinsin igda lona , dara igda loba , dara tebeij naugb sug len leic meruf touohob . Hang areg en esa dou maman dau bogo , kaba , hom emecgu touwero . Doba augwan eigouhw dara ecabeci namcir . Anai en emeineg dau maman , dara en emohw medigo dou maman deb se lobeigbogo touwero . Doba en eineg medoc aud maman terimda .
59001018	Hanoba en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb ogdoc en mer geica gin dou maman . Dauntoba maman madag mebin naugb areg en ahasesei augwan toua , aimo dau areg enin eng ogod an deinaugb mamanohob .
59001019	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij gedig dan indoc gororougb yen , sug Allah eigdoumesa yen dag mebin ogdoc en mer dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemeigdoumesa yenin meijoho naugb yen yemesai en mer eisaugb Krisdus gini dedemeda dou lusud touwero . Doba yen youman en mer gini terimda yen yecinaga men meijouhw augwan asesa nosahabi , yen yemedidib dou lusud gus toua . Yen meigdoc moc dougwo gin touwero , doba yen meigdoc eiseisan gin terimda .
59001020	Dara sug yen yebedbed en mer gin dou lusud , doba len lemeic yen meijir an gini se len merdoc mesero , kaba , yen meigdoc esrougb an len dedemeda touwero . Doba yen meigdoc eigouhw an len naugb yeigtou yateteij len terimda . Anai sug yen yens dau areg Allah en esedeb naugb lusud dara yen meigdoc esrougb an len , kaba , yen yemahwan len naugb len laimo areg Allah en esedeb naugb len gin touwero . Doba yen yedag sogo maga dougwo len namcir .
59001021	Dangg hang , yen yemaimo areg gecgu dara areg mog mog augwan dag gini toua deitero . Doba yen yerba augwan dau yen meigdoc mes . Hanoba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga naugb yen yeicara yaimo Allah en mer areg en esa se yen meigdoc mesohob gin toua terimda . Anai en mer gin , kaba , men goubesa inggebga naugb ahwan yen aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toua .
59001022	Dara sug yen youman Allah en mer gin , kaba , esloulougb medam naugb sug yen yemouman dousero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo en mer gin toua terimda . Anai sug yen youman Allah en mer , doba yen yemaimoro , kaba , gini aninim dag yen yaugwohosa yenin dau ucina geihwedaud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touohob .
59001023	Anai gareg en ouman dous , hanoba en emaimoro , kaba , en edag sud hom geiya en mena se sogomehir dag misen . Doba sug en arges sogo mehir debohob , kaba , en medoc moc dougwo en mena dedemeda namcir toua . Anai en emeiyahaiya debinbinero . Doba en eiya cum cum , dangga dous .
59001024	
59001025	Doba gareg en ogmac Allah en mer eisaugb Krisdus gini dara geigouhw namcir , hanoba en medoc moc dougwo areg en mer arougb en an gin touwero . Doba en aiyan medocesem naugb en aimo terimda , kaba , Allah eic geigouhw dou en se men geicara augwan toua namcir . Anai en mer gin , kaba , moho agas medam edreg dau gomnomna gus augwan namcir . Hang emedeinyum naugb sug emeigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwan . Dara ahwan maman terimda maman madebeij maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toua .
59001026	Dangga gareg dau yen en oudesa dag en aimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes augwan dag misenohob , kaba , eigouhw naugb en ebehnehino enin mers dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua . Anai gareg en eigdoumesa enin moho dag en aimo areg Allah arougb en an ginohob , hanoba en emebehnehino enin mers touwero . Doba en mers ogor naugb en enara ecgu dou lusud terimda , kaba , en emdec mera hom touwero . Doba men geicara augwan dag augwougb dous . Anai gini aninim dag en augwohosa enin dau ucina geihwedaud maireseb huhugb ginohob .
59001027	Doba gareg en eigdoumesa gogom areg eb debin debdes dara leng adougweni naugb en ousa len dag mogud . Hanoba en emaimo lusud gedig Bilis oiharaga len se cinogo aud areg gecgu touwero . Doba en ebehnehino enin medoc dougwo meren geicara augwan gin toua terimda , kaba , maman Mamina Allah eigdoumesa en moho dag en emedreg en mer hom touwero . Doba en aimo areg asesa enin medoc mes augwan dag misen namcirohob .
59002001	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus gedig en eigtou se gogouf cucugb dag misenohob , kaba , yen yemesi lusud aiyei touwero . Doba yen yeigdoumesa len laugwan meroho aninim dous .
59002002	Anai sug sud hom geg sansun geigouhw dara gob cincin dau emas se en mesira , en einesa meijen tuari . Dara sud hom geg sansun mecicgu einesa tuari ucan en naugb eis Ari toua .
59002003	Hanoba yen yeigdoumesa sud hom geg sansun gecabeci naugb yen yenara dou en dag en eigtou se maija moc moho agas . Doba yen yowun sud hom geg sansun ogor naugb yen yenara dou en dag en esa sunggahabi , era en eigtou se cinogo desij yen meijohora dous , kaba , gini dag yen yeigdoumesa lahwas maroho aninimohobei ? Naro , yen yowun sud hom geg sansun ogor en moho . Hanoba yen yesi sud hom mesoho mougb aiyei dau en touohob . Hang meijen gauwamara dara meijen geicara gin , kaba , augwan ecgu . Anai gin , kaba , eic dag yen yekeba goucimdeb hwai icira toua namcir .
59002004	
59002005	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij gedig dan indoc gororougb yen , eigouhw naugb yen youman dan indir ginahabi . Anai sug Allah ouci lusud debinim naugb len ledag enin men logodeh misen , kaba , en ouci leng merisoho mougb naugb ginei ? Naro , en emouci len ginero .
