Doba en ouci lusud areg leng se cinogo gin , kaba , len lowun lendag merunggwereij dara leng mecicgu dous . Anai len gin , kaba , len merdoc hom naugb len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus namcir . Hang en emebin len se men uro mes naugb en oiharaga len . Dara en eigdoumesa len meroho naugb en ogugwo mesoho mougb aingma aingma geb se bogo dou len toua . Anai gareg en medoc gororougb en , kaba , Allah os dag gini deb dou enohob .
59002006	Doba yen , kaba , yen yowun lentog merunggwereij gini len meroho , hanoba yen yeic len toua yacecim namcir . Anai yen yesi leng merisoho mougb aiyei dau lenohob . Doba gareg len logod yen naugb latagaij aremougb dau yen , hanoba len laiyan yen dara lahacugb gogom debin yen deseino sud hom gogod aremer aga lusuda ? Leng merunggwereijei ? Naro , leng merunggwereij lemeicara lemaimo dangga an yen touwero . Doba leng merisoho mougb dous eng leicara laimo dag gin an yen terimda .
59002007	Dara gareg en eic Krisdus moho gagas gedig Allah eic dou yenohob naugb sug oiharaga yen bacecim toua ? Leng merunggwereijei ? Naro , leng merunggwereij lemeicara mougwa hom dangga dou yen touwero . Doba leng merisoho mougb dous eng leicara laimo dag gin an yen dous .
59002008	Dangga yen yemowun leng merunggwereij meroho eb tainya mougwa hom touwero . Doba yen meigdoc gororougb lusud laugwan namcir . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , yen yaimo areg edag beim dara obosboro an len . Hang yen yaimo Allah men gomnomna hom geb taiba augwan dag misen touohob . Anai Surad Injil Meb Mohon arougb yen an , endagai : Yen meigdoc gororougb lusud laugwan , aninim dag yen meigdoc gororougb yenin toua namcir .
59002009	Doba sug yen yesi leng merisoho mougb aiyei dau leng merunggwereij dag gin terimda , kaba , gomnomna gini owun yen meijoho dag yen yebesesarohob .
59002010	Anai gareg dau yen en aimo Allah men gomnomna augwan terimda . Doba en edreg se aremer hom gin dous , kaba , gini aninim dag en edreg Allah men gomnomna gus augwan touohob .
59002011	Anai Allah emen dougwo maman dag maman mamsira ebsa ligida dousero . Doba en en dougwo maman dag maman mames dara mamohud lusud touwero . Dangga gareg dau yen en ebehnehino enin medoc mes dougwo ligida . Doba cum , kaba , en es len gus era en ohud len , kaba , en edreg dau Allah men gomnomna gus gus augwan toua namcirohob .
59002012	Dangga yen yemeic leng merisoho mougb aiyei dau leng merunggwereij touwero . Doba areg agunya dau yen meijirs dara meijen geicara an lusud , kaba , yen yaimo Allah men gomnomna hom geb taiba augwan gini an len terimda . Anai men gomnomna gin , kaba , edeinyum naugb eigdoc yen dau sesar men gogom augwan namcir . Hang sug en ogod aremer aga yen se lona daiyamo gacin , kaba , en aimo men gomnomna gini an meijen geicara augwan toua .
59002013	Dangga gareg en medoc emeineg an leng merunggwereij ginero . Doba en medoc agadgeij an len terimdohob , kaba , Allah medoc emeineg an en se lona daiyamo gacin touwero . Doba en medoc agadgeij an en naugb en ogod gogom medam debin en dous . Doba gareg en medoc eineg an leng merunggwereij gin terimda , kaba , Allah emogod gogom debin en touwero . Doba en eic geigouhw dou en namcir . Anai sug sud hom medoc eineg an lusud , kaba , men geicara geigouhw gini aiyan areg gogom dau enohob .
59002014	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij dara dan indamouwerij , yen yemarges dau sug yen meigdoc eineg an leng merunggwereij gin touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo dag gin terimda . Anai gareg dau yen en eigdoumesa en moho dag en medoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag misenohob , hanoba en emeicara geigouhw debin ginero . Doba en medoc agadgeij an mesir len gus namcir , kaba , en medoc ebdebin an Krisdus gin , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug Allah eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou enei ? Naro , emedeinyum naugb sug Allah eic maireseb huhugb dou en touwero .
59002015	Anai sug sud hom dau yen , kaba , en eiya en maguna hom , era en medamouwa hom eg sansun mecicgu dara men ared ingma emeb naugb enero . Doba en ohw mer misen dou en . Hanoba en enara baseda en , endagai : Allah eseyeiyo ban naugb sug ban beda , kaba , ban bedeg sansun gesrougb dara ban betara beiceb toua , kaba , gini emeigouhw dagiro ? Anai sug sud hom gohw mer dou len dag gini dous , kaba , emedeinyum naugb sug Allah eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou en touwero . Doba en asid en deb dig medigo namcir . Anai sud hom gin , kaba , men ara ara inggebga . Doba en medoc agadgeij an mesir naugb en emousa lenero .
59002016	
59002017	Dangga gareg en medoc ebdebin an Krisdus , doba men geicara emaimo debin gin naugb en ousa lusud dara ara ara touwero , kaba , en medoc ebdebin an gin , kaba , dag omom dau enohob . Hang emahwan en aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touwero .
59002018	Doba sud hom dau yen , kaba , en etaha dan an areg dan dog dou yen graga , endagai : Ligbum , kaba , len merdoc ebdebin an Allah dous . Doba ligbum , kaba , len laimo areg edag beim an lusud toua . Hwas gini edeinyumohob . Doba dan dauni dou ban , dendagai : Sug ban bemeicara bemaimo areg edag beim dara obosboro an lusudero , kaba , dagiro , naugwe hang , ban bens dou lusud dag ban abdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag misenohoba ? Naro , ban bemens dou lenero . Doba sug dan daimo areg geigouhw an lusud dag gin terimda , kaba , dan dens danin ainyes dou len dag dan indoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag misen naugb ginohob .
59002019	Ban abdoc eica Allah dag enin dous eng Allah misenei ? Ban abdoc eica dag gin , kaba , eigouhw namcir . Doba merna mog mog , kaba , len toua merdoc eica Allah dag en edag Allah misen hom gin dous . Dangga len merdoc ahau dau en toua . Anai len lemaimo areg geigouhw an lusud debin ginero . Doba len leicara laimo areg gecgu an len terimda . Hang len lecinaga dag Allah esedeb gogom medam deinaugb len touohob .
59002020	Dangga hang , areg ban ben dou graga , kaba , dag sud hom mou edgom namcirohob . Anai sud hom gareg en medoc ebdebin an Krisdus , hanoba en emeicara geigouhw debin ginero , kaba , en emec mera maireseb menau geb huhugb gini touwero . Ban bouwan naugb dan dens gansins hwai debin gin dou ban toua , dauntoba ban becinaga dag misen namcir .
59002021	Anai maman mamjemouwa Abraham , kaba , Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou en dau sug en medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou en dousei ? Era dau sug en esedeb naugb en eic en meisi Isag bauwaharo debin gin dou Allah touei ? Naro , Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou en sug en esedeb naugb en eic en meisi bauwaharo debin en medoc ebdebin an gini dou en touohob .
59002022	Dangga hang , Abraham medoc emebdebin an areg Allah os dou en dousero . Doba sug en medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou enohob , kaba , en eicara baimo areg Allah arougb en an debin gin toua . Sug en eic men geicara geigouhw baos dara dag ginohob , kaba , eic dag en medoc ebdebin an gin toua edeinyum namcir . Hang emedeinyum naugb sug Allah emeic gesgigouhwesa dou en toua . Naro , kab , naro . Ban abdoc eica ginohobei ? Era anambei ?
59002023	Anai augwan gini esogwa deisa areg Surad Injil Meb Mohon ouma debin gin deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Abraham medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou en naugb en aimo toua terimda . Hang Allah emeic gesgigouhwesa dou en . Dara en emeija en dag en mesi misen toua .
59002024	Aremer graga augwan , kaba , ens ainyes dou maman dag Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou lusud emogdoc sug len merdoc ebdebin an en dousero . Doba ogdoc sug len leicara laimo geigouhw debin gin touahabi .
59002025	Dangga toua , dara gida hom gedig en maga eijouhw , en moho Rahab . Allah eic gesgigouhwesa dou en emogdoc sug en medoc ebdebin an areg Allah os dou leng Israel eisaugb cinogo Kanaan gin dousero . Doba ogdoc sug en eicara geigouhw baos dara gin toua . Anai sug lahwai dau leng Israel lan laihweda se meren cinogo Yeriko naugb ladogmac cinogo ingga , kaba , en ebin lan se men tu . Dara en ecgoneh lan toua . Hanoba en edidib ucina susugb dou lan , dauntoba lan lamagasa sadodor dau cinogo ingga touwero .
59002026	Dangga gareg en medoc ebdebin an Krisdusohob , doba men geicara geigouhw emaos dara ginero , kaba , men medoc gebdebin an gini emedeinyum naugb sug Allah eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou enero . Doba dag omom dous , aninim dag maga emec augwougb dau enin touwero . Doba sug mena einesa , hang emeic goubesa dou maga naugb emec mohora toua . Naro , kaba , maga omom namcir .
59003001	Dan indagunerij dara dan indamouwerij , deciciji dau sug leinyana dau yen len merdoc erleij naugb len ledidib Allah mer men meijouhw dou lusud . Anai yen yecinaga dag se Lona Sug Allah Ogod Aremer Aga Lusud , kaba , en ogod aremer aga maman gedig maman madidib aremeijouhw dou lusud edreg dau maman mamsir leng Krisden gus laugwan toua .
59003002	Anai maman maugwan , kaba , maman mabesesar ogdoc maman mamirs mougwa einyanohob . Doba sug sud hom areg dag sesar emagunya dau en mers gin deitero , kaba , gini ansins dag en edag lusud mos se Krisdusohob . Hang men goubesa inggebga naugb sug en ebehnehino enin maga gus augwan dougwo areg gecgu augwan namcir toua .
59003003	Dara yen yeiya dau maman geicara dou kuda gin touahabi . Anai sug maman mauwan naugb kuda aimo maman mamir , kaba , maman maic aumaga macba kuda mers . Hanoba sug maman maseranohob , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug maman mahwan kuda maga augwan dig gacda , dig ginin , toua terimda .
59003004	Dara yen yauwam an kapal . Anai kapal maga , kaba , toua medam gougwa . Dara loungmen medam eisa naugb oto kapal dara goubesa toua . Doba gurei mogurei edeinyum naugb auti kapal mebes aimo dau areg sud hom gos gurei en ouwan dous .
59003005	Dangga toua , maman mamtemouwu , kaba , mogurei dous . Doba edeinyum naugb sug maman maimiman mamanin an aremer medam deseino lusud terimda . Dara yen yauwam an dau sug lusud len lasaih smougb toua . Anai aimougtut , kaba , smougb gini mogurei dous . Doba cum , kaba , edeinyum naugb ait lomos augwan bouwa namcir .
59003006	Dara maman mamtemouwu gin , kaba , toua aninim dag smougb gini . Dara aninim dag mougt mera medam gedig en mog mog namcir naugb en arautut lusud laugwan . Dauntoba len lemaimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes touwero . Doba len ledreg dau en mer gin terimda . Anai sug en eb se maman mamaga dag gin , kaba , en oho areg gecgu debin maman mamaga . Hanoba eic gogor dou lusud se cinogo augwan toua namcir . Hang men meiyo gin , kaba , emen dau eninero . Doba en dau Bilis se dum smougb dous .
59003007	Dangga astesda aremeta geb se lomesmes , dara ba , dara aremeta gagrigrilo , dara areg geb se dum mohu , kaba , maman goubesa inggebga naugb maman maosnih len laugwan . Hanoba maman maicara dag gin an len touohob .
59003008	Doba maman mamtemouwu , kaba , sud hom ingma dau maman en emosnihero . Anai atij an aregua namcirohob . Hang en aninim dag sud hom gemehigdoc touwero . Doba en mohora esesa dinga dingada naugb en edoho aremer gecgu debin lusud laugwan toua terimda .
59003009	Dara ogdoc maman mamtemouwu gin , kaba maman maic naugb magahugouhw an maman Adehsud gedig en edag maman Mamina . Dara maic naugb maman mauwara an lusud , dauntoba Allah eic gecgu dou len gedig en esinsin len se men obob aninim dag maman touohob .
59003010	Dangga dara maman mamirs hom gin , kaba , maman magahugouhw an Allah . Dara maman macgeij en naugb en eic gogom dou lusud toua . Doba , dan indagunerij dara dan indamouwerij , augwan gini emeigouhwero . Hang yen yemaimo touwero , doba yen yarges dau namcir .
59003011	Anai duhu getougtoro dara duhu gedougdaha , kaba , hwas ohw dau duhu mer homei ? Naro , hwas emohw dau duhu mer hom touwero .
59003012	Dara sogo moho ara , kaba , era mera dag sogo moho saitun , era sogo moho anggur , kaba , era mera dag sogo moho ara gin touei ? Naro . Dangga toua , sug duhu gedougdaha ebsa duhu mer , kaba , dagiro duhu getougtoro agunya dau duhu mer hom gina ?
59003013	Gareg dau yen en mou ouforoho naugb en edidib meijouhw dau Surad Injil Meb dou lusud , hanoba en mou auti naugb en ecinaga areg geigouhw dara areg gecgu , kaba , en emaimo areg gecgu an lusud toua deitero . Doba en aimo areg edag beim dara obosboro an len dous . Dara en emeimiman enin an gin deseino len touwero . Doba en edidib augwan gini dou len dara en medoc arjaga an dou len terimda . Anai sug en eicara dag gini , kaba , en ens enin ainyes dou lusud dag en mou ouforoho dara en mou auti dag misen namcirohob .
59003014	Doba sug yen yeclul an , hanoba yen meigdoc edougdaha anim , dara yen yed yenin deseino len gus toua terimda , kaba , yen yemereiyara dag augwan gini aimo ucina se geica . Dara yen yemeigdoumesa yenin meijoho an gin touwero . Doba yen yarges dau namcir .
59003015	Anai mou ouforoho naugb gin , kaba , emen dau Allah se bogo . Dara Mena Gogoufu emarautut yen se gin touwero . Doba en dau Bilis dara lusud gedig en oiharaga len se cinogo gin dous .
59003016	Hang emahwan yen aud areg geigouhw touwero . Doba ahwan yen aud areg gecgu mogud namcir . Anai sug yen yediseijim , dara yen yed yenin deseino len gus dag gin terimda , kaba , cum ahwan yen naugb yen yenara edregim . Hanoba eic areg gecgu aingma aingma debin yen toua terimda .
59003017	Doba mou ouforoho gen dau bogo , kaba , ahwan maman aimougtut naugb sug maman maimo areg ecabeci dara esgiraha anim . Dara maic gesgigouhwesem gin dous . Dara sug aremer inggebga , kaba , emahwan maman naugb maman maic mamus dara mamed mamanin deseino lusud touwero . Doba ahwan maman naugb maman mamus obsara an . Dara maman maimo areg edeinyum an len toua . Hang ahwan maman naugb sug maman mamdoc eineg an len . Dara maman mara mera geigouhw an len laugwan toua . Dangga hang , maman mamesi leng merisoho mougb aiyei touwero . Doba maman mausa leng leb se hugaiyebeiya laugwan toua terimda . Dara mou ouforoho dau bogo , kaba , emahwan maman naugb maman mameicara mamarerei lusud meriresi touwero . Doba se maman geicara augwan , kaba , maman maimo areg se geica an len dous .
59003018	Anai gareg en esedeb se enin medoc mes naugb en eic gesgigouhwesa dou lusud se aremer augwan . Hanoba en eba meij dag gin toua terimda , kaba , cum , en era mera areg asesa Allah enin medoc augwan touohob .
59004001	Dangga yen yemaimo areg yen meigdoc etrij icira gin toua deitero . Doba yen yaiyan augwan gini dau yen meigdoc mes namcir . Anai sug yen yenara ucucugb anim dara yogodim , kaba , augwan gini en dau sug yen meigdoc ebtouei ? Naro augwan gini emen dau ginero . Doba en dau sug yen meigdoc etrij icira lusud meren aremer se cinogo gin dous .
59004002	Dangga hang , yen yemeigtou yemateteij len touwero . Doba sug yen meigdoc etrij icira dag ginohob , kaba , yen yehilon ucina naugb sug yen yohud len dau meren aremougb . Dara eic dag yen yedim dara yogodim naugb sug yen yesma meren aremougb dau len toua . Anai yen meigdoc ediseijim terimda . Dobnaro . Meijen geicara augwan gin , kaba , emeic dag yen yesma ara ara touwero . Anai augwan gin , kaba , dau sug yen yemacgeij dau Allah an nosahabero . Doba ogdoc meijen geicara gecgu gin dous .
59004003	Dara sug yen yacgeij en an ara ara , kaba , en emeic dou yen touwero . Doba en ecgun mesira debin gin dau yen namcir . Anai areg yen yacgeij dau en gin , kaba , naugb areg yen meigdoc etrij icira gini dous . Hang meijen gauwamara augwan gin , kaba , ecgu namcir touohob .
59004004	Meijen geicara augwan gin , kaba , aninim dag gida gedig en medoc emakebin mesuwa toua deitero . Doba en maga eijouhw naugb en ohw en maga dou ligiji gusohob . Anai gareg en medoc dag hom dara lusud gedig Bilis oiharaga len se cinogo gin , kaba , en medoc dag hom dara Allah toua deitero . Doba en edag men moc dous . Yen yemecinaga gineroei ? Naro , yen yecinaga augwan gini dag misenohob . Dangga hang , gareg en medoc etrij naugb en medoc dag hom dara lusud se cinogo gin , kaba , en ens enin ainyes dag en edag Allah men moc toua namcirohob .
59004005	Augwan gini aimo dau areg Surad Injil Meb Mohon enara eisaugb gin deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Maman mamin areg Allah eic dou mamanohob , kaba , arautut maman aud areg maman mamdoc etrij icira dara goubesa terimda .
59004006	Doba Allah medoc an maman . Hang en eic goubesa edreg dau maman mamin men goubesa gini dou maman touohob . Anai Surad Injil Meb Mohon enara , endagai : Gareg en medoc agas , kaba , en edag sogo maga dougwo sud hom gin namcir . Doba gareg en owun enin medoc mes arjaga , kaba , Allah medoc an en naugb emousa en se aremer augwan toua . Yen youdesa dag areg Surad Injil Meb Mohon enara gin , kaba , en enara augwougb dousei ? Naro , yen yecinaga dag areg en enara gin , kaba , dag misen namcirohob .
59004007	Sug Allah men mobisamougb eb naugb yen dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemeic meijus dou en naugb yen yaimo areg yen meigdoc etrij icira gin toua deitero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga naugb yen yaimo areg asesa enin medoc mes dous . Hanoba yen yemaimo Bilis aud areg en arautut yen an gin touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem dougwo en mer terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , en emougbdedau yen toues .
59004008	Dangga hang , yen yemeigtou aigus dau Allah toua deitlo . Doba yen yen aud en , dauntoba yen meigdoc dag hom dara en ucugb deit . Anai sug yen yen aud en , kaba , en en aud yen toua . Hanoba yen yemaimo areg gecgu gin toua deitero . Doba yen yarges dau , anai yen yebesesar terimdohob . Dara yen meigdoc hwai hwai an en touwero . Doba yen yerba augwan gin dau yen meigdoc mes . Hanoba yen yaimo Allah men ucina dara yen meigdoc hom toua namcir .
59004009	Dara yen yemaimo areg yen meigdoc agahugouhw an . Dara eic yen meigdoc eigouhw dou yen gin toua deitero . Doba yen meigdoc ogbogpo an yenin , kaba , yen yeb an dareg yen meigdoc esdigeij meijen sesar augwan toua namcir .
59004010	Hanoba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga deseino maman Adehsud Allah naugb yen yesga meijen sesar augwan moho asesa dou en toua . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , en emeigdoumesa yen meijoho agas deseino en toua deit .
59004011	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , yen yemecic yen meijoho gouhw genes dara yen yemowunim eisaugb meijen geicara ucucugb touwero . Doba yen yarges dau namcir . Anai gareg en eicara dag graga an en maguner dara en medamouwer se Krisdus , kaba , en owun Allah men gomnomna . Hang en edag sud hom geic Allah men gomnomna gini bacecim touohob . Anai men gomnomna gin , kaba , arougb maman naugb sug maman mamdoc gororougwim dous . Dangga sug yen yowun Allah men gomnomna dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemaimo Allah men gomnomna gini dag misen toua deiterohob . Doba yen yeigdoumesa yenin meijoho dag sud hom gedig en ogod an Allah men gomnomna gini dag emeigouhw touwero .
59004012	Dobnaro . Anai Allah enin dous eng moho agas edeinyum naugb sug en eic gomnomna dou maman . Dara enin dous eng men goubesa inggebga naugb sug en ogod aremer aga maman toua . Hang enin dous eng men goubesa inggebga naugb sug en emeic mor mor dou lusud , era emeigdoc len dau dum smougb toues . Doba sug Allah enin dous eng men goubesa inggebga naugb augwan ginohob , kaba , dagiro naugwe hang , yen yeigdoumesa yenin meijoho naugb yen yogod ara ara an yen meijaguner dara meigdamouwer se Krisdus dag gina ? Yen yedag Allah , hang yen yemowun len ginei ? Naro , yen yemedag Allah touwero .
59004013	Dara yeng yehilon aremougb , kaba , yen youman dan indir an areg dan den dou yen gini deigeigouhw namcir toua . Anai yen yeigdoumesa yenin meijoho an meijen geicara toua terimda , yendagai : Irogini , era lonehibi , kaba , emen emeihwedig cinogo hom . Hanoba emen emdohwara sungga se arisogomoc hom naugb emen emdehilon aregoufu ingma touahabi .
59004014	Dobnaro . Yen yemecinaga an loneg areg obsara debin yenero . Anai yen meijireseb dag ara ? Yen meijireseb aninim dag lohos moro eisa cum , dangga dous . Doba cum , kaba , osahabaha ucugb dangga .
59004015	Dangga hang , yen yemeigdoumesa yenin meijoho an meijen geicara se lona daiyamo gacin touwero . Doba yen yenara doum dag gini , yendagai : Sug maman Adehsud en ouwan , kaba , emen emireseb , naugb emen emohwara sugini , era se cinogo gusahabi . Naro , kab , naro .
59004016	Dobnaro . Yen meigdoc agas , hanoba yen yeimiman yenin an meijen geicara se lona daiyamo gacin deseino lusud toua terimda . Hang meijen gauwamara augwan , kaba , ecgu namcirohob .
59004017	Dangga gareg en ecinaga areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes naugb en aimo , hanoba en eic mos naugb en emaimoro , doba en amsoho namcir , kaba , gini aninim dag en ebesesar touohob .
59005001	Dara yeng meijisoho mougb , kaba , yen toua youman dan indir an areg dan den dou yen gin deigeigouhw namcir . Dauntoba yen yemeija meijuwesa meijen aremougb gin terimlo . Doba yen meigdoc ohwohu dara yeb an yenin teitei . Anai lona gacin , kaba , Allah esa ara gogom en baiyan yen dangga .
59005002	Anai meijen aremougb augwan , kaba , etaha . Dara meijen minc , kaba , agur et .
59005003	Dara meijen emas dara perag , kaba , prab et augwan touohob . Dangga hang , se Lona Sug Allah Ogod Aremer Aga Lusud , kaba , prab gini emet yen yaugwan toues , aninim dag smougb ait lusud laugwan louwa namcir toua . Anai se Lona ingga , kaba , prab gini edag sud hom naugb ehin merisa yen dag yen yemagaha yen meisira an meijen aremougb gini dou leng merunggwereij touwero . Doba yen meigdoc agadgeij an len . Hanoba yen yob augwan gin deb naugb yenin dous .
59005004	Dara yen youman dan indir an areg dan den dou yen gin deigeigouhw deit . Anai leng leic merug erij dou yen se meijen lo , kaba , yen yerei len . Hanoba yen yemeic meren siouwa dou len touwero . Doba yen yesedi meren siouwa dau len toua terimdohob . Dangga leng louci meijen areg geb se lo debinim se meijen tu meij gin , kaba , len leiyagarij Allah naugb en ousa len . Hang meren geiyagarij gin , kaba , edebeij en touohob . Hang en emauni gogom medam dou yen toues . Anai en , kaba , en edag mougt mera medam naugb areg geb se bogo augwan toua namcir .
59005005	Dara yen , kaba , yen yemarges dau areg yen meigdoc agahugouhw an , dara geic yen meigdoc eigouhw dou yen augwan se cinogo gin touwero . Doba yen yogo ara gaihim , hanoba yen yaimo augwan gini ucucugb terimda toua . Hang gini dag yen yod aror se yenin dag hweij mering moto moto debohob . Doba deb naugb lona sug Allah eic gomom dou yen dous , aninim dag hweij sug lusud lod aror se en toua .
59005006	Dara yen yemogo ara gaihim dousero . Doba yen yoho yas lusud deseino sud hom gogod aremer an lusud . Hanoba yen yeic cicmogo dou en naugb en eic gomom dou len touohob . Dobnaro . Len gedig yen yoho yas len gin , kaba , meren geicara gecgu hom dou yen touwero . Doba len merdoc ogoufu namcir . Anai len lemen dougwo yen se aremer hom touwero . Doba len ledag ara gosum naugb yen dous .
59005007	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug Allah esedeb gogom naugb leng merisoho mougb dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemobsara dau men ucina gin sug len leic mog erij dou yen touwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij dara yeigtou yateteij terimda Lona Sug Maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus En Ecicugwen . Aninim dag sud hom areg en es meijohob , kaba , en emera mera dou en se lona ingga touwero . Doba en eigtou ateteij naugb sug Allah esa los debin meij gini sug aimougtut dara lona daiyamo gacinahabi , en emera mera dou en toua .
59005008	Sug sud hom geba meij en eigtou ateteij naugb Allah esa los debin meij dag gin , kaba , yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij dara yeigtou yateteij namcir toua . Anai Lona Naugb Sug Maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus En Ecicugwen gin , kaba , ebeij deinyorohob .
59005009	Dara sug aremer eb debin yen dag gin , kaba , yen yemenara ucucugb anim . Hanoba yen yemahacugb gogom debinim touwero . Doba yen yarges dau namcir . Dauntoba se lona gacin , kaba , Allah emowun yen , hanoba en emogod gogom debin yen touwero . Doba en amsoho yen namcir . Anai men Lona Naugb Sug En Ogod Aremer Aga Lusud gin , kaba , ebeij deinyor touohob . Yen youman dan indir an areg dan den dou yen gini deigeigouhw namcir toua .
59005010	Dara yen meigdoc moc dougwo leng leperwei maman Adehsud en mohw naugb len lesai en moro sug nosa an meren geicara gin touwero . Doba yen meigdoc eiseisan len toua . Anai len ledag gansins dou maman dau lusud gedig len lemobsara dau ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba len laiyan merdocesem naugb len les agadgeij namcirohob .
59005011	Sug len les agadgeij dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamowun len meroho an gini touwero . Doba maman maigdoumesa len meroho an gin toua namcir . Anai lusud lecic dau Ayub men geicara dou yen dag en toua aimo ucina mog erij medam sug nosa touohob . Hanoba yen yecinaga dag en emobsara dau sug en medoc ebdebin an maman Adehsud gin touwero . Doba en aiyan medocesem naugb en es agadgeij terimda . Dangga hang , maman Adehsud medoc emagadgeij an en touwero . Doba sug Ayub aimo ucina mog erij gini terimda edebeij sug ouwedocohob , kaba , maman Adehsud eigdoc en dau mog erij augwan gin toua . Anai maman Adehsud gin , kaba , en medoc eigouhw . Hanoba en medoc eineg an maman toua namcirohob .
59005012	Doba dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , aremer gesloulougb edreg dau aremer gus augwan namcir , kaba , dag yen yemou areg geb se bogo , dara areg geb se cinogo , dara areg gus augwan len meroho debin areg yen yos dou lusud , dara debin meijen aremer gus gus augwan touwero . Doba sug aremer misenohob , kaba , yen yenara , endag : You . Era sug misenero , kaba , yen yauni , endag : Naro . Anai sug yen youwara dougwo meijen aremer , era yen youwara debin areg yen yos dou lusudohob , hanoba yen yemaimo ginero , era misen touwero , kaba , cum , Allah ogod aremer gogom deinaugb yen namcir .
59005013	Dangga toua , sug sud hom dau yen en aimo ucina mog erij , era areg gecgu eb naugb en touohob , kaba , en emenara ucucugb an ginlo . Doba en ocuncum dou Allah naugb gin dous . Era sug sud hom en medoc ebtouohob , kaba , en emeigtou augwougb touwero . Doba en agahugouhw an Allah terimda toua .
59005014	Era sug sud hom dau yen en areba , kaba , en emeigtou augwougb touwero . Doba en acgeij mougtir se goucimdeb naugb len len aud en , dauntoba len lehin mani se en maga . Hanoba len locuncum dou Allah aga en , aimo dau areg maman Adehsud en mer ogod an gin deb naugb len . Anai len leperwei en mohw naugb ginohob .
59005015	Sug len locuncum dou maman Adehsud dara len merdoc ebdebin an naugwohob , kaba , en eic geingmos agauwesa dou sud hom gin ucugb . Dara sesar areg en aimohob , kaba , en aigdougwo augwan gini ediyebeiya dau en toua .
59005016	Dangga hang , sug meijen sesar eic dag areba an yenohob , kaba , yen yemecgoneh meijen sesar gin daum touwero . Doba yen yesga doum . Hanoba yen yocuncum anim ucucugb toua . Dauntoba aremeba yen touwero . Doba Allah eic geingmos agauwesa dou yen ucugb deit . Anai gareg en medoc edag beim deseino Allah naugb en aimo areg asesa enin medoc mes augwan namcirohob , kaba , men goubesa inggebga naugb en eic ara ara dau Allah toua terimda .
59005017	Augwan gini aninim dag Elias men geicara sug nosa . Anai en , kaba , en toua dau maman masud misen . Doba sug en acgeij Allah dauntoba los emes se leng Israel meren hancob ginero , kaba , Allah ouf misis se bogo dougwo los toua . Anai en emacgeij augwougwero . Doba en acgeij dara medoc ebdebin an namcir . Hang los emes se meren hancob se arisogomoc homoi mougwu toua deitero .
59005018	Dauwohob , kaba , en acgeij Allah naugb los es ucugb deit . Hang sir emeb se leng Israel meren hancob toua deitero . Doba ared dara sogo mera dara ara gus gus augwan , kaba , eb naugb len terimda . Anai Allah ec misis se bogo , hanoba los es deitohob .
59005019	Dangga dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug sud hom dau yen en obsara dau ucina misen ginohob , kaba , yen yemamsoho en touwero . Doba yen yahwan en ucugb dedemeda .
59005020	Anai gareg dau yen en ahwan sud hom gebesesar dau ucina gecgu gin , kaba , yen yecinaga dag sud hom gini eigdoc en dau gomom ucugb touohob . Hanoba en ousa en naugb Allah aigdougwo men sesar areg en aimohob augwan ediyebeiya dau en toua .
60001001	Surad gini dau dang , Petrus , anai Yesus Krisdus enin eng eigdoumesa dan . Hanoba en arougb dan naugb dan desai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb en dou lusud laugwan toua . Dan dog surad gini dou yeng yedag irinya se Pontus , Galatia , Kapadokia , Asia , dara Bitania meren hancob yen yaugwan . Anai maman Mamina Allah en ecinaga deb dau sug yen youman Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gin , kaba , dag yen yemesbes an en mer gin touwero . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en terimda . Sug en ecinaga augwan deb dag ginohob , kaba , en ouci yen deb toua , aimo dau areg enin esedeb dangga naugb yen sug acgunogohob . Hanoba Mena Gogoufu ouci yen debinim dag Allah enin men lusud . Dauntoba sug Yesus Krisdus en mogwihi edu yen meigdoc mes ecabeci dau sesar augwanohob , kaba , yen yemohoiya en mer toua deitero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga naugb yen yaimo en mer se areg en arougb yen an gin toua terimda . Dangga hang , dan dacgeij Allah naugb en medoc eigouhw an yen beiseisaugb namcir . Dara en eseyeiyo yen dara en eic gesgigouhwesa dou yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan terimda toua .
60001002	
60001003	Eigouhw naugb maman man sijo dou maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus en Mena Allah gin besesa terimda . Anai sug en medoc eineg an maman beiseisaugb namcir dag ginohob , kaba , maman mamomom toua deitero . Doba en eigdoumesa maman dau gomom aud maireseb menau gin touohob . Dara maman macinaga dag maireseb menau gin , kaba , emediyebeiya dau maman touwero . Doba eb naugb maman beb huhugb namcir . Anai maman macinaga dau sug Yesus Krisdus en omom sug nosa , kaba , dag en emomom terimda touwero . Doba Allah eigdoumesa en dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touohob . Hang emeic dag maman maod mamina debsa Allah an gin dag buc gototo toua namcir .
60001004	Dangga hang , yen yemeija meijuwesa en an areg en esedeb naugb men lusud yen gin touwero . Doba sug en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou yen dag ginohob , kaba , yen yod meijina debsa en dag en emeic augwan gini dou yen toues . Anai en obdeb augwan gini se bogo naugb yenohob . Hang emetaha , dara emogor , dara emombrerij dau yen touwero . Doba ebsugeb naugb yen terimda .
60001005	Anai sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus dag ginohob , kaba , Allah esedougwo yen dara men goubesa namcir . Dauntoba yen yemobsara dau ucina aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo ucina gini terimda edebeij Lona Sug Ouwedoc gin toua . Anai en esedeb naugb sug en ens dau maireseb menau geb huhugb gini eb ainyes se Lona ingga dou yen toues . Hang areg en esedeb se bogo naugb yenohob gin , kaba , hom emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba en esedougwo augwan naugb yen terimda .
60001006	Dangga hang , sug aremer aingma aingma eb naugb yen , kaba , yen meigdoc emeijesan gin touwero . Doba sug Allah esedeb areg geb se bogo augwan naugb yen dag ginohob , kaba , yen meigdoc erleij icira gin namcir sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin toua . Anai gogom gin , kaba , eisa bainyen yen cum cum dangga dous , aimo dau areg Allah enin eng esedeb naugb yenohob .
60001007	Anai en eicara dag gini dou yen , dauntoba yen yens yenin ainyes dou en dag yen meigdoc ebdebin an en dag misenohobei ? Era dag aibibra dousei ? Anai sug lusud louwan lecinaga emas misen , kaba , len lec se smougb toua . Sug edag emas misenohob , kaba , smougb emait touwero . Doba sug emedag emas misenero , kaba , cum smougb ait bediyebeiya namcir . Dangga hang , sug lusud lainyen emas misen dag ginohob , kaba , Allah ainyen yen toua . Dauntoba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij terimda . Anai emas misen gin , kaba , cum ediyebeiya dous . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an gin , kaba , mera eisaugb bedreg dau emas misen gin namcir . Dangga hang , sug Allah en eiya dag yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij ginero , doba yen yes agadgeij naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an en terimdohob , kaba , eic dag en eimiman dau meijen geicara gini se Lona sug en ens Yesus Krisdus ainyes dou lusud laugwan toua . Hanoba en ogugwo men gogouf cucugb ingma dou yen . Dara en eigdoumesa yen meijoho agas se Lona ingga toua namcir .
60001008	Sug nosa , kaba , yen yemeiya Yesus gini en mog mougwa hom touwero . Doba yen meigdoc gororougb enohob . Dara iteitogini , kaba , yen yemeiya en touebma . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en terimda . Dangga hang , eic dag yen meigdoc erleij dara agahugouhw medam an en bedreg dau areg yen yecic dou lusud gini toua namcir .
60001009	Anai yen yecinaga dau sug yen yemobsara dau Krisdusero . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en terimda , kaba , dag maireseb menau geb huhugb emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba Allah emeic dou yen toues .
60001010	Eisaugb maireseb menau geb huhugb gin , kaba , leng lesai Allah en moro sug nosa len logmac . Hanoba len lesa lauweila dougwo namcir naugb len lecinaga meijouhw dau augwan gini asesa toua . Anai len lens deb dau areg geigouhw gini gedig Allah esedeb naugb yen dou lusud sug nosa touohob .
60001011	Len leicara dag gin , anai sug Krisdus esa Mena Gogoufu se len merdoc mes sug nosa , kaba , en enara dou len deb , endagai : Cum , kaba , sud hom en emagunya debin yen . Hanoba en aimo ucina mog erij naugb yen , dauntoba en eigdoc yen dau sesar men gogom augwan . Dauwohob , kaba , Allah emeigdoumesa en moho agas medam ucugb toues . Dangga hang , sug len louman dau ginohob , kaba , len meru laisa naugb len lecinaga dau areg Mena Gogoufu ens dou lenohob meijouhw augwan asesa toua . Hanoba len leijidougwo Allah an gin toua , lendagai : Areg Mena Gogoufu en ens dou emen endag sud hom en emen naugb en eigdoc emen dau sesar men gogom augwan , kaba , gini naugb emen touei ? Era naugb lusud se lona daiyamo gacin dousei ?
60001012	Doba Allah auni dou len dag areg len lesai gin , kaba , emousa len se lona inggaro . Doba eb naugb yeng daiyamo gin dous . Dara areg Mena Gogoufu ens deb dou len sug nosa ingga , kaba , yen youman dau augwan gini dag misen touohob . Anai Allah esa en dau bogo . Hanoba en eic mou ouforoho dara goubesa dou leng lesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus naugb len ledidib meijouhw dau augwan gini asesa dou yen touohob . Dara leng lesai Allah en moro sug nosa , kaba , len louwan lecinaga dau meijouhw augwan gin dousero . Doba malaikadir len toua louwan lecinaga meijouhw dau augwan gini asesa toua . Dobnaro .
60001013	Dangga hang , sug Allah en esedeb areg geigouhw augwan deb naugb yen dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemeisan gurog touwero . Doba yen yesedeb yen meigdoc mes dara yen meiju naugb yen yaimo areg geigouhw toua terimda . Hanoba yen meiju auti ucina aud maireseb menau geb huhugb . Dara yen yod meijina debsa Allah an areg en os dou yenohob dara yen meigdoc augwan toua namcir . Anai se Lona sug en ens Yesus ainyes dou lusud , kaba , en emogugwo areg geigouhw gini dou yen toues .
60001014	Dara yen yemeicara yemaiga Allah men hancob touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo en an areg en arougb yen an gini terimda . Hang yen yemaimo areg yen meigdoc etrij icira aud areg gecgu hom toua deitero . Doba se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yeicara yaimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes dous . Aninim dag Allah enin toua emaimo areg gecgu touwero . Doba se men geicara augwan , kaba , en aimo areg gedag beim dara obosboro an lusud toua terimda . Yen yeicara dag gini terimda , anai se lona sug yen yemecinaga en dag misenbuma , kaba , yen yaimo areg gecgu ginohob .
60001015	
60001016	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg Allah arougb maman an se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Indan geicara augwan ecabeci namcirohob . Dangga hang , meijen geicara augwan , kaba , ecabeci namcir toua .
60001017	Dara Allah gin , kaba , en emobsara aud sud hom touwero . Doba sug en ogod aremer aga lusud , kaba , en ogod augwan gini dara en medoc edag beim an gin terimda , aimo dau meren geicara an len toua . Dangga sug yen meijireseb sousougb se cinogo ginaba , kaba , yen yaimo areg en ouwan dareg yen meigdoc ahau dau en toua namcir . Anai sug yen yocuncum dou en , kaba , yen yeigdoumesa en moho dag yen Meijina ginohob .
60001018	Hang yen yemedreg dau en mer gin mougwa hom touwero . Doba yen yeicara yaimo augwan gini dara yen meigdoc hom terimda . Anai yen yecinaga dau sug Krisdus encoho aga yen sug nosa , kaba , en emeic areg getaha dag emas era perag naugb en emancoho aga yen touwero . Doba en eic enin dag domba gedig mougb mogud . Hanoba ecabeci namcir naugb en eigdoc yen dau yen meijemouwer meren gomnomna ogdoc en mogwihi mera eisaugb gin dous . Anai areg len lomnomnan deb naugb yen gin , kaba , mera emeisaugwero . Doba dag augwougb namcir .
60001019	
60001020	En , kaba , Allah emouci en dau iteitogin touwero . Doba en ouci en deb naugb gini sug en emahasesei cinogo dara bogo touebma . Dangga se Lona Gouwedoc gin , hang Allah emesa en ainyes se cinogo gini naugb en ousa yen . Dauntoba en eigdoc yen dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toua .
60001021	Ogdoc en , hang yen yemod meijina debsa Allah an areg gin augwan touohob . Hang gini emedag augwougb touwero . Doba areg yen meigdoc ebdebin an dara areg yen yod meijina debsa en an ginohob , kaba , augwan dag buc gototo naugb yen namcir . Anai Allah gin , kaba , eni sud hom gedig en eigdoumesa Krisdus dau gomom ucugb . Hanoba en eigdoumesa en moho se gogouf cucugb naugb yen touohob .
60001022	Dangga hang , yen meigdoc mog mog anim touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen meigdoc gororougwim dara yen meigdoc augwan toua terimda . Anai gareg en aimo Allah mer misen gin , kaba , en emaimo areg gecgu an en maguner dara en medamouwer se Krisdus len toua deitero . Doba en edu enin medoc mes dau aremer graga augwan namcirohob . Hanoba en aimo areg ecabeci dara obosboro an len dous .
60001023	Dara yen yemobsara dau gin touwero . Doba yen yeicara dag gini doum terimda . Anai Allah en mer gin , kaba , edag maireseb dara eb huhugb namcir . Hang emahwan yen aud en naugb en emeic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou yen toua . Dangga hang , yen yedag Allah mehir menau gin , kaba , emogdoc yen meijiner misen se cinogo gin touwero . Doba ogdoc yen Meijina Allah hom gin dous . Anai enin eng eis huhugb namcir .
60001024	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg Yesaya en og deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Lusud laugwan , kaba , ledag arec mec dous . Dara meren areg moho agas augwan , kaba , dag aremerij toua . Anai arec mec , kaba , cum en maga agaci . Dara merij toua , cum og an namcir .
60001025	Doba areg maman Adehsud en en deb ginohob , kaba , augwan emediyebeiya touwero , doba eb huhugb terimda . Dara yen , kaba , yen youman dau en mer gin touohob . Anai sug lusud lesai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus dou yen sug nosa , kaba , len lens en mer gin eng dou yen dous .
60002001	Sug yen yedag Allah mehir menau dag ginohob , kaba , yen yerba areg gecgu dara mog mog augwan dau yen namcir . Hang yen yemereiyara doum , dara yen yemeicara yemarerei len gus meriresi , dara yen meigdoc emetrij icira ara ara daum , dara yen yemowunim ucucugb toua deitero .
60002002	Doba yen meigdoc erleij naugb yen yebin Allah en mer areg Mena Gogoufu eic dou yenohob se yen meigdoc mes dous . Aninim dag godeh mahaniheni en mers emagad dau aring mohu touwero . Doba en mers ebdebin terimda toua . Anai sug yen yebin en mer gini se yen meigdoc mes terimda , kaba , yen yeiji dag lusud mos se Krisdus toua namcir . Hang maireseb menau geb huhugb emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba Allah emeic dou yen toues .
60002003	Yen yeicara dangga , anai yenin yecinaga dag maman Adehsud , kaba , en medoc emecgwan yen mougwa hom touwero . Doba en medoc eigouhw an yen namcirohob . Gini esogwa deisa areg Daud en erba Ugwaremer an deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Yen yenin yecinaga dag maman Adehsud Geis Huhugb gin , kaba , en medoc eigouhw an maman namcirohob .
60002004	Sug maman Adehsud en medoc eigouhw an yen dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemasid yenin dau en touwero . Doba yen yedag igdahab gedig maireseb menau naugb en toua namcir . Hanoba yen yen aud en , dauntoba en eic yen naugb en ahud yen dag Allah men tuari ogdoc Mena Gogoufu men goubesa gin toua . Yen yen aud en dag gini , anai enin eng edag buc mandeij gedig lusud lerbahaba deb dag emeigouhw naugb lahud meren tu touwero . Doba Allah , kaba , en ouci en deb dag buc mandeij mera eisaugb gedig en maireseb naugb eninohob . Sug yen yedag Allah men tuari dag ginohob , kaba , yen yedag gembala gesa taij gecabeci se men tuari gini naugb yen yeic areg geic Allah medoc eigouhw dou en sungga toua terimda , aimo dau areg Mena Gogoufu arautut yen aud gin toua . Anai yen yedag Yesus Krisdus men logodeh ginohob .
60002005	
60002006	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg Allah enara deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon ogdoc Yesaya sug nosa touohob , endagai : Dan douci igdahab mera eisaugb hom debohob . Hanoba dan dogo dag buc mandeij naugb indan tuari se mengarougb , moho Sion , gin toua . Dangga gareg en medoc ebdebin an en , kaba , igdebes emeba en touwero , doba en eic mos namcir .
60002007	Dangga hang , naugb yen gedig yen meigdoc ebdebin an enohob , kaba , buc mandeij gini mera eisaugb naugb yen toua terimda . Doba naugb len gedig merdoc emebdebin an enero , kaba , areg sud hom en erba Ugwaremer an gin deb , kaba , esogwa deisa an lenohob . anai en enara deb , endagai : Igdahab areg lusud lerbahaba deb dag emeigouhw naugb lahud meren tuero , kaba , Allah eigdoumesa en dag buc mandeij bedreg dau igdahab gus augwan namcirohob .
60002008	Dara Yesaya enin toua og deb eisaugb gini se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Igdahab gin , kaba , lusud letohob en . Hanoba len lobsara icira en toua . Len letohob igdahab gini , anai len merdoc emebdebin an enero . Dangga hang , Allah emesedeb len deb naugb len lobsara icira en namcir toua .
60002009	Doba yen , kaba , Allah ouci yen dag enin men meijouhuda . Dara en eigdoumesa yen dag enin men gembala gesa taij . Dauntoba yen yeic ara ara dag yauwaharo dou en terimda . Anai en , kaba , en edag mougt mera medam naugb yenohob . Hanoba en ouci yen debinim dag enin men lusud . Dauntoba yen yens dau men geigouhw dag ganusbus gini dou lusud laugwan toua . Anai en eija yen dau lobeigbogo naugb yen yeinesa men mouf gecabeci ginohob .
60002010	Anai sug nosa , kaba , yen yemedag men meijouhuda gin touebma . Doba iteitogin , kaba , yen yedag enin men meijouhuda . Dara sug nosa , kaba , en medoc emeineg an yen touebma . Doba iteitogin , kaba , en medoc eineg an yen namcirohob .
60002011	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij gedig dan indoc gororougb yen , sug yen yedag lugmahara dara irinya se cinogo dag ginohob , kaba , dan desulou yen dara goubesa . Dauntoba yen yemaimo areg yen meigdoc etrij icira se cinogo gin toua deitero . Doba yen meigdoc obsara dau augwan gin namcir . Anai yen meigdoc etrij icira gin , kaba , ebemoc dou yen naugb aiyan yen terimda .
60002012	Dara meijen geicara deseino leng medigo Yesus , kaba , augwan toua edag beim namcir . Dauntoba sug len lowun yen meijoho dag yen meijug mogohob , kaba , len lemeicara lemaimo dangga an yen se Lona Sug Allah En Ecicugwen toua deitero . Doba len louma debin yen se Lona Sug En Ogod Aremer deinaugb lusud , kaba , dag meijen geicara augwan edag beim namcirohob . Anai len leiya dau meijen geicara geigouhw gini augwan sug nosohob . Hanoba len leigdoumesa Allah en moho an men geicara dou maman gin , kaba , dag augwan eigouhw touohob .
60002013	Dangga toua , sug mougt mera medam en arougb yen an ara ara , kaba , yen yemohoiya en mer touwero . Doba yen yaimo en mer toua terimda . Anai en moho eb taiba yen yaugwanohob . Dara sug en esa men gedeijan naugb len lesedougwo yen , kaba , yen yemohoiya len merir touwero . Doba yen yobsara dou len naugb areg len larougb yen an gin toua namcir . Anai en esa len aud yen naugb len leic gogom dou leng meru mog . Hanoba len leigdoumesa leng leicara edag beim len meroho toua . Dangga hang , yen yemedreg gareg en edag mougt naugb yen en mer an areg en arougb yen an touwero . Doba sug yen yedag maman Adehsud men lusudohob , kaba , yen yaimo len merir toua terimda . Dauntoba yen yemowun maman Adehsud en moho gin deseino len touwero .
60002014	
60002015	Anai Allah en ouwan dau sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , dag leng meru edgom gin , kaba , len lemesmesman dara lemenara ceg ceg yen touwero . Doba meijen geicara geigouhw gini , kaba , eic dag ouf dougwo len merirs an yen namcir .
60002016	Anai yen yemedag Musa men gomnomna men sogougb deitero . Doba Krisdus eigdoc yen dau ginohob . Dangga hang , sug yen yedag lusud misenohob , kaba , meijen geicara aimo dag gin toua terimda . Doba yen yemeic lusud misen gini naugb yen yemaiyeiyo yen dougwo meijen geicara gecgu touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga dag Allah men sogougb deit naugb yen yaimo areg en arougb yen an gin dous .
60002017	Dara yen yemowun sud hom en moho touwero . Doba yen yeigdoumesa lusud laugwan len meroho . Dara yen meigdoc mog mog an yen meijaguner dara yen meigdamouwer se Krisdus len touwero . Doba yen meigdoc gororougb len laugwan . Hanoba yen yahau dau Allah . Dara yen yeigdoumesa meijen mougt mera medam se cinogo gini en moho eb taiba toua terimda .
60002018	Dara yeng Krisden gedig yen yedag sogougb , kaba , yen yemeic meijus deseino meijen mougtir touwero . Doba yen yeigdoumesa len meroho eb taiba namcir . Hanoba yen yowun yenin meigdoc arjaga naugb yen yaimo len an areg len larougb yen an gini toua terimda . Dara yen yemeicara dag gin dou meijen mougtir gedig len merdoc arjaga dara len ledag isgwerec an yen dousero . Doba yen yeicara dag gin toua dou meijen mougtir gedig len lesenagan yen namcir toua .
60002019	Anai sug yen yauwam an areg Allah en ouwan , hanoba yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij icira leng lesenagan meren geicara gin touwero , doba yen yes agadgeij namcir , kaba , Allah eic geigouhw dou yen toua terimda .
60002020	Anai sug yen yeicara gecgu , hanoba yen yes agadgeij sug len leic mog erij dou yen icira gin , kaba , gini emeigouhw dagiro ? Doba sug yen yaimo areg meijen mougtir larougb yen an augwan asesohob , hanoba yen yes agadgeij sug len leic mog erij dou yen augwougb dous , kaba , Allah eic geigouhw dou yen icira gin toua terimda .
60002021	Anai sug en eija yen aud en sug nosa , kaba , en esedeb yen naugb sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij dag gin , aninim dag Krisdus enin toua aimo ucina mog erij naugb meijen sesar sug nosohob . Dangga hang , en eic gansins dou yen . Dauntoba sug yen yecinaga , kaba , yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij areg yen yaimo augwougb gin touwero . Doba yen yesogwa deisa en mohotimei mohw se men ucina gini toua terimda .
60002022	Anai en , kaba , en emebesesar mougwa hom . Dara lusud louman , doba gereiyara dara gerba mohoisa hom emagunya dau en mers dou len touwero .
60002023	Dangga toua , sug lusud lenara gecgu dou en , kaba , en emenara gecgu ucucugb dou len . Dara sug len leic mog erij dou enohob , kaba , en emenara mog mog dag en eic mog erij ucugb dou len touwero . Doba en ogugwo aremer graga augwan se Allah enin mesira dous . Anai en ecinaga dau sug Allah ogod aremer aga lusud , kaba , dag en emobsara aud sud hom touwero . Doba en aimo augwan dara gedag beim an len dous .
60002024	Dara Krisdus enin eng ohw en mougt edug naugb oho sesar men gogom augwan se men medgomori taiba sogo salib dau mamanohob . Dauntoba maman mamireseb emeb se sesar deitero . Doba maman mamom dau gini naugb maman maimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes gin dous . Anai ogdoc Krisdus en mos ohubecbec gin , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug Allah eic yen meigdoc mes geingmos agauwesa dou yen ucugwohob .
60002025	Anai sug nosa , kaba , yen yedag domba gedig len laijahasero namcirohob . Doba iteitogin , kaba , Allah ahwan yen aud Krisdus gin ucugwohob naugb yen yaimo en terimda . Anai en eng meijen gembala gedig en agauwesa yen . Hanoba en esedougwo yen meijina dara geigouhw toua namcir .
60003001	Dangga toua , naugb yigida Krisden gedig yen yes meisuwohob , kaba , yen yemeic meijus dou len touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga naugb yen yaimo len merir an areg len larougb yen an toua terimda . Dauntoba sug yen meisuwer gedig len merdoc emebdebin an Allah en Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus ginbuma len leiya , doba meijen geicara augwan ecabeci dara edag beim terimda , kaba , aic len naugb len merdoc ebdebin an Krisdus toua . Hang emedeinyum naugb sug yen yemenara yemagodgod len touwero . Doba meijen geicara geigouhw gin , kaba , edeinyum naugb ahwan len aud Krisdusohob .
60003002	
60003003	Dara yen yemeic areg mera eisaugb naugb yen yobungma yen meijaga touwero . Doba yen yobungma yen meigdoc mes gebdededero gedig lusud lemeiyero gin dous . Hang yen yemecgun areg geigouhw se yen meijugt , dara yen yemed areg dag emas , dara perag , era sariou mogo . Dara yen yemeg sansun meb tintin gedig mera eisaugb touwero . Doba yen meigdoc arjaga an len gus . Dara yen meigdoc ebtou dau augwan toua terimda . Anai gobungma gin , kaba , mera eisaugb deseino Allah dara emediyebeiya touwero , doba eb beb huhugb namcir .
60003004	
60003005	Augwan gini esogwa deisa ligida meren geicara gedig len lesijaresa Allah dara len lod merna debsa en sug nosa touohob . Hang len lemohoiya len mersuwer merir an areg len larougb len an gin touwero . Doba len lobungma lenin merdoc mes naugb len laimo len merir se aremer augwan toua terimda .
60003006	Augwan gini dag Sarai men geicara sug nosa touohob . Anai en , kaba , en emeic mos dou en mesuwa Abraham sug nosa touwero . Doba en owun enin medoc arjaga deseino en naugb en aimo en an areg en arougb en an gin toua terimda . Hanoba en eija en moho toua dag Adehsud . En eicara dag gini , anai en toua gida hom dau leng lesijaresa Allah sug nosa dara lod merna debsa en an ara ara touohob . Dangga hang , sug yen yeicara yaimo areg geigouhw an lusud , dara yen yemahau dau ara ara touwero , doba yen meigdoc ebtou namcir , kaba , yen yedag Sarai medebeitor misen touohob .
60003007	Dangga toua , yigiji gedig yen yeic meisouwohob , kaba , yen meijires gor emeiyeiya len touwero . Doba yen meiju ouforoho naugb yen meijires oucan len an areg ebdebin len toua . Anai se aremer augwan , kaba , meren goubesa dag yenero , doba len merisira moc dous . Hang yen yemowun len meroho an ara ara touwero . Doba se aremer augwan , kaba , yen yeigdoumesa len meroho an terimda . Dauntoba meijen geicara emedag sogo maga dougwo yen sug yen yocuncum dou Allah touwero . Doba yen yocuncum dara goubesa dou en namcir . Anai en medoc eigouhw an yen meisouwer , hanoba en eic maireseb menau geb huhugb dou yen yaugwan aninim toua .
60003008	Sug indan surad ouwedoc gin , kaba , dan desulou yen yaugwan , dauntoba yen meijir anim . Dara meijen gauwamara toua dag hom . Dara yen meigdoc eineg anim ucucugb . Dara yen meigdoc gororougwim . Dara yen meigdoc eigouhw anim . Dara yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga deseinom ucucugb toua terimda . Anai yen yedag meijagunem dara yen meigdamouwem se Krisdusohob .
60003009	Dangga toua , sug lusud leic gogom dou yen , kaba , yen yemauni gogom ucugb dou len . Era sug len lenara gecgu dou yen , kaba , yen yemenara gecgu ucugb dou len touwero . Doba yen yacgeij Allah naugb en eic geigouhw dou len dous . Anai sug en eija yen aud en sug nosa naugb yen yaimo areg en esedeb naugb yenohob augwan gin toua , kaba , en emeija yen naugb yen yeic gecgu dou lusudero . Doba en eija yen naugb yen yeic geigouhw dou len terimda . Sug yen yeicara dag gini , kaba , Allah emeic geigouhw dou yen toues .
60003010	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg Daud en erba Ugwaremer an deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Gareg en ouwan , dauntoba areg geigouhw eb naugb en terberba , dara en ouwan naugb areg geic medoc agahugouhw dou en emediyebeiya dau en touwero , kaba , esloulougb naugb en emenara gecgu dou lusud dara en emerba mohoisa len .
60003011	Dara en emaimo areg mog mog an len touwero . Doba en eineg dau augwan namcir , hanoba en aimo areg geigouhw an len . Dara en eic mouwemougb esesa naugb en eic gesgigouhwesa dou len se aremer augwan toua .
60003012	Anai gareg en aimo areg asesa Adehsud enin medoc mes dag gin terimda , kaba , en maires oucucan sud hom gini naugb en eseyeiyo en dougwo areg gecgu augwan . Dara en oc moms naugb areg en acgeij dau en toua . Doba leng merug mog an lusud , kaba , Adehsud en edag sogo maga dougwo len namcir .
60003013	Dangga hang , yen yemarges dau sug yen yeic geigouhw dou lusud gin touwero . Doba yen meigdoc erleij naugb yen yaimo augwan gini terimda . Anai sug yen yeicara dag gin , kaba , gara mog eng eic gecgu dou yen , hanoba ahwan yen dau maireseb menau geb huhugb gin toua ? Naro , sud hom ingmaro .
60003014	Doba sug yen yaimo areg geigouhw an lusud , hanoba yen yaimo ucina mog erij icira gin toua , kaba , augwan inggaida . Anai augwan gini emeic dag yen yera mera geigouhw toues . Hang yen yemahau dau sud hom ingma sug en eic gecgu dou yen . Dara yen meigdoc emeijesa an gin touwero .
60003015	Doba yen yed Krisdus enin dous eng se yen meigdoc mes desei ineinohabi , yen yemesijaresa dara yen yemeigdoumesa en dag meijen Adehsud naugb yen toua . Hanoba yen yesedeb yenin meigdoc mes naugb yen yens dau areg yen yod meijina debsa ginohob meijouhw augwan asesa dou lusud areg len leijidougwo yen an gin toua terimda . Dara sug yen yos yadi Krisdus deseino lusud , kaba , yen yemeic yen meijir yemaic len touwero . Doba sug yen yens meijouhw augwan asesa dou len , kaba , yen meigdoc arjaga , dara yen yeigdoumesa len meroho toua namcir .
60003016	Dara yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa dag meijen geicara augwan , kaba , edeinyum naugb sug yen meigdoc emogdoc yen an aremer hom touwero . Doba ouma debin yen dag augwan ecabeci namcirohob . Yen yeicara dangga , dauntoba sug lusud lowun yen meijoho augwougb an meijen geicara geigouhw icira sug yen yedag Krisdus men logodeh dag gin , kaba , meren geicara gini eic igdebes dou lenin dous .
60003017	Anai sug Allah ouwan naugb yen yaimo ucina mog erij , kaba , eigouhw naugb yen yaimo ucina gini dau sug yen yemeicara gecgu dou lusudero . Doba dau sug yen yaimo areg geigouhw an len dous .
60003018	Anai Krisdus , kaba , en toua emebesesar mougwa homero . Doba en aimo ucina mog erij augwougb aud gomom naugb maman sesar sug nosa touohob . Hang sug en ohw en mougt edug mougwa cum bedeinyum naugb maman sesar beb huhugb dag ginohob , kaba , en ahwan maman aud Allah . Dauntoba en eic gesgigouhwesa dou maman ucugb toua . Dara sug lusud leic gomom dou en , kaba , en edag lusud misen se cinogo gin touaba . Doba sug Allah eigdoumesa en aud maireseb menauwohob , kaba , en edag mena deit .
60003019	Sug en edag mena dag ginohob , kaba , en eihwedig usi hom gedag tu gesisug , moho w Seol , naugb en esai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb enin men geicara taiba sogo salib dou leng laihagab Allah mer se lona sug Nuh eg men ij gini len laugwan sungga toua . Anai len gin , kaba , Allah eigtou ateteij len se lona ingga naugb len lesga meren sesar dara lahau an dougwo toua . Doba len lohoiya Nuh en mer an areg en esai dou len gini terimda . Dangga hang , sug duhu erisa , kaba , Allah eigdoc merug senggemoi se ing mes gin dous . Len gus , kaba , duhu aiyan len laugwan ingga namcirda .
60003020	
60003021	Areg graga augwan , kaba , edag ansins naugb lona sug gembala ogun yen se duhu gin toua . Anai sug en ogun yen se duhu , hanoba en eigdoumesa yen dau duhu ucugb , kaba , gini ansins dag Allah eigdoc yen dau sesar men gogom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb . Aninim dag sug nosa , kaba , duhu eigdoumesa ij an merug senggemoi merna agau dau gogom areg aiyan len gus gin touohob . Dara Allah eicara baimo dangga an yen . Anai Krisdus , kaba , en eisa dau gomom aud maireseb menau geb huhugb sug nosa naugb ginohob . Hanoba en eisaugb dig bogo naugb en edeigtou desij Allah dig en mesira misen . Dauntoba en edag mougt mera medam naugb malaikad , dara merna mog mog gedig len meroho agas , dara leng merubisamougb se bogo meniha len laugwan toua . Dangga hang , sug gembala ogun yen se duhu sug nosa , kaba , gini dag en emedu areg gogor dau yen meijaga ginero . Doba gini dag yen yos dou Allah dag yen yemaimo areg dag sesar deitero . Doba yen yaimo areg en arougb yen an gin dous . Anai yen yecinaga dag sesar hom emeb naugb yen touwero , doba yen yeineg dau augwan namcirohob .
60003022	
60004001	Dangga hang , sug Krisdus emobsara dau ucina mog erij ginero , doba en aiyan medocesem naugb en aimo ucina gin aud gomom dag gin touohob , kaba , yen yeic men gauwamara gini se yen meigdoc mes naugb sug yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yaimo ucina mog erij aninim dag en toua . Anai gareg en aimo ucina mog erij dag gin , kaba , eic dag en emaimo sesar toua deitero . Doba en arges dau sesar gin namcirohob .
60004002	Hang sug cumougt mougwebaba , kaba , yen yemaimo areg yen meigdoc etrij icira toua deitlo . Doba yen yaimo areg Allah en arougb yen an gin dous .
60004003	Anai sug nosa , kaba , yen yaimo leng medigo Yesus aud areg len meru ehigehi se lona einyana bedeinyum touohob . Hang se lona augwan gin , kaba , yen yemaimo areg geigouhw hom touwero . Doba yen meigdoc etrij naugb yen yohw yen meijaga doum aibibra namcir . Dara yen meigdoc oungmogo naugb yen yaimo areg gecgu gus gus toua . Dara yen yemarges dau sug yen yeg ahwei mohu touwero . Doba yen yeg ahwei mohu bed yen yomom icira gin namcir . Dara yen yogo ara gaihim . Dara yen yegara yaigeigem . Dara yen yecguna dou seiseij . Hanoba yen yaimo areg lusud merus eijeij dau debin gin toua namcir .
60004004	Doba iteitogin , kaba , yen yemaimo len aud meren geicara dag mihi . Dara edag duhu ohw baihagab gin toua deitero . Doba yen yasid yenin dau gin namcirohob . Dangga hang , sug leng medigo Yesus len leiya dau gin , kaba , len lomi , hanoba len lowun yen meijoho an meijen geicara menau gin toua terimda .
60004005	Doba inggaida . Anai cum , kaba , len ledens dau meren geicara gecgu gini meijouhw augwan asesa dou Allah toua . Anai en , kaba , en esedeb Lona naugb sug en ogod aremer deb naugb leng merna agau dara leng lomom len laugwanohob .
60004006	Sug Allah esedeb Lona naugb len dag ginohob . Hang Krisdus en emeihwedig w Seol naugb en esai Mer Geigouhw eisaugb enin dou leng lomom laugwan sungga toua . Dauntoba sug len ledag merna gini len merdoc ebdebin an en , kaba , len lemomom namcirero . Doba len merireseb aninim dag Allah en maireseb huhugb gin toua . Krisdus eicara dag gini , anai sug len merna agau sug nosa , kaba , len lebesesarohob . Hang Allah emogod gomom deb naugb len , aninim dag en ogod gomom deb naugb lusud gus laugwan touohob .
60004007	Dara lona naugb sug areg se cinogo gini ediyebeiya , kaba , ebeij toua deinyor namcirohob . Dangga hang , yen yematou touwero , doba yen meiju auti . Hanoba yen yogmac yenin meigdoc mes dougwo aremer augwan toua . Dauntoba ara ara emedag sogo maga dougwo yen naugb yen yocuncum dou Allah touwero . Doba yen yocuncum esesa dou en terimda .
60004008	Doba aremer gesloulougb edreg dau aremer gus augwan namcir , kaba , dag yen yemarges dau sug yen meigdoc gororougwim touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yeicara yaimo dag gin anim terimda . Anai sug yen meigdoc gororougwim , kaba , yen yemecic dau sug yen yebesesar anim ucucugb touwero . Doba yen yeic gesgigouhwesem naugb yen yaihiron dougwom augwan toua namcir .
60004009	Dara sug yen yebin yen meijaguner dara yen meigdamouwer se Krisdus , kaba , yen yemenara ucucugb an len touwero . Doba yen yebin len laugwan dara yen meigdoc eigouhw an len terimda .
60004010	Dara yen yemeisan gurog dau mou ouforoho era goubesa aingma aingma areg Allah eic dou yenohob gin touwero . Doba yen yesedougwo augwan gin deigeigouhw namcir . Dara yen yemeic gini naugb yenin dousero . Doba yen yeic gini naugb yousem ucucugb terimda toua . Anai mou gouforoho dara goubesa gedig maman masma , kaba , augwan aninimero , doba susugb toua namcir .
60004011	Dangga hang , gareg dau yen en mou ouforoho naugb sug en esai Allah enin mer eisaugb Krisdus dou lusud , kaba , en emarges dau gin touwero . Doba en ebedbed en mer gin dou lusud . Dara gareg dau yen Allah eic goubesa dou en naugb en ousa leng lentog moc moho dara leng mecicgu , kaba , en aimo augwan gini dara medoc hom an len . Dauntoba se meijen geicara augwan , kaba , yen yeigdoumesa Allah en moho gin terimda . Anai en , kaba , en eigtou se gogouf cucugb . Dara en edag mougt mera medam naugb augwan beb huhugb toua . Yen yeicara dangga , anai yen yedag hom dara Krisdusohob . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
60004012	Dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij gedig dan indoc gororougb yen , sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij medam iteitogin , kaba , yen yemeija meigdocesa dag aremer ganusbus inggeb debin yen touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yaimo gin terimda . Anai Allah eic gini bainyen yen meigdoc mes , endag yen meigdoc ebdebin an en dag misenohobei ? Era anambei ? Aninim dag lusud lec ara ara se smougb naugb lainyen toua . Dangga areg misen , kaba , smougb emaitero . Doba areg misenero , kaba , smougb ait bediyebeiya namcir .
60004013	Hang yen yemeija meigdocesa areg gainyen yen touwero . Doba sug yen yesogwa deisa Krisdus mohotimei mohw se men ucina mog erij gin , kaba , yen meigdoc eigouhw an . Dara yen yagahugouhw naugb gin toua . Anai sug yen yes agadgeij se gini terimda , kaba , yen meigdoc emeijesa se lona sug Allah ens Krisdus se gogouf cucugb ainyes dou lusud touwero . Doba yen meigdoc agahugouhw se lona ingga toua namcir .
60004014	Dangga sug yen yedag hom dara Krisdusohob , hanoba lusud lowun yen meijoho icira gin , kaba , yen meigdoc momogo an touwero . Doba yen meigdoc ebtou namcir . Anai gini ansins dou yen dag Allah esa Mena Gogoufu gedig en eigtou se gogouf cucugb se yen meigdoc mes touohob . Hang geigouhw areg Allah esedeb naugb yenohob , kaba , hom emediyebeiya dau yen touwero , doba en emeic augwan dou yen toues .
60004015	Doba sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij gin , kaba , eigouhw naugb yen yemaimo gini ogdoc sug yen yeic gomom dou len gus , dara yen yeiyohora , dara yen yodo yen meijaga se len gus meren aremer , dara sug yen yeicara gecgu gus gus touwero .
60004016	Doba yen yaimo ucina mog erij gini dau sug yen yedag Krisdus men logodeh gin dous . Anai sug yen yaimo ucina mog erij icira gin , kaba , igdebes emeba yen dau gin touwero . Doba yen yen sijo dou Allah , anai gini ansins dag Krisdus en moho aiga yenohob .
60004017	Anai Lona ebeij deinyorohob naugb sug en ogod aremer aga lusud laugwan ebiji dara men lusud maman nosahabi . Dangga hang , sug Allah emedreg maman debero . Doba en ogod aremer aga maman nosahabi , kaba , dagiro eisaugb leng merdoc aihagab en Mer Geigouhw eisaugb Krisdus gina ? En amsoho lenei ? Naro , en emamsoho len deb namcirero . Doba en emeic gogom medam dou len se lona ingga toues .
60004018	Augwan gini esogwa deisa areg sud hom en og deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob , endagai : Ogom medam naugb leng laimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes len leinesa maireseb menau geb huhugb gini . Dangga dagiro eisaugb leng leic Allah moho lacecim . Hanoba len ledreg men gomnomna gin toua terimda ? Len toua leinesa maireseb menau geb huhugb ginei ? Naro , len lemeinesa namcirero , doba Allah eic mor mor dou len dous .
60004019	Dangga hang , sug Allah esedeb naugb yen yaimo ucina mog erij dag ginohob , kaba , yen yemarges dau gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo areg asesa enin medoc mes sug yen yeraga asa ucina gin terimda . Hanoba yen yogugwo yenin debsa enin mesira toua . Anai en emamsoho yenero , doba sug en esinsin yenohob , kaba , en eseyeiyo yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan . Anai en emereiyara dou yen touwero . Doba en aimo areg en os dou yenohob , augwan dag misen an yen toua namcir .
60005001	Dara yeng yedag mougt naugb yen yesedougwo Allah men lusud se goucimdeb , kaba , dan desulou yen dara goubesa namcir . Dauntoba yen yemaisan gurog dau sug yen yagauwesa lusud dag domba gedig Allah ogugwo deb se yen meisirohob gin touwero . Doba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yesedougwo len dara geigouhw namcir . Dara sug yen yesedougwo len , kaba , yen yemecbec se gin touwero . Doba yen yaimo augwan gini dara yen meigdoc erleij an len dous . Anai gini aimo dau areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes namcirohob . Dara sug yen yesedougwo len , kaba , yen yemarerei aremougb dau len touwero . Doba yen yagauwesa len dareg yen meigdoc esgiraha an gin terimda . Dan desulou yen dag gini , anai dan toua dedag mougt naugb dan desedougwo Allah men lusud . Dara sug len leic mog erij dou Krisdus sug nosa , kaba , danin deiya se dan indires touohob . Dangga hang , ebiji dau lona sug Allah ens Krisdus se men gogouf cucugb ainyes dou lusud , kaba , en emogugwo men gogouf cucugb gini ingma dou dan , aninim dag en emogugwo men gogouf cucugb ingma se lona ingga dou yen toua .
60005002	
60005003	Dara len gedig Allah ogugwo se yen meisirohob , kaba , yen yemeigdoumesa yenin meijoho dag mougt mera medam naugb yen yemaiyan len touwero . Doba yen yedag gansins deinaugb len terimda .
60005004	Sug yen yes agadgeij se gin terimda , kaba , gogouf cucugb areg Allah esedeb naugb yenohob , kaba , emediyebeiya dau yen touwero . Doba ebiji dau lona sug en ens maman Gembala Moho Gagas dou lusud , kaba , en emogugwo dau gogouf cucugb gini ingma dou yen toues . Dara men gogouf cucugb gin , kaba , mohw emousireij touwero , doba eb huhugb namcir .
60005005	Dangga toua , naugb yeng yedag yugdeh mesaba , kaba , yen yemeic meijus deseino meijen mougtir naugb yen yohoiya len merir touwero . Doba yen yaimo len merir se aremer augwan toua terimda . Dara yen yaugwan , kaba , yen meigdoc emagas anim touwero . Doba yen yowun yenin meigdoc mes arjaga doum . Hanoba yen yei iremeb aiyim terimda toua . Anai gareg en medoc agas , kaba , Allah ougb sogo maga dougwo en mebes namcir . Doba gareg en owun enin medoc mes arjaga , kaba , Allah medoc eineg an en . Hanoba en eic geigouhw dou en toua terimda . Augwan gini aimo dau areg len log deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon deb sug nosa touohob .
60005006	Hang yen meigdoc emagasero . Doba yen yowun yenin debsa Allah enin mesira mes naugb yen yaimo en terimda . Dauntoba edebeij lona areg en medoc edug sehob , kaba , en eigdoumesa yen meijoho toua . Anai enin eng mobisamougb dau augwan namcir .
60005007	Dangga sug yen meigdoc momogo an ara ara , kaba , yen yogugwo augwan gini deb se Allah enin mesira dous . Anai en , kaba , en medoc eineg an yen . Hanoba en agauwesa dara eseyeiyo yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua .
60005008	Dara yen yesedeh yauweila dougwo meijen moc Bilis gin toua terimda . Anai en , kaba , en edag mihiloro medam gowi asa ucina naugb en au yen .
60005009	Dangga hang , yen yemobsara dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem . Hanoba yen yes agadgeij dougwo Bilis toua namcir . Anai yen yecinaga dag yenin dous eng yemaimo ucina mog erij ginero . Doba eb naugb yen meijaguner dara yen meigdamouwer se cinogo gus augwan touohob .
60005010	Doba Allah , kaba , en eija yen aud en . Dauntoba sug yen meigdoc dag hom dara Krisdusohob , kaba , yen yeigtou desij en se men gogouf cucugb beb huhugb namcir toua . Anai eni sud hom gedig en medoc an lusud naugb en eic geigouhw dou len toua terimda . Dangga hang , sug en medoc gororougb yen dag ginohob , kaba , en emarges dau yen . Doba en ousa yen , dauntoba yen yemobsara dau ucina aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touwero . Doba en eic goubesa dou yen naugb yen yaiyan meigdocesem . Hanoba yen yes agadgeij naugb yen yaimo ucina gini terimda yen yedebeij men usi gin toua namcirohob . Anai ucina mog erij areg yen yaimo iteitogin , kaba , dag cum cum dous .
60005011	Dangga eigouhw naugb maman maigdoumesa en moho agas taiba augwan beb huhugb terimda . Augwan gini asesa dag misen namcir .
60005012	Dan dog surad agarougb dag gini dou yen , dauntoba dan denara dad yen meigdoc mes . Dara dan dauma debin dag areg yen yaimohob gin , kaba , dag augwougwero . Doba esogwa deisa areg Allah medoc eigouhw an yen augwan dag misen touohob . Dangga hang , yen yemobsara dau ucina mog erij gin touwero . Doba yen yes agadgeij namcir naugb yen yaimo terimda . Dara areg dan dog gini , kaba , dan demog ai danin insirero . Doba dan darougb maman mamaguna Silas en og dou dan naugb dasulou yen . Anai dan decinaga en toua edag sud hom gedig en emobsara dau Krisdus touwero . Doba en aiyan meigdocesem naugb en aimo Krisdus dara en medoc augwan toua terimdohob .
60005013	Leng se goucimdeb se cinogo Babel sugin , kaba , len laugwan lou yen . Anai Allah ouci len debinim naugb en , aninim dag yen touohob . Dara dan indisi se Krisdus , moho Markus , en ou yen toua .
60005014	Sug yen youcimdeb , kaba , yen yanim dara you meijufesem toua . Anai gini ansins dag yen yedag hom dara Krisdusohob . Dara gareg dau yen en edag hom dara en dag ginohob , kaba , dan dacgeij Allah naugb en eseyeiyo en dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua terimda .
61001001	Surad gini dau dang , Simon Petrus , gedig dan dedag Yesus Krisdus men sogougb naugb dan desai en moro dou lusud laugwan toua . Dan dog surad gini dou yen gedig yen meigdoc ebdebin an Yesus Krisdus ginohob yen yaugwan . Anai en , kaba , en emobsara dou sud hom touwero . Doba en medoc edag beim an lusud laugwan namcir . Dangga hang , en eic goubesa dou yen naugb yen meigdoc ebdebin an en . Dara yen meigdoc gebdebin an gin , kaba , moho emeb tainya dau emen gedig emen emdoc ebdebin an Krisdus aimougtut gin touwero . Doba mera eisaugb aninim dag emen toua . Anai en , kaba , en edag maman Allah . Dara en eigdoc maman dau sesar men gogom augwan aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touohob .
61001002	Dangga hang , sug yen meiju aiso Yesus en edag maman Allah dara maman Adehsud dag ginohob , kaba , dan dacgeij en naugb en medoc eigouhw an yen beiseisaugb terimda . Hanoba en eseyeiyo yen dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua namcir .
61001003	Dan dacgeij Krisdus an dag gini , anai sug en moho edag Allah teitei dag ginohob , kaba , en ogugwo enin men goubesa augwan dou maman toua . Dauntoba maman mamaimo areg gecgu dag nosa deitero . Doba sug maman macinaga areg asesa enin medoc mes augwan dag misenohob , kaba , arautut maman naugb maman geicara augwan , aninim dag enin men geicara augwan toua namcir . Anai sug en eija maman sug nosa , kaba , en eija maman naugb sug maman maigtou desij en se men gogouf cucugb . Dara maman masogwa deisa en mohotimei mohw aud areg edag beim , dara obosboro , dara ecabeci gin dous .
61001004	Sug en eija maman aud augwan ginohob , kaba , en eic men gos dou gedig mera eisaugb dara moho agas namcir einyana baos dara debin gin dou maman toua . Dauntoba sug maman macinaga dau gin , kaba , eic goubesa dou maman naugb maman mamaimo lusud aud areg len merdoc etrij icira se cinogo gin toua deitero . Doba maman mamug augwan aninim dag Allah enin mog gin toua namcir . Anai areg lusud se cinogo len laimo gin , kaba , etaha aisa len dangga .
61001005	Sug Yesus eicara dangga dou yenohob , kaba , yen meigdoc emobsara dau en touwero . Doba yen meigdoc ebdebin an en terimda . Hanoba yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb meijen geicara augwan edag beim dara obosboro an lusud . Dara sug meijen geicara augwan edag beimohob , kaba , yen yainyen naugb yen yecinaga ucina areg Allah esedeb naugb yen yaos dara gin toua .
61001006	Dara sug yen yaimo ucina areg Allah esedeb naugb yenohob , kaba , yen yebehnehino yenin meigdoc mes dougwo areg gecgu augwan toua namcir . Dara sug yen yebehnehino yenin meigdoc mes dougwo areg gecgu augwanohob , kaba , yen yemobsara dau sug lusud leic mog erij dou yen touwero . Doba yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb yen yes agadgeij terimda . Dara sug yen yaiyan meigdocesem naugb ginohob , kaba , yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yaimo areg Allah arougb yen an gini toua namcir .
61001007	Dara sug yen yaimo areg Allah arougb yen an gin , kaba , yen meigdoc eineg an yen meijaguner dara yen meigdamouwer len laugwan . Dara sug yen meigdoc eineg an len dag gin , kaba , yen meigdoc gororougb lusud laugwan yaos dara toua .
61001008	Anai sug augwan gini eb se yen meigdoc mes , hanoba yen yeic gerleij naugb gini beiseisaugb terimda , kaba , yen yemedag sogo maga mogud touwero . Doba sug yen yecinaga areg geb se maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus enin medoc mes augwan dag misen namcir , kaba , eic dag yen yera mera areg graga augwan bedreg dau nosa toua deit .
61001009	Doba gareg dau yen en emeicara emaimo areg graga augwanero , kaba , en edag sud hom maires ebeigbogo ucugwohob . Dangga hang , en emeiya lo asesa toua deitero . Doba en eiya areg geb deinyor en dous . Anai en medoc emeiseisan Allah men geicara dou en dag en aigdougwo dara edu men sesar mohon augwan dau enohob touwero . Doba en medoc moc dougwo augwan gin namcirohob .
61001010	Dangga hang , dan indagunerij , dara dan indamouwerij , sug Krisdus eija yen , hanoba en ouci yen naugb yen yeigtou desij en se men gogouf cucugb dag ginohob , kaba , yen yeic meijuwemougb esesa naugb yen yaimo areg graga augwan edreg dau nosa deit . Anai sug yen yeicara yaimo dag gini esesa terimda , kaba , yen yemobsara dau sug yen meigdoc ebdebin an Krisdus touwero , doba yen yes agadgeij namcir .
61001011	Hang maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus gin , kaba , en emouf misis dougwo yen touwero , doba en eigdoumesa yen meijoho . Hanoba en ec misis gouji dau yen , dauntoba yen yeinesa men Goiharaga Beb Huhugb toua terimda . Anai en , kaba , en eigdoc yen dau sesar men gogom augwanohob .
61001012	Yen yecinaga areg graga augwan dag misen namcirohob , anai lusud lesai dau augwan gini dou yen sug nosa . Hang yen meigdoc ebdebin an dara yen yogo areg misen gini dag buc gototo se yen meigdoc mes touohob . Doba inggaida . Dan demarges dau sug dan desulou yen an augwan gin touwero . Doba dan deicara dangga ucucugb an yen terimda .
61001013	Anai maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus en ens ainyes dou dan dag cum , kaba , dan indina emagau an yen deitero . Doba dan domom dau yenohob . Dangga hang , sug dan indiresebaba gin , kaba , dan douwan debir yen meigdoc mes ucucugb an gin toua terimda . Anai dan decinaga dag gin , kaba , ucina obosboro naugb yenohob .
61001014	
61001015	Dara gin dousero . Doba dan deic induwemougb esesa naugb dan deic ara ara dou yen . Dauntoba sug dan domom dau yenohob , kaba , yen meigdoc emougwou areg dan desulou yen an gin touwero . Doba eic dag yen meigdoc eiseisan gini augwan terimda toua .
61001016	Dan deicara daimo dangga an yen , anai sug emen emesai dou yen sug nosa dag maman Adehsud Yesus Krisdus en ecicugb aud maman dara goubesa namcir , kaba , emen ememaimo emu gouforoho naugb emen emecic dag huhugb dou yenero . Doba emen emeiya dau men gogouf cucugb sug erbacec en se emenin emires sug nosohob . Hang emen emecinaga dag en emecicugb aud maman dag misen toues .
61001017	Dara sug en Mena Allah agahugouhw an en , hanoba en eigdoumesa en moho deseino emen , kaba , emen emouman mer gen dau bogo gin toua . Anai emen emugwengga desij en se menmod gecabeci ingga touohob . Anai Allah Gedig En Eigtou Se Gogouf Cucugb namcir , kaba , en ouma debin en dau bogaden dou emen , endagai : Gini dan Indisi hom gedig dan indoc gororougb en . Anai en eic dan indoc eigouhw dou dan namcirohob .
61001018	
61001019	Sug emen emeiya dau augwan ginohob , kaba , emen ememeija emuwesa areg leng lesai Allah moro sug nosa len log deb se Surad Injil Meb Mohon naugb maman gin toua deitero . Doba emen emdoc ebdebin an augwan gini bedreg dau nosa deit . Anai areg emen emeiya gin , kaba , esogwa deisa areg len log deb gini toua namcirohob . Dangga hang , eigouhw naugb yen yemoc dou meijums dougwo areg len log deb gin touwero . Doba yen yei meijums naugb gin terimda . Anai areg len log gin , kaba , edag padoumara mouf gererij naugb aisema yen se lobeigbogo terimda edebeij sug lona esga . Hanoba singmur ohobo se yen meigdoc mes touohob . Anai sug Krisdus en ecicugwen , kaba , gini aninim dag lona esgohob . Hang se lona ingga , kaba , en erba mouf se yen meigdoc mes naugb yen yecinaga meijouhw augwan asesa . Aninim dag sug singmur ohobohob , kaba , cum , lusud leiya augwan asesa toua , anai lona esga namcirohob .
61001020	Doba aremer hom gesloulougb edreg dau aremer gus augwan namcir , kaba , dag yen yemaimo yenin meijen gauwamara an areg len log deb gin touwero . Doba yen yacgeij Mena Gogoufu naugb en ens meijouhw dou yen naugb ginahabi , yen yemaimo augwan gin toua terimda .
61001021	Anai areg len lesai gin , kaba , len lemeic dau lenin merdoc mes dou lusudero . Doba Mena Gogoufu enin eng ens dau augwan gini dou lenohob . Hanoba en arautut len naugb len lesai dou lusud gin toua . Anai areg en arautut len se gin , kaba , Allah enin mer dous .
61002001	Doba cum , kaba , gembala areibahau len lagunya augwougb debin yen . Aninim dag sug nosa , kaba , gembala areibahau agunya augwougb debin leng lesai Allah moro dou leng Israel sug nosa touohob . Dangga sug len lagunya debin yenohob , kaba , len ledidib dau ara ara dou yen toua . Doba areg len lens dou yen gin , kaba , augwan dag areibahau mer dous . Hang emeic dag lusud merdoc emebdebin an Krisdus toua deitero . Doba eic dag len lobsara dau en aud mor mor namcir . Dara len lemebedbed dau mer areibahau gin dou yen dousero . Doba len lagada merus dougwo Krisdus dag en emedag meren mougt mera medam toua deitero . Anai sug nosa , kaba , en eic enin bancoho aga len dau sesar men gogom augwan aud maireseb menau geb huhugb gin touohob . Dobnaro . Len leic merus terimda . Dangga hang , Allah emamsoho len toua deitero . Doba en esedeb len naugb en ahacugb len merur mor se dum smougb dedemeda icira gin toua namcir .
61002002	Dangga se lona ingga , kaba , leinyana dau maman len lesogwa deisa gembala areibahau ingga len meruhotimei mohw an meren geicara naugb len laimo areg gogor . Dara len lohw len meraga aibibra doum , aninim dag len toua terimda . Hang leng medigo Yesus , kaba , len lemousa deisa maman an areg maman mamdoc ebdebin an gin touwero . Doba len leic Ucina Geica areg maman maimo ginohob augwan lacecim namcir .
61002003	Dara len merdoc etrij icira aremougb toua terimda . Hang len lemeic areg dag huhugb dau lenin merdoc mes naugb len larerei aregoufu einyana dau yen toua . Dangga hang , gogom areg Allah ogod deb naugb len sug nosohob , kaba , augwan emesijes dau len . Dara areg eic mor mor dou len , kaba , emougbdedau len touwero . Doba eb naugb len toua namcir .
61002004	Anai yen yecinaga dau sug malaikad len toua lebesesar sug nosa , kaba , dag Allah emamsoho len touwero . Doba en ohud len merisira darem . Hanoba en erba len se w Seol ai mei , moho Tartarus , naugb len leigtou se lobeigbogo mes ingga terimda edebeij Lona Sug En Ogod Gogom deinaugb len toua .
61002005	Dara yen yecinaga dag se Nuh men lona , kaba , Allah emamsoho lusud touwero . Doba en esa duhu erisa baiyan len laugwan namcir . Anai len lemaimo areg asesa enin medoc mesero . Doba len laimo areg gecgu terimda . Hang sug en esa duhu debin len , kaba , en eigdoc Nuh an merug senggai dau duhu men gogom gin dous . Anai en , kaba , en emaimo len ingga an meren geicara gecgu touwero . Doba en esulou len , hanoba en ens dau areg asesa Allah enin medoc mes dou len touohob . Doba len lemaimo en an areg en esai dou len ginero .
61002006	Dara yen yecinaga dau sug leng se cinogo Sodom dara Gomora len lohw len meraga doum ucucugb terimda , kaba , dag Allah emamsoho len deb touwero . Doba en owun len meroho an gin . Hanoba en esa smougb dau bogaden naugb ait len laugwan merur mor namcir . Dangga hang , augwan gin , kaba , dag ansins dou leng laiga men hancob se lona daiyamo gacin len laugwan toua . Dauntoba sug len louman dau Allah men geicara gin , kaba , len lecinaga dag en emamsoho len an meren geicara gecgu gin deb touwero . Doba en emeic mor mor dou len icira gin toues .
61002007	Dara yen yecinaga dau Lud , kaba , dag en aimo areg asesa Allah enin medoc mesohob . Dangga hang , sug leng Sodom dara Gomora len lohw len meraga doum , dara len leic merus naugb len leicara laihagab Allah men gomnomna dag gin terimda , kaba , en medoc eijesa medam . Hang smougb emait en touwero . Doba Allah eigdoc en mena agau dau cinogo ingga namcir .
61002008	Anai sug sud hom gedag beim gini en eigtou se len merufu se cinogo ingga , kaba , en eiya , hanoba en ouman dau meren geicara gecgu gini astesda lona terimda . Hang emeic en medoc momogo medam dou en toua .
61002009	Sug Allah eicara dangga an leng graga len laugwan dag ginohob , kaba , gini ens ainyes dou maman dag men goubesa edeinyum naugb sug en eigdoc leng leicara edag beim dau gogom areg ainyen len .
